ESP.ORIGINAL: Both Holograms are on now. It's safe for you to get to your position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个全息影像都打开了。你可以放心就位了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one who knows how I got to the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你肯定知道我是怎么来到别墅区的咯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I know. Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013bea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every time I see one of you I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, anymore than Dog can help himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013bea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013bea_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's still out there, in the Wastes, preserved, just waiting for someone to crack it open. But getting to it. That's not the hard part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但它依然矗立在废土之上，完好无损，等着有人前来将它开启。只不过，找到它并非难事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The war froze it in time, like a big flashbulb going off. The Grand Opening - one big ending of humanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争将它凝结在了时间的长河之中， 仿佛一盏巨大的镁光灯突然熄灭。开业大典的当天，人类迎来了自己的结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except - the Sierra Madre never opened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而——马德雷山脉赌场从未开幕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A chance for anyone to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何人在这里都有机会重获新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ... but for all who came to its doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……也针对所有来到它门前的宾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The opening was supposed to symbolize a road to a brighter future, not just for the world...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这场庆典原本象征着一条通往未来的康庄大道，不只针对这个世界……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An invitation was a sign of... exclusiveness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能够受到邀请，就说明这个人必然……卓尔不群。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world's most famous stars and entertainers were invited to its Grand Opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全世界最著名的巨星和艺人都被邀请来参加它盛大的开业典礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These Ghost People... they're the only ones alive around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些鬼人…他们是这里唯一的活人了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I warned you to cooperate. Now I'll have to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我警告过你要相互合作的。现在我只能重新开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speakers and radios interfere with the bomb collar frequency, and can trigger the detonators... prematurely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收音机和扩音器的频率会干扰炸弹项圈，造成项圈……提前引爆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013FC3] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is an unfortunate side effect, one I did not anticipate. I was unable to calibrate the collars to block the signals - so you'll have to make do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾出现这样的副作用，完全在我的计划之外。我也没办法校准项圈来屏蔽多余的信号——所以你只能多加小心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013FC3] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get me here again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一遍，你是怎么带我来这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone asks that. Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都会问这个问题。你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013fc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013fc6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The chain ends with the super mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个连锁反应到那个超级变种人那里就结束了。不过对他来说…项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013fc6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... just calm down... there's no need to keep fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗...冷静下来…不必一直使用武力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... Dog no listen to you, no listen to your voice anymore - will tear you apart, feed on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...狗才不听你的，再也不听你的了——狗要撕碎你，吃了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are damaged speakers, and shielded ones... the damaged ones you can destroy at range - don't get close, you can't switch them off like a radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些喇叭是坏的，有些是带防护罩的...坏的你可以从远处开枪把它们打掉，但千万别靠近，你不能像关掉收音机一样关掉它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00014014_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you upset?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不难受吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've... done worse. Much worse... and for more hopeless causes, and I will again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更糟糕的事情…我都经历过。甚至比这次还绝望，但就算再有下次，我也义无反顾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013522_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是想要折磨你，他是想要改造你的声音，来解开一个声控锁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To the vault... of course. That makes sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开避难所的门锁……是啊，这下就清楚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001352a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An audio-lock to where? To the Sierra Madre vault. It's voice-activated. And he wanted in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声控锁？开哪儿的？马德雷山脉避难所的吗？原来它是声控的。他想进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001352b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That makes sense. So... those bodies in the Clinic... all right. Dean always felt like the odd one out, and he kept... studying me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就说得通了。所以…诊所里的那些尸体... 好吧。难怪我总觉得迪安这人神神叨叨的，他好像一直在…打量我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001352b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah didn't put you in the Auto-Doc... Dean did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你放进自动医生不是以利亚…是迪安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean? Dean Domino?
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安？迪安 ·多米诺？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would he want to torture me? If he wanted to do that, he could keep his singing career going... or keep staring at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他为什么要这样折磨我？ 他有这个兴趣，还不如继续他的歌唱事业…哪怕继续盯着我看也行啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013527_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you got off lucky?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你变成这样是万幸？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... I saw records of other "patients," and what had been done to them. Some couldn't hear anything but static. Others, just... gibbering wrecks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的…我看过其他“患者”的记录，他们的下场更凄惨。有些人除了电流音，什么都听不见。另一些人…变成了精神失常的怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013524_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never going back... and Elijah was on his way here, so I couldn't stop to see if it was something I could fix...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再回去了…可惜当时以利亚已经离开那里前往马德雷山脉了，所以我也来不及寻找治疗方法…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013524_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...if you can even fix what happened to me when they jabbed the electrodes into my skull and turned my head into a flashlight.
ESP.TRADUIT: …但一想到它们把电极插进我的头骨，将我的脑袋改造成了一个手电筒，我估计也没谁能治得了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013524_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I got here, and my voice got severed... now I have a new one. Another thing Elijah has to answer for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到了这里之后，我的声带又被切断了…好在现在我有了新的声音。这些事全都要算在以利亚头上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013524_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can the Auto-Doc heal your scars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生能治愈你的伤疤吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... they run a lot deeper than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…这些伤疤没这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013528_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I was hunting Elijah in the Big Empty, he trapped me in one of those medical research centers buried there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在大空山里追杀以利亚时，他把我关在了其中一间地下研究中心里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013529_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It... did something to my head... and I got off lucky. It's difficult enough to read now, and somehow the leap between what's in my head and words...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里…我的大脑被做了手脚…我变成现在这样已经是万幸了。我现在有严重的阅读障碍，感觉大脑和文字之间的联系已经被切断了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013529_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...it just ends up being a mish-mash of symbols, not letters. Can still do math, formulas, equations... writing poetry's out.
ESP.TRADUIT: …所有文字在我眼里只是一团乱麻。尽管我依旧可以做算术题，解方程式、等式……但写诗肯定是没戏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013529_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some questions I wanted to ask you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些问题要问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Just glad I can answer you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。现在我终于能直接回答你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001352c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can download off of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能从上面下载到什么有用的数据吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you got almost everything, not much more I can extract... "doctor."
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉你都下载完了，我也提取不出什么有用信息了……“大夫”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Not mocking at the end, she's impressed, means "doctor" as a casual compliment. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see... check the root, recent diagnostics...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试试... 查看根目录，近期的诊断记录...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013526_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of Med-X was dispensed for... Vera Keyes. Guess that's her corpse there for certain... and why all those meds are scattered around in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开了大量吗啡针给…薇拉·凯斯。所以坐着的那位肯定就是她了…也解释了为何地上散落着这么多吗啡针头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013526_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...here's the medical report. Looks like she had some sort of terminal condition... diagnosis isn't conclusive, must have been painful.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这是体检报告。 看起来她患了某种绝症…诊断结果并不明确。她一定非常痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013526_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not even sure she knew, if these medical reports are enough. She must have been numb most of the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这几份报告来看，我怀疑她甚至对此毫不知情。她的感官应该大部分时间都是麻木的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013526_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that Auto-Doc there work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个自动医生还能用么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, still functional. Lot of garbage data on it, its basic procedures should still work fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，依然能用。虽然里面有许多垃圾数据，但基础程序运转依然良好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, love is transitory - or ended in gunfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，爱情是短暂的，只会在争吵中结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand how important a loved one can be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白爱人有多重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods slowly, studying you. She seems to be gauging you again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她缓缓点头，打量着你，像是在重新审视你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She makes a slow circle motion after a moment, taps her wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [接着她慢慢做了个画圈的手势，又碰了一下自己的手腕。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a little credit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我有点信心呗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you think I don't understand love?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你觉得我不懂爱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She raises an eyebrow, looks at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她扬起眉毛，看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013636_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unrequited? Or...
ESP.TRADUIT: 单相思？还是...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head, draws the two fingers together, then shakes her head more emphatically.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇摇头，把两根手指并在一起，头摇得更厉害了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013652_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were more than girlfriends - lovers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们不仅是闺蜜——更是恋人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, and looks at you a little surprised.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，有些惊讶地看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013628_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh- girlfriend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦——闺蜜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013645_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh - girlfriend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦——闺蜜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013960_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, your wife?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是你妻子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head, but rolls it side to side.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她用力地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013644_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... boyfriend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃… 男朋友？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh - girlfriend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦——闺蜜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001395f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Family? Husband?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你的家人？丈夫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, shakes her head, and even more so at husband.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，摇了摇头，尤其听到“丈夫”这个词时，摇得更厉害了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He cut you off from someone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他拆散了你和另一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013647_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She repeats the chopping motion, slower, then draws the two fingers apart. She looks sadly at one of the fingers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她放慢了速度，重复了一遍劈砍的动作，然后把两根手指分开，伤心地看着其中一根手指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why would you waste time looking for him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干嘛要费这么大功夫找他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She frowns, raises two fingers, and has them walk together. Then she looks down on the two fingers, and her face becomes angry.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她皱着眉头，伸出两根手指，比出走路的动作。然后她看着这两根手指，神情突然变得愤怒。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013653_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then she chops her hand down, and draws the two fingers apart. One of the finger she points at herself.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她的另一只手猛劈下来，把两个手指分开，用其中一个指着自己。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013653_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like it's pretty important to you to find this person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来找到他对你来说很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She pauses, looks at you for a second, then shrugs and shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她停下来，看了你一眼，然后耸耸肩，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013654_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...还有点疯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱着眉，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那人很聪明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, then circles her ear.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，在耳旁画了个圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013635_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The man on the Pip-Boy holotape, Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是我哔哔小子录音里的那个人，以利亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were looking for a Vault Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找一个避难所小子?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again and makes a talking motion with her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，又指了指你的哔哔小子，做了个代表说话的手势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were looking for a man in a Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找一个避难所里的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她又摇了摇头，指了指你的哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013638_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An... angry, bearded... man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个…愤怒的，大胡子…男人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your Pip-Boy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指了指你的哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, looks concerned, taps the side of her head, and expands her hands.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，表情有些焦虑，她敲这侧边头，接着摊开双手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, someone alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，一个活人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or a woman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是个女人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head... then stops mid-way, frowns... then tilts her head, as if thinking. She seems lost in thought for a moment.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，又突然停下，皱起眉头，似乎想到了什么，就这样沉浸在了自己的思绪中。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013646_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She glances at you, as if caught, then she smiles slightly, but there's an edge to it. Then she shakes her head, slowly, once.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她瞥了你一眼，仿佛刚注意到你似的。随后她淡淡一笑，眼神中带着些许轻蔑。她慢慢地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013646_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods. She makes a motion with her hands around her chin, drawing it down, and then she raises her hands and clenches them at the sky.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，用双手捧着脸颊，又顺着脸颊向下伸展。随后她举起双手，握紧拳头，伸向天空。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013632_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head and pumps her fist near her chest.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇摇头，用拳头撞了一下胸口。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This charades shit is driving me crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再玩这种你比划我来猜的游戏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns and raises her middle finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱起眉头，甩了个中指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013649_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wherever you were, it was hot out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你在哪儿，感觉周围都热烘烘的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇摇头，翻了个白眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were looking for someone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找什么人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods and raises a finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头伸出一根手指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were... looking for something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在……找什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Shakes her head and makes a motion of two fingers walking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，用两根手指做了个走路的手势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013640_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were over the moon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你高兴得上天了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，翻了个白眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... we'll find a way to heal you, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…我一定会想办法治好你的，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She doesn't look at you, continues to stare darkly in front of her.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她没有理睬你，仍然阴郁地盯着前方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [After a moment, she glances at you, then taps the back of her wrist. She nods in front of her.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [过了一会儿，她又瞥向你，敲了敲手背，示意继续前进。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013626_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really need to relax. This entire place is a Pre-War paradise, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别搞得那么紧张嘛，放松点，毕竟这地方在战前可是旅游胜地啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you, surprised. Then she opens her mouth as if to laugh... silently.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她有些惊讶地看着你，然后她张开嘴，无声地大笑着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013629_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Almost as soon as she utters her silent laugh, she stops, looks pained, and her expression becomes dark.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [突然她停了下来，露出了痛苦的面容，表情也逐渐黯淡下去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013629_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A smile... now that's more like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于笑了…这还差不多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Still smiling, she rolls her eyes, and then slowly taps the back of her wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她翻了个白眼，仍然保持着微笑，然后她慢慢敲打手背。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you shaking and nodding for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一会儿摇头一会儿点头的是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [Her face wrinkles more, and then she gives a reluctant smile.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她的脸扭曲地更厉害了，不情愿地笑了笑。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013658_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, okay, I get it. <Nod slowly.> Better than finger snaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。好吧，我懂了。<慢慢点头>总比打响指好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她看起来有些失望，挥了挥手，似乎在赶你走。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013659_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things would be a lot easier if you did one snap for yes, two snaps for no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你敲一下代表同意，敲两下代表不同意，咱俩的交流会轻松很多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She smiles humorlessly. She then nods once slowly. Then she shakes her head slowly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她露出了一本正经的笑容。然后缓慢地点了一下头，又慢慢地摇了摇头]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then looks at you, her face wrinkled in a humorless smile.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [然后她看着你，那副冷峻的微笑让她的脸上现出了皱纹。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, be a bitch, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随你的便吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not the one trying to communicate with hand motions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要用手语交流的人又不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She gives you a snarl, glances at your collar, makes a dismissive wave.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她朝你怒吼一声，看了一眼你的项圈，挥了挥手，似乎在赶你走。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013637_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't protect the world from the world... it's useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界要毁灭，你也毫无办法啊……没用的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your collar, then hers, and shakes her head slowly... then cuts the air with her hand and her face becomes blank.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指指你和她的项圈，摇了摇头，手掌一挥，脸上没了表情。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013650_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're worried someone's going to find this place? Use it to hurt people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你担心有人会发现这里？然后利用这里去伤害别人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods slowly, hands still locked on her throat. She looks pained for a moment, and she breaks from your gaze.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她缓缓点头，手依然抓着脖子。她看起来有些痛苦，眼神逃离了你的视线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her fingers flutter, almost frantically, for a second, and she runs her hands along her scalp, then her throat - then the collar.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [突然间，她的手指开始狂乱地跳动着，拂过了头皮、喉咙，最后停在了项圈上。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013631_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your Pip-Boy, almost with frustration... then gestures all around her, and her shoulders seem to sag.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她沮丧地指着你的哔哔小子，胡乱做着手势，最后肩膀似乎也耷拉了下来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013631_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [After a moment, she glances back at you, glances around her, then shakes her head slowly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [过了一会儿，她看了你一眼，看了看周围，慢慢摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013631_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want to do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这么做?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you, as if surprised. Then glances at your collar, wrinkles her face, and points at it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看着你，表情显得有些惊讶。她瞥了一眼你的项圈，指了指它。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She makes a wide sweeping circle of the area, looking around... then brings both hands back to her, then to her neck, and holds it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她用手画了一个大大的圈，接着环顾四周……然后把手收回来，抓住了自己的脖子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her hands still on her neck, she looks at you gravely, then shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她一边牢牢地抓着脖子，一边用严肃的眼神看着你，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to... hunt here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想在这儿……打猎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks impressed, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她看起来很欣慰，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013660_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to kill something here, then protect this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这儿是为了杀掉某个人，同时保护这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她看起来有些失望，不以为然地摆了摆手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013661_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would you want to stay here of all places?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你想呆在这儿?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, makes a mock motion of loading a gun, then hefting it to her shoulder and taking aim at something in the distance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，做了个假装给枪上膛的手势，然后抬起手，好像在瞄准远处的某个东西。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then she pauses, makes a sweeping circle, then puts her arms in a circle around it, as if covering it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她停顿了一下，画出一个圆，又把手臂围成一圈，将那个圆包在了里面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you trying to break into the casino?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想要进入赌场吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're after the treasure then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是来寻宝的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, shakes her head... pauses... then tilts her head slightly, nods slowly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，摇了摇头，停顿了一下，然后轻轻歪着脑袋，缓缓点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013657_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren't going to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013655_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't you find your way back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么回不来?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She slowly shakes her head. She points at the ground, then moves each leg outward, straddling the place where she's pointing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她慢慢摇了摇头，指向地面，随后两腿向外，横跨在她手指的地方上面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013648_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods once.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013643_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...to return here if I leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我走了就回不来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... have no idea what you're saying. Again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…还是不知道你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She shakes her head, points at herself, then points at you, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她摇了摇头，指了指自己，又指了指你，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're saying it'll be difficult to return here if we leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说如果我们离开，就很难再回来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她看起来有些失望，不以为然地摆了摆手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013665_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So once the collars are gone, we can just leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么一旦项圈拿下来了，我们就能走了吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods slowly, as if thinking. Then she raises an eyebrow, looks skeptical, then shrugs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她若有所思地点点头，随后扬起眉毛，似乎显得有些怀疑，又耸了耸肩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points downwards, makes a circle around her, then back to the same spot... and then her finger drifts, circling, and she makes a mock-frown.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她用手在自己身边画了个圈，最后回到原点…接着她假装皱着眉头，开始漫无目的地划圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001362d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how to get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道要怎么离开这里么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points in the direction of the main gate. Then points at your collar, shakes her head, and locks her hands around her neck.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指了指大门的方向，又指了指你的项圈，摇了摇头，用她双手掐住自己的脖子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then her hands lash outwards, fingers splayed and she rolls her eyes back. After a second she turns back to you shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [然后她的双手向外摆动，五指张开，翻了个白眼。过了一会，她又转过来看着你，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you'd want to stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢相信，你居然想呆在这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not going to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不想走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying it's one or the other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底指的是这儿，还是那儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns. Glances in the direction of the casino, then the exit, then back in the direction of the casino.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，分别朝赌场和出口看了一眼，最后看向赌场的方向。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013651_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shrugs... without strength or conviction. She isn't looking at you when she does.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她有气无力地耸了耸肩，眼睛并没有再看向你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013651_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? What about you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？那你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She slowly shakes her head, then points at the ground.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她慢慢摇了摇头，指着地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I could leave, I would.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然也想离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you for a moment, glances at your collar, shrugs. She then lightly grabs her neck with both hands, holds it for a moment.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她盯着你看了一会儿，又朝你的项圈瞥了一眼，耸耸肩，然后用两只手抓住自己的脖子，握了好一会儿。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then her hands fall away. She looks at you, looks at the exit and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [随后她放开了手，看着你，又朝出口点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't even tell you why, I just... did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也说不出原因，我就是……想来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking to start life as a Prospector, figured this place was a good place to start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想当一名淘金客，感觉可以先来这儿碰碰运气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, puts her hands on her hips and glares at you. After a second, she rolls her eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱起眉头，叉着腰看着你，随后翻了个白眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013634_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then makes a mocking, slow intake of breath, and then winces. Then she glances at you, points in the direction of main gate.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她深吸了一口气，表情颇为嘲讽。随后她往后退了一步，瞥了你一眼，指了指大门的方向。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013634_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought I may have stumbled on an Old World treasure cache.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为来这儿兴许能发现什么旧世界的宝藏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needed supplies, thought it might lead me somewhere interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想搜刮点物资，心想着也许到了这地方能有所收获。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I was curious where it led.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我只是好奇它的来源。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you for a second, studying you. Then nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看了你一眼，琢磨着。然后点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013639_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at you, then points at the casino, and she slowly shakes her head - then points in the direction of the main gate.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指向你，又指向赌场，然后慢慢摇了摇头，最后指向大门的方向。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013639_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Raise an eyebrow back.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <扬起眉毛回应。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Almost against her will, she smiles. After a moment, the smile fades, and she points at the ground again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她极不情愿地笑了笑。过一会儿，她的笑容消失了，她又指着地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013662_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关你的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shrugs, then taps the back of her palm in the direction of the Fountain.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她耸耸肩，朝着喷泉的方向敲敲手背。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shrugs, then taps the back of her palm, pointing West and down.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她耸耸肩，敲敲手背，指向西方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Followed a radio signal here, a woman's voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着一个广播信号来的，一个女人的声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She waits. After a second, she raises her eyebrow again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她仔细聆听着，随后再次扬起了眉毛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001365d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……没明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她笑着点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to know how I got here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我是怎么到这儿的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She makes a mock sigh.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她嘲弄地叹了口气。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you circle the area, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这地方画了一个圈，还是…?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What about my feet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的脚怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She repeats the circling motion again. This time, she lowers her hand and circles her finger inward, until she's pointing at the spot between you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她重复了一遍画圈的动作。这次她放低一只手，手指向内弯曲，最后停在你和她之间。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Still pointing at the ground between you two, she raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她扬起眉毛，手指依然冲着你们俩中间的地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001363d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... wait, you're acting like you don't trust me or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你这意思是不信任我咯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She continues to look at you for a moment, studying you, then her eyes fall to your collar, then your Pip-Boy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她又看了你一会儿，审视着你，随后她的眼神落到了你的项圈和哔哔小子上。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She glances back up at you, then she circles herself and points at the ground between you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她抬起头盯着你，然后围绕自己身边画了个圈，最后指向了你们俩之间的地面。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001364f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I had something to do with this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我和这件事有关？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't bring you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓你来的人不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you for a moment, studying you. She doesn't move. After a second or two, she frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她站在原地，似乎在审视你。过了一会儿，然她皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013641_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, glances at your feet, then nods. She then raises an eyebrow, points at you, makes a circle, then points at your feet.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱着眉头，看向你的脚，然后点点头。她抬起眉毛，指着你，画了个圈，然后指着你的脚。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013642_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you get gassed like I did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我一样吸入毒气了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were knocked out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被打昏了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods. She raises an eyebrow, points at you, makes a circle, then points at your feet.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点头，扬起一只眉毛，指向你画了个圈，然后指着你的脚。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013656_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... back to the Suites. And we'll sing the lock open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...回到套房去。我们用歌声把锁打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through main lobby speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro. Set speaker to Elijah for safety.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013673_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have the last fragment, that is all I need. Now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了最后一个片段。这样就都齐了。接下来…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through main lobby speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro. Set speaker to Elijah for safety.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013674_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the main lobby terminal, thread the music sequence together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到门厅的终端那里去，把音乐片段拼接到一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through main lobby speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro. Set speaker to Elijah for safety.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013675_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another fragment... good. Almost have the entirety of what I need from the music archives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一个片段…很好。我要的档案马上就要全部到手了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you have the last fragment, you can thread the archives together at the main floor terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你拿到最后一个片段，你就可以利用大厅里的终端把所有档案拼接在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013671_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you have the last fragment, you can thread the archives together at the main floor terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你拿到最后一个片段，你就可以利用大厅里的终端把所有档案拼接在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotten one of the floors re-established, good... accessing the music archives now. Two more to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经修好了这层楼的系统，很好…我现在接入音乐档案库。还差两个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013672_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... it seems the casino has uninvited guests... the Villa inhabitants were pounding at the doors - now they've found a way inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...看来有不速之客光临赌场了...别墅区的居民在撞门——它们找到进来的方法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013672_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with them - and don't try and leave yourself, or I'll let the collar do its work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉它们，别想逃跑，不然我就用项圈解决你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahca_00013672_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... it seems the casino has uninvited guests... the Villa inhabitants were pounding at the doors - now they've found a way inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦...看来有不速之客光临赌场了...别墅区的居民在撞门——它们找到进来的方法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with them - and don't try and leave yourself, or I'll let the collar do its work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉它们，别想逃跑，不然我就用项圈解决你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch out for the Villa inhabitants, they're... difficult to kill unless you chop them apart... if you can, blow them up or disintegrate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心别墅区里的居民，它们很难被杀死，除非将它们肢解…有办法就炸烂它们，或者用能量武器把它们熔掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013775_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outside, you may notice your vision'll pulse, get dizzy. It's the Cloud. Eats your insides, slowly. Too much exposure, death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在户外时，你可能会感到视线模糊。这是由于毒云的影响，它在慢慢侵蚀你。如果暴露太久会致命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013777_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Villa's comm speakers have aged poorly, like the Madre. Pre-War junk. The speakers emit a signal that'll set off your collar if you stay too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区的扩音喇叭老化得很严重，赌场里的也一样。战前的垃圾就是不中用。如果你停留得太久，喇叭发出的信号就会引爆你的项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013773_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picking up signals near your location. Detonators. Watch for traps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 探测到你附近有信号源。是引爆器。小心陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013776_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the Salida del Sol gate alone. You're not done with the Villa yet, so don't stray.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先别管日出镇。别墅区的事情还没完，不要开小差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_0001377a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't go through the gate to Puesta del Sol yet - gather the others first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还没必要进入日落镇——先去集合其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013772_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This gate to the Sierra Madre's sealed, locked. For now. Do as I say, and it won't be locked for much longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往马德雷山脉的大门锁住了。不过只是暂时的，只要你照我说的做，不久之后它就能打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013779_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the way out - after you break into the Sierra Madre's vault. Try to leave, I'll set off your collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是出口，不过你得先打开马德雷山脉赌场的金库。想跑，我就引爆你的项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013774_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn speakers at end of hall - red light means they're shielded. Must be a way to shut them off somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走廊尽头有几个该死的喇叭——闪着红灯，说明它们有防护罩。一定有办法在别处关掉它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013786_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picking up an emitter signature - watch for security Holograms, dangerous. Don't shoot them - attacking them is useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 探测到全息投影仪信号——小心全息保安，很危险。不要对它们开火——武器对它们一点用也没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_00013787_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear the event firing off. Now get to the main gate of the Sierra Madre, quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到盛世庆典启动的声音了。现在马上到赌场大门去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get there soon or the doors will seal, and you'll be trapped outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动作快点，不然大门一关上，你就会被困在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get there soon or the doors will seal, and you'll be trapped outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 动作快点，不然大门一关上，你就会被困在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_0001401f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the mute down the elevator and into the Manual Override Chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带那个哑巴下电梯，进入手动控制室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There - the Switching Station. That's where you'll need to bring the mute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是那儿了——开闭所。你要把那个哑巴带过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're at the Ghoul's Gala area... now, make him stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经到达那个尸鬼该去的地方了…想办法让他待在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bell tower. That's where you'll trigger the Gala Event. It's a ways up. I'm sure you'll find a way to climb up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钟楼，盛世庆典的操作台就在那里，你得爬到顶楼去，你应该能找到路上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once you get near the top... look for a ladder. It's easy to miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你快到顶楼的时候…注意找一架梯子。比较不起眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once you get near the top... look for a ladder. It's easy to miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你快到顶楼的时候…注意找一架梯子。比较不起眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're at one of the Gala locations, you'll need to bring the mutant here. Only he has the strength to operate the levers, I've found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经抵达了启动盛世庆典的关键地点，你得把那个变种人带过来。只有他有足够的力气扳动这里的开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([0100F3F7]NVDLC01ElijahBarkTown) Elijah Signal Established EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahba_000137ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods at you, then the Ghost Person on the ground, makes a neck-chopping motion.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀向你点点头，示意你看向倒在地上的鬼人，做了一个扭断脖子的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000137da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not dead... it's a trick. Get an axe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没死…是装的。找把斧头来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013821_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better make sure he's dead. Poke him with a stick or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好确定他死透了再走。拿根棍子什么的戳他一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000137d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be a back entrance to the kitchen - check the main casino side corridors. Find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 厨房一定有后门——检查一下赌场中心的侧面走廊，找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_0001384e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry up and deal with the FEV reject, he's of no use to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快去解决掉那个FEV病毒的残次品，他对我们已经没用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "FEV" is Forced Evolutionary Virus acronym, Elijah should say it flippantly, like everyone should know what it is. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_00013852_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that Ghoul's still alive... correct that. Or break him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是那个尸鬼还活着…干掉他，或者让他屈服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013857] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahth_0001384a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Floor's buzzing with emitter signatures. Watch out for Holograms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这层楼里到处是发生器的信号，当心全息影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013856] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahsu_0001384d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the mute and deal with her. She's somewhere on this floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到那个哑巴，干掉她。她应该就藏在这层楼里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013856] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahsu_00013851_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your collar's ticking. Get out of that floor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的项圈在响！快离开这层楼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013856] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahsu_00013854_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door to the vault is voice-activated. Which means we need the starlet's voice. Or recordings of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往避难所的大门是声控的。我们必须借用那个女明星的声音，播放她的录音应该也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013856] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahsu_0001384f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator to the casino vault is locked, find a way to open it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入避难所的电梯被锁上了。想办法打开它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013856] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahsu_00013853_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out, before your collar blows!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快出去，不然项圈就要爆炸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_0001384c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the door before the collar explodes, move!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快跑向大门 ！不然项圈就要爆炸了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013857] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahth_00013850_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, deal with the Ghoul. This has gone on long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在去干掉那个尸鬼吧。已经拖得够久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013857] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahth_00013855_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Door's sealed. Must be a key to the backstage. Hunt for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门封住了。后台一定有配套的钥匙，找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013857] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahth_0001384b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get here from the Gala Event? And onto this floor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么离开盛世庆典现场的？又是怎么来到这层的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up - thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 庆典仪式结束后，开闭所的门就打开了。本以为自动医生的噪音已经很吵了，没想到开闭所里的更甚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got outside, saw the light show, and it was enough to make me run to the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚走到外面，就看到了满天的焰火，于是赶紧冲向赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013880_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also... it seemed like the lights and speakers were helping to guide me... guess your master wanted a back-up in case you died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且…感觉那些灯光和喇叭在指引我…看来你的主子担心你会挂掉，特意留了后手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013880_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for being assigned to this floor... maybe it's because of my new voice. Your guess is as good as mine. Maybe it recognized me as a guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于被安排到这一层…也许是因为我现在的声音吧。我也不知道，可能它把我当成贵宾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013880_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get to the main gate? Then get here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进入大门，又怎么来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up - thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 庆典仪式结束后，开闭所的门就打开了。本以为自动医生的噪音已经很吵了，没想到开闭所里的更甚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013881_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got outside, saw the light show, and it was enough to make me run to the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚走到外面，就看到了满天的焰火，于是赶紧冲向赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013881_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also... it seemed like the lights and speakers were helping to guide me... guess your master wanted a back-up in case you died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且…感觉那些灯光和喇叭在指引我…看来你的主子担心你会挂掉，特意留了后手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013881_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for being assigned to this floor... maybe it's because of my new voice. Your guess is as good as mine. Maybe it recognized me as a guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我被安排到这一层…也许是因为我现在的声音吧。我也不知道，可能它把我当成贵宾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013881_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get from the Gala Event to here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么从盛世庆典的现场来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? I was halfway off the rooftop, through the service tunnel and bee-lining for the gate before the light show started...
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯光秀开始前，我就已经跑下了屋顶，穿过隧洞，准备冲向赌场大门了…
