ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013888_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and before Vera finished her Gala speech... I knew what'd happen with "music" in the streets and lights in the sky... Ghost People. Lots of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: …在薇拉的演讲结束前…我就已经知道这满大街的“锣鼓喧天”和火树银花会带来什么后果…鬼人会如潮水一般涌来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013888_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that was your problem. Anyway, front gate was open, no way I was letting you get in first. I walk in... there's a flash... and I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这事与我无关，反正大门已经开了，我可不能让你比我先到。于是我就走了进去…然后眼前一道白光闪过…醒来后我就到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013888_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must have been Sinclair's security... he always had a thing about letting any threats into the casino. Security system's twitchy that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想必是辛克莱的安保系统干的好事…他这人老是千方百计地想把一切危险都隔绝在赌场之外。安保系统在这方面实在有些过于敏感了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013888_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, though, I'm a guest here, so I guess I got the royal treatment after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，现在我已经是这里的贵宾啦，看来我还是受到了优待的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013888_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get from the Gala Event to here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么从盛世庆典的现场来到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was already was halfway off the rooftop, through the service tunnel and making a break for the gate before the light show started...
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯光秀开始前，我就已经跑下了屋顶，穿过隧洞，准备冲向赌场大门了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013887_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and before Vera finished her Gala speech... I knew what'd happen with "music" in the streets and lights in the sky... Ghost People. Lots of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: …在薇拉的演讲结束前…我就已经知道这满大街的“锣鼓喧天”和火树银花会带来什么后果…鬼人会如潮水一般涌来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013887_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also meant the front gate was open, and no way was I missing it after all these years. Then... I walk in... and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，大门也会打开。这么多年了，我可不能错过这个机会。于是我走了进去…然后……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013887_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in control. The Master won't help Dog now... and it won't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在自己做主。主人现在帮不到狗……也帮不到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Ignoring the player's Pip-Boy audio message. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001388c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not listen, Dog out of cage now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不听，狗离开笼子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Ignoring the player's Pip-Boy audio message. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001388d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have the key in there, the "Old Man" can order Dog to open the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有钥匙，那个"糟老头"可以直接命令狗打开笼子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let him spot you! If he does, talk him down before he has a chance to ignite the gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让他看到你！如果被发现了，就想办法说服他，不要让他有机会点燃煤气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_000138a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut off the gas valves, or that idiot'll kill us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关掉煤气阀门，不然那个蠢货会害死我们所有人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_000138a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That idiot's opened the gas valves! A single spark - or he sets off his collar, the casino's going to burn. Us along with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个蠢货打开了煤气阀门！只要一丁点火花，或者他脖子上的项圈爆炸，整个赌场就都完了。他这是要和我们同归于尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [01013858] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahki_000138a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What weapons are you good at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你擅长什么武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is better at the baser instincts than I... I merely have the brain for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗在生存本能方面比我强...我基本什么都不擅长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000138d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His sinew and muscle are difficult to move consciously... he's always hungry, clumsy, heavy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很难有意识地去控制他的关节和肌肉…因为他总是很饿，体态很笨拙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000138d8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What weapons are you good at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你擅长什么武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog good at punching... hitting people with metal bear jaw until they go quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗擅长用拳头打人…拿铁质的熊夹子，打到他们没声音为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000138d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog sometimes pick up club when thing need to hit is big, need to punch in many places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果对手个头大，狗就会捡根棒子，因为要揍的地方多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000138d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What weapons are you skilled with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你擅长什么武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not one for fighting if we can avoid it. Still, wasn't bad at the pistol range and over the years, I've learned how to handle a knife...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最擅长避免与他人争斗。不过，我的手枪枪法还可以，这些年，我也学会了如何耍刀……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000138d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and explosives a bit. A bit. Made a lot of mistakes along the way. Still have my fingers, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...炸药也会一点。一点而已。虽然犯过不少错，但我至少没有缺胳膊少腿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000138d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, is that all? Guess that'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，就这些啊？还行，勉强能打吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She makes a disapproving frown, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她不以为然地皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like you've been well-trained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来受过很全面的训练。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shrugs slightly, then waits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她轻轻耸了耸肩，等待着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Energy Weapons, Explosives, Melee, Unarmed, and Guns. Is that all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能量武器，炸药，冷兵器，格斗，还有枪械。这不就是十八般武艺样样精通？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods. Once.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点了一下头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What weapons are you skilled at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你擅长什么武器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine draws a jagged lightning bolt in the air, pantomimes throwing a grenade, and then pulls an imaginary knife from behind her back.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀比划了一个拉枪栓的动作，又做出了一个扔手雷的动作，然后假装从背后抽出一把刀。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then she moves her feet shoulder width apart, holds hands up in a martial arts stance, then turns both hands into pistols, pantomimes rapid-firing.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [接着她双脚分开，与肩齐平，握紧双手，摆出了武术的架势，又将两只手比成手枪，用哑剧的风格表演快速射击。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then holds one pistol up, takes aim as if sighting along the barrel and does a single shot, ends with a nod.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她抬起其中一支手，仿佛在用眼睛顺着枪管瞄准，她假装开了一枪，并点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000138da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always in the mood for another drink. What's the recipe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就喜欢无事小酌一杯。这东西的配方是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds... interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来...很有趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, well done... now, for the festivities, and your parts in all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，干得不错……那么接下来，就该说说庆典仪式，以及你们几个的分工了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahac_00013b01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The owner of the Sierra Madre... for whatever reason... keyed the Grand Opening to the Gala Event itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场的主人……不知出于什么原因……将赌场的开业仪式与“盛世庆典”绑定在了一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahac_00013b01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It needs to be fired off in order for the casino doors to open. As I've discovered, one person can't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要打开赌场大门，就必须先启动这个盛世庆典。而我发现，这件事单凭一个人是做不到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahac_00013b01_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, get your team in position indicated on your Pip-Boy, then trigger it properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你要带着队友，到哔哔小子地图上标记的地方，再用合适的方法启动仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so close now, don't let me down. Otherwise, I'll have to rely on the next team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离成功只有一步之遥了，别让我失望。否则，我就只能指望下一支队伍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahac_00013b01_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need me to do now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gather the three others needed for this job, return them here. After that, I'll have more instructions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把其他三个能完成这项任务的人找到，带他们到这里。之后，我会给你们进一步的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the others to their positions to trigger the Gala Event. After that, the doors of the Sierra Madre should open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将他们带去各自的位置，启动盛世庆典。之后，马德雷赌场的大门就会开启。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will exposure kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 暴露的话会让我丧命吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... while it will erode your health, it will only bring you to the point of death, no farther. At that point...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……虽然它会逐渐损害你的身体， 但它不会直接杀死你，只会让你命悬一线。到时候……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The air here is lethal only if you enter concentrated pockets of the Cloud. Too long inside one, you'll die, so be careful where you step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不钻进浓密的毒云里，这里的空气就不至于致死。在浓雾里待太久是会没命的，所以，前进时一定要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen some survive concentration of the Cloud for short periods of time if healthy enough - others were too weak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过某些身体强壮的人，在浓雾里还能坚持一小段时间，但身体虚弱的人恐怕就没这样的好运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rebreathers, chemical suits... there is no protection against it, it decays all it touches. I've found fighting it useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论呼吸器还是防护服……任何措施都无法抵御它们，凡是接触过它的东西都会被腐蚀。我试过各种方法，都没有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的装备在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre has many... defenses, means of screening guests for illicit or dangerous items. Your arrival here, weaponless, was not my intention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场配备了一套相当复杂的……安保系统，其中就包括检查来客身上是否有携带违禁品或有害物品。所以你才会手无寸铁来到这里，这并不是我的本意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Casino, this Villa... it takes anything with even a trace of radioactivity, traces of unknown substances... and returns it home. The bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个赌场，这片别墅区…但凡发现来宾身上的东西带有一丝核辐射或是不明成份…就会将它们没收，寄回原址，也就是地堡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The process is automated, and the casino itself has other, similar "services." I was unable to find a workaround, except to send others in as tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一过程是全自动的，赌场里也有许多类似的"服务"。我找不到变通的手段，只能想办法把人当成工具送进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is my vision blurring?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我眼前雾蒙蒙的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is the Cloud covering the Villa. The longer you are outside, the more its toxins seep into your system... through the lungs and the skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是因为笼罩着别墅区的毒云影响了你的视线。你在户外逗留得越久，就会有越多毒素通过呼吸道和皮肤…渗入你的体内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will eat at you the longer you are outside... so wherever you go, move fast, or you'll soon find yourself too weak to move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间越长，你受到的伤害也就越严重...所以不管去哪儿，动作一定要快，否则用不了多久，你就会连腿都抬不起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is the Cloud that surrounds the Villa. It shouldn't prove lethal in the time you are here... prolonged exposure would be hazardous, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是因为笼罩着别墅区的毒云影响了你的视线。虽然你待的时间不长，吸入的毒素并不足以致命…但持续暴露在这样的空气中，也会对身体有害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fall asleep... and you will not wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 千万别睡着…否则你可能再也醒不过来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anyone alive around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿还有活人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... the inhabitants... avoid them if you can, they are difficult to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的…这里有不少本地住民…尽量避开它们。它们很难被彻底杀死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever has created them, bullets, explosions, energy... it can make them inert for a time, then they seem to crawl back up, restored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道它们是怎么变成那幅模样的，无论子弹、炸药还是能量武器…都只能最多延缓它们的行动，就算它们倒下，过一会儿也能再度爬起来，恢复原状。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps it's the Cloud... perhaps something in their physiology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是毒云…改变了它们的生理构造。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a21_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did I get here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是怎么到这儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I brought you here. There are mechanisms in place once the traps across the Mojave are sprung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我把你抓来的。一旦有人掉进了遍布在莫哈维各地的陷阱，我就会用相应的手段把他送来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, your sole focus should be the Sierra Madre, and how to get inside. Until then, you won't leave alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼下，你唯一该关心的就是如何进入马德雷山脉赌场。在达成目标前，我不会让你活着离开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfamiliar with the legend of the Sierra Madre? The casino exists. You are one of the few who look upon it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然不知道马德雷山脉赌场的传说？这赌场是真实存在的，而你是少数能够亲眼见到它的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where you're standing is the Villa beneath the casino above. The wreckage... the Villa... lies in the shadow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在所处的地方就是位于赌场山脚下的别墅区。这片遗迹…别墅区…鲜有人问津。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Villa is a dumping ground of failed construction... Pre-War junk that has aged poorly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区里散落着许多破败的建筑…都是战前建造的豆腐渣工程，风化得十分严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a19_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题想问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am short on patience. And you are short on time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的耐心不多，你的时间也不多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. When player awakes in Villa, Elijah hologram materializes and speaks. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not helping you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不会帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you are of no use to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你对我没有用处了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you came into the bunker, you saw a victim, their head blown off for disobedience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进地堡时，应该看见过一具尸体吧，那个人就是一个因为拒绝服从命令而被炸掉了脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The city is filled with other stories, many such stories. Is "no" your choice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样的例子在这镇上比比皆是，你确定要说"不"吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That structure you see above the Fountain - the Sierra Madre Casino... you need to break inside. A... heist. Too many years in the making.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到喷泉上方那个建筑了吗——马德雷山脉赌场...我要你闯进去，执行一场……抢劫。我策划了很多年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to get inside, avoid its traps... you'll need to gather the team. As I've found, one cannot do it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过想要进到里面，避开各种机关...你还需要一支团队。以我的经验，单凭一个人是做不到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Around the Villa are three other collars like yours - Collar 8, 12, and 14. Find all three and get them here, to the Fountain. Then, we'll talk more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在别墅区周围，有三个像你一样戴着项圈的对象——8号，12号和14号。你要先找到这三个人，把他们带到喷泉这里来，我们再谈下一步计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And should you get any ideas about killing each other and taking the treasure of the Sierra Madre for yourself - a warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们企图自相残杀，或者独吞马德雷山脉的宝藏——那么我有言在先：
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: All your collars are linked... one of you dies, you all die. If that's what it takes to make you cooperate, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们几个人的项圈是连在一起的...一人死，全都死。我也是迫于无奈才这么做的，希望你们能好好合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a26_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collar? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 项圈？你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like that Pip-Boy on your wrist, except filled with explosives. A little radio of the Old World, just needed some tuning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它和你手腕上的哔哔小子很相似，只不过里面塞满了炸药。这是旧世界遗留下来的无线电设备，我只是略微做了些改进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what I say, and the collar won't go off... refuse, try and run, disobey me? I'll kill you and find someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要听我的话，项圈就不会爆炸……如果你拒绝、试图逃跑，或者违抗我的命令，我就会杀了你，再找其他人来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no escape from here until I let you go. The sooner you accept your situation, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我点头，否则你休想逃出这里。我建议你还是趁早接受这个事实吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you listening? Good. From now on, when I talk, listen - and follow my instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听得见吗？很好，从现在开始，我说话的时候，你得给我认真听——并且严格照我吩咐的去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahin_00013a22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play stupid, play clever, make the mistake of saying "no?" That collar on your neck'll go off and take your head with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是敢装傻充愣，耍花招，或者胆敢说个"不"字，你脖子上的项圈就会立刻爆炸，让你脑袋开花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahin_00013a22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I needed to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道的就是这些了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. If necessary, I will guide you through the Villa's broadcast systems - if you get lost, return here, and I'll direct you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。如有必要，我会通过别墅区的广播系统来引导你。如果你迷路了，就回到这里，我会给你指明方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've downloaded instructions on an audio log to your Pip-Boy in case you can't read... if you forget why you're here, let my voice remind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了避免你不识字，我已经把刚才的指令转成了音频文件，上传到了你的哔哔小子里了…如果你忘了该干什么，就让我的语音来提醒你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then go. The Sierra Madre may wait... I will not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧。马德雷山脉也许可以等你…但我可等不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are these people I'm gathering?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要集结的这些人都是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One is a trusted ally... obedient, collar or no, although the collar helps. The other two... well, we'll have to see what the traps caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一人是个可信的同伴…他很听话，无论戴没戴项圈都一样，虽然戴着更好。至于另外两个人……嗯，那就得看落入我陷阱的都是什么货色了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. So find the other three people with bomb collars, bring them back here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。所以只要找到其他三个戴着炸弹项圈的人，把他们带回这里就行了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've downloaded the instructions and markers on your Pip-Boy... in case you forget. And yes, I have access to that device on your wrist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把指令和路标传到你的哔哔小子上了…免得你忘记。别太惊讶，我确实可以直接访问你手腕上的那个装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the other three here, after that... I'll have more instructions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把其他三个人带回来，然后…我会给你进一步指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do this, I'll let you go. I'll let all of you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要乖乖听话，我就放了你，和其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radios and speakers can set off my collar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 收音机和扩音器喇叭会引爆我的项圈？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. But not immediately. You'll hear a beep from your collar's detonator - when you do, step back, scan the area, and find the signal source.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。但不会立刻引爆。 项圈的引爆器会先发出刺耳的警报声，如果你听到这种声音，一定要赶快后退，然后再搜索整片区域，找到信号的来源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are damaged speakers, and shielded ones... the damaged ones you can destroy at range - don't get close, you can't switch them off like a radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些喇叭是坏的，有些是带防护罩的...坏的你可以从远处开枪把它们打掉，但千万别靠近，你不能像关掉收音机一样关掉它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The damaged speakers are sparking, ha... hard to miss. The casings are resistant to vandalism - punching or hitting them will not destroy them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些破损的喇叭通常会冒火星，所以……容易辨别。它们的外壳采用了防暴材料，普通的拳打脚踢是砸不烂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radios and speakers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 收音机和喇叭？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, music was intended to be broadcast all over the Villa... over time, however, the radio signal has decayed and emits a different frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，本来它们的作用是在别墅区里播放音乐……但过了这么长时间，信号衰减，频率也发生了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speakers and radios interfere with the bomb collar frequency, and can trigger the detonators... prematurely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收音机和喇叭的频率会干扰炸弹项圈，导致项圈……提前引爆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is an unfortunate side effect, one I did not anticipate. I was unable to calibrate the collars to block the signals - so you'll have to make do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾出现了这样的副作用，完全在我的计划之外。但我也没办法校准项圈来屏蔽多余的信号——你只能自己多加小心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a32_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you speaking to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是用什么方法和我说话的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confused? Don't be. I'm commandeering the hologram technology of the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感到困惑吗？大可不必。我使用的是别墅区里的全息影像科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Numbers, equations, circuits... all can be controlled, provided there's a connection, and the knowledge to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数据、方程、电路……只要它们之间存在联系，掌握了相应的知识，我就可以操控它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Villa, the casino... a treasure trove of such devices. The Holograms included.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个别墅区，这个赌场…汇聚了无数类似的装置，其中就包括了全息影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone who followed the call of the Sierra Madre, just as you did. Now that I've found it's more than a story... I intend to take what's inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个听从了马德雷山脉赌场召唤的人，和你一样。我发现这里不只是个传说……所以我打算取走这里的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's why you came. Why you followed the Pip-Boy here... and straight into one of my traps. Now, this is your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能你也抱着同样的目的吧。你跟随哔哔小子的指引……一头栽进了我设下的陷阱。而你现在的处境，就是你的奖赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a33_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any place safe to rest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有可以安全休息的地方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anywhere sheltered from the Cloud... inside buildings, tunnels... any place not exposed to the outside air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要是能避开毒云的地方都可以…无论建筑物内部…或是隧道…反正别暴露在户外就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything the Cloud has touched has preserved it one way or another... but only the Holograms in the Villa truly remain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凡是被毒云碰到的东西，都会被腐蚀成类似标本的形态…但这里真正能称得上保存完好的，也只有别墅区里的全息影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a31_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What Holograms are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的全息影像到底是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The inhabitants? There's people alive here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民？这里还有活人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the Vending Machines in the Villa?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区里的自动售货机是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assembly stations. Schematics are stored within... dispensers with unlock codes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是一种自动生产装置。它内置了各类物品的蓝图…需要相应的兑换代码才能解锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They use the Chips scattered around as batteries... alloys and raw material embedded in the shell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 散落在别墅区周围的筹码就是它们的电池……合金和原料已经提前封装在机器里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a6b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They resemble the vending machines of the Mojave, but they are crafting devices of tremendous versatility. Once an Old World convenience, now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们虽然外表类似莫哈维废土的自动售货机，但它们能生产的物品种类却十分繁多。曾经在旧世界是个不错的便民装置，如今...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a6b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...now, they are a means of survival. Use the Chips to power them. Select from the holographic display, the device will assemble it.
ESP.TRADUIT: …如今，它将成为你赖以生存的工具。你只要用筹码给它们充能，通过全息屏选择你想要的物品，机器就会自动进行组装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a6b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the Cloud?
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒云是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Cloud is what blankets the sky here... you may smell it in the air, copper and sulfur... burns the lungs and seeps into the skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒云就是这里铺天盖地的红雾……你应该能闻到吧，一股铜锈和硫磺的气息……它会灼烧人的肺部，渗进人的皮肤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for its origins... I am not certain. Pre-War industrial pollutants... something in the Sierra Madre structure...
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于它的来源……我不清楚。也许是战前的工业污染…也许是马德雷山脉赌场建筑里的某样东西…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is unique across the wasteland... and deadly. It has kept this place preserved since the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放眼整个废土，也只有这里存在着如此独特……而致命的物质。赌场正是依靠它才能核战之后屹立数百年不倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a75_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Holograms in the Villa?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我别墅区里的全息影像是怎么回事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most Holograms perform specific functions. The Security Holograms, ever since the bombs fell, now perform their function.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数全息影像都有其特定用途。全息保安自从核弹落下之后，就一直在履行自己的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will kill anyone they detect. They are immune to guns, weapons, EMPs... even energy weapons. Still, they have limitations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们会射杀侦测到的一切活物。而且它们刀枪不入，EMP也奈何不了它们……甚至能量武器都不行。但是，它们也有弱点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their design limits their field of view, enough to avoid detection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于设计原因，它们的视野范围十分狭窄，你完全可以躲开它们的侦测。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a68_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Each has an emitter - destroy or disable it, and they cease to be a threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并且每个影像都有一个对应的投影仪，只要摧毁或者关掉投影仪，它们就构不成威胁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a68_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... at least they still work as intended. Other technology here is more of a threat to you... notably, the Villa's radios and speakers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但话说回来…至少它们的工作情况还算正常。那些坏掉的设备对你的威胁其实更大…尤其是别墅区里的收音机和扬声喇叭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a68_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are these Holograms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些全息影像是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghosts... they fill the Villa. More in the Casino... much more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是幽灵…它们在别墅区里随处可见。赌场里的数量……更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They carry out the functions the dead once did. They cannot be harmed... they only perform the same rote tasks until their power dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们会顶替那些死去的人执行原本的工作。它们不会受伤...只会机械地重复单一的动作，直到油尽灯枯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are of no consequence - except for the Security Holograms, the ones with the silhouettes of the armored Sierra Madre guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用不着担心它们……全息保安除外，就是那些穿着马德雷山脉赌场原本警卫服的影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's FEV?
ESP.TRADUIT: FEV病毒是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A long story. FEV... a virus with an even longer story... it gave birth to the docile one, turned him into a Super Mutant long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就说来话长了。FEV…这个病毒的历史比它的名字还要悠久…总之，很久以前，是它给了那个温顺的人新生，把他转化成了超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any suggestions for who I should get first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该先去找哪一个？你有什么建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... Collar 8, the FEV reject, the Super Mutant. He's docile, predictable, and provided he's not starving, should be easy to command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有的…… 先找8号项圈，FEV病毒的残次品，一个超级变种人。他性格温顺，容易掌控，只要不让他挨饿，他就会乖乖听你指挥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost contact with him some time ago... probably after he dragged you here from the trap. Find him, he'll follow you, collar or no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经和他失去了联络……大概是从他把你拖来这里之后。去找他，不管有没有项圈，他都会跟着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How am I supposed to find them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该怎么找到他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your piece of RobCo trash will help you, I've ensured it. It can latch on to the signal of the collars...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手上那块罗伯科公司生产的垃圾可以帮你，我已经替你改装过了。它能辨识项圈发出的信号……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and tune into their frequencies. The bomb collars come with radios embedded in them. You can eavesdrop easily.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……并调节到与其一致的频率。每个炸弹项圈里都嵌有无线电收发元件，很容易进行监听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was part of their design... to listen in. They can even screen out white noise from the environment to allow greater monitoring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是它原本的功能之一……窃听。它甚至可以过滤掉外界的白噪音，从而取得更好的监听效果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013a76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have got to be kidding. This place is filled with radio mines that can kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定是在开玩笑。你是说这地方的收音机一个个都能要我的命，而且还满地都是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I have to deal with them - or I explode?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我必须想办法毁掉它们，不然我就会爆炸？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it, then. I'll be on my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别再说了。我这就上路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll cooperate - if you can answer some questions for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你肯解答我的几个疑问，我就愿意合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've decided I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经决定了，我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you came into the bunker, you saw a victim, their head blown off for disobedience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进地堡时，应该看见过一具尸体吧，那个人就是一个因为拒绝服从而被炸掉了脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The city is filled with other stories, many such stories. Is "no" your choice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样的例子在这镇上比比皆是，你确定要说"不"吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题想问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did I get here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是怎么到这儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm! Get here? You walked into one of my traps in the Mojave... following the Sierra Madre signal. Now, you're here, with that collar on your neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼！怎么到这儿的？你是跟着马德雷山脉赌场的广播信号……一头栽进了我设在莫哈维的陷阱。所以你才会脖子上套着项圈，出现在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then maybe you better tell me why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你最好告诉我为什么我会在这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not alone, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我不是孤身一人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've caught others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还抓了别人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the woman Hologram in the Fountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喷泉上的女性全息图像是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not know. A Pre-War icon, perhaps. It is of no consequence aside from being a circuit I can utilize.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。可能是个战前的某个明星吧。她是谁对我而言并不重要，我只是借用了她脚底下的电路设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can't punch them or smash them, that doesn't leave me many options.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我打不到它们，那我也没有什么办法了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aside from switching them off, what can I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了关掉它们，我还能做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are they different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为何它们有区别？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Security" doesn't sound safe to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: "保安"这两个字对我来说可不怎么安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this rifle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这把步枪是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a Holorifle, a weapon I constructed when I arrived... I have since made superior models - and modifications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一把全息步枪，是我来这儿之后制造的武器…此后我又对它进行了一系列改进和调整。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, that tool will have to do until you find other weapons... and I suggest you do, the Holorifle's ammo is limited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在找到其他武器前，这是你唯一能仰赖的自卫手段……我建议你多留意一下四周，毕竟全息步枪的弹药有限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it should serve well enough. I fashioned it from the Holograms of the Villa and used it against the Villa's... living inhabitants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这把枪应该是够用了。我是以别墅区的全息影像为灵感将它设计出来的，我也曾用它来对付过别墅区里的其他……居民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这话是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is well-preserved. Few who came here ever returned. All of the treasures of the Old World lie scattered about, virtually untouched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方保存得非常完好，毕竟很少有人能带着战利品返回。旧世界遗留下来的宝藏随处可见，而且几乎从未被人染指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search, hunt... craft what you can from what you find. The trash of the Pre-War era can keep you alive - food, knives, more. Use them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多找找，多看看…你可以借助这些东西来制作各种生存物资。战前留下的垃圾是可以保命的，无论食物、刀子，还是别的东西。要善加利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the Villa's toxins... and the residue it leaves behind... can be shaped into tools and weapons. Gather it as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪怕别墅区里的毒云…和它挥发后的残渣，都可以拿来制作工具和武器。务必多加收集。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also... there is one more thing in your possession, a rifle that will keep you alive, as surely as the collar will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了……我还给你留了一样东西，一把可以用来保命的步枪。就和你的项圈一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的装备在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre has many... defenses, means of screening guests for illicit or dangerous items. Your arrival here, weaponless, was not my intention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场配备了一套相当复杂的……安保系统，其中就包括检查来客身上是否有携带违禁品或有害物品。所以你才会手无寸铁来到这里，这并不是我的本意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Casino, this Villa... it takes anything with even a trace of radioactivity, traces of unknown substances... and returns it home. The bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个赌场，这片别墅区…但凡发现来宾身上的东西带有一丝核辐射或是不明成份…就会将它们没收，寄回原址，也就是地堡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The process is automated, and the casino itself has other, similar "services." I was unable to find a workaround, except to send others in as tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一过程是全自动的，赌场里也有许多类似的"服务"。我找不到变通的手段，只能想办法把人当成工具送进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b00_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... I have not left you defenseless, and the Sierra Madre's security in some respects, can help you if you are resourceful enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…我也给你留了武器，而且只要你善于变通，马德雷山脉赌场的安保措施某种程度上也可以为你所用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b00_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many of these victims did you bring here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底绑架了多少受害者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too many. This place is dangerous... and its quarantine measures, its hazards... have claimed many. Failures upon failures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太多了。这地方过于危险…长期与世隔绝，环境又恶劣…已经有很多人命丧于此。而我也经历了无数次的挫败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I wanted to place collars on you to ensure compliance? No... if robots could have done this, I would've sent them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我乐意给你套上项圈，逼你听话吗？不…如果这种事机器人也能办到，那我早派它们来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre is a complicated lock. Cracking it open requires human hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场是一把精致而复杂的锁，只有凭借人类的双手才能打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b03_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's inside the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场里面有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is for me to know. You get that far... you'll see for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想知道。如果你走得够远……说不定你也能知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Floating Hologram Head Projection at Fountain. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013af8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are they all dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都死了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ones brought here live on only in what they've left behind, their marks - graffiti on the walls. And victims they've killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被带到这里的人只能依靠前人留下的蛛丝马迹活下去，他们做了不少标记——包括墙上的涂鸦和地上的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013aff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some tried to help... left supplies and healing for others who came. Their reward? They were tracked down, killed by others with baser instincts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人很慷慨…他们留下了食物和药品，想要帮助后来人。可结果呢？却是被那些生性丑恶的家伙当做猎物，遭到他们的屠戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013aff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of these murderers went as far as to leave traps behind them... turning markers for help into deathtraps for anyone following them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一部分杀人狂甚至会布下机关……将原本用于帮助他人的标记变成夺命陷阱，等着后来人自投罗网。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013aff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It killed some of them when they forgot where the traps lay... or when they desperately needed the assistance they had cut others off from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过他们有时也会因为忘记陷阱的位置而玩火自焚……又或者为了坑害他人，切断了所有的逃生渠道，等到自己也被困时才发现求助无门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013aff_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help. What do you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意帮忙，不过你到底想让我干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would you do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because in some respects, breaking in to the Sierra Madre is easier than breaking human instinct. Greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为某种程度上说，攻克马德雷山脉赌场比克服人类本身的天性——贪婪——要更为容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Villa is filled with corpses. Some killed by the dangers here, some by me. Others... turned on each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区里早已遍布尸骸，有些是死于非命，有些是死在我手上。而剩下的人……都是死于自相残杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013afd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they realized the Sierra Madre could be theirs, they cared nothing for their freedom... their survival... or each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他们意识到可以将马德雷山脉赌场的宝藏据为己有，自由…生存…同伴情谊，也就统统抛诸脑后了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I need others to pull off this... heist. Who?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我还需要别人来完成这场……抢劫。都有谁呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how do I destroy the radios and speakers then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我要怎么才能摧毁那些收音机和喇叭呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gunshots, energy blasts - even spears thrown with great force - can puncture their exterior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用枪，或者能量武器— 如果你力气够大，投矛也可以，这些武器都能刺穿它们的外壳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shielded speakers can't be destroyed at all. You'll need to avoid them or switch them off via a terminal. I... I'll leave the method up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带防护罩的喇叭没办法摧毁，你只能避开它们，或者找到控制终端，把它关掉。至于办法，就交给你自己去想了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The real work? What was this, a warm-up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正的任务？难道我们之前做的这些只能算是热身？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you think this is a simple robbery. A cheap casino heist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能以为这只是一场简单的抢劫，只是随便劫个赌场而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... this is a heist of the centuries. We're not plundering the Sierra Madre - we're plundering history, taking from the Old World itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但事实并非如此...这是一场世纪大劫案。我们要抢的并不仅仅是马德雷山脉赌场，而是历史，是旧世界本身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It won't let its secrets go easily... not without a fight. I wouldn't expect anything less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但它是不会轻易地将自己的秘密……拱手相让的。所以，我也绝不能掉以轻心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll head out, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们这就出发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd suggest taking the FEV reject to his position first... although you may need his brutality and strength elsewhere first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我个人建议，你可以先带那个中了FEV病毒的废物去他指定的位置……不过，你也可能需要依靠他的蛮力来穿过某些地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As easy as the Villa was to navigate... the outlying areas of the Villa are far more dangerous, thicker with the Ghost People, traps, and toxins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然别墅区算不上危险…可它周围的地带就不一样了，你也许会遇到更多的鬼人、机关陷阱和毒气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use your team as I use you... listen to your collar, watch where you step. You're no use to me dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好利用你的队伍吧，就像我利用你一样…仔细聆听项圈的声响，时刻留意自己的脚下。你死了对我可没好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the Gala Event?
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛世庆典是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A display of lights, fireworks... music in the streets, a Pre-War festival to mark the casino's opening. The bombs struck first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一场大型灯光秀加烟火表演…此外音乐也会传遍大街小巷，是战前用来庆祝赌场开业的一次庆典活动。可惜被落下的核弹给搅黄了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is of no consequence, only firing the event is - get the three in position, then travel to your position in Salida del Sol and trigger the Gala.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都无关紧要，关键是你要再次启动它。先让那三个人就位，你再到日出镇去，打开庆典活动的开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, the real work begins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后，真正的任务才正式开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How am I supposed to get to the markers on my map?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该怎么抵达地图上的标记点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've unlocked the West and East gates to Puesta del Sol and Salida del Sol...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经打开了东西两侧分别通往日落镇和日出镇的大门……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...now that you've survived the Villa, I need to get to my position, you don't need me to hold your hand anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: …既然别墅区里的各类危险都奈何不了你，我看你也不再需要我手把手教你了，我还有别的事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep monitoring you via the transceivers through the Villa... if I need to offer guidance, I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会持续通过无线电监控你在别墅区里的一举一动...如果我觉得有必要给你指引，我会告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b0f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪儿能找到他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel West, toward the Villa Police Station - follow the radio frequency and the alarms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向西，往别墅区的警察局方向，跟着无线电频率和警报器的声音走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although there's a great deal of interference at the source. Perhaps that's why I lost contact with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，信号源处存在相当大的干扰，这或许就是我和他失联的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b11_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter, aside from Collar 8, there should be weapons, armor at the police station. Go West, avoid the Villa inhabitants, bring the mutant back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，除了8号对象之外，警察局里应该还会有武器和护甲。向西走，避开别墅区的居民，把那个变种人带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00013b11_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So after your speech about control, now you're going to use the collars like Elijah did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说了这么多，听你的意思，难道你要学以利亚，用项圈来逼人就范？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what... you're right. I don't need to use the same methods to kill you, and I shouldn't... it would make me as bad as Elijah is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有道理…你说得对。我不需要这样的手段，我也不应该这么做…这只会让我变得和以利亚一样道德沦丧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013b15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right - forget the proximity frequency, we'll decide this ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就别管什么频率了，咱们直接一决胜负吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013b15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we were sneaking, you mentioned Lou... who's Lou?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前我们轻声走路的时候，你提到了一个叫中尉的人……他是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lou... ten... ant? Long ago. Smart. Gave us all things to do. Like watch. And kill. Gone now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中…中尉？那是很早以前的事了。他很聪明，吩咐我们做了很多事。比如站岗，杀人之类的。他已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Miss Lou. Miss the Base. Miss the Church. Don't like here. Don't want to talk about it any more, makes head hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想念中尉，想念基地，想念大教堂。不喜欢这儿。不想说了，头疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013b18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't stay here, I'll bring Dog out and leave him here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不肯留着，我就叫狗出来，让他替你待在这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what would that gain you? Are you so eager to slice off your hand to spite your arm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那对你有什么好处？你就这么喜欢干这种杀敌一千自损八百的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds to me if I bring Ghost People here, you couldn't handle them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉要是我把鬼人带过来，你也根本对付不了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't trust Dog to do this properly. I can trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信狗能做好这件事。我相信你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone who can operate the switches - and stay in control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要有人来操作这个开关——还要能压得住。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because this requires intelligence, and I trust you to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这需要智力，我相信你能做到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want Dog to have to deal with this, I prefer to deal with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想要狗来做这件事，我想要你来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really. And why is that? Dog is much more... docile. Obedient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的。为什么呢？狗更温顺，更服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, I'll make Dog help me. Can't be hard to figure all this wire stuff out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧，我让狗来帮我。弄明白这玩意儿应该不难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You think you can figure out what to... hnh. Of course you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你居然自以为看得懂这些……啊。你确实可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He's knows when to choose his battles, and he'll wait for the right moment to strike back. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stand at my post. Once you trigger the event... well, we'll see who makes it to the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在这里坚守岗位的。等你开启了盛世庆典…呵，那就看谁能先抵达马德雷山脉赌场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He's knows when to choose his battles, and he'll wait for the right moment to strike back. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134cb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that diagram over there holds the details, I can walk Dog through the instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个示意图里已经包含了各种细节的话，那我完全可以指挥狗来扳动开关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... you can barely give me instructions, let alone order Dog. Bark your orders somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不…你都没法教我做事，更别说狗了。你还是到别处指手画脚去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you know how to operate the switches, I need you to trust me to get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你知道怎么操作开关的话，那你必须得相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not about to fight any more Ghost People just to feed you... or Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不会为了你…或者狗去招惹鬼人呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't really have time for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间争论这个了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't... then I can't guarantee I'll remain in control long enough to help you. It is... your choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不干的话…那我可能坚持不了太久，也就没法帮你了。这…都取决于你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So some of the "meat" inside them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以只要几块它们的"肉"就行？
