ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll go hunting, see what I can find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那我就去打猎，搞点肉回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two chunks of meat from their bodies should be enough. Hunt... quietly, so as not to draw more here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要从它们的尸体上割两块肉下来就行了。动静别太大…免得引来其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect you to do what you're told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你听我的命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's what it takes to make you listen, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果只有这样你才能听话，那好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you want me to listen. To obey. No... I can't. Because Dog wouldn't let me. I can already feel him clawing at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你的目的是想让我听话。不...不行。狗不会给我这个机会，我都能感觉他在我体内蠢蠢欲动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me to remain, then I'll need to stay aware... enough to operate the switches properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让我留下来，那我就必须保持清醒……至少得有能力操作这些开关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134d0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... we just need to make sure that Dog doesn't surface before that happens. To do that... he'll need to be fed. That makes him stay in the Cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我们必须确保在这过程中狗不会跳出来捣乱。所以…得先将他喂饱，把他关在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to kill him anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是想杀他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you're right, killing him is the best option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的，杀了他是最好的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He came this way for a reason, and I want to know why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他变成这样是有原因的，我想知道为什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，在空中划了个叉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care. I'd rather reason with someone first than simply kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎。我宁愿先和人讲道理，而不是直接动手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，在空中划了个叉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013498_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not out to kill anyone, I just want to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想杀死任何人，我只想离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks at you, then shakes her head, points at your collar, then the front gate and shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看着你，摇了摇头，指着你的项圈，然后指着大门，又摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know why he did all this first and what's so important about the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先搞清他为什么要干这种事，还有这赌场究竟为何如此重要？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's expression becomes furious, and she raises her hands, draws jagged lines in the air.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀突然变得十分愤怒，她举起手在空中画了一条锯齿状的线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then points at you, then the direction of the casino, and makes the motion of two hands talking to each other.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [接着她指向你，又指向赌场，比出两只手仿佛在说话的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [As one hand continues to talk, she moves the other hand to the wrist, and constricts until the other hand slows, stops talking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [其中一只手“说话”的时候，她用另一只手抓住了它的手腕，然后那只手慢慢蔫了下去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could always slap a collar on him and let him run into a wall of speakers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以直接用项圈套住他，然后逼着他撞向满是喇叭的墙壁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's expression relaxes slightly, and she nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀的表情放松了一些，她点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fine with killing the son of a bitch. As long as we can torture him first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对干掉那王八蛋没什么意见，不过得先让他多吃点苦头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods grimly. She seems satisfied.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她严肃地点点头，看起来很满意。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013492_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你挺有决心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's responsible for the scars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些伤疤是他造成的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She gives a nod. Then another nod, even slower.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，随后用更慢的速度点了一下头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you looking for him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么找他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She wrinkles her face, frowns, and looks angry. She touches her throat, traces the scar with her finger, then points the finger at the casino.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她的表情有些扭曲，眉头皱起，有点生气的样子。她摸了摸喉咙，手指抚过伤疤，然后指向赌场。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013496_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then points at your collars, points at the casino. Then she matches your gaze with a dark expression, then draws a slow line across her throat.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着你的项圈，又指向赌场。随后她盯着你，用一种阴沉的表情，慢慢地做了一个抹脖子的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013496_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah? You need to see Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚？你要见以利亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're looking for the man inside the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要找的是赌场里的那个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013493_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You kind of... changed there for a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才你好像……突然变了个人似的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她似乎想要摇头，却停下了，接着她把手举过眼睛上方，搭了个凉棚，似乎正望着远方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000134a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't ignore me - your whole body language changed there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别不理我啊，刚才你的肢体语言整个都变了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She glares at you a moment, then slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她看了你一会儿，慢慢摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000134a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, do you want to talk about it, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你想谈谈吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她似乎想要摇头，却停下了，接着她把手举过眼睛上方，搭了个凉棚，似乎正望着远方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, before we go any further, I need to know what the problem is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，在我们继续行动之前，我想知道问题所在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She glares at you a moment, then slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她看了你一会儿，慢慢摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to get to him, don't you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是真的想找到他，是吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She ignores you for a second, still staring at the casino. Then she glances at you, and her face and stance relax slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她没理睬你，仍然盯着赌场。随后她看向你，表情和站姿都稍稍放松了点。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at her collar, then the casino with an irritated look. She then folds her arms and raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着自己的项圈，朝赌场恼怒地看了一眼，然后抱着手，扬起了眉毛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's broadcasting from the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是从赌场里进行广播的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks at you, frowns. Then glances at the casino, her eyes narrowed. She stops breathing for a second, as if holding it in.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看着你，皱起眉头，然后瞥向赌场，眼睛眯了起来。突然，她屏住了呼吸。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013495_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still do numbers and calculations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能数数。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001348b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still do math, that's good to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还懂得怎么算数，好事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, smiles.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，笑了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013499_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why... would someone remove your ability to write, or...
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么……有人要移除了你的书写能力？难道…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, slowly, and then makes the motion of typing and drawing X's and lines in the air, and then gives a thumbs up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她慢慢点头，做了一个打字的手势，在空中画了一个叉，然后竖起了大拇指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013490_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a specific form of brain surgery using electrodes. Pre-War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种将电极插入人脑的特殊手术。战前科技。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She looks distant... then slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她看向远方，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013491_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a rather specific form of operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种特殊手术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... brain damage, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说…脑损伤，还是…?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head... then stops, as if thinking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头…似乎在思索着什么。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013497_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something to do with the surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和手术有关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She pauses, then draws a jagged symbol like electricity in the air, then puts on an odd, staring face.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她停顿了一下，然后在半空画了一个代表电流的锯齿状符号，脸上浮现出一种古怪而专注的神情。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013494_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She keeps the blank face for a second, then slowly blinks, looks around. She looks at her hands, shakes them, then lets them go limp.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [这样空洞的表情维持了几秒，紧接着她缓慢眨了眨眼，看向自己的手，晃了晃，让它们毫无生气似地垂下。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013494_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This nodding, frowning, pointing you do is wearing me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这又是点头又是皱眉，又是指手画脚的，实在给我整糊涂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [Christine frowns, then pauses and traces one of the scars on her head with her finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，然后停了下来，用手指划过了她头上的一处疤痕。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then makes a motion as if picking up a pencil, tries to write, then shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [然后她做了一个像是拿起铅笔写字的动作，接着摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you communicate some other way? Can you write?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不能用其他方式交流么？你会写字么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [Christine nods, frowns, then points at you, then points West. Then she glares at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [克莉丝汀点头，皱起眉头，指了指你，又指着西边。然后便盯着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach around to the chain on your neck, see if you can find a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你脖子上的锁链附近摸摸，有没有一把钥匙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the Fountain and wait for me there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去喷泉那儿等我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master, Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. If Dog finds more, will bring them to the Fountain, Dog promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，主人。狗等了这么久...给你带了很多人来。狗保证会再抓一些人，把他们带到喷泉那里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Let's go, follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，走吧，跟上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master. Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. Dog will follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，主人。狗等了这么久...给你带了很多人来。狗这就跟上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already have a Dog with you... Dog will meet you at the Fountain. Maybe find food on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经有只狗跟着了...狗会在喷泉那里和你会合。路上可能会找些吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up, reject, and give me the key. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，废物，马上把钥匙给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master. Here, Dog sorry, Dog... just... just let Dog out of the cage. Don't want to be here any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，主人。给你，狗很抱歉，狗…只要你肯放狗出来就行。狗不想再待在笼子里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me the key - you want out of the cage, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把钥匙给我就行了——你也想逃出笼子，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master... Master sounds different, quieter. Master... Dog doesn't want to be in the cage any more. Dog will be good this time, Dog promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，主人...主人声音不一样了，更温和了。主人...狗不想再进笼子了。狗保证这次一定会乖乖的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Confused because he's used to Elijah being mean, and the player's being nice. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that you are awake, Master wants you to listen, Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你醒了，主人现在要你听从命令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master, Dog is here. What does Master want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人，狗就在这儿。主人想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Confused, then reverent, obedient. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need your obedience. First, I'm going to show you a trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你服从。不过首先，我给你表演个魔术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does Master want Dog to fetch someone? Dog will hunt down whoever you want, bring them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人想要狗捉什么人吗？只要你想捉的，狗都可以照办，把他们捉来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, hidden on you is the key. Find it, and toss it to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，钥匙就藏在你身上，把它扔给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... Dog doesn't have a... hnh. Here it is. Dog... Dog didn't know it was there. How did it get there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗...狗身上没有...啊。找到了。狗不知道身上有钥匙。它是怎么跑到身上的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised they could hear you over the alarm bell outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面警报声那么大，能听见才奇怪呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Very good. Yes... it's another layer of white noise to ensure privacy. Unfortunately, it's also acted as a dinner bell for the residents.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的...这确实是一层可以保护隐私的白噪音。但坏消息是，对于这里的居民而言，这也约等于是开饭铃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as the holographic greeter outside is active, however, I can get by them... the Holograms fascinate them. Ghost-worship, perhaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，只要外面的全息迎宾员还在运作，我就能从它们身边偷偷溜过去…它们对全息影像特别着迷，可能崇拜幽灵吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and the alarm sound outside helps as well. Your doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: …外面的警报声也屏蔽了窃听。你干的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yes... interesting that. More like a dinner bell to some.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 没错...挺有趣的。不过对某些东西来说，那警报声更像是开饭铃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Initially amused that the player doesn't know why... but there are bad guys outside, lured by police station alarm, irritated by that at the end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The... inhabitants of the Villa. They are difficult to kill. They need to be chopped apart, hacked on the ground... disintegrated, if you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区里的…居民，它们很难被杀死。得把它们剁成肉块，或者趁倒地的时候劈烂它们……最好能把它们熔化分解掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are difficult to kill... but not to devour. And Dog is always hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然它们很难被杀死…但吞下去倒是不难。而且狗一直都很饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a81_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he is with you, when they fall, he will fall on them, end them. If I am with you... fighting will be far more difficult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果让他来帮你，在它们倒下的时候，狗就会扑上去，给它们致命一击。如果我和你一起的话...战斗就会变得更加艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a81_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, I will bring him along, I don't need you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这样，我就叫他出来吧，用不着你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so... greed, practical or otherwise, has its day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来…在贪婪面前，务实并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if Dog is more helpful, we can manage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算狗的用处更大，我也更相信我们俩的能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am not sure you belong here. No, you don't belong here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你的性格和这地方不太搭啊。对，你确实和这里不搭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yet... you came this far. And I'm not interested in remaining here any longer. I'll unlock the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可…你居然还能走这么远。算了，我也没兴趣在这儿耗着了。我这就打开笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't convince you I'm not here for the Sierra Madre or the Old Man, so I'll prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是为了马德雷山脉，也不是为了那个糟老头而来的，既然说服不了你，我就证明给你看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prove it... how? Words are worthless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证明...怎么证明？说什么都是没有意义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the power to let Dog out of his cage. I'm going to prove it by not doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我随时都能把狗放出笼子，但为了证明我的诚意，我不想这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. No... no, you're not. Even though Dog's more docile... easier to control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔。确实…你不会的。尽管狗更加温顺，更容易控制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may regret this. This place... this place is where creatures like Dog can survive. The people that fill its streets...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你可能会后悔。这个地方…这个地方只有像狗那样的生物才能够生存。街道上横行的那些东西……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is as vicious, more vicious than them. His hunger can help you more than I can. When I am in control... this shell is difficult to... fight in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他比它们要凶残，凶残得多。也许和我比起来，他的饥饿对你而言更有用，在我控制这副躯体的时候，我是很难用它来……战斗的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. Follow me, willingly, I won't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别激动。只要你自己肯出来，我就不播录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you wouldn't. If you did, you won't escape this place alive. I'd shatter every one of your limbs to splinters and leave you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然不敢。否则你就别想活着走出这个地方。我会扯断你的四肢，把你扔在这里等死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm afraid of your collar exploding, killing us? No, I'll leave you breathing, then keep walking until my collar goes cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我会顾忌项圈爆炸，不敢对你动手吗？不，我会留你一口气，然后我就远走高飞，一直走到我的项圈冷却下来为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll prop your broken body in view of the Sierra Madre so you can see what you came to steal... forever out of reach as you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你苟延残喘的躯体挂在刚好能远眺到马德雷山脉赌场的地方，让你望眼欲穿地看着自己求而不得的东西…慢慢死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a73_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye, whoever you are... I'm going to let Dog out of his cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，不管你是谁……我要把狗放出来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! No, no, don't! I'll make you suffer for this, I promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！不，不，不要！我一定会让你生不如死，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although it may not matter... I suspect the Sierra Madre will be reward enough for ones like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，无关紧要了……对你这种人，也许马德雷山脉赌场就是最好的奖赏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we go after the Old Man together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我们一起去找那个糟老头算账呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... I don't trust you. Even if you're not working with him, you'll fall into the same trap he did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...我不相信你。就算你和他不是一伙儿的，你也会和他一样掉进利欲熏心的深渊中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may think you can take your revenge... that'll change. You'll start thinking there's a way to have it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你现在满脑子只想着复仇…但人心是会生变的。很快，你就会想要独吞这里的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want my freedom, too. You think I like having this collar on me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想要自由。你以为我愿意戴着项圈？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They all wanted their freedom at first. Then... they realized they could get inside the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一开始都想要自由。可后来…他们发现自己还可以进入马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, their freedom wasn't important any more. They couldn't let go, just like the Old Man. So you say you want your freedom...
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是自由也就变得不再重要了。他们不懂得放手，和那个老头一样。所以，你说你想要自由...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... even if you feel that way, it won't last. You'll forget, get greed-blind, and you'll turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…即便你现在这么想，将来呢？你会忘记的，会被贪婪蒙蔽双眼，然后你就会变成另一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Man's voice is on my Pip-Boy, just like yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个糟老头的声音就在我的哔哔小子里，还有你的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can play his voice, yes. I have an audio log from him on my Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以播放他的声音。是的，我的哔哔小子里有他的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... don't play it. If you do, I'll find a way to get out of the cage, end you. I'll murder you, crush your arms and legs until...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…别播。如果你播了，我会立刻冲出笼子杀了你。我会把你打得面目全非，扯断你的两条腿和胳膊，直到...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he hears the Old Man's voice, he'll do what the Old Man says.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他听见那糟老头的声音，那他肯定会服从的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... obeys. Yes. Why... do you have some means of contacting the Old Man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗…是的，他会服从的。怎么…你有办法联系上那糟老头吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to die? Cooperate, or you're both dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想死吗？合作点，不然你们俩都会死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could just tell Dog he has the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以直接告诉狗，钥匙就在他身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... you could. And once he was out, all starving and hungry... what do you think he would do then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错...你可以。但他如此饥肠辘辘，你把他放出来的话...你觉得会发生什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful what cage you open, because he won't go back in it without a fight. He'll tear you apart, he won't care if it kills you both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开笼子前，你可要想清楚，毕竟再想把他关进去可就没那么容易了。他会把你大卸八块的，他也不在乎是否会和你同归于尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The key's in there with you - and Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙就在你——和狗身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but Dog doesn't know that. We don't share everything. Sometimes it's a blessing... sometimes... it causes difficulties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，但狗不知道。我们的记忆不共享。有时这是好事…有时…也会造成一些困扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I think it's a blessing, it keeps you on that side of the cage. Now... you go fetch. Find your master, bring him here so we can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就目前来说，这显然是件好事，因为这样一来，你就打不开笼子了…你走吧。去把你的主子带来，否则免谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could order Dog to come with me. I bet he'd obey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以命令狗和我一起走，他会服从的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog? You're not talking to him now, are you? No, even if you could drag Dog out of his cage, you still couldn't get him out of this cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，狗？但现在和你说话的并不是他吧？不，就算你能把狗从笼子里拽出来，你也没办法让他离开眼前这个笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I put him here for a reason... if he could have escaped, he would have. So here he stays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把他关在这儿是有原因的...要是他跑得掉，他早跑了。所以他哪儿也去不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't come with me, he'll set off our collars - yours and mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不跟我走，他就会引爆我们两个人的项圈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I still win. I'd rather die in this cell than have Dog follow him any longer, follow his orders, his commands, desperate for recognition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我也赢了，我宁可死在这牢房里，也不要让狗再对他俯首帖耳，唯命是从，任由他摆布，渴望得到他的赏识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Snarling, gets a little quieter and introspective at end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Man... he has the need to hold on, to the past, to the Madre... I'd rather be free, let go of this shell, than have it cage me any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个糟老头…对自己的过去，对马德雷山脉，都有很深的执念…而我只想要自由，我想从这个躯壳中解脱，不再受它束缚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Snarling, gets a little quieter and introspective at end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you surround yourself with all these radios?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你让这些收音机围绕着你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] They were here when I arrived... so I made use of them, in a manner of speaking. More their... voices, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我来的时候，它们就在这里了…所以某种意义上说，我确实利用了它们。我想多制造一些…杂音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These collars... they don't just track us. You can eavesdrop on them as well. Tune to a frequency, and you can hear everything someone is saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些项圈…不仅能追踪我们的方位，还可以用来窃听。只要调到一个固定频率，就能听到他人说的每一句话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So perhaps it's a good thing that Dog swallowed his collar. Anyone listening would find it difficult to hear past the... digestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以狗把项圈吞进肚子里，未尝不是一件好事。毕竟要透过消化系统来偷听……恐怕还是挺困难的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These radios, were you using them for signal interference?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些收音机，你是在利用它们干扰信号吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I was afraid Dog would get lonely. The voices, as static and whispering as they are... are still company.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我害怕狗会寂寞，这些声音就算只是微弱的白噪，对他而言也是一种陪伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're locked in there? Where's the key?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你被关在里面了？钥匙呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The key? Why it's the Old Man, the one who brought us here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 钥匙？钥匙就是那个老头，把我们绑架到这里来的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hid the key on me so Dog wouldn't know... I just need the Old Man to show up, so he and I can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把钥匙藏在身上了，免得狗找到...我要那个老头亲自过来和我面谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog was in control when the Old Man appeared... well, he would just do whatever he commanded, as always. And I can't have that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个老头出现时，狗还在控制这具躯体...那他就会和以前一样，对那个老头言听计从。我不能允许这种事情发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a66_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't have locked yourself in there without some sort of key to let you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没有钥匙之类的东西，你是不可能把自己关在里面的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] It's close, safe, as you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 就在附近，很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] It's close, safe. I did lock myself in, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 就在附近，很安全。毕竟，是我自己把自己关起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait. So you... or Dog... doesn't know the key is on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等。所以你…我是说狗…不知道钥匙其实就藏在自己身上？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog and I don't share... everything. What I know, he doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗和我的记忆…并不相通。我知道的事情，他不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Still angry about Dog swallowing the collar and trapping them here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What he knows... what little he knows... I don't. For example, your arrival is a surprise. I wished that I could have remembered, I'm sure Dog knew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他知道的事情…哪怕只有一丁点…我也一概不知。比如，你的到来对我而言就是个意外。我也希望自己能想起来，我敢说狗肯定知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Still angry about Dog swallowing the collar and trapping them here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when he's feeding, well... I sometimes have to find out about it later. Now all there is to do is wait for my intended guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于他吃进嘴里的东西…这么说吧，有一些我得过了很久才能搞明白。至于现在，我只想待在这儿，等着我期望的那个人出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Still angry about Dog swallowing the collar and trapping them here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a57_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you locked him... you... in, what if you couldn't get out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然是你把他...和你自己……锁住的，万一你出不来怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I have the key, always did. Hid it on the chain behind my neck before Dog came bursting out, eating everything he could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我当然有钥匙。在狗冲出笼子，将一切吃干抹净之前，我已经把它藏在了我脖子后面的锁链上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wanted to make sure whoever came to fetch Dog spoke to me first, got within reach. Instead... I get you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本想着无论谁来找他，都得先过我这一关。没想到……等到的人是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why did you bring me here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你为什么抓我到这儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is he doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来这儿干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... exactly the same way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finds out it's more than a story, comes to this shining poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a88_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a88_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scorched by the sun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在烈日下化为焦土？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Man... this "Elijah," tried to hold the sun in his hands, arrogance, was cast down for it. Icarus' crime was to fly too high, Elijah...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老头..."以利亚"，他想把太阳握在手心，结果因为傲慢自大，受到了惩罚。伊卡洛斯的罪过就是因为飞得太高，而以利亚……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah wanted to bring the sun down to him. Hnh! Arrogance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚竟然想让太阳从天而降，落到他身边。哼！真是自不量力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a7a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea, I was unconscious the whole time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，我完全没有意识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember, only woke up when my Pip-Boy went active.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不记得，只记得我的哔哔小子启动，我就醒了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must have already been in the cage... already had the collar in me. You're lucky Dog didn't devour you... otherwise, we'd be closer than we are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来那时候我已经关在笼子里了…项圈也在我肚子里了。你很走运，狗没有吃掉你。否则咱俩现在的关系可就要近多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you say that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember you... that isn't surprising. What is... is that it was when Dog was out of his cage... free, hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不记得你…这件事并不令我惊讶。真正令我吃惊的是，在我刚把狗从笼子里放出来时……他是饿着肚子的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knows not to eat anything he catches in the traps... after that, however... so he dragged you here, you got spared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道不可以吃陷阱里的东西…但在那之后…他把你大老远拖到这儿来，你却毫发无伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog must have fed after you arrived... once he was fed, that allowed me out of the cage, and put him inside. Do you remember how long you were out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以在你抵达这里之后的时间里，狗一定吃过东西…正因为他吃饱了，我才有办法出来，把他关回笼子。你记得自己昏过去多长时间吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you know the way back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你知道回去的路吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way back doesn't matter... try to leave, try to disobey, and your collar ends the journey faster than you can say, "begin again."
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去的路并不重要…只要你试图离开，或是违抗他的命令，那在你还没来得及说出"从头再来"之前，你的项圈就会送你上路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're clever, you'd be able to find a way back if you left the Villa. Dog can... I can find the way back, if "back" is where I even wanted to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很聪明，如果离开别墅区，你肯定能自己找到回去的路。狗...我也可以找到回去的路，但前提是我有地方去 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until the Old Man lets you go, you're going nowhere. This beautiful paradise, with all its toxins and death... it's home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非那糟老头放你走，否则你哪儿也去不了。这个美丽的天堂，这个充满毒气与死亡的地方……就是你的家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought me here to the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以是你把我抓到这个别墅区来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? You think I want to haul bodies around the wastes like a Brahmin at the whip? No, Dog does it, when the Old Man says fetch, Dog fetches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？难道你认为我愿意像一只带轭的双头牛似的，在废土上拖着几个大活人四处晃荡？不，抓你来的是狗。那个糟老头命令他做什么，他就做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were in a man-trap, and Dog made his rounds, and dragged you here. When, I don't know. But... it must have been... recent. Before the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你踩中了陷阱，狗查看陷阱的时候发现了你，就把你拖到这儿来了。至于这是什么时候发生的事，我不知道，但…肯定是……不久以前。在我进这个笼子之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Old Man, what do you know about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那个糟老头，你知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah. Human, weak like all of you are. Feeling age circling him like starved dogs, howling for blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他叫以利亚。人类，和你们一样弱小。衰老仿佛一群咆哮的饿犬围着他，随时都会将他吞噬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To me, he reeks of age and failure. And madness. To me, he is simply the "Old Man." To Dog, he is "Master." His name, meaningless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，他散发着一股老而无成却又偏执疯狂的臭气。在我眼里，他就是"糟老头"而已。但对狗来说，他却是"主人"。至于他的名字，没有意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Running out of years, hopes and dreams running through his withered hands like sand from the Big Empty... and scorched by the sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他时日无多了，希望和梦想仿佛大空山里的沙子，正从他那双干枯的手中滑落…在烈日下化为焦土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you say I'm the same as the Old Man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你说我和那个糟老头一样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not him anymore than I'm Dog. But that collar around your neck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和他的关系，如同我和狗。但你脖子上的那个项圈…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...you're an extension of the Old Man's grasp, clumsy, perhaps, but a tool, yes. And once you get acclimated to the Sierra Madre...
ESP.TRADUIT: …你就是个工具，替那个糟老头发号施令，虽然不太灵光，但懂得听使唤。等你适应了马德雷山脉赌场的环境…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...then you'll feel the same overpowering hunger the Old Man does. And then you'll be him, not just his hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你就会变得和那糟老头一样贪得无厌。到时候你就会想取代他的位置，不再只甘作他的爪牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how I got here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我是怎么到这儿来的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I know. Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every time I see one of you, I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, anymore than Dog can help himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's angry because if people wouldn't follow the broadcast, Dog wouldn't be as much a slave to the Old Man. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。我还有别的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you shouldn't go around shoving Old World tech in your stomach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你不该不分青红皂白就把旧世界的科技产品往嘴里塞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As if I had a choice. Sometimes instinct takes over, and that's when I go into the cage. It's like curiosity that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我有办法控制吗？有时冲动是抑制不住的，而那种时候我通常都在笼子里关着呢。主要还是好奇心作祟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Implying the player's greed got the player in his bad situation. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, you wouldn't have put that collar on by choice... perhaps it was your curiosity that caused that hand to close on your neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 何况，你的脖子上不也套了个项圈吗…也许你也一样是因为好奇心，才会不小心踩中别人的圈套吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Implying the player's greed got the player in his bad situation. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a59_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell did you... or whoever... eat one of these collars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 且不说你的情况…那个项圈…究竟是怎么到你肚子里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They... detach. When segmented, they look like nothing more than metallic Radscorpions... and if they're attached to neck flesh, warm, red...
ESP.TRADUIT: 它…松脱了。脱下来以后，它的样子就像是一只铁皮辐射蝎…如果把它贴在脖子上，就会发热，变红……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't care what's on the body he's crushing in his hands, he'll mangle it, twist it, make it fit until he's full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗根本不在乎他手里抓着的是什么，他只会将那东西撕成稀巴烂，然后塞进嘴里，直到填饱自己的肚子为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a77_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog can't help himself... hungry... greedy. And now the collar's inside, alive again. And we're trapped here until it goes cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗控制不了自己…他太饥饿…太贪心了。现在肚子里的项圈又启动了。除非它再次冷却，否则我们只能被困在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a77_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that collar inside you is active, I didn't switch it on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你肚子里的项圈动了，那肯定不是我干的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really. Yet it led you here, to me. And now you're here, and it's burning a hole in my guts. Maybe it's crying for its owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。然而是它指引你来找我的。你也确实找到了。现在我的内脏都快要被它烧穿了。可能它是在呼唤自己的主人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you weren't expecting me, who were you waiting for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是在等我，那是在等谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't play stupid, I already have to mind one child. You must have figured it out by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别装傻了，我可没兴致陪你过家家。你应该清楚我说的是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Man obsessed with the Sierra Madre... riddled with greed. Hoped you might be him when I woke up. All you are is his hand...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个糟老头对马德雷山脉赌场十分痴迷…他的脸上写满了贪婪。我醒来的时候，还以为来找我的人是他，结果来的却是他的爪牙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...you're the same kind of greed. Followed the radio, the broadcast, and now you're here, all confused. Not for long. You'll figure it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你也和他一样，贪得无厌。你跟着广播，稀里糊涂地到了这里。再过不久，你也会明白我说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a75_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get you out of there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你放出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no, I don't think so. Even in here, I have more control than you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不，我不同意。哪怕被关在笼子里，我现在也比你更占据主动权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not leaving until the one who controls the collars shows... not his voice, not his hand, not his lackey... him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非我见到控制项圈的那个人，否则我是不会离开这里的…我不想听他的声音，也不想见他的走狗…我要他本人亲自来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when he comes to see me, we'll settle things. So go on, go back to your master, tell him I'm waiting for him. Dog may follow him - I won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等他来了之后，我会和他做个了断。所以，你走吧，回去找你的主子吧，告诉他我在等他。也许狗会听他的话，但我不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a5f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you lock yourself in the cage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要把自己锁在笼子里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... why did I lock him in the cage. I locked him in because I could feel him... getting hungry again. There wasn't much time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…是我把他锁在了笼子里。因为我感觉……他又饿了。我当时没有多少时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog roams, he gets into trouble... eats things he shouldn't, listens to others he shouldn't... so he's safer in here. We're safer in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果放任狗四处乱跑，他一定会惹上麻烦…吃不该吃的东西，听不该听的话...所以他在这儿更安全。*我们*在这儿更安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a65_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hoped if I locked him in here... the one he obeys would come for him. Instead, I get you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我原以为只要把他关在笼子里…操纵他的幕后主使就会现身。没想到，来的却是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a65_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was looking for someone with a collar like mine. Where is your collar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找和我一样戴着项圈的人。你的项圈呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's close. Closer than I'd like... Dog's been into things, needs to think before he eats, chew before he swallows. He's... eager that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它近在咫尺，比我想得还近……狗太着急了，他在吃东西前应该先想一想，在狼吞虎咽前应该先嚼一嚼。他在这方面……太过饥渴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Suspicious of player, keep the maliciousness and distrust here. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now the collar's a part of me. Inside. I can feel its electronic heartbeat, clicking and burning down below... like before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，项圈已经成为了我的一部分，留在了我的体内。我能感受到它电流的脉动，在我的胃里震颤、发热……就像以前一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Suspicious of player, keep the maliciousness and distrust here. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was cold and heavy before going in the cage... now you're here, and it's pulling and kicking again, tugging like a leash. Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本来在进笼子之前，它又冰又沉…可自从你来之后，它又开始蠢蠢欲动，仿佛狗链似的拽着我。有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Suspicious of player, keep the maliciousness and distrust here. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't leave until we get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不跟我走的话，我也走不了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you can't. This cage is locked tight... from you and the Old Man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然走不了。这个牢房的门锁可结实了…你和那个糟老头进不来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like Dog might be more willing to get out of the cage than you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来狗比你更愿意从笼子里出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something tells me I could walk Dog through unlocking a door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我可以让狗走出这扇门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Dog could just open the door at any time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以狗随时可以打开门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, the casino already opened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，赌场之前打开过？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Gala Event was triggered at least once?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以盛世庆典以前至少启动过一次？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh. Master ordered it. "Take places." Then... Master went away. Left Dog... Dog in cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼，是主人命令的。"出事了"。然后...主人就不见了，把狗...狗扔在了笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Casino open long time ago, not sure when... voice keeps putting Dog in cage. Haven't seen Master since, only hear voice on your arm and from walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场很久以前打开过，不知什么时候…后来那声音就只准狗待在笼子里了。那之后也没见过主人，只从你的手上和墙上听到过他的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... do you want to talk about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你可以和我说一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The lights were pretty. In the sky. Pointed at casino. And the casino opened up.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 那些灯光很美，在天上，面对赌场的方向。然后赌场的门就打开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ab6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, think back to the lights, the pretty ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗。回想一下那些漂亮的灯光吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Uh-uh. Dog... Dog wants to stop talking now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 呃-呃。狗…狗不想说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is important - do you remember what happened exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很重要——你记得到底发生了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog can't remember. Don't want to go, can't make him stay there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不记得了。不想去，狗不想待在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, do you know why you have to go to the position on this map?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，你知道你为什么要去地图上的这个地点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to get you to the Gala Event. Get you to your place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得帮忙操控盛世庆典。到你的岗位上去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... Dog has heard that before. Was there pretty lights? There... were things to pull? Hard to pull, but Dog did. And... a cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗…狗以前听过这句话。好像有很多闪闪发光的小灯？还有个…玩意要拉下来？很难扳，但狗最后还是扳动了。还有…一间笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Whispering, frightened at the memory of tearing apart the girl who helped him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and Dog was hungry there. Dog... was someone else there, with Dog. Then... then there was noise, then... lights... and streets... screamed.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...狗那时觉得很饿。狗...和另一个人在一起。然后…狗听到了噪音…光亮...街道…和惨叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Whispering, frightened at the memory of tearing apart the girl who helped him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Dog doesn't want to go to cage. It's inside Dog now, Dog can see the cage, hear the noises. The way to casino... it'll hurt you. Inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...狗不想进笼子。它在狗体内，狗可以看见笼子，也可以听见噪音。一想到要进赌场…就让人心痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Whispering, frightened at the memory of tearing apart the girl who helped him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aac_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess... the alarm outside sure is a racket, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实……外面的警报声挺吵的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Very good. Yes... it's another layer of white noise to ensure privacy. Unfortunately, it's also acted as a dinner bell for the residents.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的...这确实是一层可以保护隐私的噪音。但坏消息是，对于这里的居民而言，这也约等于是开饭铃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ab2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as the holographic greeter outside is active, however, I can get by them... the Holograms fascinate them. Ghost-worship, perhaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，只要外面的全息迎宾员还在运作，我就能从它们身边溜过去…它们对全息影像特别着迷，可能崇拜幽灵吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ab2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're blocking the eavesdropping with the alarm outside, too. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用警报声阻止了窃听。不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yes... interesting that. More like a dinner bell to some.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 没错...挺有趣的。不过对某些东西来说，那警报声更像是开饭铃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Initially amused that the player doesn't know why... but there are bad guys outside, lured by police station alarm, irritated by that at the end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ab3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Play Elijah Audio Tape.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <播放以利亚的录音>

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can't prove it to you, then forget this, I'm bringing Dog out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你怎样都不信，那就算了，我要放狗出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先这样吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnh-hnn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Responding to player telling him goodbye. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012af4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nnnh-Hnnn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Responding to player telling him goodbye. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012af5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to stay here and trigger the switches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你待在这儿，扳动开关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't understand... too hungry, hard to hear words... Master, when can Dog feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不明白...太饿了，听不见...主人，狗什么时候能吃东西啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog was fed like last time, Dog would listen. If the feeding was quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是狗能像上次一样吃饱，狗一定会听话的。这次的食物最好不要再乱动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe voice could make Dog stay, Dog not want to be in cage, Dog want to be free, find Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许那个声音可以让狗待在这里，狗不想再关到笼子里了，狗想要自由，想去找主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nnnh... getting tired of hearing your orders. Dog's clawing at the cage, hungrier than usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…我已经对你的命令感到厌烦了。狗在扒笼子，感觉比以往更饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : So, let's make a deal... the last part should be to himself, referring to something horrible Dog did that God is (surprisingly) ashamed of. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ac0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must need something, I can see it in your eyes. The Gala... of course. How could I forget?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找我一定是有事吧，我可以从你的眼神里看出来。盛世庆典…是啊。我怎么把这条给忘了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : So, let's make a deal... the last part should be to himself, referring to something horrible Dog did that God is (surprisingly) ashamed of. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ac0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me to... heel... if you want Dog to obey, then he'll need to be fed, like last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要我...想要狗听你的话，那你得给他吃东西，就像上次一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : So, let's make a deal... the last part should be to himself, referring to something horrible Dog did that God is (surprisingly) ashamed of. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ac0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those scars on your body - where did you get them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上的伤疤，哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurt self. Hurt makes the voice go away... it doesn't like pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自己弄的。疼痛可以让那个声音消失…因为它怕疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't like pain, either, but keeps voice quiet, so Dog will hurt self until voice dies. Dog hurt self enough, voice go away, never come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗也怕疼，但只要能让那声音安静下来，狗就算弄伤自己也没事。也许疼到一定程度，那声音就不会再出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012abe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me how you got to the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你是怎么来到马德雷山脉赌场的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here? Followed voice in air, then here... here as long as can remember. Don't like this place... hard to find things to eat sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿？狗只记得…跟着风中的声音，就到了这儿。不喜欢这里…很难找吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ac1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better than the cage. Dog doesn't like being locked up. Voice in air didn't say anything about a cage and nothing to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比笼子里好。狗不喜欢被关起来。那阵风从来没说过这里会有笼子，也没说过这里没有吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ac1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how to wake him up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道怎么唤醒他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes when Dog gets tired. Or eats too much, gets full. Sometimes... when Dog goes to the cage... then voice wakes up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等狗累的时候，或者吃太多、太饱的时候。又或者…狗钻进笼子的时候...那个声音就会醒来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slight evil creeping in here, suggestion that maybe God doesn't do all bad things, he's trying to keep Dog on a leash. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The voice locks Dog in when it comes up, always trying to keep Dog from food. Voice did it at the cage where you found me. Then Master came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个声音出来的时候，会把狗关起来，不让狗吃东西。你找到我的时候就是这种情况。然后主人来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slight evil creeping in here, suggestion that maybe God doesn't do all bad things, he's trying to keep Dog on a leash. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the other voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个声音是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other voice... don't wake him up. When voice wakes up, Dog goes to sleep and voice climbs up in Dog's head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个声音…狗不想叫醒他。只要那个声音醒来，狗就会睡着，然后那声音就会钻进狗的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012adf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The voice puts Dog in places... puts him in cages and locks him in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个声音会把狗赶走……赶进笼子里关起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012adf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's your collar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的项圈呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lost it. Got hungry. Made the other voice mad, madder than it ever was, mad enough to lock Dog up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丢了。饿了。结果那个声音就发怒了，比以往任何一次都要生气，气得把狗关了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae7_1.ogg
