ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to hear more about the Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这个主人，你还有什么能告诉我的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He takes care of Dog. He tells Dog what to do. Told Dog to come here, put collars on people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他照顾狗。他指挥狗做事。是他派狗到这儿来，给人戴上项圈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Put a slight trace of evil in this, Dog's gleeful that something else causes God pain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes people fight. Dog holds them until they go quiet, don't make any noise. If collars don't fit or go too quiet... find others for Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人反抗，狗就捏住他们，直到他们安静下来，不再发出任何声音为止。如果项圈不合适，又或者他们太安静了...主人就会让狗再找别的人来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Put a slight trace of evil in this, Dog's gleeful that something else causes God pain. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master makes the other voice go away - the other voice hates Master, Dog can feel it. Master's voice is like pain, protects Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人的存在会让另一个声音消失——那个声音讨厌主人，狗感觉得到。主人的声音和就像疼痛一样，可以保护狗免受骚扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Put a slight trace of evil in this, Dog's gleeful that something else causes God pain. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like good trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来还挺划算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master always feed Dog if not in cage. Master lets Dog do what Dog wants. Not like other voice in cage. Always mad with Dog, shouting at him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不在笼子里的时候，主人一直会喂狗。主人让狗想干啥就干啥，不像笼子里的另一个声音，总是生狗的气，朝狗大吼大叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ade_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where does the voice come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那声音从哪儿来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know where other voice come from. Wish would go away. Always trying to stop Dog, caging Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道那个声音从哪儿来的。希望能消失吧。总是想阻止狗，把狗关进笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice started talking not long ago, Dog think... was always there. Start talking when Master showed up? Making Dog sleep, go to cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那声音是从不久前出现的，狗觉得...它其实一直都在。是主人出现后，他才开始说话的。他会把狗赶到笼子里，让狗去睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice hates Master. It okay... voice always hide when Master around, go quiet, watch Master as he does things. Voice scared of Master, Dog thinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那声音讨厌主人。还好...主人在附近的时候，那声音就会躲起来，闭上嘴，静静地观察主人。狗觉得，那声音害怕主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sound nice. It still there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错。那地方还在吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where Church now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大教堂在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you go back someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许某天你可以回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All gone. All gone. It better now that found new Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都不在了。都不在了。现在有了新主人，比之前好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Don't make this line amusing... the horror should start escalating by this point. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012add_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New Master tells Dog what to do, rewards Dog, like old Master. Dog goes get people, drag them here... like vat. Dog knows how to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新主人不仅指挥狗做事，还会奖励狗，和老主人一样。狗去四处抓人，把他们扛到这里来…就像扛玻璃缸一样，狗知道怎么扛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Don't make this line amusing... the horror should start escalating by this point. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012add_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If people fight, Dog hit them until they stop. And if more than one, Dog can eat them, so Dog hunts hard for as many as he can find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有人反抗，狗就揍他们，揍到他们动不了为止。如果抓的人多了，主人就会把其中一些赏给狗当饭吃，所以狗一直在努力抓人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Don't make this line amusing... the horror should start escalating by this point. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012add_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must been hard to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样你就隐身了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you want to look like ground?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干嘛要变得和地面一个颜色？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When put it on, hard to see. Hard to see... Dog was told not to be seen then. Same as now, except different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戴上以后，别人就很难看到狗了...他们告诉狗，最好别被人看到。现在也一样，只不过下命令的人不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog and others... had to hide in Base. And Church. The Master was there. Master was... spoke like many people. Smart. Like Lou-Lieutenant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗和其他人…都藏在基地里。还有大教堂。主教大人当时也在。主教大人好像会……模仿各种人说话，他和中…中尉一样聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog misses the Church. When got dark, no people, Dog could sit on floor and look up at ceiling. Could... take off wrist-collar then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗想念大教堂。天黑的时候，人都走了，狗可以坐在地上，抬头看着天花板，手上的圈……也可以拿下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuh-uh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is true. Dog wore it right on his hand, where bear trap is now... he thinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的。狗原来戴过那样的东西，就在现在捕熊夹的这个位置……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dumb characters still sharing stories about past. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题想问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: More? Don't push your luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有？别得寸进尺了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a brave one. Sure you're ready for the answers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很勇敢嘛。你确定你想听我的回答？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你吃什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog eats whatever he can catch. Sometimes they run, but Dog is strong, moves fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要是能抓得到的东西，狗都吃。有时那些东西会乱跑，但狗力气大，跑得也快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes... makes voice mad when I eat... Master doesn't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候……狗吃东西，会让那个声音特别生气……但主人不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice in the air?
ESP.TRADUIT: 风中的声音？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog hears many voices... one in air. The... other one. And Master. Master is the nicest. Gets mean, mad sometimes. But lets Dog feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗能听见很多声音…其中一个会在风中和狗说话。还有另一个。是主人。主人最好了。虽然他有时脾气不好，爱发火，但他会给狗吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master was quiet for a long time until Dog heard him on your arm... did you eat him? Dog gets hungry, too. Being hungry makes the voice... mad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗刚才从你的手臂上听到了他的声音，之前他突然沉默了很久…是你吃了他吗？狗也饿。饥饿会让那个声音…变得疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like it here, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不喜欢这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me hear voice, too? Then got here, bad place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也听到某个声音，然后不知怎的就到了这里，破地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog trapped here, too. This place not like West. Air like copper wire. Gut heavy, hurts, beeps sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗也被困在这儿了。这个地方不像西边。空气里有一股铜线的味道。肚子很沉，很痛，有时还叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Referring to his Stealth Boy, a wrist-mounted device Dog's people used to cloak themselves. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back West... in bone cities... Dog wore a collar on wrist, turned him into color of ground, turned him into color of sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前在西边…骨头城的时候...狗的手腕上有个圈，可以让狗的身体变得和地面天空一个颜色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Referring to his Stealth Boy, a wrist-mounted device Dog's people used to cloak themselves. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其它问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is getting tired, Master. When can Dog eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人，狗累了。什么时候狗能吃东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too much talking makes Dog's head hurt. Getting hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说太多了，狗觉得头疼。饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我说说那个声音吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your name is carved on your chest. Is that part of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的名字刻在胸口上。和这个有关系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... no... don't know what the word means, everyone says the same, except the voice. The voice says it backward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的…不…狗不懂那个词的意思，大家都用同样的称呼叫我，除了那个声音。那个声音是倒过来念的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012adc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that why you have a bear trap locked on your arm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你手臂上才会有个捕熊夹？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog put his hand in it, hurts. Made the voice go away, now can't get it off. Don't want it off, hurt keeps voice sleeping... bleeding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗自己把手放进去的，很疼。虽然赶走了那个声音，但现在也拿不下来了。不想拿下来，疼痛可以让那个声音沉睡…让它流血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012adb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It also keeps others quiet, too. Dog hits them with metal bear teeth until their voices stop, makes Master's voice come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也能让其他人闭嘴。狗会用抓熊的夹子把它们打到不能说话为止，这样主人就会再次和我说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012adb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Just... stay here in the courtyard, I'll go get food.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 你就…在院子里好好待着，我去找吃的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... for a moment there, I thought... hnh. I'll wait here then, come back when you've found a carcass. Or three.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…只待一会儿的话，那我觉得…也行。我会在这儿等你的，你只要带一具尸骸回来就够了。最好是三具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ada_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I bring food, will that calm Dog down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我带些吃的东西来，能让狗冷静下来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It always does... makes him sleepier. Weaker. Easier to keep out of trouble. As for the type of food...
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以的…食物能让他变得困倦、虚弱、不容易惹麻烦。至于何种食物...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < God waits for player to return. > EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make sure it isn't struggling, if you can. It's hard enough to choke down half of what I suspect he eats. And make sure it's not a bomb collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要不会乱动的东西都行。我估计他吃的东西里有一半都在他的嘴里挣扎过。还有，千万别再拿爆炸项圈来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < God waits for player to return. > EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, I'll make Dog help me. Can't be hard to figure all this wire stuff out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我会让狗帮我。把这些线路弄清楚应该不难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You think you can figure out what to... hnh. Of course you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你觉得你有这种本事吗……哼。你确实有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He's knows when to choose his battles, and he'll wait for the right moment to strike back. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stand at my post. Once you trigger the event... well, we'll see who makes it to the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会守在这里的。一旦你启动了盛世庆典…呵，那就看谁能先抵达马德雷山脉赌场吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He's knows when to choose his battles, and he'll wait for the right moment to strike back. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that diagram over there holds the details, I can walk Dog through the instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那边的示意图里已经包含了详细说明的话，我可以指挥狗来操作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... you can barely give me instructions, let alone order Dog. Bark your orders somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不…你连我都指挥不了，更别说狗了。少在我面前指手画脚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012ae6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have orders for you - for going, staying, all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有命令要给你，比如让你走，让你坐下之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗在听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012af2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Master sounds like he treats you well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来主人对你很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could I find my way back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能找到回去的路吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Not sure you could find way back once leave. Dog has to smell and hunt for path back here sometimes... Cloud keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以。但如果你离开，想要再找路回来就很难了。有时狗得靠鼻子闻才能回到这里……毒云总是在移动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow downnote, like the pronouncement of doom - the player has no escape. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It okay... no one ever leave except Dog... and Dog not want to leave. You here until Master lets you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事的…这里除了狗，没人离开过…但狗不想离开。除非主人放你走，否则你也休想离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow downnote, like the pronouncement of doom - the player has no escape. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know the way back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道回去的路吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might find way back if Master lets you go. If he not want you to go, he makes head red spray. Then Dog has to find another one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果主人准你走，也许你能找到回去的路。如果他不让你走，你的脑袋就会开花。狗只好再抓一个人来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : The last sentence is an explanation: "It's why it's so quiet here." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To leave...? Go through gate, walk. Hard to find way, Dog can do it, too hard for most to come here. Why so quiet in streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真要走的话…？穿过大门，往前走就是了。很难分清方向，狗可以，但来这儿的大多数人都不行。所以这里的街道才这么安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : The last sentence is an explanation: "It's why it's so quiet here." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you bring me here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你把我绑到这儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog fetches. Dragged you here... Dog thinks. You not struggle like others. Trap makes you sleep, make your voice go to cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗会捡东西。应该就是狗……把你拖到这儿来的。你不像其他人一样挣扎。你中了陷阱，睡着了，你的声音好像也被关进了笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doing what he was told. Tried to catch as many as he can, can eat the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗一直都很听话，努力多抓人，因为没用的人可以直接吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No eat you, though. Master talk through you, like voice inside Dog. Dog missed hearing Master, not hear Master for long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不能吃你。主人会通过你和我说话，就像狗体内的声音一样。狗想念主人的声音，很久没听到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b03_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the other voice inside you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能说说你体内的另一个声音吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about the Gala Event going off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我启动盛世庆典的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how long ago?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是多久之前吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the casino already opened, what are we doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个赌场早就打开过，我们还在这儿干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. Dog keep bringing people here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。狗只知道抓人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Master vanished around that time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以那段时间主人消失了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master went away until you show up with him on your arm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人不见了，但你来的时候，他又出现在了你的手上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, do you know why you have to go to the position on the map?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，你知道你为什么要去地图上的这个地点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to pull things...? Dog has to pull very, very hard to... are we going there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了扳开关…？狗得花很大力气，才能扳得动...我们要去那里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog not want to stay and pull things... hard to do... and cage there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不想去…那东西很难扳…还有笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does Dog know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗都知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask him. Or better, don't. It wouldn't be an interesting conversation, much like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问他吧。或者，最好还是别问了。估计也和现在差不多，你们聊不到一块儿去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Elijah doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚来这儿做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... exactly the same way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finds out it's more than a story, comes to this shining poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b26_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about the man who brought us here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想多了解一点那个把我们绑到这儿来的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is your collar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的项圈在哪儿?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did getting hit in the head cause you to start acting this way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是之前撞到头了还是怎么的？你表现得很古怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Trauma... yes, in a manner of speaking.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 创伤...没错，可以这样说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have multiple personality disorder. Some trauma caused this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有多重人格失调症。是创伤导致的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... sometimes it simply wakes voices up.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...有时候我心里就是会突然响起某种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't you control him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么控制不了他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The instinct is stronger than me. Dog is stronger than me. He's just a child... he knows when he does wrong, he just can't help himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法战胜那股冲动，狗比我强太多了。他就是个孩子...虽然他懂得认错，可他总是知错不改。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know when I first spoke, or when I first started thinking for myself, it was so long ago. I... slept for a long time... before...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经记不得自己是何时开口说话，何时开始思考的了。我…似乎...沉睡了很久...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b21_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I want to believe I was the one in control. Once. I don't know anymore. Then Dog got a new Master. A new voice. And I woke up, to protect him.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我曾想让自己相信我才是这副身体的主宰。成功过一次吧，我记不清了。可那之后，狗又有了一个新主人，一个新声音。于是为了保护他，我就苏醒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b21_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You care about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你关心他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's my brother - kin. Without him, I wouldn't exist. Maybe I was nothing more than his conscience, trying to rein him in. Useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我的骨肉兄弟。没有了他，我也将不复存在。也许我只是他良知下的产物，想要控制他的行为。但没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I just need him to show restraint, let go of the needs, the hungers. Ease the burden... just once, so I can have my thoughts to myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我只希望他能稍稍克制一下，抑制自己的本能和饥饿。放下那副重担…哪怕一次也行，好让我有时间思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does not being in control bother you so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就这么想控制他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I've watched over Dog for so long. Tried to stop him from... hurting others, killing others, quiet that mindless howling instinct of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我照顾狗很久了。我也曾经数次阻止他…伤人，甚至杀人，想要安抚他那股无处发泄的冲动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He doesn't understand, he has the brain of a child... he knows when he does wrong, he just can't help himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不明白，他实在太孩子气了…虽然他懂得认错，可就是知错不改。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're trying to protect Dog. Having Elijah control him, hurt him - you want to protect him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在保护狗。以利亚控制他，伤害他，而你却想保护他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... because all I need to do is bide my time. I'll settle this... myself, as I always planned.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...因为我想等一个机会。我想按自己的想法…将这件事彻底解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you do anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都做不了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do anything? Me... me, Dog puts in the cage, hurts himself to try and drown out my voice, when all I want to do...
ESP.TRADUIT: 能做什么？我...我，狗把我关在笼子里，为了屏蔽我的声音，他甚至不惜自残，而我只是想……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...aah... hrrr, never mind, useless. Finally had to start fighting back, screaming on my own. Had to take matters into my own hands, lock Dog up.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...啊...呵，算了，反正也没用。为了出声，我只能反击。我只能自己动手，将狗锁了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does Elijah make Dog do that angers you so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚对狗做了什么，让你这么生气？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gather others, drag them here... fetch, like an animal... and hurt them if they resist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了把其他人聚到这里…他就像对待动物一样使唤狗…甚至命令狗对那些反抗的人痛下杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't even blink, even hear their cries when he's twisted their arms full circle... fragile things, screaming on the ground...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到他们的哭喊，狗甚至连眼睛都不眨一下，就这样生生将他们的胳膊折成圆形…那些脆弱的人类，在地上惨叫着...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To listen to him... commanding Dog... to hurt others... and Dog just nods, eager and willing to serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要是他…命令狗做的…无论多么伤天害理的事…狗都照办，他的心里只有服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like it makes you mad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你要被逼疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mad? Mad doesn't even begin to describe... there's not a word for the hate I feel inside. It's consuming... twists every thought to red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 疯？那根本不足以描述…没有一个词能够形容我的仇恨。它蚕食着我...把我所有的意志扭曲成暴虐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all that's laid ruin to the world... again and again, I thought at last, we could be free... thought Dog could be free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一次又一次…将身边的一切砸成废墟，本以为这样我们就能获得自由...狗就能获得自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no, the world's always got another cage, waiting, keeping everything you want... just out of reach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可是…没有，这个世界永不缺牢笼，而你根本无法挣脱，只能望眼欲穿…却求而不得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... true enough. Sure uses the word "Master" a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...没错。他确实经常说"主人"两个字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The "Master" - Elijah... reminds Dog of someone from long ago. His leader, commander. Commanders.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] "主人"——以利亚...让狗想起了很久以前的另外一个人。他曾经的领袖、指挥官，也有多重人格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Master was a strong personality... personalities as well. Dog is slavish, was conditioned to serve the Master until death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个主人拥有强大的个人魅力…无论哪种人格。狗当惯了奴隶，他只懂得服侍主人，至死方休。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Old Man... Elijah merely came along and opened that door in Dog's mind. Now Dog does whatever the Old Man wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那个糟老头...以利亚的出现，只不过是重新打开了狗脑海中的那扇大门。现在狗已经唯他马首是瞻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you put emphasis on the word "Master" before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你之前说"主人"这个词的时候要特意加重语气？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Habit. Conditioning. It doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 习惯而已。没什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does that make him go away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这样他就会走开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is afraid of me as long as the Master isn't around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要主人不在，狗就很怕我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to discuss tactics - and positioning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要讨论战术和你的站位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders - for me. This should be good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想命令我吗？有点意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you switch back and forth between voices?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么做到在两个声音间来回切换的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All it takes is the right... command. Whenever Dog hears the... his Master giving orders, I go back in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要说出正确的…口令。无论何时，只要狗听到…他主人下的命令，我就会回到笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that leash on your wrist... and the one on your neck. I won't truly be free to... express myself until every trace of that voice is destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你手腕上的那条束带...还有脖子上的项圈。除非将所有能传递他声音的渠道全部切断，否则我永远也无法…畅所欲言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... if you ever want to speak to me, bark my audio log at him, the one in the police station. That'll call me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过…如果你想找我的话，只需要把我留在警察局里的那段录音放给狗听，我就会出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b25_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can't have possibly have set up a deadman's switch like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不可能搞出这样一个损人不利己的招数吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really. As much hatred as I hold for him, he is much, much smarter than many I've met... no offense meant, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的。我虽然很恨他，但我必须承认，他比我见过的许多人都要聪明…哦，我无意冒犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seems to not only understand the workings of Pre-War tech, he seems to breathe it. And... these collars, commandeering your Pip-Boy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不仅了解各种战前科技产品的工作原理，甚至已经到了痴狂的地步。而…这些项圈，还有操控你的哔哔小子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are the marks of someone who makes mistakes - but he's not leaving much to chance when it comes to ensuring our compliance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都证明了人是很容易犯错的——可他为了确保我们的服从，容不下多这样的纰漏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b41_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then how are the collars active again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那这些项圈怎么又重新启动的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Interesting... so it seems you have another link we don't. And... you're to blame for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 有意思…原来是你身上有着一样我们没有的东西。所以…这也算是你的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... he wears a Pip-Boy on his wrist, just as you do. If he's feeding commands and signals, then I would be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...他和你一样，手腕上也有一个哔哔小子。如果他真的在通过这东西发送指令和信号，那我可得小心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's most likely installed a contingency switch in the Pip-Boy. If the signal gets cut off, or you try and remove it... well, then we'll all die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他极有可能在哔哔小子里装了应急开关。一旦如果信号被切断，或者你尝试摘除它…那我们就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Pip-Boy could boost the signal. If Elijah has a Pip-Boy, that would explain it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哔哔小子能够增强信号。如果以利亚也有一个哔哔小子，那就说得通了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] That I don't know. The collars came back to life... I'm not sure how.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我不知道。项圈为何重新开始运作…我也不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I felt it when you woke me up... that kicking in my gut, the collar was coiled with a charge again, like a snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叫醒我的时候，我就感觉到了它…在我的体内跳动，仿佛一条蛇，盘绕着一堆炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask Dog. It doesn't matter... it's in the past, as much as I try to forget it, it's always... with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问狗吧。不重要了…过去的事情，就算我再怎么想忘掉，它也会一直…萦绕在心头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以后来又发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog happened. When the collars came off... he got... hungry. And all my work, all my effort... wasted because of his hunger, his greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗又出现了。项圈掉下来的时候...他突然…就饿了。我的全部心血，全部努力…就因为他的饥饿，他的贪婪，毁于一旦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the casino block the signal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是赌场屏蔽了信号吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It should have... the casino's construction is unusual. Signals in there get... scrambled, some alloy in the architecture... I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是…这赌场的构造不太寻常。信号在这里…会被阻断，可能是建筑内部采用了某种合金...我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure until the collars de-activated that I had won. Trapped him in his cage. Dog... I... could be free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到项圈关闭，我才意识到自己成功了，我把他关进了笼子里。狗…我…终于自由了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't he have commanded you to rescue him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不能命令你去救他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... I saw to that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能...我早有准备...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he got trapped, why didn't he set off the collars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他被困在里面了，为什么他没引爆项圈？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he couldn't. As soon as he made his way into the casino, it sealed up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他做不到啊。他一进入赌场，门就封上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and the casino's construction allowed me an opportunity to escape. The collars... unhooked. I... was free.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...赌场的建筑结构给了我逃走的机会。项圈...断开了。我...自由了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the casino opened up, then why are we here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果赌场打开过，那我们还在这儿干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because something got left inside. The Old Man... Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为有人被落在里面了。那个糟老头...以利亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's trapped in there. As I hoped he would be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被困在里面了。我求之不得呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said the casino opened up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说赌场打开过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good. As for the casino... yes, it did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。赌场...没错，它打开过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something about lights and colors, not much else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就说了一些灯光啊烟花啊，没别的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was more. Only he truly recalls, though... and should. I won't spoil it for you, especially when we have more... pressing matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实还有别的。不过得等他自己想起来才行…他不该忘掉的。但这事我就不透露给你了，尤其咱们眼下还有…更要紧的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog said he triggered the Gala Event once already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗说他曾经启动过盛世庆典。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He did, yes. A team did, with collars linked just like yours. Did he tell you everything, or just about the pretty lights?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。他和另外一支小队，戴着和你一样的项圈。他都告诉你了吗，还是只说了灯光好看之类的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还知道别的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog might know more, you should ask him. Beware the answer, because I think Dog got hungry, he couldn't help himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗可能知道得更多，你应该去问他。不过要小心他的回答，我觉得狗一旦饿了，就会控制不住自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried, I always try, and he... he keeps giving in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试过了，试过很多次…可他就是不听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b35_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Gala Event?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于盛世庆典，你都知道些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala Event is the way to bring the Old Man out. He won't show himself until the casino doors are open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有盛世庆典才能让那个糟老头现身。赌场大门不开，他是不会出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So triggering the Event is key... and the key. The question becomes... can we trust each other to do this? We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以启动盛世庆典，既是打开赌场的钥匙...也是关键所在。那么问题来了…我们可以互相信任吗？恐怕还得看情况吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we go there, you'll have to give me control. If you bring Dog out, then... I'll make sure you pay in blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要一起进去，那你必须保证我能控制这副躯体。要是你让狗出来…到时候我一定你会付出惨重的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard electricity and radios can cause, uh, voices in people's heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说长期接触电流和无线电信号会让人，呃，出现幻听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hmm... Hrrr... That's the easy explanation, the one humans use. Pre-War technology, as if it's the cause of all ills, mind and body.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这是个万金油一般的解释，人类编造的借口罢了。仿佛一切生理或心理上的疾病都是战前科技造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I needed to come out of the cage to protect Dog. From clever humans... like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想走出笼子，保护狗。让他不会被你这样……聪明的人类利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b49_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Super Mutants, brain damage is usually the result of prolonged Stealth Boy usage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于超级变种人来说。脑损伤通常是长期使用隐形小子造成的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Perhaps. Or maybe I was here all the time, watching. Waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 可能吧。也可能因为我一直都待在这里，等着你现身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any reason why you're assigned to this point on the map?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道为什么你会被指派到这里来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it's familiar, comfortable. Practice makes perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能因为我熟悉，顺手吧。毕竟熟能生巧嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as much as it bruises my ego, some things require... brute strength. In the right combination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这话让我挺没面子的，但有些事情确实需要…蛮力，加正确的步骤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b48_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, none of your assembled band of thieves look able to rip a 200 year rusted power switch down like a machete to fire up an entire town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，你们这个临时搭起来的盗窃团伙，恐怕也没人有力气能扳得动一个锈了200多年的电闸开关，来为这个镇子提供电力吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012b48_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She sighs silently, then shakes her head and motions to the West.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她轻轻叹了口气，摇了摇头指向西方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... can only type with two fingers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说…只能用两根手指打字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She slowly nods, looks impressed.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她缓缓点头，看起来很欣慰。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither Dean or Dog have the technical aptitude to man the Switching Station?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说迪安和狗都没有足够的知识来操纵开闭所吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She sighs silently, then shakes her head and motions to the West.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她轻轻叹了口气，摇了摇头指向西方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you think he wants you to go the Puesta del Sol Switching Station?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么认为他想让你去日落镇的开闭所？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, then makes a motion as if typing at keys... then she points at you, raises her left wrist and pantomimes talking into it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱了皱眉，做了一个像是敲键盘的手势…然后指了你一下，又举起左手腕，假装在对它说话。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at you, then her, looks right and left, raises two fingers, tries to type, pauses, and slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着你又指了指自己，接着左顾右盼，竖起两根手指，假装在打字，停下，然后慢慢地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b5f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure seem eager to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确实看起来急着要走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at the Fountain, then at your Pip-Boy... pauses, then points at her collar, then yours.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指指喷泉和哔哔小子，停顿片刻，又指了指你们来的项圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She encircles her throat with her hand, then slowly releases it. Then she motions again to the West.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她用手握住喉咙，然后慢慢松开。接着她再次指向西方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Wait.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <等着。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: No worries, I'll just stand here like a piece of furniture until you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心，在你完事之前，我会像个家具一样杵在这儿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful, that's my arm, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点行吗？这是我的手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her finger stabs through the red buttons, narrowing in on the local map. She scrolls to the Sierra Madre's main gate, frowns, backs out.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她戳了几下红色按钮，打开了本地地图。她把地图滚动到马德雷山脉赌场的大门，皱皱眉，又退了回来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She calls up the local map of the Puesta del Sol Switching Station, zooms in. Her intent expression loses some of its edge as she notes the marker.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她打开日落镇开闭所的地图，然后放大。她注意到了地图上的标记，专注的表情瞬间变得有些失落。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b6a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks up at you, points at marker on your Pip-Boy, points West and tilts her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她抬头，指着你哔哔小子上的标记，又指向西方，歪着脑袋看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b6a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to get shot in the face for this. Get your own!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要啊？我为了它可是差点被人爆头呢。想要就自己去搞！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want you messing with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢你这样鼓捣它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine snarls, makes a dismissive wave, and goes back to studying the Fountain intently - then looks at the casino, then the Fountain again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀从喉咙里发出一声低吼，手轻蔑地一扬，又故意回过头去研究喷泉。她望向赌场，又再次看着喷泉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啥？你想干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, and snaps her fingers at your Pip-Boy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，用手弹了一下你的哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No fucking way am I giving this to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我送你？门儿都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Show her the Pip-Boy.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <给她看哔哔小子。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine studies the Pip-Boy intently, turning your arm around as if your wrist's a sensor module she just found.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀专心致志地研究着哔哔小子，抓着你的手腕转来转去，仿佛在端详一个新发现的传感器模组。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She doesn't seem interested in the screen - she studies the exterior, then the casing. She seems to be making sure it's intact.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她似乎并不关心屏幕里的内容，却对外观和材质颇有兴趣，似乎是想确认它是否有破损。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b60_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He leaves audio logs, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他也留下了音频日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine holds out her hand, and motions at your Pip-Boy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀伸出手，指了指你的哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to trigger the event like he says.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须按他说的启动这个庆典。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the hologram projector in the Fountain. What of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指的是喷泉里的投影仪吗？怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, and raises her hands, palms facing each other, then rotates in a 180 degree arc and back again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她点点头，举起双手，掌心相对，转了180度角然，又转了回来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think he's using the Pip-Boy? To establish the projector connection?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得他在使用哔哔小子连接投影仪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She rolls her eyes, opens her mouth to speak, then stops, her face tensing up in frustration.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她翻了个白眼，张开嘴想要说话却又停住了，脸耷拉了下来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's our captor. He likes giving orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是绑架我们的人，他喜欢发号施令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She circles her finger around the Fountain and moves her fingers and thumb together rapidly, as if talking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她把手沿着喷泉比了一圈，快速地晃着大拇指和手指，好像在说话。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, stops moving her hand, then points at the Pip-Boy at your wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱起眉头，停下手中的动作，又指了指你手腕上的哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b67_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make a pretty lousy transmitter, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你传递信息的方式怎么啰里啰嗦的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She glares at you. After a second, she pauses, and smiles slightly, shaking her head. She then makes a circle of the skyline with her finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她瞪了你一眼。过了一会儿，她微笑着摇了摇头，用手在半空中画了一个圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd have to be broadcasting from somewhere nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一定是从附近的地方进行广播的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think he might be close, then. Any idea where?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉他可能就在附近。知道他在哪儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She surveys the area, focusing upwards. She glances at the casino, frowns. She then looks West, then East.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她仔细检查着这片区域，目光朝上。她瞥了一眼赌场，皱起了眉头。接着她又看向西方和东方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012b70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's been broadcasting all this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她直到现在还广播？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bombs fell, and the emergency signal went out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹落下来后，应急信号就发送了出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... it's not an invitation, it's a call for help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...那其实不是邀请，而是求救信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. The Sierra Madre's last song, one only a few people are ever going to hear. A little sad, but what can you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，马德雷山脉赌场最后的挽歌，却被一些人听到了。虽然有些感伤，但又能怎么办呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean about the Sierra Madre broadcast?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说马德雷山脉的广播是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Vera's beautiful voice doesn't run on casino power, exactly. Her broadcast is tied into the emergency broadcast signal for the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个嘛，薇拉那优美的嗓音能传遍废土，靠的并不是赌场的电力系统，而是占用了马德雷山脉赌场的应急频段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, in case of attack? Well, guess what - the night of the Gala Event, the emergency signal went out all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，就是遭受攻击时会使用的那种频道。结果呢？盛世庆典当晚，这个应急频道启动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b91_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But because the broadcast had been hooked up to the Gala Event, instead of an emergency signal, you get Vera's voice on the radio. Great, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但因为广播系统本身就是和盛世庆典串联在一起的，所以就导致你最终在收音机上听到的是薇拉的声音，而不是紧急广播。是不是很妙啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b91_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would security shut down for the Gala?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么庆典开始时安保系统会关闭？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How is the Gala tied to the casino? That makes no sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 庆典怎么会连接着赌场呢？没道理啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala Event's tied into the casino's generators?
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛世庆典连接着赌场的发电机？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, look - so, not everything about the Villa was the pinnacle of bright ideas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，听着，别墅区有些东西可算不上智慧结晶，倒更像是随便拍脑门的产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to pull off the Gala, old Sinclair had to get creative... the Sierra Madre announcement, for example. Not just for the casino, not at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了盛世庆典能够一炮打响，老辛克莱不得不另辟蹊径…比如马德雷山脉的开业广播，他打广告可不光是为了给赌场揽客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala's tied to the casino, draws on its power. Might cause it to reset itself, open the doors for a bit like it was supposed to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛世庆典与赌场是联系在一起的，需要它的电力才能启动。如果庆典开始，赌场的电力系统也许会重启，大门就有可能按原计划打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b99_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any advice to getting through this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得应该怎样才能在这儿活下来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... considering my life's on the line, too, yeah, a few things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...考虑到咱俩现在是一条绳上的蚂蚱，我还真有几条建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, keep everyone together. Keep checking behind you, make sure your partners are following... don't let them wander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，确保不要有人掉队。一定要注意身后的同伴是否跟上...别让他们四处乱跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, don't go running crazy everywhere. Almost every inch of this town is lethal. So if you're not sure, take it real slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，自己也不要乱跑。这里几乎每一寸土地都潜藏着致命的危险。如果没有十足的把握，就放慢脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And speaking of slow, don't go shouting, or attracting attention. Go quiet. The Ghost People find you, it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到慢，千万别大吼大叫，免得引起注意。关键是保持低调。要是让鬼人发现你，你就完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the people who came to the Villa?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些到别墅区来的人最后都怎样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead. Either got killed by one of the Villa's attractions, locals, or the beautiful weather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了。要么死于别墅区的各种机关，要么死于本地人之手，要么就死于这怡人的空气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can tell you right now - they didn't stick close to each other, and when they did, they let down their guard at the wrong moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实不相瞒，他们的问题就是太不团结了。即便其中有几个懂得团队精神的重要性，也会在错误的时刻放松警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some left signposts to others, trying to help them out - just led to them getting killed by someone a little more greedy than they were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人特意留了标记，好心提供帮助，到头来却被更加贪得无厌的人所杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the visitors all killed each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以来这儿的人全是自相残杀而死的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. First, they figure they can get out, escape. Then they start thinking it over, start thinking about how they can have it all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。刚开始他们都想逃出去，之后就打起了各自的小九九，想方设法地独吞这里的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They start weighing the odds, taking risks... and then taking each other out. Bomb collars or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们开始权衡利弊，铤而走险…不久就发展成拔刀相向，利用爆炸项圈或者别的方法互相残杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although... it's odd, the bomb collars weren't linked before like they are now. Guess someone learned what the problem was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过...说来奇怪，以前的炸弹项圈可不像现在这样是彼此绑定的。估计终于有人发现了问题的核心吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b92_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some medical records in the Villa Clinic. You brought her in for treatment, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在别墅区的诊所里找到了几份接诊记录。是你带她来治病的，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Clinic? Yeah, I did bring her in. Before the Gala... well, before the first Gala Event. A few lifetimes ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诊所？对，是我带她来的。那是在庆典前…呃，我说的是几百年前原定要举行的那场盛世庆典。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was a stress case, throat was shot, all nerves. When she wasn't doped up on Med-X or Superstimming her pain away...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时她压力很大，嗓子打不开，精神也很不稳定。如果她没有使用吗啡针或者超级治疗针来止痛的话……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...look, never mind. I don't want to speak bad about her. She was a classy woman, good singer, and if she couldn't act her way out of a box...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...算了，不说了。我不想说她的坏话。她是个美人，歌唱得也好，虽然她的演技实在让人无法恭维…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...she was Sinclair's world, and that's all that mattered. He didn't need to know any of that, any of her history.
ESP.TRADUIT: …但只要辛克莱看重她，这就够了。他不需要了解她的健康状况，也不需要知道她的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you met her before she met Sinclair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你在他俩交往之前，就已经认识薇拉了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Introductions? You knew her before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 介绍人？你认识她?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. What, some kind of surprise to you that I knew people once? Used to have my name in lights, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。怎么，当年我人脉很广的，这很奇怪吗？那时侯我大小也算是个名人好吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew a dozen Veras, or whatever her name was. Uh... "Vera Keyes." Figured I could pay Sinclair back, introduce the two...
ESP.TRADUIT: 像薇拉这样的女人，我认识可多了，我甚至都记不清她的全名。呃…她全名叫"薇拉·凯斯"。我是为了报答辛克莱的恩情，才替他们俩牵的线...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...guy was a slouch in the dame department, had to pick up the slack somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...辛克莱在女人这方面实在太嫩了，我就想拉他一把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b94_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我说说她的故事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vera was a big star, back before the Bomb. Not the best actress, but... well, she had other talents. Nice voice, nice legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薇拉是核弹落下前那个年代的大明星，虽然她演技不算出众，但...她有些别的天赋。比如嗓音美，腿美。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For some reason, Sinclair... he built this place... she caught his eye. Once he was hooked, that was it, had to have her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于某些原因，辛克莱…就是这地方的建造者…对她一见倾心。他上钩之后——没错就是上钩——便彻底爱上了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So made the introductions, and guess what? He builds this place for her, like some kind of Cleopatra obsession. Wasn't always a deathtrap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是我充当了他们俩的介绍人，结果你猜怎么着？他居然为薇拉修了这座赌场，简直就和某些人对埃及艳后的痴迷一般。以前这地方还没有那么危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before, you mentioned the Hologram at the Fountain - Vera? Do you know her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先前你提到了喷泉上的全息影像？是叫……薇拉？你认识她么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens during the Gala Event?
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛世庆典上会有什么节目？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it'll light up the casino, light up the sky... set the speakers in the Villa to play beautiful, soothing music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，整个赌场都会被点亮，亮如白昼.…别墅区的所有喇叭都会播放美妙舒缓的音乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and when I say soothing music, I mean with the speakers being the state they are, things'll be screaming, all right. Think air raid sirens.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我说舒缓，前提是那些喇叭都还没坏，现在这些玩意只会发出刺耳的尖叫，那声音简直比得上空袭警报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means it'll wake up everything in town like a hornet's nest. Not sure what a hornet is? Forget it - basically, trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是它们响了，那城里的所有牛鬼蛇神都会醒过来，不亚于捅了马蜂窝。你不知道马蜂是啥？算了——简单来说，情况会变得相当棘手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting? Interesting how?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣？怎么个有趣法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah... maybe the drain in power, that'll cause the security systems to shut down enough to let us in. But... getting back out?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是啊…一旦电力供应不上，安保系统就有可能断电，到时候咱们就有机会溜进去了。不过…想要再出来的话…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Fronds = Old World casino, Danny Parker = Old World entertainer that Domino didn't like too much. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the place'll close up tighter than an opening at the Fronds. Or Danny Parker's sphincter when he has to tip a doorman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难了，恐怕这大门会关得比开业庆典时的碎叶赌场还要紧，甚至紧过丹尼·帕克给门童付小费时的菊花哟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Fronds = Old World casino, Danny Parker = Old World entertainer that Domino didn't like too much. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why... it sure is interesting. Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对呀…确实很有趣。看来咱俩的想法一致？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Interesting... in the sense that having some light show open the Sierra Madre? Interesting to me, who would have thought?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 有趣…我是说在马德雷山脉赌场开幕的时候举办灯光秀。对我来说可真是太有趣了，谁能料到这种场面呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Whoops, almost revealed too much, backpedaling a bit here before the player finds him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the woman? The Auto-Doc victim - what about her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个女人呢？躺在自动医生上的那个，她怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little Miss Silence...? Maybe she needs to be in some place where she can be seen, but being heard isn't important?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那位沉默的小妞吗…？可能更适合去一个能够当花瓶，却用不着出声的地方吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about Christine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine, that her name? Nice name. I mean, you can't see it on posters, but... never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她叫克莉丝汀？好名字。招贴画上可找不到这样的名字，但...算了，不说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. She might need to hold some place where speaking isn't important. Like stage tech? Lighting? Got me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我觉得她更适合去做那些不太需要说话的工作。比如舞台设备？灯光？搞不懂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9d_2.ogg
