ESP.ORIGINAL: And me? I've had prime billing in Europe, New York... and this gig doesn't feel like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我？我在欧洲、在纽约可都举办过大型专场……这种级别的场子根本入不了我的眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I can hold an audience, conduct a score from the rooftops, but I'm guessing I'm the odd man out in this whole heist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会啊，我知道如何调动观众，我也懂得怎么站在屋顶上指挥乐队，但在我看来，我绝对是咱们这个抢劫团伙里的异类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea why he wants you there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他为什么要派你来这儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Partner, I'm not sure this guy's operating with a full deck. My bet? Process of elimination, lowest common denominator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的好搭档哟，我也不清楚这老家伙的脑子是否正常。但要我猜的话，他应该用了排除法，寻找最大公约数吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He figures the "Strong Man"'s needed somewhere, even if it sounds like the Strong Man's two minds about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他估计是对那个"大块头"另有安排，虽然听得出来，那大块头的脑子里似乎有两个人在打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus, I'm guessing wherever ol' Doggy Boy's needed doesn't need smarts. I hope not, or we're royally jones'd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外啊，我猜咱们这位狗兄要去的地方应该是用不着多少聪明才智的。希望我猜得对吧，否则咱们可就凶多吉少咯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b9f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to the marker, you're slated for a spot in Puesta del Sol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据哔哔小子上的地标，你要去的是日落镇的一个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... looks like a rooftop in Puesta del Sol. In better days, nice view. Now? It's the last place anyone wants to stand when this event goes off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…更具体说，应该是日落镇的一处天台。那地方以前风景不错。现在呢？恐怕是欣赏开业大秀最糟糕的位置了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That place during Spring, Summer, and Fall, a little bit in Winter, is a prime resort spot for Ghost People. Not the best of neighborhoods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里一年四季，除了冬天的大部分时间以外，都是鬼人最喜欢光顾的地方。可不是什么邻里和睦的好去处啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're going there, I'm not going alone. And if you have any bright ideas about telling me to stroll over there - or leave me there? No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们真要去那儿的话，我拒绝单独行动。甭管你有什么理由，想让我就这样进去，或是要我留在那里，门儿都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Vera" Hologram? You know the holographic woman?
ESP.TRADUIT: "薇拉"，那个全息影像？你认识那个全息女人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah - don't you? Or... guess Vera Keyes got lost along with the rest of the holo-archives when the bomb hit, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对啊，你不认识？…看来核弹落下后，薇拉·凯斯的事迹也和其他全息档案一道，消失在了历史的长河里啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost in name and image. Still a looker, though. Got to hand it to Sinclair, sure can pick 'em. Well, or get picked. Whichever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只剩下一个名字和外貌。不过，她确实是个美人。必须夸一下辛克莱，挺会挑人的，或者也可以说，是被她盯上了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know anything about this Gala Event we're supposed to trigger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我们要启动的这个所谓盛世庆典，你有多少了解？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposed to be the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Lot of lights, music, the works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原本要作为马德雷山脉赌场的开业大秀，搞了许多节目，张灯结彩、欢天喜地的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he's going to use the Gala Event... to open the casino? But... that's... interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙居然想借着盛世庆典来…打开赌场的大门？…这还真是…挺有趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't take any chances, though... you may be some victim who simply stumbled down here. If so, can't let you let Dog out... no, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过容我先确认一下…也许你只是个误打误撞闯进来的倒霉蛋，那样的话，我就不能让你把狗放出来…不，现在不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [01012BB1] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Speaker filter>God starts giving directions, just in case someone else fell into his trap. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012bab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're who I think you are, you came to fetch Dog, use him to drag others here. Now I'll use you - and that Pip-Boy you're wearing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没猜错的话，你应该是要来带走狗的，你想利用他来绑架其他人。而现在我要利用你，和你手上的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [01012BB1] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Speaker filter> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012bac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're smart. Clever. The key to Dog's cage is simple. Take my voice to the cage above. Let me speak to the beast inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很聪明。非常聪明。打开笼子的方法非常简单。把这盘磁带拿到上面的笼子旁边，播放它。让我和笼子里那个怪物说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [01012BB1] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012bad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you and I... we can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我和你…我们就能交谈了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [01012BB1] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012bae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it... signal frequency's hot, let's see how you deal with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行了，信号频率已经调试好了，看你还有什么花招。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switching frequency, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换频率给你看看，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switching frequency, bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换频率给你看看，婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012c3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to reset this damn thing... switching the frequencies... come on, come on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 得赶紧重启这该死的东西…转换频率… 快点，快点…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Resetting signal... resetting signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重设信号… 重设信号…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you can run? The longer you try and keep your distance, this scanning frequency will flush you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你能逃得掉吗？就算你一直躲着我，这个扫描频率最终也会让你暴露的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01suitesco_00012bb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing what I can do to shut those turrets down from up here... come on... come on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想想办法，看能不能关掉这些炮塔…快啊…快啊…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Christine Voice Activator [01012E46] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine lets the player know that two turrets are now disabled. She urges the pla EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...got it, two of 'em down... can't shut down the others - he's cut off access. Dammit! Put him down, bury him - whatever it takes!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...成了，关掉两个...其他的没办法了，他切断了连接。该死！干掉他！无论用什么手段！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Christine Voice Activator [01012E46] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine lets the player know that two turrets are now disabled. She urges the pla EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00012bf0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is... is this thing on? You hear me down there? Trying to help you out here... disable the speakers, play a little music...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这东西开了吗？你在下面能听到我说话吗？我在想办法帮你…关掉喇叭，来放点音乐吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Dean Voice Activator [01012E45] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanvaul_00012bf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and that's more like it, got a beat you can swing to. And they won't set off your collar any more - just hit that guy where it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这才像话嘛，这节奏怎样？够你跳舞的了。它们不会再引爆你的项圈了，好好给那家伙一点颜色看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Dean Voice Activator [01012E45] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanvaul_00012bf1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you've escaped?! You can't outrun me, you were always under my control! Do you hear me?! Do you hear me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你安全了吗？你休想摆脱我，你的生死由我掌控！你听到了吗？！听到了吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_00012bed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't get out. I'll bring the whole Sierra Madre down on you, bury you here with all the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你出不去的。我会将整个马德雷山脉赌场掀翻，让你和其他人全部葬身于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player's running out of the Vault, making good time, Elijah's anger is building. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_00012bee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you can escape? No, that hand on your throat is mine, always was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你逃得掉？不，我的双手早已扼住了你的咽喉，一直如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_00012bef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, those are my emergency supplies! Uh... I-I mean... I know we're in a bad spot here... just, uh, leave me something, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，那些都是我留着救急用的！呃…算了…我知道咱们现在处境也不好……就，呃，拜托你，给我剩点行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Line plays when player finds one of Dean's caches in the Villa he squirreled away for emergencies. It's an emergency. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012e51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, go on... help yourself. Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，拿吧…随便拿。干嘛不拿呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : This line plays when the player finds one of Dean's caches in the Villa that he squirreled away for emergencies. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012e52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me something, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我留点，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : This line plays when the player finds one of Dean's caches in the Villa that he squirreled away for emergencies. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012e53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never should have left those stupid handprints. Dead giveaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早知道就不留这些蠢手印了。此地无银三百两。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Looting one of Dean's stashes. He's referring to the "handprint" symbol he left for himself as clues to where he placed them. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012e54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gala
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛会
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01012EA5]NVDLC01RadioAMBMusic) DLC01 Ambient Music EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: END MUSIC
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束音乐
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([01012EA5]NVDLC01RadioAMBMusic) DLC01 Ambient Music EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not following you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没听明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Odd Man out... dead weight. Someone you need holding the toolbox, the nurse passing the scalpel, the chauffer driving you to the concert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 异类…就是可有可无。比如替你拿工具箱的人，给你递手术刀的护士，送你去音乐会的司机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012fa1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any guy with hands is who he needs up on that rooftop. Guess he thinks I don't rate, looking like I do. Poor him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正他只需要一个双手健全的人站上屋顶就行了。也许他瞧我这副模样，就觉得我无关紧要吧。可惜他想错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012fa1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there one console that runs them or several?
ESP.TRADUIT: 究竟是有一台主机，还是有几台主机在控制它们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep going. What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续走。不然呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the radios and speakers - what about a central sound system?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是收音机和喇叭——那中控音响呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The speakers are all controlled by a central console. It's the farthest from the only door out of here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有喇叭都由一台中央主机控制的。从我说的那扇门进去，它在最里面那个房间……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...so you'd need to do a full circuit of the corridor to get to it. Once there, you'll need to shut it down, and I don't have the code.
ESP.TRADUIT: …想要过去，你得沿着走廊走一圈。到那儿之后，你得自己想办法关掉它，我不知道密码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013263_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have the code, you can turn off all the speakers, make them settle down. Getting backstage should buy us time, just take it slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有密码，就可以关闭所有喇叭，让它们安静下来。躲进后台可以为我们争取一些时间，但你一定要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013263_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing you mentioned that before I ran back there, "partner."
ESP.TRADUIT: 多谢你及时提醒，我都要准备出发了呢，"好搭档。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm in danger here, all right, not exactly thinking with a level head, so cut me some slack. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，情况危急，我脑子可能不太好使，您大人有大量，就别和我计较了，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Genuinely sorry at the end, realizes player could leave him out to dry. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One problem at a time. Take a breath, try and remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们一件件来。你先喘口气，好好想想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, think. Do you know specifically where?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，想一想。你知道那些喇叭具体的位置吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... let's see. Um, once you break right, watch each turn in the corridor, one'll be on your right past my dressing room - and up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我想想。呃，你进去后，注意观察走廊内的每个转角，有一台就在我更衣室门口的右上方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013264_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, my dressing room - may have left the radio on, right by the table... uh, if you could just shut it off instead of blowing it u... uh, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，更衣室里的收音机可能还开着，就放在桌上...呃，如果你能关掉它的话，最好是别对它动粗…呃，算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013264_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there was a speaker in the prop room, too - on the wall between the entrances. And... well, walk slow - there's bound to be more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一台在道具间，位于入口处的墙上。至于其他的…你还是小心点吧，肯定还有别的喇叭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013264_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the speakers in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里面的喇叭呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah... yeah, so what? We got bigger problems with the Holograms... no, no, wait, you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 对...对。怎么了？咱们现在的重点是全息影像...不，不，等等，你说得对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Theater piped music and sound backstage, which means those little squealers are in the corridors back there, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剧场里的音乐和声音都可以传到后台。也就是说，后台的走廊里肯定也装了不少该死的小喇叭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013268_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean, the theater speakers are wired to a central sound system, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安，剧院里的所有喇叭都连着中控音响，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] What about them? The speakers won't kill you if you leave them alone, don't worry about them, just get backstage.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 喇叭？你不去碰它们，它们又不会杀了你，别管喇叭了，到后台去就是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Increased urgency at the end, but won't raise his voice. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013269_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This casino's security system is pissing me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这赌场的保安真是太让我恶心了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are preaching to the choir. Sinclair and his security... don't even get me started. Those Holograms...
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁说不是呢。辛克莱和他的保安团队…我真的不愿意提起他们。那些全息影像...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Being slightly casual in his speech here, even though his life is in danger.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... anything else you can tell me that'd help? Anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...还有什么可以告诉我的吗？什么都行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Uh... right. Uh... let's see... when you get the door open, there'll be an exit door dead ahead. Don't take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 呃...对。呃...我想想…进门之后，你会在前方尽头处看到一扇标着出口的门。千万别开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's most likely filled with toxins from the vents. So hug the wall, make as much space between you and the door... or it's Cloud Nine in a casket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面可能充满了通风口排出来的毒气。所以你要靠墙走，尽量离门远点...不然你可就要交待在那儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Past that... is my dressing room. Under the table there's a footlocker. It's tucked back a bit, so you might miss it. Inside, a gun, some ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 越过那扇门…就是我的更衣间，桌子下面有个手提柜，藏得比较深，你多找找。柜子里面有一把枪和几发子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much help against the ghosts, still, if you're about to give up, call it quits? Throw it to me so I can eat a bullet first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿来对付全息影像恐怕不行，但如果你撑下不去，想自行了断的话，麻烦你先把它扔给我，我第一个来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a little more than that to go on if we're going to break out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这么想让我逃出去的话，那你得多给我一点建议。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Anything else? I've told you all I can think of! Now, come on, get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 还想听？我已经把一切都告诉你了！赶紧，出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll head for the door on the left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会往左边的门跑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, go, and don't get yourself killed - do that, and we're both done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，去吧，千万别作死，否则咱俩都完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013279_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll break to my right, head for the locked door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会向右跑，去找那扇锁住的门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, go, and don't get yourself killed - do that, and we're both done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，去吧，千万别作死，否则咱俩都完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013266_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... just get rid of them, all right? Tried to slip off stage, then they all started changing color and raising their hands... not a good sign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…一定要甩掉它们，知道吗？我试过从舞台附近溜走，谁知它们的颜色立马就变了，还举起双手……看着相当不妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dean pleads to be rescued from the Theater's Holograms. He vanishes into the stage's scaffolding/hallways to hide away from them - Holograms are on> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how do I get you out of there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我该怎么把你弄出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me - as soon as you can, run to the door to the left - use the key you got out of the music rag there, and camp out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，你要用最快的速度跑向左边的门，然后用你从乐谱里找到的钥匙打开门，进去里面躲着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As bad as things are, it's going to get a lot worse if either of us pops - so get backstage... until we get a better plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这不是个好办法，但万一咱俩有一个嗝屁了，那情况只会更糟。所以先到后台去吧…等我们想出了更好的方法再说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001326c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't see any security coming in - only the speakers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没看到有保安进来，只看到了喇叭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what Holograms? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么全息影像？你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... those ghosts are going to come out of the wings behind you in a second, the security types, not the "friendly" bald types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…那些幽灵很快就会从你身后的舞台边上现身，它们穿着保安的制服，和你之前遇到的那些“友好”的秃头可不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you got in here, the door's probably locked tight behind you - so don't back up or run for the exit, you're not going to make it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且既然你进来了，那你身后的门很有可能已经锁上了。所以也别想着从剧院的出口出去了，没用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013265_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, makes sense. Where's the music?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有道理。音乐磁带在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Holotape should be where I left it... no, wait. It's... it's in Vera's dressing room, probably. May... may be a key to her room on my desk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息磁带应该还在原地……不，等等。也可能是在...在薇拉的更衣间里，搞不好…搞不好她房间的钥匙还放在我的桌子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013275_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway... snag the key out of my room, and look around Vera's room, the Holotape has to be there. As for getting it to the projection booth...
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之…先去我房间里拿钥匙，再去薇拉的房间里看看，全息磁带一定在那儿。至于放映室嘛…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013275_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... sometimes Vera used to watch from the projection booth, so she must have had a master key... look around her room, might be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...薇拉有时候会在放映室观看录像，所以她一定有万能钥匙...在她房里找找，应该有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013275_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but if I run, what about the Security Holograms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，要是我跑了，那些全息保安怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah... yeah, right. So... let's see... security's here because the show hasn't started. Guests aren't allowed in, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 对...对，没错。我想想…之所以场内有保安，是因为演出还没开始，观众不允许入场，所以…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...guess we need to start the show. Okay... so when they were setting this place up... we had rehearsals...
ESP.TRADUIT: …我们可以假装让演出开始。好吧…当初他们建这个地方的时候...我们彩排过几次…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013273_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and heh... Sinclair even set up hologram recordings of the shows so we could watch and critique our performances before a fake audience. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: …呵...辛克莱甚至用全息录像把彩排过程都录下来了，以便我们之后可以对着一群虚假的观众来检验自己的演出效果。真是够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013273_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, when the recording queued up, a nice, calm, appreciative audience appeared in the Theater - no security with their head-blasting zap rays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键在于，录像播放的时候，剧场内只会出现一群彬彬有礼又颇有教养的假观众，那帮头顶放光的保安此时就会消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013273_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, find the music, get it to the projector room upstairs, then play it...? Might reset security, worth a shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你如果能找到录像带，拿到楼上的放映室里播放…兴许安保系统就会重启，值得试一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013273_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting backstage is a temporary measure if I can't find the security terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲进后台只是权宜之计，关键还是得找到安保控制终端。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] One thing at a time - and buying time is what we need, all right? Think in the now, it'll sort itself out. I hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 饭要一口口吃，现在重要的是争取时间，好吗？船到桥头自然直，会有办法的。也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I go to the locked door, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我要跑进那个上锁的门，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] What? Oh, my left - your right. So, yeah, run to the door on your right. Heh, almost got you killed there. Us killed there.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 什么？哦，我的左边就是你的右边。对，应该去你右手边的那扇门。嗨，瞧我差点害死了咱俩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait - I need to head to the door to your left or my left?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等——我要去的是你左边的门还是我左边的门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Right, the locked door to the left. Watch out, the guards are going to materialize in any second, crouch and take it slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 对，左边上锁的门。小心，守卫随时会出现，你最好蹲下来，慢点前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013278_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I wanted to know. I'll head out, see what I can do on my end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先了解这么多吧，我会去想想办法的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you blackmailing her with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用什么来要挟她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What wasn't I blackmailing her with. Chem use, indiscretions, more chem use... the usual Hollywood tune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还能有啥呢？滥用药物，品行不端，以及——滥用药物…反正就是好莱坞常见的那些套路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Superstimmed" is a chem, supposed to heal chronic damage and suppress pain. Causes a damaging numbing affer-effect. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like Sinclair, people are the architects of their own misfortunes. Leave themselves wide open for someone to waltz right in and take what they want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像辛克莱这种人，命中犯太岁纯粹就是咎由自取。要不是他自己门户大开，又怎么会有人趁虚而入呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Superstimmed" is a chem, supposed to heal chronic damage and suppress pain. Causes a damaging numbing affer-effect. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as they take a single step into the trap. Get a few pictures, get a little dirt, and that person's your piano.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他们入局，只需要几张照片，再加一点黑料，就能将他们玩弄于鼓掌之间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Superstimmed" is a chem, supposed to heal chronic damage and suppress pain. Causes a damaging numbing affer-effect. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vera? Med-X was her thing, even Superstimmed herself for the after-rush. Sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于薇拉？她喜欢吗啡，甚至为了过瘾，不惜注射超级治疗针。简直病态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Superstimmed" is a chem, supposed to heal chronic damage and suppress pain. Causes a damaging numbing affer-effect. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you want her to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让她做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair built this whole town to accommodate her. Same with the casino's voice lock. He wanted to make sure she had access to everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱为了讨她欢心，不惜斥巨资修建了这个度假村，还将赌场的声控锁也设成了她的声音，他想把这里的一切都交给薇拉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And since I already had access to Vera... well, that meant I had access to the vault, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我只要将薇拉捏在手心…呵，那就等于将避难所的钥匙也捏在了手心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you blackmailing Vera Keyes to break into the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为了进入马德雷山脉赌场，曾经要挟过薇拉·凯斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Blackmail" is such a strong word. I asked her, she said yes, then... she started to get cold feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说"要挟"有些过了，我只是求她帮个忙而已，本来她都答应了，谁知后来…却心软了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I blame Sinclair... he was such a victim, that maybe she felt it would be too easy... it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是辛克莱的错...他太老实了，搞得薇拉可能于心不忍…不过无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this Holotape in your safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在你的保险箱里找到了这盘全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? Little bit of two-reel memories... we're here to steal from the Sierra Madre, not from each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？小小一卷磁带，包含多少回忆呀…不过我们的目标是马德雷山脉赌场，可不是各自的私人珍藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player found a blackmail tape Dean used for heist. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair?! Sinclair, I'm trapped. Please, oh god, the security systems won't let me out, they're keeping me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱？！辛克莱，我被困住了。天啊，安保系统不允许我出去，我被关在里面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair! Sinclair!
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱！辛克莱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all pay for what we've done. I'm so sorry, Sinclair. Sorry, I... I should have trusted you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都是自食其果。我真的很抱歉，辛克莱，我……我本该相信你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end of whole sequence. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to die here, amongst the ghosts. I... I'm still being recorded by the holographic system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要死在这儿了，死在这些幽灵身边……那些全息设备还在录着我的一举一动……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The doors, they... they sealed. I... I can hear the other guests, screaming to be let out, to let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门……门被锁住了。我……我能听到其他客人的惨叫，哀求着让他们出去，放他们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let go? Let go of what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 放手？对什么放手？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : As if talking to herself here, slightly confused. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came so far to be here... now, now I just want to leave. Please... let me leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我花了那么多心思……可现在，现在我只想离开。求求你，让我走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair? Sinclair, where did you go? Why did you leave me here? Why...
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱？辛克莱，你到底去哪儿了？为什么把我丢在这里？为什么…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair, is that you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱，是你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Starlet Hologram [010116D6] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Recording of Vera being trapped in the Suites.>Desperate, final moments, followed by quiet, letting go at end. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...would you stop? Such a kidder.
ESP.TRADUIT: …别这样行吗？ 真会开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Vera Keyes, auditioning for Love Sets Sail... god, this script. Don't get me wrong, I'm happy to have the w...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是薇拉·凯丝，正在试镜《爱已起航》…天哪，这破剧本……哦，别误会，我很高兴能得到这份……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...is that a plane over head? Those bombers are nothing but big hornets buzzing around the sky these days...
ESP.TRADUIT: ……我们头顶是刚过去一架飞机吗？那些轰炸机像蜜蜂似的，成天飞来飞去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...is it gone. All right. This is Vera Keyes, auditioning for "Love Sets Sail."
ESP.TRADUIT: ……它走了，很好。我是薇拉·凯丝，正在试镜《爱已起航》…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Malcolm... ever since our freighter went down, I feel like my heart's fallen to the bottom of the ocean along with my... ugh"
ESP.TRADUIT: "马尔科姆…自从我们的货船沉没之后，我感觉我的心也一起沉到了海底…连同我的……呃"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...along with my career. God... heh... all right, all right...
ESP.TRADUIT: …连同我的事业…上帝啊…呵，好吧，好吧…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([010138C3]NVDLC01StarletDialogue) 010138C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01sta_nvdlc01starleth_000132a3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty as a picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是美若天仙啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Holotape Filter for whole topic. No ghoul filter for Dean.>A recording of Dean walking into Vera's dressing room, predatory, blackmail. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Dean, I... didn't hear you come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊...迪安，我...没听见你进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: This whole topic is a holotape recording.>Vera is in her dressing room, when Dean walks in. Tense. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not wearing my dancing shoes, so I walk a little softly now. What, you think I was a Chinaman, come to cut your American throat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没穿舞鞋，所以脚步很轻。怎么，难不成你把我当成了中国佬，要来暗杀你这美国人了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安，别这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... no hug? Come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了…来抱一个吗？来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean, I'm getting ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安，我要上台了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sing like a bird, pop the safe, and we're as through as through can be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好好唱歌吧。等金库的事情办妥了，我就不再为难你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean... I just... about tonight, I... I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安…可我...今晚，我...不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know? I ask one simple favor of you, and you tell me "no?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道？我只是请你帮个小忙，连这你都不答应？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, tense, Dean's here to insure Vera's cooperation in the heist. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't say no. I just said that... I don't think...
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有不答应。我只是...觉得这样不行...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, getting tenser. Dean's about to tell Vera she's going to do the job, no matter what. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, you don't think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，你不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Cold, angry. Holotape recording, getting tenser. Dean's about to tell Vera she's going to do the job, no matter what. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need you - I'll send you back to the farm, worse off than you were, because you'll have seen the Sierra Madre, and had to let it all go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你了——我可以把你送回农场，你会过得比以前还糟，因为你已经见识过马德雷山脉赌场的奢华，舍不得放手这样的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, getting tenser. Dean's about to tell Vera she's going to do the job, no matter what. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have gotten any leggy dame out of Hollywood to get out here and play Sinclair's heart strings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早知道就随便找个好莱坞的长腿美女来勾引辛克莱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, getting tenser. Dean's about to tell Vera she's going to do the job, no matter what. "Holowood" intentional. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just happened to be the one I caught, and it was really your own fault, a little too much into the chems and meds, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不过是恰巧遇到我慧眼识人，可你却自甘堕落，沉迷于药物之中，而且……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, getting tenser. Dean's about to tell Vera she's going to do the job, no matter what. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, shhh, don't cry. Look, I'm not trying to hurt you. Just one last little job, a little less dirty, a little less messy. He trusts you, Vera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊呀，哟哟，别哭啊。听着，我不是有意要为难你的。最后一点小忙，不必搞得这么难堪。他相信你，薇拉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, now Dean's softening her up, realizes he doesn't need her as an emotional wreck... now. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so do I. After this, I promise you, all those other Holotapes, they'll go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。我保证，这事结束以后，所有这些全息磁带，它们全都会消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Holotape recording, final doomed note here. Dean's lying, he'll never stop using her or the blackmail. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，迪安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, final doomed downnote. She's trapped. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanholo_000132c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's still alive on each floor - including you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每层的人都还活着——包括你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still trying to find out. Not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还在想办法，我也不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... even if they all end up dead, though, you say there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...就算他们都死了，你说还可以通过马德雷山脉赌场的档案来复原这首歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal to tie it all together? Easy. Just a little legwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端将档案拼到一块就行了对吧？简直小菜一碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? For the love of... chopping up her voice box was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？天哪…算了，反正改造她的声带本来就十分冒险。这样一来只能放弃备用计划了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives, right? Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此...还是可以利用赌场的档案来修复这首歌的，对吧？只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端进行操作就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine is alive. Dog... well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀还活着。狗…他…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget that walking stomach, not interested in being his lunch... just glad the girl's all right. Where is she? Is she here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了那个怪物吧，我也不想变成他的午餐…我只是很高兴那个姑娘还活着。她在哪儿？还在赌场里面吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... no, if the Sierra Madre assigned people to floors, she's got to have been sent to Vera's room, right? That's irony for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下……如果马德雷山脉赌场会自动安排人们到各个楼层去，那她肯定已经被送到薇拉的房间了，对吧？老天爷可真会开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perfect, couldn't have worked out better. So - what, you're heading to the main terminal now that you've got this floor unlocked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可真是太棒了，简直万事俱备。既然这层的门锁都打开了，你现在是打算去操作主终端吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> If Christine's throat surgery was your plan, too late, she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 如果克莉丝汀的声带手术也是你计划的一部分，那很可惜，她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Dead? After all I went through... after all that hauling her body through the streets?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 死了？我费了那么大的劲儿…千辛万苦地背着她走街串巷…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Really... "partner." Now, now... you can't pull one over on Dean... but you tried, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 说真的啊..."搭档"。这种级别的谎话可骗不了迪安…虽然你的想法不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you don't want to share... keep her from me, huh? All we have to do is make her sing, and it's all ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看这样子，你是想吃独食咯…不乐意我碰她吗？我们只要让她唱首歌，就能发大财了呀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132aa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although... why lie to me? I'm hurt. I mean, we don't even need her if you get the terminals live, and the music kicking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这样…为何还要骗我呢？我真的很受伤。你看，如果你能启动终端，让音乐响起的话，我们甚至都用不着她呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132aa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were using Christine's voice box to smuggle Vera's voice in, she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是想用克莉丝汀的声带来“重现”薇拉的声音，那我告诉你，她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And here I thought I was being clever. Teach me to hold my cards a little closer to the chest... whole heist was a gamble anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是我自作聪明了。这件事教育我下次得把底牌藏得更深一点…不过随便了，这场抢劫本来就是一次豪赌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives, right? Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此…还是可以利用赌场的档案来修复这首歌的，对吧？只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端进行操作就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you were trying to smuggle one inside? Where is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你曾经夹带过一盘录音进来？它在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's safe. I hope. Right now, let's focus on getting everyone else to safety, all right? Everybody else all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它很安全。应该吧。我们还是先确保大家都平安无事吧，好吗？其他人情况怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So - what, you're heading to the main terminal now that you've got this floor unlocked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这层的门锁都打开了，你现在是打算去操作主机了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. You got a point. You better not let me down. Try and get into the Sierra Madre without me? You'll wish you hadn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，挺有道理的。最好别让我失望，你要是敢抛下我独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定会让你后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < Weighing the player's offer, makes sense. > EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... look, if the Holograms are here to keep me company, then... I don't mind staying here for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...听着，如果那些全息投影会来和我作伴的话，那…我可以在这儿多待一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But listen... when this thing goes off, try and get into the Sierra Madre without me? You'll wish you hadn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你听好了……等这玩意启动后，你要是敢抛下我独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定会让你后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < Weighing the player's offer, makes sense. > EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal can tie the fragments together, just need to wrap it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端会把片段拼接起来，我只要最后点个确定就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that I've got the signal established to this floor, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经设置好了这层的信号，所以是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right - well, thanks for bailing me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，谢谢你救我出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, that's the next step. You going to be all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，这就是下一步。你会没事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be fine, don't worry about me. Go on ahead, I'm going to try and unwind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事的，不用担心我。去吧，我想在这儿吹吹风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it means I can get out of this alive, yes, that's why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正能活着出去就行，这就是我来这儿的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least you're honest, can't blame you. I'd have done the same if there was a trigger to my head... or a collar on my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少你很诚实，也怪不得你。如果有人用枪抵着我的脑袋...或者脖子上套个项圈的话，我也会做同样的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No - believe it or not, I wasn't going to leave you to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，信不信由你，我不会丢下你不管的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... people can still surprise me. All right, I believe you. You got spine. Guess the bombs left a little human goodwill behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真应了那句老话…知人知面不知心。好吧，我相信你。你有骨气。看来核弹还没有带走人类所有的良知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one who put these collars on us wanted me to deal with everyone first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们身上安项圈的那个家伙，想让我先对付你们所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figures... wish he'd show himself, although I'm betting he's not doing that until we've cracked the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出所料啊…要是他能亲自现身就好了，不过我估计得等到咱们打开了避难所，他才会出现吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means we'll still need a copy of the song to get into the vault... and after all I went through to smuggle a copy inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以想要进入避难所，我们还是需要一份录音…好在功夫不负有心人，我已经成功夹带了一份进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... you said this guy wanted you to deal with all of us first? What, is everyone else here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下...你说那老头要你先搞定我们所有人？那就是说其他人也都进来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If by "recording inside," you meant Christine, she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你所说的"夹带进来的录音"是指克莉丝汀，那她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figured that out, huh? Clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然猜到了？挺聪明的嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> If by "recording inside" you meant Christine, she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 如果你所说的"夹带进来的录音"是指克莉丝汀，那她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? For the love of... Chopping up her voice box was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？天哪…算了，反正改造她的声带本来就十分冒险。这样一来只能放弃备用计划了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? For the love of... this whole heist was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？天哪……算了，反正这次的抢劫本来就是一次豪赌。看来只能放弃备用计划了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine is alive. Dog... well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀还活着。狗...他...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget that walking stomach, not interested in being his lunch... just glad the girl's all right. Where is she? Is she here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了那个怪物吧，我也不想变成他的午餐…我只是很高兴那个姑娘还活着。她在哪儿？还在赌场里面吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... no, if the Sierra Madre assigned people to floors, she's got to have been sent to Vera's room, right? That's irony for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下……如果马德雷山脉赌场会自动安排人们到各个楼层去，那她肯定已经被送去薇拉的房间了，对吧？老天爷可真会开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perfect, couldn't have worked out better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就太棒了，可以说万事俱备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait - you said you have one inside? Where's the song recording you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等——你说里面也有一盘录音？那盘录音在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's safe. I hope. Right now, let's focus on getting everyone else to safety, all right? Everybody else all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它很安全。应该吧。我们还是先确保大家都平安无事吧，好吗？其他人情况怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one who put these collars on us wanted me to deal with everyone first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们身上安项圈的那个家伙，想让我先对付你们所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figures... wish he'd show himself, although I'm betting he's not doing that until we've cracked the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出所料啊…要是他能亲自现身就好了，但我估计，得等到咱们打开了避难所，他才会出现吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means we'll still need a copy of the song to get into the vault... and after all I went through to smuggle a copy inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以想要进入避难所，我们还是需要一份录音…好在功夫不负有心人，我已经成功夹带了一份进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... you said this guy wanted you to deal with all of us first? What, is everyone else here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下...你说那老头要你先搞定我们所有人？那就是说其他人也都进来了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Realizes what the player just said. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132a6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I'm not sure how to do it yet. You said you had a recording outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我还不太清楚该怎么做。你说过你在外面有盘录音带？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, yeah in the Villa. But I have one inside, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，对，在别墅区里。但里面也有一盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : A little cagier here, is trying to figure out if Christine is alive. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can talk about that later, though, it's not important right now... you came for me, any sign of the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 待会再说吧，现在这件事不重要...你都能找到我了，那其他人呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : A little cagier here, is trying to figure out if Christine is alive. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The song still exists in fragments in the Sierra Madre archives on each floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这首歌分成了好几个片段，就藏在赌场各层的档案室中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess Vera echoes down through the ages, then. Sierra Madre hasn't completely forgotten her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来薇拉的声音回荡了数百年，马德雷山脉赌场还没完全忘了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's why you showed... you wanted what was in the music archives on this floor, hook up the signal. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你才来这里…你想找到这一层保存的音乐档案，然后再把几个片段拼接到一起，聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001329c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as I re-establish a frequency to each floor, I can rebuild the song.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我重新设定每一层的频率，我就可以修复这首歌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The key is a song by Vera Keyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钥匙是薇拉·凯斯唱的一首歌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Are you sure? That song... that stupid song of hers... no, that makes perfect sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你确定？那首歌.…那首破歌…啊，原来如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it was always playing here in the casino... dammit, if I'd only brought a recording inside... so, what, you're trying to recover it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难怪赌场当时老在循环播放那首歌…见鬼，要是我能带盘录音带进来就好了...怎么，你要尝试复原它？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132b6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing with a key to her room?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会有她房间的钥匙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I have to spell it out? Come on. Time's wasting, and those Holograms are going to be on us any second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 连这种事我都需要向你解释？拜托，时间不多啦。那些全息影像随时都会启动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...got it, two of 'em down... can't shut down the others - he's cut off access. Dammit! Put him down, bury him - whatever it takes!
ESP.TRADUIT: ...成了，关掉两个...其他的没办法了，他切断了连接。该死！干掉他！无论用什么手段！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Christine Voice Activator [01012E46] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine lets the player know that two turrets are now disabled. She urges the pla EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000132e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and that's more like it, got a beat you can swing to. And they won't set off your collar any more - just hit that guy where it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这才像话嘛，这节奏怎样？够你跳舞的了。它们不会再引爆你的项圈了，给那家伙一点颜色看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Dean Voice Activator [01012E45] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanvaul_000132df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can handle a 200 year old washed-out lounge singer, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个过气了200年的酒吧歌手，我对付起来根本不在话下，相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I'll try the key and see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先试试这把钥匙也无妨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll talk about this more when we're face-to-face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条等咱们见面了再细聊吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're a terrible liar. See you soon, Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？多谢你如此坦诚。待会儿见啦，迪安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of all the... where the hell are those stupid Holograms already? Even if you get back here, you won't live long, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的…那些该死的全息影像怎么还不出来？就算你能跑进后台，你也命不久矣，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...that plan sounds pretty clear to me. Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这计划听起来挺靠谱的，明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So as long as I make sure I don't run for the exit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我只要不往出口跑就行了……

ESP.ORIGINAL: What... what now? Try and come back here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么...怎么？难不成你还要往后面跑？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you belong out in the audience... I mean, not like... uh... you could get backstage. That key you snagged, it won't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你只能呆在观众席…你不能…呃…来后台。你拿到的那把钥匙，没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...head backstage, destroy every speaker, grab every key, then shut down security...
ESP.TRADUIT: …所以我只要去后台，破坏所有喇叭，拿走每把钥匙，再关掉安保系统……

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm that predictable, am I? You're probably right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的心思有那么容易预料吗？你可能说对了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I should have figured you'd have an escape plan. Clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早该猜到你已经想好了逃跑计划。真聪明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a betting man, I've come too far to leave it to chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢赌博，我已经花了这么大心思，可不能再靠运气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? What makes you think you can slip out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你凭什么觉得自己可以溜出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I figure it, you'll try and run for the exit, and only I know where the key is - and where the safest place in the whole theater is: backstage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我看，你会往出口跑，但只有我才知道钥匙在哪里，而且我也知道，这座剧院最安全的地方，其实是后台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, you're trapped down there, and you couldn't shut off the speakers, unlock the doors, or cancel security if you tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你，你在下面插翅难飞，既关不了喇叭，也打不开门，解除不了安保措施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the collars, huh? Kill me, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那项圈怎么办？如果我死了，那...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] No... no... the collars... I know what happened now. Sure, mine activated... but it feels different, the electronic tapdance inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 不...不...项圈…我现在明白怎么回事了。没错，我的项圈是启动了…但振动的频率感觉和以前不一样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can kill you and still make it out while security is busy frying you to a crisp. Hands are clean, then smooth sailing to the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算我杀了你，也可以放心逃走，任由保安将你的尸体烤成焦炭。我也不必担心弄脏自己的手，还可以大摇大摆地开进马德雷赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the collars? You sound awfully eager to kill someone whose life is tied to yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那项圈怎么办？咱俩可是生死与共的伙伴啊，你就这么舍得对我动手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... I know how the collars behave now, in here anyway. At least the Sierra Madre gave me that.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...我已经明白项圈在这里的运作机制了。是马德雷山脉赌场点醒了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should be thankful, in a second, it'll give me another gift - with any luck, security'll leave enough of your ashes for an urn on my mantle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该感恩，很快它就会再送我一件礼物——希望保安能留你几片骨头渣，毕竟我还想把它们装进骨灰盒，放到壁炉上供着呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine with me. Come on, let's settle this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没意见。来吧，咱们做个了断吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm not going to fight you - I'm going to let security show you out. Didn't see anyone come in? Well... they'll be here soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我不想和你打，我会让保安们代劳的。怎么，你没看到他们？...他们马上就到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Security? What security?
ESP.TRADUIT: 保安？什么保安？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't see anyone come in? Well... they'll be here soon.
