ESP.TRADUIT: 你没看到外面有人？嗯…他们应该很快就会来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And go on, run for the exit door, this'll be fun to watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去吧，往出口跑吧，我会好好欣赏你的表演的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, Dean, turning me to ash? Hardly the way to end a beautiful partnership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，迪安。咱俩合作不是挺愉快的嘛，你居然就想这样把我轰成渣？也太绝情了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame... I regret it. Still, you dames are all the same - things get a little hot, you get cold feet. That's why I'm still alive. You? Well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到合作…真是丢人，我早就后悔了。何况，你们这帮人都是一路货色，但凡碰到个硬茬，立马就两腿发软。所以我才能活到今天。而你？哼……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013302_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... hmm. Never mind, doesn't change anything. The Sierra Madre's still waiting for us to crack it open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这……算了。没什么意义。马德雷山脉赌场还在等着我们破解呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001330d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you need her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么需要她？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because she could get closer to Sinclair than I ever could. He built this place for her... well, after the two "chanced" to meet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为她能比我更接近辛克莱。这地方可是他为了取悦她而建的……就在他俩"邂逅"之后不久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001330c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think she was sick, yes. Found a medical report in her Suite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得她病了。我在她的房间里找到了诊断报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about? Medical report? Vera wasn't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说什么？诊断报告？薇拉没有...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013310_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the Med-X and Superstims. And here I thought she was trying to numb herself to the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: …吗啡和超级治疗针。我还以为她是怯场，所以想让自己不再畏惧灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013310_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair must have known, though. He was dense, not in that way. But... that doesn't make any sense. If she was sick, dying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱肯定知道。他虽然迟钝，但这方面还是很敏感的。可是...这说不通啊。如果她真的病了，快死了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013310_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...then why build this place? Why start a damn casino and have her be the lock?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...那为什么要盖这个地方？为什么要开这该死的赌场，还拿她当做这里的钥匙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013310_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm positive you have it. Now, I'll just kill you and take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信你有。我打算直接杀了你，拿走钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Hey, hey... now... w-wait... I... ah, forget it. Time for the hard way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？嘿…不对...等-等等...我...啊，算了。那就来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <THEATER: Dean curses Player, getting ready to fight to the death> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001330f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me the key, Dean, and you walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我钥匙，迪安，然后你就可以走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, based on your response, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你的回答，我很确信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right... look, I'll hand it over, I promise. No need to get all upset. We can both come out ahead in this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧... 听着，我会把钥匙给你的。没必要搞得场面太难看嘛。咱们大可以一块出去，然后既往不咎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001330e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet I can figure out how to unlock the exit without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算没有你，我敢打赌，我一样可以打开出口的门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Lucky guess... you sure about that? Because if you make a mistake... well, Sierra Madre's got us both.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 猜得不错…你确定吗？要是你猜错的话…那咱俩可都要交待在这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013313_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not a betting man, which means I'm betting you have the key to the exit on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是个赌徒，所以我猜测，你身上一定有钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yeah, you're a gambler. Me, I don't take chances. Trust me, only one of us has a sure out.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 是啊，你确实是个赌徒，可我不喜欢冒险。相信我，我们中只有一个人能逃得出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I wanted to know. Ready to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就想知道这么多了，准备好受死了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always asking questions when you should be shooting. You're a piece of work, I'll give you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明明早该动手了，却还问这问那的。不得不说，你可真是朵奇葩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013312_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this Holotape in your safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在你的保险箱里找到这盘全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't just stop robbing casinos, do you? What's that tape... oh, the one with Sinclair's woman, Vera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你抢劫起赌场还挺有心得的啊？这盘带子是...哦，是辛克莱的女人，薇拉的磁带。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013311_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about it? You want me to give you a standing ovation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么？难道你想让我为你起立鼓掌吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013311_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has the Cloud decayed your brain? Forget the Sierra Madre!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些毒云把你的脑子了给毒傻了吗？别管马德雷山脉了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in killing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣杀你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you really that stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真这么蠢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I waited an entire lifetime! Sitting in that Villa, watching it all fall apart - Sinclair's Sierra Madre towering over everything? Untouched?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等了一辈子！就这样干坐在别墅区里，眼睁睁地看着这里日渐衰败。而辛克莱的马德雷山脉赌场，那座不可一世的城池，却仍然完好无损地立在那里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you show up, thinking you can just take it all from me, you and the old man running the show? I planned all this, I made it all happen, not you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你们一来，就想夺走我的一切，你和那个老头打算坐收渔翁之利。要知道这一切都是我策划的！是我的劳动成果！不是你们的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, yeah, I have the key on me. I made other keys, too, to unlock the casino and ruin Sinclair, finally. After all these years...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，没错，我身上有钥匙。其他的钥匙我也有，我费了这么多功夫，就是为了打开赌场，亲手毁掉辛克莱的遗产。这么多年过去，这天终于来了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... now... now I think ruining you and all your plans would be enough for me. Kill me, I still win, you're never getting in the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...现在...现在只要能毁掉你和你的计划，对我来说就足够了。即便你杀了我，我一样赢，你们永远也别想进入避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it, I'll just kill you and take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我还是直接杀了你，然后拿走钥匙吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quit stalling, hand it over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别磨磨蹭蹭的，交出来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to give me the key or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底给不给我钥匙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... I give you this key, and there's nothing to keep you from just killing me and running. And as I see it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看啊…如果我给了你钥匙，也就失去了利用价值，你大可以直接杀了我，然后跑路。依我看……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I just gave up my ace in the hole. So... the only chance I've got left is making sure you don't leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: …那等于是我主动放弃了最后的底牌。因此...我唯一的机会就是确保你走不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there's no way in hell I'm letting you get to the Sierra Madre vault instead of me. Not after all this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我好不容易才走到这一步，决不能放任你进入马德雷山脉赌场的避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001331c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must know me enough by now to know I'm not going to put you in danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱俩认识的时间也不短了，你应该看得出来，我不会让你陷入危险的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, right, after all the "we'll both blow up if you don't do as I say" talk we first had. Not put me in danger? Right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，刚见面时你怎么说的？"如果你不听我的，我们就同归于尽"。不会让我陷入危险？少来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... yeah, you're right. You didn't have to switch on those Holograms, and you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错...没错，你说得对。你完全可以不必打开那些全息影像的，但你还是打开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even when you first showed up in the Villa, you didn't threaten me, were just willing to cooperate to get through this. Hnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你第一次出现在别墅区时，也没有恐吓我，而是表现得十分配合，愿意和我仔细商量。唔……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you can count on the Holograms, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要有那些全息影像就没问题的，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... yeah. You got a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vera's stayed powered up since the bombs fell... those Holograms will, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹落下那么久了，薇拉都还有能源...那些全息保安应该也没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Really? You're not the one standing up here waiting for the Ghost People to show, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 真的？得了吧，在这儿提心吊胆等着鬼人来索命的人又不是你，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just trust me, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... yeah. You got a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't trust me? Then trust our collars. I die, you die. Got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不相信我？那相信项圈总可以吧。我死，你也死。明白吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Trust you? Right. You're not the one who has to sit up here and wait for the Ghost People to show.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 相信你？得了吧，在这儿提心吊胆坐以待毙的人又不是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, what do you want to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎样才肯干？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... yeah. You got a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not about to trade your life for mine, got it? Remember the collars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不会为了自保而把你牺牲掉的，明白吗？你忘了项圈的事了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] What do I want? I want a little more insurance than some Old World Villa construction to guard me, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 怎样？我只希望能有一个比这老房子更坚固的东西来保护我，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean... a man with cold feet isn't someone I'd share a bed with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安…我是不会和临阵脱逃的人穿一条裤子的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, hold on. I didn't say I was scared. Heh, heh. Cold feet? Don't be ridiculous. I've played to worse crowds than this, I can hold the fort here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，打住。我可没说我怕了。呵呵，临阵脱胎？别扯淡了。再糟糕的演出场面我都经历过，守住这里对我来说不是问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't do this, I'll go shut off the Holograms now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是不听我的，我现在就把全息影像关掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You wouldn't. I mean... no, wait, you would. You don't bluff, ever since you first showed up in the Villa and we chatted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你不敢...不，等等，你敢。你是个说一不二的人，你第一次出现在别墅区和我说话的时候，我就看出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you wouldn't. You're not the type. Even when you first showed up in the Villa, you didn't threaten me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...你不会的。你不是这样的人。我们第一次见面的时候，你丝毫没有威胁我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just let me talk, not even letting on that our collars were linked, when all you had to do was tell me that to get me to come along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直顺着我说话，甚至连我们俩的项圈绑在一块儿这件事，你都没告诉我。其实如果你说出来的话，我肯定会乖乖跟你走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... no, I don't think you'll shut them off. You don't threaten people, not your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…我觉得你不会关掉全息影像。你不擅长恐吓别人，这不是你的风格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ab_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do what I say, or I'll break both your legs and leave you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 照我说的做，不然我就打断你两条腿，把你扔在这儿自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I break your legs, you can't leave - only scream. Here, in the middle of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我打断你的腿，你就走不了了——只能在镇中心哀嚎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it only means I wouldn't come back for you. Ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，但我也不用再来管你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't... no, yeah, you would. I would. If I thought you screaming wouldn't attract more of the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不敢这么做……不，是的，你干得出来这种事。换我也会这么想，只要尖叫声不会引来本地人就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Suspicious, warning. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013391_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll stay here. For now. But you leave me high and dry, make a run for the Sierra Madre? You'll pay for it, I promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我暂时留在这里。但你要是敢丢下我，独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定要你好看，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Suspicious, warning. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013391_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is your hands to hold the wires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只要抓着电线就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could break both your legs, leave you here on the roof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以打断你的腿，把你丢在屋顶上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't. You need me to strike up the sparking chords there. Breaking my legs isn't any way to get me to dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会的。你还需要我给你当电线桩呢。要是打断了我的腿，你也就没戏唱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of us dying wasn't my plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想咱俩一起死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need to kill you, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可我并不需要杀你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001338f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, let me see if I can reactivate the Holograms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让我看看能不能重启全息影像。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I remember correctly, there should be two Holograms you can switch on in the area... just don't remember how.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我记得没错，这个区域应该有两个全息投影仪可以打开...只是我不记得怎么用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001338e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do that, and I'll consider waiting on the rooftop. Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能启动它们，也许我会考虑待在屋顶上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001338e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I switched on two Holograms to cover the courtyard, those should protect you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打开了两个全息影像，让它们把守庭院，应该能保护你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You powered the Holograms up? Well... yeah, that's pretty good protection. Sure worked at the fountain, Vera kept the Ghost People away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打开了全息影像？哦...行吧，倒是个不错的防护措施。比如喷泉那里，就是薇拉的影像让鬼人不敢靠近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, uh... how do I know the power won't suddenly go out? And... I don't know, this still sounds risky to me. For me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，呃…万一它们的能源突然耗尽怎么办？而且...我总感觉，还是很冒险。对我来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could just throw you off the roof. What about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以直接把你扔下房顶。怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're full of it - you kill me, we both die. You wouldn't dare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你尽扯谎——你要是杀了我，我们都会死。你不敢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you leaving me here? No dice, not going to happen, and nothing you can say will change my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你想把我留在这儿？门儿都没有。说什么我都不会改变主意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013395_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I can guarantee they won't come into the courtyard below?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我可以保证他们不会进入下面的院子呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... yeah. If the Hologram systems still work, that'd do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 那…也行。如果全息影像系统还能工作的话，这法子倒是不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... all right, you call up some of those Old World stiffs, that'd be an audience I wouldn't mind having below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧……那行，你就去张罗几个旧世界的老古董到这儿来吧，我不介意让他们当我的观众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013398_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Villa has Holograms everywhere. If I switch on some to cover the area...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区到处都有全息影像，只要我启动其中几个，让它们看守这片区域……

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yeah, and how can you guarantee that? I'm not waiting here alone, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 行啊，但你要怎么保证？我可不想一个人在这儿干等，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, if I had a few of those Holograms... or a few hundred... surrounding me, maybe. I'd settle for two, enough to cover a quick exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果能给我张罗来几个全息护卫…当然几百个更好…只要能保护我就行。哪怕两个也行啊，足够掩护我开溜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013399_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. What's it going to take?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那你开个条件吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take? It's not going to take anything because you couldn't offer me anything to stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 条件？没有条件。无论你给我什么好处，我都坚决不会待在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ghost People'll come out of the woodwork when the Gala Event starts blaring, and when they see me trapped up here? It's curtains for Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦盛世庆典启动，那些鬼人就会纷纷从石头缝里钻出来。要是被它们发现我一个人待在楼顶上，那我的人生也就到此为止了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I clear out all the Ghost People in the area, will you change your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我清理了这个区域所有的鬼人，你会改变主意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you want to know why? Because there's more beneath the streets, in the buildings, and oh - everywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会，你知道为什么吗？因为下面的每一寸街道、每一幢建筑——哦，以及其他所有地方，都有它们在活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They hear anything out of the ordinary, especially "music" screaming through the speakers when I close the connection? They'll be here, fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何异常响动都会传到它们的耳朵里。尤其当我切断连接，喇叭里响起了雄壮的"音乐"的时候，它们不用多久就会找到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I need you to stay here and do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我要你留在这儿启动庆典。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the middle of town here? Alone? On a rooftop, with a big lightshow in the air?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要我待在镇中心？一个人站在屋顶上，身后的夜空中还噼里啪啦地闪着烟花？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what - why don't you just give me one of those Space Age Cosmic Knives so I can slit my wrists, be less painful checking out that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你啊，倒不如直接塞给我一把大宇宙菜刀，让我就地割腕得了，这样起码还能死得痛快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If re-connecting the speakers is part of the Gala Event, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果为了启动盛世庆典就必须打开喇叭的话，那我也在所不惜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look... I strike up the speaker system, there's going to be ghosts all over this place. Any change in the sounds around here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着…一旦我打开扩音系统，鬼人很快就会占领这里。但凡这地方有一丝响动...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the Ghost People are not big on talking, they are big on listening. Hunting. Killing. More vicious than music critics, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: …虽然鬼人不会说话，但它们听力很好，杀人的手段也很犀利。比那些乐评家犀利多了，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013390_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could just jab both wires into you, close the circuit that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以直接把电线戳在你身上，形成回路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You don't strike me as the type, especially after our little "how can I cooperate" chat at my home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？我还真没想到你是这种性子，你在我家时的态度可是相当谦和呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001339f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Real funny. Although you know, after your "collar talk" in the Residential area, I believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思。不过回想起咱们在居住区里那段“亲切而友好”的交谈，我觉得这种事你是干得出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the plan. Are you going to be able to do it safely?
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划就是这样。你在这里安全吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... "safely?" Around here, that word doesn't come cheap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…"安全？"这种事可不敢轻易打包票啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013396_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safely? What, after your sweet-and-ruthless talk when we first met, now you care about my safety? Right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安全？怎么，刚见面时你还一副咄咄逼人的样子，现在倒关心起我的安全了？真行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013397_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a Hologram guarding the courtyard below, you're covered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面已经有个全息影像在守卫院子了，你不会有事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless he's got a friend, no dice. Nobody relies on a single escape route unless they want to get caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得给他找个伴儿，否则没用。没有人会只盯着一条逃跑路线，那不等于作茧自缚？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless he's got a friend, no dice. Nobody relies on a single escape route unless they want to get caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得给他找个伴儿，否则没用。没有人会只盯着一条逃跑路线，那不等于作茧自缚？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013b12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me hunt around, maybe there's something I can do to protect the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我四处看看，也许这附近还有什么东西可以用来保护这片区域。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can look all you want... I still feel safer with a pair of Hologram escorts to make it through the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你找吧...我还是觉得有两个全息护卫更安全点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you make it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西你拿什么做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scrape some Cloud Residue off the walls, mash it in a Tin Can with some Junk Food from the machines, then hold your nose and down it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从墙上刮了点毒云残渣，和售货机里的那些垃圾食品一起捣进罐头里，然后捏着鼻子，一口闷下去就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's Electric Hot Plates around if you can't find a campfire to mix it at. Also, there's other recipes you can do with the Cloud Residue...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想学着做，却找不到营火，附近也有不少电磁炉可以用。对了，毒云残渣还可以用来酿造别的东西……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...although it might take a hardier survivalist than me to brew them. I stick to martinis.
ESP.TRADUIT: …但那些就留给命硬的人去试吧。我还是做些马提尼酒就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scrounge supplies? Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜刮物资？都什么物资？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still need to eat. At least I think I do. The Villa provides... even if it's not as glamorous as the Cantina Madrid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总得吃饭啊，反正我觉得自己该吃饭。这别墅区里倒是有不少食品供应…虽然不如马德里餐馆里那样美味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I... well, realized what you could scrounge up around here, I had a lot of time to experiment. Not the best chef, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我……呃，发现这里蕴藏的各类宝藏之后，我就花了很多时间来钻研烹饪。虽然说不上厨艺精湛吧，但……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ba_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...well, here's the mix, if you can stomach it. I call it a "Sierra Madre Martini."
ESP.TRADUIT: …喏，送你一杯，我自己调的，希望能入得了你的喉。我管它叫"马德雷山脉马提尼。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133ba_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found one of your stashes. Why did you leave them around the Villa?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你的一个储物箱。你为什么要把它们丢在别墅区的各个地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Survival. I still needed to leave the Residential Area to scrounge up supplies, and I don't like taking chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？为了活命啊。我偶尔还是需要离开居民区去搜刮些物资的，而我这人不喜欢冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Villa's dangerous. So I left weapons and stims in case I got in a tight spot. Then, of course, you show up, putting your mitts on everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别墅区非常危险。所以我四处留了一些武器和治疗针，以防遇到紧急情况。谁曾想你来之后，就把这些东西全都笑纳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose this qualifies as an emergency, so I'm not complaining. Much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这也可以算是一种紧急情况吧，所以我也没什么可抱怨的……是吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133bb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can use these somehow? To make... make Sierra Madre Chips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以使用这些来制作… 马德雷山脉赌场的筹码？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if I find what you're talking about, you can let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我找到了你形容的东西，你再提醒我吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you teach me how to do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能教我怎么做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods. She then makes a series of hand motions to represent weight and amounts - enough so you think you could do it on your own.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，然后做了一系列用于表达重量和数量的手势，你觉得自己已经领悟了她的意思。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need a battery... a Fission Battery... and Scrap Metal? And you can counterfeit the chips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只要一块电池… 一个裂变电池…和废金属？就可以仿造这个筹码？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, impressed. Then she points at you, then her and makes a circle.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头。然后指着你，画了个圆圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if I find whatever objects you're trying to describe, this might make more sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许等我找到了你要形容的东西，我就能搞清楚你要说的意思了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不懂你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她笑了，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your Pip-Boy, makes a motion of opening it up and removing something from it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指指你的哔哔小子，然后做了个打开的手势，仿佛从里面取出了什么东西。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then raises her hand and makes the motion of smashing it and holding up the remains.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [接着她举起手，比了个砸烂的动作，又将砸过的东西捧在手心。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can make more of those at a Workbench. With the right materials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要有正确的材料，你就能在工作台上造出更多筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, then thinks for a moment. She then points at your pack, and taps the back of her wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她皱皱眉，思考了一会儿。她指了指你的背包，又敲敲她的手腕。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, there's more. All over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，外面到处都是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, looks frustrated for a moment, thinking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱了皱眉，看起来有些失望，努力思索着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She stands still for a second, then stops, and slowly makes the motion of bending down and scooping something up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她笔直站了一会儿，然后慢慢弯下腰，好像是在捞起什么东西。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Then she holds the imaginary object in her hand, as if heavy, and puts it in front of her, as if on a table.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她将这东西握在手心，感觉分量沉甸甸的。接着她把这东西摆在自己的面前，仿佛那里有一张桌子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then hefts what looks like a small box, and pours it on top of the object, looks at it, then reaches down and holds up a small "O."]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她举起一个形似小盒子的的玩意，将它倒在那东西上，又端详了一会儿，然后将手指围成了一个圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine points at your pack, then points at the Fission Battery and the Scrap Metal.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指了指你的背包，又指了指裂变电池和废金属。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... can make more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…可以制造这种筹码?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她笑了笑，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can... scrounge more somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以…找到更多这种筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, looks frustrated for a moment, thinking.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她皱了皱眉，看起来有些失望，努力思索着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We really don't have time for magic tricks right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们真的没时间变魔术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她微一皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000139ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want... a small circle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要个…小圆圈？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她微一皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a Sierra Madre Chip. I'll need that back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。记得还我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She examines the chip for a second, raises it to her eye, then turns it to the side, gauging its diameter and width.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她把筹码放在眼前翻来覆去研究了一会儿，似乎在测量它的直径和厚度。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She runs her finger over the surface slowly, checking the engraving. She then tosses the chip back to you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她慢慢用手指抚过筹码表面，仔细端详着上面的铭文。然后把筹码扔回给了你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She then pretends to look around, sees something on the floor, then pretends to bend down and pick it up. She then looks at you and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [接着她环顾四周，假装在地上发现了某样东西，俯身将“它”捡了起来。表演完后，她望着你，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133d1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any Sierra Madre Chips on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上没有马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, then waits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，继续等待。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know what those machines around the Villa are?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那些别墅区里遍布的那些机器有什么用吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head, then pauses, and makes a small circle with her thumb and forefinger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀摇了摇头，然后停下来，用拇指和食指围成了一个小圆圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at you, and makes the motion of putting something in her palm.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着你，做了一个把东西放在手掌上的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000133cf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you show me where?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以告诉我是哪儿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog can... see where back of collar is? Follow down, to lower back - hit neck, middle back, right on spine, crack. Then they not get back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以…知道项圈背面吗？从那儿一直到后腰，脖子，后背中间，还有脊椎，朝那儿用力，它们就起不来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013454_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog hits them, then Dog eats them... easier to make quiet twice that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗打倒它们后，再把它们吃掉…这样它们就彻底消停了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013454_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog knows where to hit them, make them stay down... base of neck, lower back, hit it hard enough, life snaps out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道它们的要害，可以让它们再也爬不起来…比如脖颈下部，后腰，只要用点力，就能杀死他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013444_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That all seems lethal. Sort of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉这些方法都挺致命的啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Dism... disin... chop legs off while stand up, eat when fall down. If not that, make them electric ash.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 肢什么…熔什么…反正只要把它们的腿打断，或者趁它们倒下的时候将它们吃掉就行。如果都不行，就把它们烧成灰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Tries to say dismemberment and disintegrations, gives up. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... dismemberment and disintegrations take them down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…用肢解或者熔解的方式就可以将它们彻底消灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] All make them stay down. Most of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 只要不让它们再站起来就行。大多时候都有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013456_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you need to eat them to make them stay down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以想不让它们活过来，你就必须吃掉它们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... if you rip their arms off... or legs, mask people stay down. Easier to rip off legs and arms when they fall on ground, just keep hitting them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…只要把把它们的胳膊…或腿扯下来，这些面具人就再也爬不起来了。它们倒地的时候，扯断胳膊腿更容易些，用点力气就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001344a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If can't make them fall down and rip off legs, make them ash. Saw one caught in electric sparks so much, he turn into burnt pile. Not get back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果来不及趁它们倒下的时候把腿扯断，那把它们烧成灰也行。狗见过其中一个家伙被电火花点燃，烧成了渣，它再也没有爬起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001344a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you eat the Ghost People?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么吃鬼人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗也不喜欢老吃它们，可它们有时数量太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013445_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't that make the voice mad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样不会让那个声音生气吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice doesn't get mad when Dog feeds on the people here. Voice not like Ghost People, worried there are too many to eat, too many knives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗吃这里的人的时候，那声音不会生气。那声音也不喜欢鬼人，他只是担心它们数量太多，吃不完，会被刀子砍伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013462_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Started eating them because wouldn't go quiet when Dog smashed them with bear jaw. Only want one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗只能吃了它们，因为就算拿熊夹子揍它们，它们也不肯消停。本来吃一只就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, as if relaying an important secret. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013463_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got Dog angry, others kept cutting him and slicing him with knives when he tried to make one go quiet with teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可是它们把狗惹毛了，狗咬住其中一个，想让它安静点，但其他鬼人老是拿刀子来砍狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, as if relaying an important secret. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013463_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Dog started crushing them, then when they stop twitching, then eats them. Then they not get back up with hssss-chkk noise, Dog not like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以狗把它们都打成了稀巴烂，等它们都不动了，狗就吃了它们。它们也不会再爬起来，发出嘶嘶的噪音了，狗不喜欢那种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, as if relaying an important secret. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013463_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog can tell when they not yet dead... twitch a bit, make low noise, then noise when they get back up, listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗能分辨它们死没死…先是微微抽搐，发出低沉的声音，接着仔细听，就能听到那种噪音，然后它们就会爬起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, as if relaying an important secret. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013463_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I watched you devour one of the Ghost People.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见你生吞了一个鬼人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many. Keep stabbing Dog, cutting him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗也不喜欢老吃它们，可它们有时数量太多了，还总爱用刀来刺狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001344f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how the Ghost People taste?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道鬼人是什么味道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taste like plastic and copper. Gas inside, in pockets, hssss when teeth sinks into them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 味道就像塑料和黄铜。袋子里一股臭气，咬下去的时候，嘶嘶地漏气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001344b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I'll go hunt for food, you just stay here, and wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我去搞些肉来，你在这儿等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... for a moment there, I thought... hnh. I'll wait here then, come back when you've found meat from two of the bodies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…只待一会儿的话，那我觉得…嗯。我会在这儿等你的，你只要带两块肉回来就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000134cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to trust me if we're going to get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要熬过这关，你就得相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you'll throw me in the cage when you need to, just like at the Police Station. Trust you? No... you've made trust... difficult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你只会在必要的时候把我扔进笼子里，就像你在警察局时干的那样。相信你？不...你让我很难对你产生信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013442_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not staying here and doing what you "order" me to do. Not again... and the sequence here? Just see if Dog can figure it out on his own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不会待在这儿任由你"摆布"。绝不会再有第二次了…至于这些开关的顺序？那就看狗自己有没有本事领悟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013442_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of food should I bring back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该带什么食物回来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog has torn apart a number of the inhabitants of this town... while he doesn't prefer them to... other flesh... it'll do for the time being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗曾经杀死过这里的不少居民…虽然比起其他肉，他真的不喜欢这些家伙的味道…但拿来充饥还是可以的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013443_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find some of the inhabitants... it'll require some hunting on your part. Kill them, take some of the remains inside them, bring it back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得想办法寻找这些居民…这就要考验你的捕猎本领了。杀了它们，割下它们的肉，带几块回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013443_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're not easy to kill. But... I have faith in you, and the beast must be fed if you want him to stay in this cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然要杀死它们并不容易。但…我对你有信心，想要让野兽待在笼子里，就得先喂饱它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013443_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to trust me. I let you out of the cage in the Police Station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完全可以信任我。毕竟在警察局的时候我都把你从笼子里救出来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right... but trust? Trust is such a... harsh word. I prefer... mutual need. It's more honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错…但你说信任？信任是个…很严肃的词。咱们现在这样顶多…坦白点说，只能叫各取所需。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013461_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I can help you. These wiring diagrams... I know how to operate the switches in sequence to make fire appear in the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮你。有了这些示意图…我已经知道该怎样扳动开关才能让烟花启动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013461_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... we just need to make sure that Dog doesn't surface before that happens. To do that... he'll need to be fed. That makes him stay in the Cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我...我们必须确保在这过程中狗不会跳出来捣乱。所以…得先将他喂饱，把他关在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013461_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worried about being attacked if left here? The gate looks strong enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你担心待在这儿会被袭击？可这门看着挺坚固的啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Villa was built to decay, but parts... parts were well-defended, indeed. There was a method in the layout, you can... see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这别墅区虽然是个豆腐渣工程，但里面的一部分设施…确实很牢靠。教你一种方法…通过外表布局就能识别出这种地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001345c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal outside... one of those means this place was designed... properly. No, if locked, it could hold others out... and even Dog inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如外面那台终端…只要出现这样的东西，就说明此地的设计…是合格的。所以，假如门关上的话，不仅外面的人进不来…狗也出不去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001345c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how to operate the switches?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道怎么操作这开关吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do. And after you threw me in the cage at the Police Station, I have no intention of telling you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。可因为你把我扔在了警局的笼子里，我不想告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013459_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do... the diagram there tells me what I need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道...那边的示意图已经告诉我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001345a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you won't do it, then Dog will, like he did at the police station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不做，那就让狗来，就像我在警察局时那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... this time is different. The key is different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...这次不一样了。问题的关键变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet I can get Dog to stay here, if you won't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不肯的话，我可以唤狗出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really... an amusing thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个……想法挺滑稽的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013451_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you needed his teeth to devour those metal switches, chew up the diagram, then let him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你希望他咬掉那个金属把手，吃掉整块电路板，那你大可以放他出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013452_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a sequence, precise and clear as a knife, that must be followed. And it requires more than instinct to operate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些开关的操作是讲顺序的，必须严格按步骤来，不能随意改变。要执行这样的操作，光凭直觉可不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013452_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you need me, here - out of the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你需要我留在这里——而不是把我关进笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013452_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to stay and operate the switches for the Gala Event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你留在这儿操作庆典装置的控制杆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can lead me to water... no, being trapped in this courtyard while lights are flashing and sirens are screaming...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是强人所难...不行，一旦庆典开始，不仅漫天烟花，还会警报大作，而我到时候却独自留在这个院子里……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013450_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can survive one or two of the inhabitants... more than that, even Dog would have to work to keep full without being carved to pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果只引来一两个鬼人倒还好…可要是再来多几只，恐怕就连狗也无法保证自己不会被撕成碎片，除非你能让他填饱肚子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013450_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the gate here... if it somehow got locked, it'd be the holding cell at the Police Station again, except with no way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有那扇大门，万一它意外锁住了，这里就会变成另外一间警局牢房，只是这次连逃走的办法都没有了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013450_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是想折磨你，他是想改造你的声带，从而解开一个声控锁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: An audio-lock to where? To the Sierra Madre vault. It's voice-activated. And he wanted in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声控锁？开哪儿的？马德雷山脉避难所的吗？原来它是声控的。他想进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013448_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That makes sense. So... those bodies in the Clinic... all right. Dean always felt like the odd one out, and he kept... studying me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就说得通了。所以…诊所里的那些尸体... 好吧。难怪我总觉得迪安这人神神叨叨的，他好像一直在…打量我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013448_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was trying to figure out if I recognized him... and see if my throat healed. I'll deal with you first, then I'll deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来他是害怕我认出他…还想搞清楚我的喉咙是否已经痊愈。好吧，我先对付你，再去找他算账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013448_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't put you in that Auto-Doc. Dean did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你放进自动医生的不是我，是迪安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean? He put me in there? No, I don't believe it. He didn't have any reason to torture me. You, on the other hand...
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安？他把我放进去的？我不信。他没有理由折磨我。而你…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013449_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even with the differences in the Villa, I don't want to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我们在别墅区时有些分歧，但我不想和你打。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] No, I believe you. All along, you were watching out for yourself. I understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我相信你的话。一直以来，你考虑的只有你自己。我理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013446_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I wonder what you would have done if there hadn't been these collars. Would you have gotten me out of the Clinic at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不禁想知道，如果没有这些项圈的话，你会怎么做？你还会不会把我救出诊所？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So as long as we're "in this together," and it's a choice between you and me? I know what you're going to choose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 纯粹因为咱俩曾是“一条绳上的蚂蚱”，如果换成你必须在咱俩之间做出选择时，我很清楚你会怎么选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013446_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not gonna wait for that to happen - again. I'm tired of being controlled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想让这种事再次发生。我不想再受人摆布了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013446_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're inside the casino. We don't need to fight anymore, it's useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经进入赌场了，没必要再自相残杀了，根本没有意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I believe you. And that's not the point. That collar... I believe you got caught by Elijah, too. I don't think it changes who you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我相信你。但这不是重点。那个项圈… 我相信你也是被以利亚绑架的。但我觉得这并没有改变你的为人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013447_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How you behaved in the Villa... all that was you. And as bad as these collars are, maybe it kept you from being worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在别墅区里的表现… 那才是你的本质。虽然项圈不是什么好东西，但也许戴上它的时候，你反而有所收敛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013447_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's the worst part about all this. That it takes something like that to keep you from hurting someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是最可怕的地方。为了不让你伤害别人，居然得用这样的东西来限制你的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013447_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know I didn't put you in the Auto-Doc, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也知道，把你绑在自动医生手术台上的人并不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, Elijah... it doesn't matter. Both of you have run out of places to hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，以利亚…都无所谓。反正你们已经无处可藏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There'll be a second or two of lag while you switch it. That's long enough for me to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你转换频率时会有一两秒的延迟，足够我杀你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see. I don't think you're gonna have the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走着瞧。我觉得你来不及的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013464_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done talking? I want to put your little theory to the test.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说完了？那不妨把你的理论付诸实践吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and run, it won't matter, the signal will find you. Get too close to me, then the signal'll lock on. You can't get away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想跑也没关系，信号很快就能找到你。要是敢近我的身，信号也会锁定。你逃不掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... your collar's still on. So you're not free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可…你也还带着项圈啊。你也不自由嘛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, it helps... as long as I need to control your movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 呵，用处可大了…能把你牢牢控制在我手心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013457_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can modify the detonator signal. I don't see how that helps you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能修改引爆器的频率。我看不出来这有什么用处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Free? I have more freedom of movement than you do, and that's all I need.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 自由？至少我的行动比你自由，这对我已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013458_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that like a science thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是什么科学道理？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I did. And it means I can control your movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的。所以你现在已经逃不出我的手掌心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013466_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You found a way to modify the collar's radio frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了修改项圈信号频率的方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You'll find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013467_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If killing you will shut you up, let's do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果杀了你就能让你彻底闭嘴，那我乐意至极。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've had your voice back for only a little while, and I'm already sick of listening to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声带还没恢复多久，可我却已经听腻了你的废话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，沉默确实更合适。等你的主子现身时，我也一样会把他干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < Christine talks smack back and starts the fight. "Master" is delivered with disgust.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you planning to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we first met, I thought I recognized the collar technology. Just needed some time to experiment with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们刚见面的时候，我就认出了这种项圈技术，只不过我需要一些时间来做实验罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I noticed the signal lag as soon as you arrived on the floor. Collar detonator signal's down to a dull thud, more like a heartbeat than a screech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚进入这层楼，我就发现信号出现了延迟。项圈引爆器的信号频率越来越低，从原本尖锐的噪音变成了有规律的心跳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you can kill me, then make a run for the exit before my dead man's signal catches you and blows that collar. Not gonna be that easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为杀了我之后，只要在我的信号引爆你的项圈之前逃出这层楼，就可以高枕无忧了？可惜没那么容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Suites here gave me enough tools and enough time that our frequencies... I can push and pull that collar of yours however I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这间套房里有不少工具，而且我恰巧也有时间……现在，我已经可以随意地篡改你项圈的信号频率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001344e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you'd leave me in that elevator? I haven't forgotten what you did in the Switching Station, not for a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然把我丢在电梯里？我可没忘记你在开闭所时对我做过的事情，一点都没忘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trapped down in that room in the dark, listening to that sound, like saw blades. I could barely breathe... couldn't even scream!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被困在伸手不见五指的房间里，听着那个声音，锯木头似的声音。我几乎不能呼吸… 甚至无法尖叫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was like being operated on in that Auto-Doc in the Clinic... all over again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简直和我之前在诊所里被绑在自动医生手术台上时的感觉……一模一样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to throw me in the Auto-Doc? Toss me back in the Clinic where you found me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想把我扔给自动医生？想把我丢回之前那间诊所？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know the Stimpak reservoirs ran out within an hour of being in there? I was in there for two weeks, and it kept... repeating the procedure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我躺在手术台上，光一个小时内就打完了所有治疗针吗？我在那儿躺了整整两个星期，而手术……从未间断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Med-X, stims are healing items, and Christine didn't have any, very painful. Now is going to make player pay. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Med-X, no stims, just... that sound, feeling the scalpels... cut. Now... we're going to see how you like it when someone else is in control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有吗啡，没有针剂，只有…那台机器的声音，和手术刀切开我身体时的痛苦。现在……我要让你也尝尝被别人捏在掌心的滋味！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Med-X, stims are healing items, and Christine didn't have any, very painful. Now is going to make player pay. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001345f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can switch the proximity of the detonation frequency. Try and run? I'll have the signal seek you out, blow up your collar from a distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以变换引爆器的频率范围。想逃？用信号就能把你揪出来，就算你跑得再远，我也可以炸掉你的项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013460_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come in close, maybe get the upper hand? I'll set off the proximity detonator, and your collar'll blow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你企图靠近我，我也会在近距离启动引爆器，把你的项圈炸成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013460_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at the casino, makes a movement with her hands as if talking, and then repeats the squinting gesture.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着赌场，用手比划着，仿佛在说话，然后不停地挤眉弄眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001349f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine waits, studying you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀一边等待，一边打量着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013beb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're not heading to the police station, are we? Ghost People hunt there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不是要去警察局吧？那儿有不少鬼人啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnh. City smells bad in some places, so bad it makes people fall down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。这城里有些地方味道不太好闻，会把人熏倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful, the Villa's filled with pockets from the Cloud. Lethal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心，别墅区里到处是聚集的毒雾，会致命的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011341_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine sniffs the air, then touches her neck and frowns. She gestures at the air and taps her wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀嗅了嗅，然后摸了一下自己的脖子，皱起眉头。她指着空气，敲了敲自己的手腕。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes narrow. She raises an index finger, as if listening, then points ahead grimly and pulls back an imaginary trigger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛。她竖起食指，好像在聆听。之后，她冷冰冰指着前面，做出了扣扳机的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011337_1.ogg
