ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks at the machine and frowns. She points at the narrow slot on the side and raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看着这个机器，皱起了眉头。她指着那个狭小的插槽，扬起了眉毛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001133b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine studies the area, then the Police Station. She pretends to unload a weapon and holds up the imaginary cartridge, waving it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀仔细打量着这个区域，又看了看警察局。她假装卸下一支武器的弹药，又举起弹夹挥舞着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001133c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair's little surgery carts. Kept them around for his lady friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱的专用手术台，他还为他的小女朋友也特意订购了一台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The police station... Ghost People love this place, no idea why. Might be the Holograms nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警察局…鬼人很喜欢这儿，不知道为什么。可能因为附近有全息影像吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001133a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those machines... Sinclair's little gifts, lasted longer than he did. If you need food, stims... put in a chip, hold out your hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些机器...是辛克莱的小礼物，倒是比他活得久。如果你需要食物，治疗针…只要塞几个筹码进去，然后伸手就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean doesn't like these machines. Recognizes their worth, just hates their tie to Sinclair (casino founder), feels it made people beg like dogs. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001133f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty circle on machine, all glowing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个机器上的圈圈好漂亮，都在发光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001133d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those machines feed on Sierra Madre Chips. There's codes that unlock other things, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些机器会吃马德雷山脉赌场的筹码，如果有代码，还可以解锁其他东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001133e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Begin again - but know when to let go."
ESP.TRADUIT: "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Christine hesitates for a moment, preparing herself to speak the password to open the Vault Elevator. A pregnant pause, then she delivers. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001172c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dealt with the other two in our team, now I need you to open something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把队里的另外两个人干掉了，现在我需要你来打开某样东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Open something... my voice. That's why it's hers... someone wanted to use me as a key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？ 打开东西... 我的声音。所以我才会有她的声音…有人想利用我来当钥匙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001172d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I can do that... hope you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可以帮你…希望你准备好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001172d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you use them for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要用它们来干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't argue that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这倒是没错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sources of food, supplies... medical assistance, ammo... make more collars, even print currency. Make a nation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稳定的食物来源，生活用品…医疗救助，武器弹药……项圈，甚至还可以印发货币。足以建设一个国家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Cloud allows me to wipe the slate clean. Collars ensure cooperation. Holograms - defense. The Vending Machines provide... everything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒云可以让我轻松扫平一整片地区。项圈用于巩固权威，全息影像作为防卫部队，而售货机则提供……其它一切物资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre can kill nations and build them, using its technology with the right applications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要正确地运用马德雷山脉赌场的技术，任何国家都可以轻易地被摧毁和重建。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you secure that, that's all you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得到它以后呢？就满足了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, there is one last thing I want from the Sierra Madre. Its bounty. The machines that fill its streets, its corridors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，马德雷山脉赌场还有一样东西我也想得到——它的物产。那些遍布大街小巷的售货机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They provide, provide almost anything. Perhaps in the Pre-War era, they were commonplace, things to dismiss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们几乎能提供一切物资。或许在战前的年代，它们平平无奇，已经面临淘汰 。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, they are far more valuable. You know it. They helped keep you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如今，它们却拥有巨大的价值。你也看到了。它们可以为我们的生活提供保障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Working as murderous deathtraps, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，作为杀人陷阱确实很管用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Properly? Are you kidding me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 正常？你开什么玩笑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Holograms here kill trespassers. That's what I want. Dump one of those emitters in the middle of any battle, there's no defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像可以杀死入侵者，这就是我想要的。将来无论遇到怎样的战争，只要丢下一台全息影像发生器，再强大的防御手段都将失去作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like holding light in your hands. Can't fight it... only watch it burn. Just one is a portable army. Arm it - anyone stands against you, dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就仿佛你将一束火光握在手心。敌人将对此束手无策…只能眼睁睁地看着它燃烧。仅仅一台机器就抵得上一支军队，有了它，任何人都无法再反抗你的意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand how an Old World casino helps you do any of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不明白，一座旧世界的赌场怎么能帮你办到这些呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Cloud is unique in my travels. Its proximity to the Sierra Madre isn't a coincidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未见识过毒云这样独特的物质。它之所以会萦绕在赌场上空，绝不是巧合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right now it protects this casino, preserves it. It can be used to preserve other Old World relics - and cleanse them, at the same time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它保护了赌场，使它能够维持本来的样貌。所以，它也可以用来保存其他旧世界的遗产——同时净化附着在它们身上的污秽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as much as I've researched hologram technology, the Big Empty facility was clear - only the Sierra Madre got Holograms working... properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我花了很多精力研究全息技术，但大空山的设施里却没有类似的东西——只有马德雷山脉赌场的全息影像…还在正常运作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want from the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底想从马德雷山脉赌场这里得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I want. Weapons. Security. A citadel of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想得到什么？武器，安全。一座属于我自己的堡垒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Madre's all these things. It's a fortress and a weapon. A chance... to... "begin again."
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷拥有以上这一切。它既是一座要塞，也是一件武器。它给了我一个机会…一个… "从头再来"的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I unlock its archives, I can carve the Mojave into any shape I choose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我揭开了它的秘密，我就可以随心所欲地改造莫哈维了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117b4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never heard of the place you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的那个地方，我从来没听说过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Empty's a treasure box, a scientific graveyard of Old World misery. Like the Sierra Madre... there's treasures there, sleeping. Some, awake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大空山是个宝库，埋藏了许多给旧世界带来苦难的科技。和马德雷山脉赌场一样，无数宝物长眠于此…不过其中有些依然醒着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Holorifle, the Saturnite alloy... the hologram technology, hibernation chambers, Securitrons, the collars...
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息步枪，土星矿石合金……全息影像技术，冬眠舱，电子保安，项圈……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...even the suits attached to those things stalking the Villa... that's only the surface of what's there. Right now, the Sierra Madre is what I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……甚至包括别墅区里游荡的鬼人身上的防护服……这些都还是冰山一角。但现在，我唯一想得到的只有这座马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117ae_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they're Pre-War tech, where did you get them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是战前的技术，那你又是从哪儿得到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A place far from here, called the Big Empty. Almost didn't make it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从离这儿很远的一个地方，叫大空山。我差点儿死在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were two others there... a woman. And a man, a courier. The woman was familiar... the other... I don't know what happened to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时那里还有另外两个人…一男一女，男的是个邮差，女的我很熟悉…而那个男的…我不知道他到底经历了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get the collars?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是从哪儿得到这些项圈的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The collars. They're Pre-War tech, I suspect this great land had... compliance issues before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 项圈吗？它们是战前的科技产物，我怀疑这个地方在战前曾经出现过一些……管理方面的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's one of a series of models. The one on your neck? Special, easier to make adjustments. Unreliable in other ways, notably radio interference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它有很多种型号，你脖子上的那个是特制的，便于调整。但相应的，它的质量并不好，尤其容易受到无线电的干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_000117ad_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你目之所及的都是这里的历史。能亲眼目睹它的人屈指可数，今后也不会再有这种机会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Old recordings, like in main casino floor.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the past you're walking through. Few have ever seen it. No one else ever will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你目之所及的都是这里的历史。能亲眼目睹它的人屈指可数，今后也不会再有这种机会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino on main floor, similar filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro and uses same as MainCasinoFloorPowerOn.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I worked hard to get here, it'll give me what I need before I leave. And it'll always welcome me back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我费劲千辛万苦才来到这里，在离开前，我要从它那里得到我想要的一切，我也要让它今后永远欢迎我的归来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino on main floor, similar filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro and uses same as MainCasinoFloorPowerOn.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... look for a way to wake this ghost up, remind it it's got guests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在…该去唤醒这个沉睡的幽灵了，告诉它，有贵客登门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino on main floor, similar filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro and uses same as MainCasinoFloorPowerOn.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你目之所及的都是这里的历史。能亲眼目睹它的人屈指可数，今后也不会再有这种机会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah + speakers in *back* casino, main floor, similar filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro, same as MainCasinoFloorPowerOn.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d4_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你进来了。能听到我说话吗？电力不太稳定……现在用的是应急电源。哦！收到你的信号了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through main lobby speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorIntro.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You inside. Can you hear me? Power's fluctuating... emergency power. Oh! You are in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进来了。能听到我说话吗？电力不太稳定……现在用的是应急电源。哦！收到你的信号了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... thought that might be the end of you. Unfortunately, your... "friends" also found their way here. Knocked unconscious... just like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好……我还以为你完蛋了。可惜，你的那些…"朋友"们也进来了，不过他们和你一样…都被打晕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wondering what happened? You were hit by casino security. Detects anything foreign - radioactive, it subdues the "visitor," moves them if needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想知道发生了什么吗？你被赌场的安保设施袭击了。一旦它在"访客"身上探测到外来的放射性物质，就会将其制服，甚至直接拖走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_00013889_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh... getting interference from old recordings... the guests who were trapped here... eh, shut that noise off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…这些过往的录音正在扰乱通讯…都是被困在这儿的客人们留下的…呃，得把这噪音关掉……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like the casino moved your "friends" around once inside... might be useful. Or not. Wonder if they came to help or kill you. Still...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来赌场已经把你的"朋友们"扛到了别的地方……也不知是好是坏。我倒是很想知道，他们究竟是真心帮你，还是想害你呢……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_00013883_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My signal should work through the speakers, now that you're inside. Heh, heh! Welcome to the Sierra Madre, in all its glory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过既然你已经进来了，我的信号就可以通过扩音喇叭传到你那里了，呵呵！欢迎来到马德雷赌场，感受它昔日的荣光吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is what the Old World stood for, even with bombs about to rain down on them. Now look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是旧世界的象征，即便核弹的阴云曾经笼罩着它。看哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beautiful... now its guests are all dead. Better this way. Quiet. How the Mojave should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么美妙的地方……所有的宾客，都化为了白骨。这样更好。更安静。这才是莫哈维该有的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now - with the casino sleeping, it's got places closed off - won't let you go yet. We'll get there, trust me, just need to wake it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了——赌场仍然在沉睡，许多地方依然封闭着，你没办法进去。不过这阻止不了我们，相信我，我们只需要将它唤醒就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117d3_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场终于从睡梦中苏醒了，也注意到了我们的存在。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through main lobby speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoIntro. Set speaker to Elijah for safety.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Casino's woken up, paying attention to us. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场终于从睡梦中苏醒了，也注意到了我们的存在。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wondering what happened to your team...? Looks like they got moved to other floors. Interesting, maybe that's why... hmmm, yes... yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定好奇，你的队友们都去哪儿了…？看来他们都分散到别的楼层去了。 有趣，原来是这样啊……嗯，没错，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps the casino recognized specific guests... or guests with a voice or look close enough for them to be... assigned to that floor. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座赌场能自动识别来宾的特征……或者将有着相似嗓音和外貌的客人分配到同一楼层。这点还有待验证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00013882_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had hoped with the power restored, the systems would fully awaken... especially the sound archives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我原以为电力接通后，所有系统都能恢复运作……尤其是音频资料库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00013676_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no... your teammates' collars on each floor are interfering with the systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但事实却没有……你们每个人的项圈对整个系统都造成了干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00013677_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the white noise filters embedded in their construction... they're blocking the casino speakers, the music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是由于项圈内置了白噪过滤器……它们屏蔽了赌场的广播，致使音乐无法播放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00013678_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need to recalibrate... or destroy... each collar. To do that, you need to get close, re-set the signal - or blow their heads off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要么重新校准每个项圈…要么就干脆将它们毁掉。如果是前者，你就必须靠近项圈，重设信号，当然你也可以直接送他们上西天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00013679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll leave the choice up to you - my preference? End them now. They're of no use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选择权就交给你了，我个人的意见嘛，最好现在就将他们除掉。 反正他们已经没什么用处了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_0001367a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, it's safe to kill them now, provided you make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并且，只要你动作够快，现在杀死他们也很安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, the collars don't work inside the Sierra Madre... well, between floors. Else, I'd set off the collars, be done with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，项圈在马德雷赌场内部是不起作用的……至少对身处不同楼层的人来说，项圈只是个摆设。否则我早就引爆项圈，一了百了了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So find them, deal with them, as long as you're fast and can get off the floor after killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要找到他们，想办法解决他们。只要你干净利落，杀掉他们之后迅速逃离当前楼层就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The floors... whatever they lined this place with, interferes with the collar frequency... so if you kill them, you should have some time to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些楼板……我不知道他们在里面埋设了什么东西，它会干扰项圈的频率…所以即便你干掉他们，应该也会有足够的时间脱身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00011c88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... just not sure how long, may not be consistent. More... less... whatever, it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…就是不知道这个时间的长短，也许各不相同，或长…或短…随便吧，无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_00011c89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we need is in the basement, we need to go to the top first and ride our fortunes down. After we deal with your team on the other floors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要找的东西就藏在地下。为此我们要先上到顶楼，再从那里深入宝库。 在此之前，我们得先解决掉你散布在各楼层的队友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011AFF] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there, same as MainCasinoIntro> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahre_000117e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You woke it up... good. Emitter frequencies... lighting up everywhere...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你唤醒了这里…很好。全息发射器的频率…让四周变得敞亮了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino floor speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorBackIntro as well.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117dc_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你唤醒了这里…很好。全息发射器的频率…让四周变得敞亮了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah has tuned into the casino's frequency in the main lobby and is now using the speakers there.> EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn recordings... dead echoes in the frequencies...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的录音…这些频段里传来的都是死者的回声……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino floor speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorBackIntro as well.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Casino's security is shutting down... opening up its vendor and gambling programs in the back casino... Heh! Still might be something for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场的安保措施正在解除…后方的售货机和赌桌程序也启动了…呵！说不定还有东西出售呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino floor speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorBackIntro as well.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe something can help you now - security's shut down. After you're done looking around, head to the lobby, and we'll deal with your... friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你说个好消息吧——安保措施关闭了。等你逛够了，就到大厅来，我们再想办法对付……你的那些朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino floor speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorBackIntro as well.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117e0_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你唤醒了这里…很好。全息发射器的频率…让四周变得敞亮了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Intercom [01011B00] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Elijah speaking through back casino floor speakers, same filter as NVDLC01ElijahMainCasinoFloorBackIntro as well.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahma_000117da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks around, then nods toward a terminal on the far side of the room.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看了看四周，然后向屋子远侧的终端机点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000118ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? That... wasn't so bad, was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咳咳…你瞧…咳咳，也没那么可怕嘛，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000118f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine points to an electrical box on the wall, and twists her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指了指墙上的电力箱，握紧了双手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000118ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess we're going the long way around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们得绕远路了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000118ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods at the toxic cloud below, then makes a walking motion with her fingers and slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀向下面的毒云点点头，然后用手指做了一个走路的动作，缓缓摇着头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000118ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we'll have to go through this pea soup. I can get you across.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们得穿过这团飘在半空的浆糊了。我带你过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000118f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found the phrase for elevator's audio lock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到解开电梯声控锁的短语了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did? Looks like even the Old World can't keep you out when you've got a mind to get in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到了？看来只要有心，连旧世界也阻止不了你啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll have to wait just a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能得再等一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I hear my collar beeping though, I've got the route to the exit all mapped out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。不过，我已经听见项圈在响了，我已经在地图上标出了通向出口的所有路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001190a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head as you approach the edge of the catwalk. She turns away from the catwalk and begins looking around.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看到你走向小道的边缘，摇了摇头。她转身离开小道，开始四处查看。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ad6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh... now, come on, you open up. Open up, damn you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵……快点，开门。 开门啊，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open the vault... I can make it worth your while, think about what you're throwing away. I have other weapons, other technology I can share with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开避难所吧…… 我不会让你空手而归的，想想看你错过了什么。我还有别的武器，别的科技可以和你分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Big Empty... I know the way there. I know some of its secrets... if...
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且大空山…我知道去那儿的路，我还知道它的很多秘密……只要……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Big Empty = Another place of buried treasures in Fallout, like the Sierra Madre. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The collars... the collars were a mistake, I see that now. Why would I kill you? After all you've done... after all we've done together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 项圈……项圈就是个错误，我现在明白了……为什么我要杀你？你做了这么多……我们一起实现了这么多……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you listening to me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有在听我说话吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything down here... I swear... so much you could use, you could rule the wastes with what's down here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，这里的一切……你都可以派上用场，你甚至可以用它们来统治废土……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : At this point, Elijah is saying "you," really is thinking about what -he- could do with it all. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...make your own army, re-shape the world, and if others disagree... put collars on them, I can show you how.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……建立自己的军队，改造整个世界，如果有人不同意……就给他们戴上项圈，我可以教你方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you leave me here. You can't do this to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能就这么把我丢在这里，你不能这么对我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh? Getting dark in here. Machine... machine's losing power, no. I still have Pip-Boy light... maybe... maybe... no, no, that doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？这儿变黑了。机器……机器没有能源了。不，我还有哔哔小子的灯……或许……或许……不不不，没用，这没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Depowering noise of Vault shutting down.>Elijah starts fumbling with his wrist-flashlight as things go dark... EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where... where is the door. Can't find the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门，门在哪里。我找不到门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Scratching on metal, as if clawing at door.> Elijah is fumbling in the dark, talking to himself. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm, been in worse situations... find a way out... somehow, then find that Courier...
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，冷静……更糟的情况我都遇到过……我一定能找到出去的路…… 找到那个邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : "Find" that courier in the sense of killing them. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe Veronica... no... no, she thinks I'm dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许维罗尼卡可以……不……不……她以为我早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Veronica = His foster daughter, thinking about who could come rescue him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be someone... maybe that other courier, one with the flag on his back... maybe... no... no, said he'd never come to the Sierra Madre...
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定还有别人…或许我可以去找另一个邮差, 背上贴旗子的那个……或许我可以…不……不可能，他说过，他再也不会来马德雷山脉了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way out. Can't... can't end like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出不去了。不，不能就这么结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You. I know you can hear me. When you die, Courier... I'll be waiting. Your grave's going look just like this vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，我知道你能听到我说话。我会等下去，等到你死的那一天……你的坟墓会和这座避难所一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you die... I'll be waiting here... at the Sierra Madre. Waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在马德雷赌场里等着……等到你死的那天。一直等下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). This is the first line of the loop. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you die, I'll be waiting...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会耐心等下去，直到你死的那一天……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and this is last line of loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.TRADUIT: 我会耐心等下去，直到你死的那一天……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). This is the second line of 3 line loop. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b23_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我会耐心等下去，直到你死的那一天……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and this is last line of loop. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00011b24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you need surgery done? Let's get out of here... those speakers on the wall are making my nerves do a dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你是想在这儿做手术吗？我们还是走吧……这墙上的喇叭搞得我神经紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player keeps going deeper into the clinic, and Dean doesn't want Christine (a victim he put here) found. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011b79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch for Hologram security, not as nice as the lady at the fountain, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心全息守卫，相信我，他们可没有喷泉上那位小姐这般好相处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011b81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we doing here? We're not going to find a doctor on call at this hour, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们跑这儿来干嘛？现在可不是来看值班大夫的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player has entered the medical district. Confusion, then uneasy sarcasm. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011b88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place is haunted, got ghosts walking in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方闹鬼，到处是鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00011b89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I wanted to send you here without weapons, healing? No, the Sierra Madre lays you bare, strips and stores all your worldly possessions...
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你以为我是故意让你手无寸铁、缺医少药地来到这种穷山恶水之地吗？不，是马德雷赌场把你剥得精光，没收了你身上所有的财物…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...it's automated to move things as the builder saw fit, Sinclair - even the guests. It's what divided your team, me, assigned us to "our floors."
ESP.TRADUIT: …它会自动按照其建造者辛克莱的要求，对这里的每样事物进行分类——其中也包括宾客。是它把我和你的队伍分开的，把我们分配到了"各自的楼层。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No contraband, nothing foreign in his paradise - even common Pre-War vending machines were banned from the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他的这座伊甸园里，不能携带违禁品，更不允许外来物品入内—就连战前通用的售货机都不能在别墅区里出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b78_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the casino stripped me of my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这赌场扒光了我的装备？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Villa did, as an extension of the casino, yes - and then sent it back to the owner's residence. Here, "begin again" is more than a slogan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 严格来说，这里是别墅区，不过作为赌场的附属区域，它的规定是一样的，所有东西都会被寄回原址。在这里，"从头再来"可不仅仅是一句口号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how to get out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道离开这儿的方法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. I walked all this way. If you're worried... I'll give you a map back - or show you the way out when this is all over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。来这里的路我亲自走过。如果你不放心，等事情结束后，我可以给你一张回去的地图，或者直接告诉你该怎么走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的装备在哪儿？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It lies in the bunker - or whatever mantrap caught you. It's the Sierra Madre, its security systems strip guests to their garments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该还在地堡里……或者留在捕获你的陷阱里。这可都要归功于马德雷山脉赌场的安保系统，它会将来这儿的每个游客都剥得只剩一件单衣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has... prejudices against outside material, "contraband." Almost anything with a radiation signature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它…为了杜绝"违禁品"，对外来物品的检查异常严苛，哪怕有一丁点放射性痕迹，都过不了关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b8a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The New Vegas casinos do the same thing, manually. Although preventing bloodshed, not radiation poisoning, is their main concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯赌场也有同样的安保措施，不过是人工的。而且他们那么做的主要目的是预防暴力事件，而非隔绝辐射伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b8a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog put a collar on me, why didn't he say so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是狗给我戴上了项圈，为什么他不是这么说的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Dog?" Hnh. Appropriate. It's what I called him. You've met him. You know why he forgot - his brain was ruined by FEV, his memory, wreckage.
ESP.TRADUIT: "狗？"呵，没错，我是这么叫他的。 看来你已经和他见过面了，那你应该更清楚原因才对——他的大脑被FEV病毒破坏了，记忆残缺不全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He may know the way back, somewhere, deep down. I doubt it. He tracks by smell and instinct. Still, he could be trained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许在他的脑海深处，他记得回来的路。但我对此表示怀疑，他主要依靠气味和直觉行动，不过，还是可以对他进行驯化的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So someone else with a collar placed one on me? Who?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以是另一个同样遭遇的人给我戴上了项圈？是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mutant. Heh! He swallowed one of the collars... after that, he was mine. The collar wasn't even necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是那个变种人。呵！他吞下了一个项圈……之后就成了我的奴隶，有没有项圈都无关紧要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: All his kind, they exist to be given orders. They're soldiers - simple, stupid. I ask him to fetch, he did... even without the threat of death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们这个种族，从诞生之初就只懂得服从。他们是士兵——头脑简单，四肢发达。我要他去找人，他就照办了…无论那是否会威胁到自己的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even when I stopped speaking to him, he continued to leave the Villa, gather victims from the mantraps, out of habit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪怕我已经不再和他说话了，他也还是会主动离开别墅区，去各处的陷阱里搜寻猎物，这已经变成了他的习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b87_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must have found you in one of them. If so, he's probably forgotten - he only remembers my voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他应该就是这样发现你的。如果是的话，那他很可能已经忘了你…因为他只记得住我的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b87_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He put the collar on you, dragged you here, because he doesn't know any better. It's in his nature, greedy and child-like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是他给你戴上了项圈，把你拖到了这里。毕竟除此之外，他什么都不懂。这是他的天性，贪婪而幼稚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b87_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get me here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么把我弄到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone asks that. Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都会问这个问题。你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The chain ends with the super mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这个反应在那个超级变种人那里结束。不过对他来说……项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that I'm here, are you coming down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我已经进来了，你要下来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sick of talking to some image on a screen. If you're going to come down, do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再对着屏幕上的人头讲话了，你要下来的话，就动作快点吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I am not going to take the chance while I'm so close... not this close, no. Not again... I can wait... afford to be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，已经离成功这么近了，我不会冒险的…不…不能再犯同样的错误。我可以等……这代价我承受得起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you're locked down there. This is the only entrance, and I have free rein of the Sierra Madre. I have time... more than you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…你现在被关在里面。这是唯一的入口，而我已经可以自由出入马德雷山脉赌场，所以我的时间……比你多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, there might be more traps. I'll send more scouts in... yes, others. You're... resourceful, don't want to leave anything more to chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，也许还会有别的陷阱。我打算再派出几个探子……没错，再派几个人来。 你很……聪明，我绝不能在最后关头前功尽弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c63_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you answered madness with madness?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你就用疯狂来对付疯狂？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When your life is tied to another's, sacrifice and cooperation - they can be conditioned, learned, and you can focus on the matter at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有当你与他人的生命紧密维系在一起时，你才能逐渐理解、逐渐学会奉献与合作，才能更加专注于手头的事务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greed can be beaten. Contained. Controlled. You know it better than anyone... or I hope you do. It doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贪念可以被克服，可以被压抑，被控制。你比任何人都清楚这一点…也可能你并不理解。无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every time, even with collars clutched at their necks... they would betray each other, kill each other, to get inside the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即便项圈已经牢牢卡在了人们的脖子上……为了进入马德雷山脉赌场，他们也还是会反目成仇，自相残杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It... it was insanity. They could've had it all, it was so close. And... and they kept turning on each other, again and again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那…那才叫疯狂。明明胜利已经唾手可得，明明成功近在咫尺了……可是，他们却总是要一而再再而三地相互背叛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cracking the Sierra Madre was difficult... but cracking greed, that was more difficult. So the dead man's switches went in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场的机关已经教人疲于招架……可没想到人性的贪婪却更加难以应付。所以我才不得不设置一个让人同归于尽的机关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're nothing more than a killer that aspires to mass murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不过是一个嗜血成性的刽子手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm a murderer. If I was, I'd have set off your collar long ago... the collar ensures compliance, encourages... cooperation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说我是刽子手，如果我是的话，你们脖子上的项圈早就爆炸了…… 项圈可以使人服从，让人们……学会合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think about it. Would you truly have gotten into the casino without those collars? No, human nature is against us, always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想吧，要是没有这些项圈，你们进得了赌场的大门吗？不，人性永远会与我们作对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know... did you know that I had to keep adjusting the collars, keep changing the rules to make this moment possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗……你知道吗？我不停地调整项圈，不停地修改规则，就为了能让这一刻成为现实！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you find out about the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么发现马德雷山脉赌场的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It started with... a setback. Fires, blood, beneath the sun... a sun so close you could touch it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切都始于……一场败仗。火焰，鲜血，全都在阳光下化为乌有……有那么一刻，太阳近得触手可及。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moments like that, however, failures... can provide the brightest clarity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我遭受了这样的耻辱，但失败……却令我对未来豁然开朗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b85_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we better get to killing them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们不如立刻着手行动吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Perhaps... perhaps I was too quick to put a collar on a potential ally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。看来…看来我太着急了给人套上项圈了，险些失去了一个潜在的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll come down... and show you what the Sierra Madre has in store.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我这就下来…我来给你展示一下马德雷山脉赌场到底都藏了什么秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c68_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care about the Republic, they're yours to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不关心共和国的死活，想干掉他们随你便。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that. Their days were numbered since they occupied Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。自从占据了胡佛大坝，他们就是一副日薄西山的景象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] If you want to kill NCR, that's fine with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR] 如果你想干掉NCR，那我没什么意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've read your Pip-Boy. Seen what you've done...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看过你哔哔小子里的记录，我知道你都做过什么……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you wish to end them... I could use someone like you. Resourceful. Uncompromising. NCR has many soldiers... many citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你也想消灭他们…那我或许用得上你，你天资聪颖，意志坚定。NCR不但有士兵…还有大量平民……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to attack NCR? All of NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想对NCR发动进攻？整个NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack? No, not attack them. Wipe the slate clean. Make the Mojave like it was meant to be... undisturbed by man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻？不，不，我可不是要进攻他们，而是要把他们彻底消灭，让莫哈维恢复往日的安宁……不再会有人类滋扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet madness rolls to a near-quiet end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll send the Cloud, the Holograms. Bring ruin in my hands until only I stand atop the HELIOS One tower again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将用毒云和全息影像为我开道，我所到之处，一切都将化为废墟，直到我再次站上太阳神一号的顶端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet madness rolls to a near-quiet end. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b84_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll scour Hoover Dam with the Cloud, rain its walls with spears from the sun... with an army of Old World ghosts behind me, Holograms all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把胡佛大坝浸没在毒云中，用阳光之矛洗净它的全身……而这一切都将由我所率领的全息影像来实现，那将是一支来自旧世界的幽灵大军。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet madness rolls to a near-quiet end. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b84_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll kill them until it's only me, me alone... in a quiet world. In a world that's nothing like what happened at HELIOS One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把他们杀得片甲不留，直到剩我一人…让世界再次恢复安宁。在那个世界里，再也没有人可以夺走太阳神一号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Quiet madness rolls to a near-quiet end. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b84_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're Veronica's mentor. The Elder who lost HELIOS One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是维罗尼卡的导师，那个丢掉了太阳神一号的长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica... she... survived HELIOS. She would. Resourceful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗尼卡…她…居然没有死在太阳神一号。这也不奇怪，她一向很有本事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for "losing" HELIOS One... that was the only outcome, aside from retreat. NCR, swarming like ants over Old World relics... Hoover Dam... HELIOS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你说"丢掉"……除了撤退外，似乎也就只剩这么一种结局了。NCR早已像行军蚁一样爬遍了旧世遗迹的每一个角落…胡佛大坝…太阳神……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't let those... children seize anything else. Hardin... McNamara... can't stop them... won't. So I will, with the Old World as my weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我绝不会让那些…无知的孩童再夺走任何东西。哈丁…麦克纳马拉…根本阻止不了他们…也没这个胆识。所以，这件事只能交给我，而我已经将旧世界的利刃握在手中了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011b7d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you motioning about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的手势到底是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what your problem is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白，你到底有什么可怕的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her face becomes angry. She points at the elevator, points downward, then wraps her arms around her and shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她露出了愤怒的表情。她指着电梯，又向下指了指，然后抱着双手，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Perception] It reminds you of being trapped in the Auto-Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: [感知] 你想起了被自动医生抓住时的感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She turns to you, relieved, and nods... then she turns away, and her face crumbles. She makes motions with her fingers, then clenches her fists.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看向你，松了口气，点了点头... 随后她转向一边，脸耷拉了下来。她用手指做了个手势，然后握紧了拳头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine studies the elevator frame, raises her hands... then sets them down... then raises them up again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀研究着电梯的门，抬起手... 又放下... 接着又抬起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She gives a silent sigh of exasperation, and frowns at the elevator, and her hand brushes the side of her face, tracing the scar.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她恼怒地轻叹一声，朝电梯皱了皱眉，手顺着疤痕在脸上拂过。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get in that elevator or I'll make those scars on your face a pleasant memory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进电梯去，否则我会让你脸上那些伤疤变成你一辈子都无法磨灭的记忆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine takes a step back from your gaze... her eyes widen in alarm, she takes one step, then two toward the elevator.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀在你的怒视之下向后退了一步... 她警惕地睁大双眼，慢慢地一步步向电梯走去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean it. Stay alive until I get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说真的。好好活着，我会回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be back for you, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会回来找你的，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine tilts her head slightly, glances at your collar, then your Pip-Boy. She opens her mouth, frowns, then closes it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀轻轻歪着脑袋，眼睛瞥到你的项圈和哔哔小子。她似乎想说点什么，但皱了皱眉头，嘴又合上了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her face looks sad, and she taps her chest once, slowly. She nods at you, then the exit.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她似乎有些伤心，接着，她慢慢敲了一下自己的胸口，示意你离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, "thumbs up" - you better appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，“竖起大拇哥”，你确实得感谢我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能做到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，做好准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She narrows her eyes, determined, and gives a last nod.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她坚定地眯起眼，点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not in a hand-holding mood right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在可没心情牵手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, then waves you away and focuses on the terminal.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱皱眉，摆手叫你离开，眼神又回到了终端上。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Take her hand.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <牵住她的手。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She holds it, meeting your eyes intently for a few moments. She gives your hand a gentle squeeze, then releases it and smiles slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她握住了你的手，热切地直视了你的双眼一小会儿。接着轻轻捏了一下你的手，然后微笑着松开了]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011baa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to be okay here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己在这儿能行吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods... then gestures at your hand, offers hers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头... 然后向你伸出了手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011ba4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not one for church, but there's a bell tower to the north that has a nice view of the Sierra Madre. Well, did, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我虽然不信教，但我知道北方有座钟塔，站在那上边，整座马德雷山脉赌场都可以一览无余。 好吧，至少曾经是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Dean tells the player that he's seen a bell tower to the north that should have an excellent view of the casino> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdeanbe_00011bb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, there's a view. Hello, beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看吧，多壮观啊。你好啊，美人儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Stepping out onto the roof with the view of the Sierra Madre, Dean makes a comment about the view> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdeansi_00011bbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bones. Dog not like bones, don't taste good... unless meat on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 骨头，狗不喜欢骨头，味道不好…… 除非上面有肉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : Dog sees the skeletons in the courtyard and says he doesn't like eating bones. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdogbon_00011bb5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cage over there with things to pull, hard to pull, Dog can do it. Done it before? Not remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边有个笼子，里面有几个可以拉的开关，但很重，狗可以去拉。也许之前拉过？狗不记得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Dog says he has seen a small area with complicated looking switches in it nearby> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdogent_00011bb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised these homes weren't robbed blind, folks leaving the key out like that. If only the Sierra Madre'd done the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 令人惊讶，钥匙四处乱丢，这些房子居然都没被洗劫一空。 真希望马德雷山脉赌场也能这么大方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Snarky comment about the house key being left outside of the locked door> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdeanho_00011bba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine taps her collar, makes a sweeping gesture at the area, then begins to pulse her fingers outward, faster and faster.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀拍了拍她的项圈，对着前方的区域挥了挥手，然后开始用手指有规律地打起了节拍，速度越来越快。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : She's indicating speakers may be nearby. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etchrist_00011bb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You smell gas? I smell gas. Might be a valve nearby, we can use it to torch any locals that come near us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你闻到瓦斯气的味道了吗？我闻到了。附近可能有个阀门，我们可以用它把胆敢靠近的鬼人烧成灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Dean smells gas, wonders if there is a useful gas valve nearby> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdeanga_00011bb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place with hard to pull things is over there... "W" on your wrist thing? Weh-st. West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有开关的地方就在那边……就是你手腕上那东西指着的"西"，西——边。 西边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Dog says the complicated switch thing is in the area to the west> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etdoggal_00011bb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, just say the words, and let's settle this so we can go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只要说出密语，把这件事解决，我们就能回家了。
