ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't tell me where you're going - I'll find you after this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用告诉我你的去向，之后我再来找你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... never mind. Let me get the vault open... "Begin again... but know when to let go." Sounds like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…算了。我去把避难所打开… "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"感觉这话像你说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Say this a little tenderly, the player just talked her down from suicide, and Christine's found new purpose. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. If you can't let him go, you don't leave me much choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。如果你不放他过去，那我就别无选择了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He won't escape, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他跑不掉的，我发誓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine, please, let go of this. Let me deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀，拜托，放手吧。让我来解决他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. All right, I'll... but I'll need to leave this floor. He'll pick up my collar, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。好吧，我会的… 但我必须离开这层楼。他会检测到我项圈的信号，然后……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I need to keep you from doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我只能先阻止你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I didn't want this to happen. Ending him is more important than saving you. For what it's worth... I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我不想变成这样做的。杀死他比救你更重要。无论如何…我只能说声抱歉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you try and kill him, I can't let you do it. If you die, you'll kill us both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能让你杀他。要是你死了，我们两个都会完蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't. It's my mission, has been. This has to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行。这是我的任务，一直都是。我一定要完成它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let him come through the suites, follow me. If he escapes, you'll still be here, waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我的，放他过去。如果他逃走了，你依然可以截住他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to promise me. Promise me you'll deal with him... if I see him, I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要向我保证。保证你一定能干掉他…如果让我看见他，我…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he kills you, I won't be able to get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他杀了你，我也不可能逃出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know. And he will kill me, I can't get the collar off. Even if I could, I need to be sure - see his eyes, his face, when he dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。他一定会杀了我，因为我取不下这项圈。就算取下来了，我也要亲自确认他的死，我要看到他的眼睛，他的脸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you trust me? If you do, let go of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信我吗？如果相信我，就放下心吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't let go. Every time I've thought about it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我放不下。每当我想起这件事…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've lost him so many times. He needs to die... what happened here, with us? He's... he's done so much worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刺杀了他很多次，都失败了。他必须去死…你觉得我们遭受的痛苦已经很可怕了吗？他…他以前干过的事比这还要残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are... are you all right? Something seems off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……还好吗？你好像有些不对劲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why you're waiting. You're going to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你等这么久就是为了这个。你要杀他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... no, you have it wrong. Look, it's now or never, all right? Let me open the elevator.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 没… 没有，你听错了。听着，机不可失，知道吗？我这就去打开电梯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : She's lying in this node. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011f65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll come here, to the Suites - when he does, let him go through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一定会经过行政套房。你看到他的时候，记得放他过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... can't let him leave here. Look, you've done so much, and he's not going to show himself until you go down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…不能让他离开这里。听着，你已经做了这么多事，除非你亲自下去，否则他不会现身的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I'm counting on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我指望的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Begin again, but know when to let go." Let's see what happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"接下来就等着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : {Christine now knows what she needs to say at the Vault Elevator. She will start heading toward it at the end of the sentence, to bark the password i EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see. I'll take care of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等着瞧吧。我会收拾他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready? The sequence is: "Begin." "Again." "Let." "Go."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？短语的顺序是："从头""再来""放""手"。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The target's the vault, not the casino, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标是避难所，不是赌场，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess it's the object of someone's obsession - or affection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大概是出于某种执着，或者热爱吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he loved her, wanted to protect her. Too much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计啊，他很爱这个女人，十分想要保护她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love makes people do strange things. Won't argue that. It can drive you crazy sometimes if you can't... connect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱情会让人冲昏头脑，我承认。如果你…一根筋的话，很容易就会被它逼疯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they loved each other, and they were together... I suppose that's all that mattered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是如果他们真心相爱，死也死在一起…那我无话可说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But she's in that side room, dead, because the casino wouldn't let her leave. And who knows where he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可她最后却被关在赌场里头，活活困死在卧室里。而他呢，连个影子都见不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bfc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we stay here, the Cloud and the Holograms will answer that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们留在这里，毒云和全息影像就会做出反应。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got you to come down after me, it'll respond to your voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在我之后下来，你的声音可以启动电梯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... just wanted to make sure you're ready. When you go down there, that may be it for us... we won't be needed anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…只是想确认你做好了准备。因为你一旦下去，可能我们俩就…毕竟我们已经失去了利用价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one who made these collars, he'll follow you down there. And he won't let you leave. He's not one for sharing, never was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 制造项圈的那个人，他一定会跟你下去的，而且他绝不会放你离开。他这人向来只喜欢吃独食。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea, let's unlock it. The phrase is contained in the lyrics to a song.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，先把锁打开吧。开门的密语包含在一首歌的歌词中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. If you go down there, are you prepared... what if you don't come back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。如果你要下去，希望你已经做好了准备…万一你回不来怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Christine is asking, because she knows that Elijah will show up, and when he does, she's going to suicide and kill him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it was a trust issue? He built this place for her, it feels like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是出于信任？感觉这地方就是为她而建的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's possible. This place is immense... and it still has power, food dispensers, security... was it all for Pre-War guests? Or for her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有可能。这地方那么大…有电力，食品贩卖机，还有安保系统…这一切究竟是为了方便旅客，还是为了保护她？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bf8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... I'm not sure, it doesn't feel like a casino. Not entirely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方…我也不知道，我感觉它就不像一个赌场。完全不像。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know. The sealed doors, the security... it's almost a fortress. Think that's why we're being ordered to come here and crack it open?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道。紧闭的门窗，安保系统…简直就是一座要塞。所以那个人才会让我们来破解这里的奥妙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you here, so sit tight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你留在这里，乖乖坐好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dealt with the others, and I've got the key phrase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把其他人干掉了，而且我已经知道了开锁的密语。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised that Super Mutant didn't eat you... and don't get me started on Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个超级变种人居然没有吃掉你... 至于迪安，我就不问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I just rasp out some words, and the vault opens? That woman, the starlet... she didn't build this place, why would the builder do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…我只要对着电梯说话，门就会打开？ 那个女明星…这地方又不是她盖的，为什么这里的建造者要设置这种密码？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine stops, glances at the speaker, then glances at your collar, frowning.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀停了下来，瞧了一眼喇叭，又瞧了一眼你的项圈，皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. How romantic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。多浪漫啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks puzzled for a second, then glares at you and motions you to move on.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她显得有些困惑，随后盯着你，示意你继续前进。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, speaker static makes our heads blow off, right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，这些喇叭的静电声搞的我脑袋都要炸了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她正要点头——却停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can interfere with the detonation signal from the speakers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能干扰喇叭里发出的频率？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...but only between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: …这事千万保密。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just your frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是你自己项圈的频率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, once, then again, points at the two of you, then the Pip-Boy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，又指了指你们两人和哔哔小子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it, let's move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了，我们继续前进吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods, and motions for you to go ahead.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，做了个向前的手势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that work with any other collar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对其他项圈有效吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, slowly shakes her head - she opens her mouth, then makes the motion of tuning a dial, then points at herself.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱起眉毛，慢慢摇了摇头——她张开嘴，做了个调旋钮的手势，又指了指自己。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... uh...speakers make a tempo... or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…呃…是说喇叭会打节奏吗，还是……？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功][她正要点头，旋即停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can interfere with the Speaker's detonation frequency somehow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能干扰喇叭发出的频率？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You can make the speakers stop or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你能让这些喇叭停下？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她正要点头——却停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can dampen the signal somehow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能抑制信号?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败][她皱了皱眉，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001388a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She tries to open her mouth and nothing comes out. Her eyes narrow and her hands ball into fists.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她试图张嘴，却一丝声音都发布出来。她眯起双眼，手攥成了拳头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She touches her collar, then shakes her head in frustration and nods at you to go ahead.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摸了摸项圈，然后失望地摇了摇头，示意你继续前进。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, we need to keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，我们得继续前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a decayed speaker. If we stay too long near one, it'll go off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个喇叭已经锈蚀了，如果我们在它附近待得太久，它会爆炸的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She taps the collar and then opens and closes her hand really fast.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她敲了敲项圈，双手快速地开合。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She taps her collar, then opens and closes her hand really fast.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她敲了敲项圈，双手快速地开合。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your Pip-Boy, her collar, and then your collar. After a second, then she opens and closes her hand slower.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着你的哔哔小子，又分别指了指你们俩脖子上的项圈。过了一会儿，她开始缓慢开合自己的双手。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at your collar, then hers, then nods at your Pip-Boy. She makes a triangle motion, then the same slow pulse as before with her fingers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她分别指了指你们俩脖子上的项圈，然后向你的哔哔小子点点头，做了一个三角形的手势，用手指像刚才一样缓慢地]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011c28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something else I wanted to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还想问些别的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that... I wandered, alone. Saw the storms of the Divide, walked among the Ciphers of the West. Traveled to the Big Empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后……我孤身一人，四处游荡。我见识过大裂谷的风暴，也曾与西部风语者同行，还进入过大空山。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard the signal. The woman's voice, the Sierra Madre, promising a chance to begin again, reverse my fortunes. All... nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听见了那条广播。一个女子的声音，马德雷山脉，她承诺我可以在这里从头再来、改变命运，完全是……一派胡言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tracked the signal. Came here, scouted the city... using other hands. Kept dying on me, killing each other. You - you got the farthest of all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我追踪信号的源头来到这里，借他人之手…探遍了城镇的每个角落。不少人死于我手，也有不少人自相残杀，而你——你是目前为止走得最远的一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c67_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before this goes any farther, I had questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在深入探讨这个事情之前，我还有些问题想问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me to wait, I'll cooperate. The Sierra Madre doesn't matter to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你让我等你，那我就配合你吧。反正马德雷赌场对我来说也毫无意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... compliance. Good. The others... fought, argued. If they had only obeyed...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……服从。很好。其他人…他们只会打斗、争吵，如果当初他们也肯乖乖听话……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see the collar has done its work, I can hear it in your voice. Stand and wait outside the Vault, where I can see you from the elevator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来项圈终于起作用了，我能从你的声音里听出来。到避难所外好好候着，我要一下电梯就看到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c66_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Foresight, whatever it is, won't help you spot me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你有怎样的先见之明，你都没办法找到我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I've had enough... enough of others stealing from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我已经受够了……受够了别人窃取我的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've gotten past everything the Sierra Madre's thrown at me. You're no different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会克服马德雷山脉赌场留给我的一切难题，连你也无法阻止我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] As long as you're wearing that collar, you're not far from me. A press of a button, and I'll find you - I'll just listen for the explosion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 只要你还戴着项圈，你就没办法逃出我的手掌心。我只要轻轻按下按钮，就能立刻知道你在哪里——听爆炸声就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... well... I'll pick this lock, no matter how tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…这个嘛…我会撬开那把锁的，不管有多困难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I've had enough... enough of others stealing from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我已经受够了……受够了别人窃取我的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the Sierra Madre's a huge combination lock. Me? I've almost cracked it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该很清楚，马德雷山脉赌场本身就是一把巨大的组合密码锁。而我，已经快要把它撬开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Take all the time you need. I suspect the Sierra Madre is more than proof against bobby pins and crowbars.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 尽管试吧。单凭发卡和撬棍可是没办法打开马德雷山脉赌场的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c72_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So there is a lock? Good. Wasn't sure until you said so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这里头确实有个锁咯？很好，你不说我还不知道呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a way inside - you can try. The Sierra Madre is a patient thing, and it has outlasted many who've come to its doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你随便试吧，看你能不能撬开它。马德雷山脉最不缺的就是耐心，有无数人来到它的大门前，最终都败给了时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The punishment often equals the reward for those without the foresight to see what's in store. I'll let you test the security, see how you stand up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对那些目光短浅的人来说，风险与回报往往是相抵的。你想测试这里的安保措施有多牢靠，我不会阻止你的，我倒想看看你能坚持多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The size of the lock doesn't matter, only the contents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 锁的大小不是问题，内容才是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, stay up there and wait. I'll keep busy down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就在上边等着吧，我还有很多事要做呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you can find me, you mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前提是你得先找到我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hiding in the Sierra Madre... an interesting thought. I'd come to see it more as a prison.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 把马德雷山脉当作藏身之所……有趣的想法。但我觉得它可能更像一座监狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hide, flee... it doesn't matter. The Sierra Madre is patient. I can be as well. You won't get any farther inside, and you won't escape my sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想玩捉迷藏……随你便。既然马德雷山脉赌场有耐心等待数百年，那我也可以。反正你现在哪儿都去不了，也逃不出我的视线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c94_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have to find me first. The Sierra Madre basement's bigger than you'd expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得先找到我。马德雷山脉赌场的地下设施可比你想得要庞大得多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] As long as you're wearing that collar, you're not far from me. A press of a button, and I'll find you - I'll just listen for the explosion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 只要你还戴着项圈，你就没办法逃出我的手掌心。我只要轻轻按下按钮，就能立刻知道你在哪里——听爆炸声就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it has a lock... and it should... I can pick it. Somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要它有锁…反正我觉得它有…我就可以找到办法撬开它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] This casino isn't some caravan safe. And the lock that secures the Sierra Madre vault doesn't hold all its secrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这是赌场，不是外面某个商队的保险箱。况且赌场避难所的门锁内隐藏的也并不是它全部的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already managed to unlock the elevator and get down here before you. Better hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经成功解开了电梯的锁，先你一步来到地下了。你再不来也许就没机会了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Take all the time you need. I suspect the Sierra Madre is more than proof against bobby pins and crowbars.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 随便你吧。马德雷山脉赌场可不是单凭发卡和撬棍就能轻易打开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time is a commodity you don't have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拥有的时间可不像你想象的那么宽裕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all of that - all of that wasn't an obstacle, it drove you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可这一切——这一切都不能算是障碍，是它驱使你来到这里的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, you have everything - except the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的没错，你可以拥有一切——除了避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you seek to goad me... impatience and greed led you here, not me, it doesn't control me as it does you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是在对我用激将法吧…被贪婪驱使，火急火燎来到这里的人是你，不是我。我才不会像你这样沉不住气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't fall prey to another trap - either the Sierra Madre, or yours. There is no trust between us, and there will be no trades, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我绝不会再落入圈套了，无论是马德雷山脉还是你，都别想再蒙骗我。你我之间没有信任可言，我也不会和你谈什么条件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c65_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No traps, just a trade, you and the vault, me and the exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪有什么圈套，只是和你谈条件罢了。你得到避难所，而我全身而退。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... I have earned it, fought for it. Paid for it in blood, mine, others - countless times.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我…这是我历尽艰辛得到的，我为此奋斗了那么久。无数人，包括我在内，都付出了血的代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greed implies you want more than you deserve. You've earned this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人的贪欲会怂恿你去追求自己不配拥有的东西。你走到今天这步就是咎由自取。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Let you go? To crawl back to whatever caravan whore spawned you? No, she was perhaps more talented in deals than you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 放你走？让你爬回去找那个在大篷车里生下你的野娘们哭诉吗？不，我看她的交涉水平可能都比你强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... look, I want to cooperate, all right? Come down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…听着，我愿意合作，好吗？下来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hnh. The collars... yes. Technology solves so many ills.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯。那些项圈…没错。技术可以克服不少顽疾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The collar's done its work, or we wouldn't be at this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 项圈完美发挥了它的作用，不然我们也没办法走到这一步。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Enough talking, save your energy. You'll be down there for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 别再废话了，省点力气吧。你还要在下边待上好长一段时间呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've cooperated so far. You've made sure of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是一直都很配合你吗？你大可以放心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of us working together has allowed us to get this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是我们携手合作，才能有现在的成果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, it will be different - has been different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的不错，确实不一样，你没有重蹈覆辙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True... the collars... have worked better than I'd hoped. With adjustments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的…项圈…经过调整之后，居然比我想象得要有用得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... I'm not eager to leap into another trap - the Sierra Madre's or yours. This experience has taught me human nature is... unreliable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是…我可不想再落入圈套了，无论是马德雷山脉还是你，都别想再欺骗我。过往的经验教会了我，人性…是不可靠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say your freedom is important to you - so did the others that fill the Villa, before they turned on each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你口口声声说自由对你多么重要，可别墅区里躺着的那些人，在他们开始自相残杀前也是这么说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c83_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, let me out, you get in the vault, we're both happy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，放我出去，你就能进入避难所，咱们皆大欢喜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That signal... that siren's call... lured me in, yes. And being trapped in the Sierra Madre, perhaps forever...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 那条广播…如同海妖的呼唤…将我蛊惑到了这里。我被困在马德雷山脉赌场，险些再也无法离开……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That has made me more - cautious. I have my freedom, access to the bottom of the casino, and you, under my control. Heh... I can wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也让我更加小心谨慎。既然我现在已经可以随心所欲地进入赌场的地下，而你也被我捏在手掌心，呵……我完全可以静观其变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c80_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You followed the signal, too. You want what's down here, I want out. Let's deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是也跟着那条广播到了这里吗？你想得到这里的宝藏，而我只想回家，咱俩不妨做笔交易吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] If you want to appease me, then do so in silence. I'll come for you, in time. Irritate me, and I'll silence you forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 如果你想讨好我，那你最好保持沉默。等到时间合适，我自然会下去救你，但你要是敢继续挑衅我，那就永远沉默下去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say to convince you I just want to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想离开这里，怎样才能让你相信呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I've lost much in the past by... falling to my instincts. This time... this time will be different.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我曾经因为过分相信自己的直觉…蒙受了巨大的损失。这次我绝不会重蹈覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've already waited too long for this moment, there's no need to wait any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了这一刻，你已经等了那么久，没必要再多等下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Silence and patience will convince me. I'll come for you, in time. Irritate me, and I'll silence you forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你可以用沉默和耐心来打动我。等到时间合适，我自然会下去救你，但你要是敢继续挑衅我，那就永远沉默下去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having you wait up there forever with no way down sounds more appealing all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看你这副在上面急得直跺脚的样子，我可开心了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throwing a wrench into the works is what I do best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最喜欢到处搞破坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's what it takes to fix this, that's fine with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要能让一切回到正轨，什么代价我都无所谓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even... even if you damaged the mechanism... there's a chance of repairing it. It might take years... but it's possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算…就算你能破坏这里的设施…我依然有机会修复它。 这可能要花上很多年……但并非不可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... then you'd need some way of transmitting that, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…那你也需要能传递信号的方法，是不是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Huh... clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 哈…聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll clip the wires to this intercom, then the Pip-Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会切断这个对讲机的电路，再断开哔哔小子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Indeed... and how would I reach you, let alone speak to you. Perhaps you're not as resourceful as I suspected.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 当然了…不然我怎么能 找到你，更别提 和你对话了。看样子你也没有我想象得那么机灵嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Sarcastic, because he's using the intercom now, and can use the Pip-Boy to access the player. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... are you sure of the frequency?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…你的频率能传过来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Huh... clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 哈…聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's noticeable lag of several seconds for the collar to go off - and a warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 项圈引爆之前会有几秒的延迟，还伴随着警报声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Quite certain. How you managed to come all this way amazes me - perhaps it was luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 当然可以。真想不通你是怎么走了这么远的，可能全凭运气吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safeguards? If you're a gambling man now, stay up in the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保险？既然你这么喜欢赌，那就好端端待在赌场里呗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroying even a single fragment of data is more than you could stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪怕只毁坏一丁点数据，那代价也是你承受不起的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe too many safeguards, as you've discovered already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看恰恰就是保险设置得太多了，难道你看不出来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, you recognize the value of what's down there. You would no sooner destroy what's inside the Sierra Madre than destroy yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可是，你应该也意识到了这里的东西蕴含的价值。如果你执意要毁掉马德雷山脉赌场的秘密，那你自己也将灰飞烟灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Persist in threatening me... or the Sierra Madre's secrets, you're of no use to me, I'll set off your collar now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直在威胁我…还想摧毁马德雷山脉赌场的秘密，你对我一文不值了，我现在就引爆你的项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait until I get my hands on the computers, we'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就等着我在电脑上大闹一通吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You might destroy access to the data... not the data itself. Besides, there would be safeguards in place.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 就算你可以破坏数据的访问渠道…你也没办法破坏数据本身。而且，数据库肯定会设置保险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All it takes is destroying a single terminal or holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要毁掉一台终端或者全息磁带就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] There's nothing you can do that I cannot undo... or recover. And I have the time now, thanks to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 无论你做什么，我都可以还原…或者修复。而且多亏了你，我现在的时间很充裕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll trash the electronics, the vault wiring, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以劈坏电子设备，比如避难所的电路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The elevator. Then you'd be trapped for certain, no probability of escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 电梯。那你会被完全困住，没有任何逃生的可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the Vault. The elevator's only a single control box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再惦记避难所了，到这儿的电梯是单控的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] The vault would be as shielded against vandalism just as the casino itself was. No... any damage you could cause would be minimal.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 避难所和赌场一样都配备了防暴措施。所以…你能造成的损伤是微不足道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Sarcastic, because he's using the intercom now, and can use the Pip-Boy to access the player. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you don't have any way to transmit down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你没办法往避难所里发送引爆信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Huh... clever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 哈…聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between floors? I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隔着楼层吗？我觉得没可能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Really? No, I don't think so. I can afford to wait, and your threats... meaningless.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 真的吗？我可不这么认为。我有大把的时间可以等，至于你的威胁…毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player threatened to blow up the vault and failed to convince Elijah through poor wording. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, so you're willing to risk it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，所以你居然愿意冒这个险咯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Denying you the Sierra Madre vault would be worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要能让你无法进入赌场避难所，我做的一切就值得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like I'm dead anyway, the way you're talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你说话的口气，不管怎样我都难逃一死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill yourself, and you decide this now. I can shut down your signal, prevent the collar from going off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就自杀吧，你自己决定。我可以切断你的信号，让项圈不会爆炸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I'm pretty sure I can do some damage down here. Somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我肯定能在这儿搞点破坏。反正我可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The collar? Even if you could trigger it... no, you'd die.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]项圈吗？就算你能触发它…… 不，你会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see how "protected" the Vault is when I detonate this collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我引爆项圈，我们就会知道避难所的"保护机制"到底有多完善了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Really? No, I don't think so. I can afford to wait, and your threats... meaningless.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 真的吗？我可不这么认为。我有大把的时间可以等，至于你的威胁…毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player threatened to blow up the vault and failed to convince Elijah through poor wording. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll find a way to unlock the secrets of this vault, take them for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就去找办法解开避难所的秘密，把里面的一切都据为己有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotten far. Any farther, try to breach the vault, you'll become a corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经走得够远了。如果你敢再往前迈一步，试图闯入避难所的话，那等待你的只有死路一条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's inside is mine. Anyone else touches it... tries to take it from me... they'll answer for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面的一切都是我的，其他人休想染指…敢夺走我的东西…那就等着瞧吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c78_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in the vault, I only want to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对避难所没有兴趣，我只想离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then all you need to do is wait, be patient. Hnh... you may be down there for a while. Just as I was, trapped inside the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就只能等了，耐心地等吧。呵…不过你可能要等上好长一段时间咯。就像我之前一样，被困在这座赌场里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider this punishment for following the Sierra Madre signal in the first place. So eager to rush ahead... now, enjoy your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 权当是上天对你当初听从了马德雷山脉赌场召唤的惩罚吧。这么急不可耐…那就好好享受你的奖赏吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c6b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you come down here, I'll destroy the vault, everything in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不下来，我就毁掉整座避难所，连同其中的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... I don't think so. It'd most likely trigger other security measures... if you hurt the Vault at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…我觉得你做不到。如果你真的试图破坏避难所…估计只会触发其它的安保措施……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The builder of the casino built it to last - the Sierra Madre withstood the war. I'm sure the Vault is protected as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座赌场的创始人当初建造这里时就希望它能屹立不倒，马德雷赌场历经战争依旧保存完好，我敢说避难所内一定也有类似的保护机制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you wouldn't have followed the signal if you didn't want this place's secrets for your own. You're curious... past the threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，如果你不是真的想要独占这个地方的秘密，当初你也不会跟着广播过来了。你的好奇心…远胜过你的愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c7d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods at the Vending Machine, then makes a sweeping gesture with both arms and draws them to her chest.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀对着售货机点了点头，然后张开双臂，做了个将手臂收回到胸前的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <After entering a room with a vending machine, Christine indicates to the player that it may be a good time to stock up on supplies> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01etchrist_00011ca6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes dart around at the walls and the ceiling. She glances at the exit, then takes a slow breath. Sweat appears on her brow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀环顾着墙壁和天花板，又瞥了一眼出口，然后慢慢深吸了一口气。她的眉间开始冒出冷汗。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <When entering a small underground room Christine indicates that she doesn't like small spaces and would prefer to be above ground> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtchrist_00011ca1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am all about keeping low in this section of town... so let's see about creeping by the locals, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这地方我只想保持低调……所以我们就从那些当地人身边悄悄溜过去，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Dean suggests finding a way to sneak around the ghost people rather than fight them> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdeansn_00011ca5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tired of being inside. Want outside, get food inside Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再呆在里面了。狗想出去，要吃的填饱肚子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : Dog is tired of being inside when food is outside. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdogins_00011ca9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice spot for sunning. Well, if the sun ever touched here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个晒日光浴的好地方，当然，前提是得晒得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Comment about the small courtyard set up with the lawn chairs and the umbrellas> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdeanum_00011ca2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If your marker's right, think the roost we're looking for is to the southeast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的定位没错的话，那我们要去的地方应该就在东南方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Tells the player that the roof with the marker is to the south east> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdeanga_00011ca4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns, looks upward, then back at you. She nods her head upwards, then makes the motion of holding a gun at the ready.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头向上看去，接着又看向你。她仰起头向上示意，然后做出了一个举枪防范的手势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Indicates that it might be safer to find higher ground> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtchrist_00011ca8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why leave a bear trap here, so high up. Someone's arm must have lost it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要把捕熊夹放在这么高的地方。也许是从谁的手臂上掉下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdogroo_00011ca0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, aren't the trees lovely this time of year, all blooming and green...
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这个季节的花草树木真是美极了，郁郁葱葱，枝繁叶茂……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Sarcastic comment on how lovely the dead trees are this time of year> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdeantr_00011ca3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine flicks her finger back and forth quickly like a switch, then nods to the north.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀快速来回拨动着自己的手指，然后向北方点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <Indicates to the player that the Switching Station is to the north> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtchrist_00011ca7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the place you need to go when everyone is in place. Until then... nothing more than a diseased view of the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到所有人都就位之后，你就到这里去。 在那之前……我们也只能继续盯着这恼人的赌场发呆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slight disgust for the casino, he only cares about it when it's about to be triggered. AUDIO: Hear this over a speaker. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Anticipation, this is the big moment. AUDIO: Hear this over a speaker. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011d28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You hear banging from the speaker, as if someone is hammering on a wall with their fists.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你听到扩音器里传来阵阵巨响，好像有人正在疯狂用拳头捶墙。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You hear a tapping from the speaker... a series of sharp taps, then a slow, two taps.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你听到扩音器里传来敲击声…先是一连串尖利的敲击，然后是缓慢的两声敲击。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll pull the switches. And when I find you, I'll pull your head from your body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以拉动开关。但之后我会找到你，我要让你身首异处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: From a speaker. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready. The both of us. I'll keep Dog locked in his cage... you just open the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了。我们都准备好了。我已经把狗锁进笼子里了……你只要打开马德雷赌场就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: From a speaker. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is scared... wants out of cage. Cage you put me in. Will pull levers, be good, just let Dog out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗很害怕……狗想从笼子里出来。别再把我关进笼子。 狗会好好表现，会去拉开关，只要你把狗放出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: From a speaker. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is ready to be good, pull switches, see the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗已经准备好好表现了，拉下开关，打开灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: From a speaker. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for? Rubbing it in? Strike up the band already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在等什么？戳我的旧伤吗？开始演出吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Coming from a speaker. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful when you do... you think the Villa's bad now, you haven't seen anything yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点……你以为别墅区很可怕？真正厉害的你还没见识过呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Coming from a speaker. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, partner. So close now, stage is set, strike up the band.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点啊，伙计。我们马上就要成功了，舞台已经准备完毕，开始演出吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get ready to run when you do... I sure will. Think the Villa's bad now... you haven't seen half the hell this town can raise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好冲刺吧…我肯定会第一时间进去的。别以为别墅区很可怕……这才一半儿都不到呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f63_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no need for any of that, let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要这样做，我们出去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you try to burn the voice out of you, this casino will be destroyed, and us along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的把那个声音赶走，这个赌场就会毁灭，我们都会一起死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is tired of voice inside, tired of being in another cage, again. Try to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗厌倦了体内的声音了，厌倦了呆在另一个笼子里。尝试...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...kill this human, Dog. Kill them. If this casino is destroyed, good, it'll kill the Old Man, too, the one who...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...杀了这个人类吧，狗。杀了他们。如果赌场被毁了，那也好，至少那个老头也死定了，那个人……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...shouts at Dog, the voice shouts, and to stop the voice, Dog needs to burn it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: …在朝狗大吼，那声音又在大吼大叫，要他闭嘴，狗就要用火把它熏出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, if you do this, you'll kill yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，如果你这样做，你会害死自己的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...do this? Yes, he can. You caused this - coddled him, protected him, now I'm going to have to take control from...
ESP.TRADUIT: …这么做？是的，他可以。都是你造成的——你纵容他，维护他，现在，我必须要从你这儿取回控制权…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...you, you need to go, run. Dog is going to burn voice... burn voice out, burn it away.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你走吧，快逃吧。狗要烧掉那声音…用火把它熏出来，赶走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and Dog looks just like me. You've hurt yourself. Inside. Do you see now, see...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...狗和我很像。你一直在自我伤害。你看见了吗，看吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...in the water. Dog understands now. Dog knows what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: …水中的倒影。狗现在明白了。狗明白怎么回事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Confused, then slow child evil. Holding the "God voice" in his hands, turning it left and right, and realizing he could smash it like a bug. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's right. If you merge us, then... I... we... or whatever we become... we can't help you when you reach whatever's at the Sierra Madre's end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说得对。如果你让我们两个融合，那...我...我们…也许会变成另一个人…等你抵达了马德雷山脉的终点，我们那时也无法帮你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God wants to be healed, but he knows if this happens, he's leaving the player high and dry, and he genuinely regrets that. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012248_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Dog... Dog doesn't want to unremember you, may forget you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且狗...狗不想忘记你，狗也许会忘了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012249_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will forget almost all that has happened here. You'll be alone - at the Old Man's mercy. Like Dog. Like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会忘了这里发生的几乎所有事情。你将独自面对那个老头，任由他摆布，如同狗和我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God wants to be healed, but he knows if this happens, he's leaving the player high and dry, and he genuinely regrets that. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...to stop you. You think your pull is stronger than mine? No... no, I've minded Dog, protected him far longer than you ever have. He won't...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...阻止你。你觉得你的能力比我大？不...不，是我一直在照顾狗，保护狗，比你要久得多。他不会……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listen to you. If Master sent you, Dog is listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...听你的。如果是主人派你来的，狗就听你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...him, just as I do. Do you understand now? Do you understand why I have to take control? He...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...他，就像我一样。你懂了吗？你明白我为什么要取得控制权吗？他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...why keep hurting self, voice keeps... telling Dog to do things. Dog just wants voice to go away... away.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...为什么老是伤害自己，那声音老是…指挥狗。狗只想让它走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...too late. Too late for us... too late for you to do anything but...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...太晚了。对我们来说...你什么都做不了，但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listen to you. Your voice... Dog will listen to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...听你的。你的声音...狗会听你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take that chain around your neck, grab the ends, and pull slow and hard until you hear a crack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抓住你脖子上的锁链末端，慢慢拉紧，直到听见断裂的声音为止。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Dog can do that. Dog hopes to see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，狗这就照办。后会有期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Strangely calm as he's about to commit suicide, almost matter-of-fact as he slavishly obeys orders. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other voice? See it in your head - not as a voice, but as a ball, the size of your hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个声音？你要想象他不是个声音，而是个球，和你手掌差不多大小。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... Dog never thought of the voice as... small. As something he could hold...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗...从没想过那声音会如此…弱小。仿佛他可以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog's about to eat his imaginary personality, killing it. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...on for much longer. What are you doing? What...
ESP.TRADUIT: …捏在手心。你在做什么？你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God doesn't realize he's about to be devoured by God and destroyed, he does suspect something bad's about to go down. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...do you want Dog to do? Voice is small now, Dog... Dog could... Dog choke the voice, crush it into red mash.
ESP.TRADUIT: …希望狗做什么？那声音已经十分微弱了，狗可以把它吞掉，嚼烂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Confused, then slow child evil. Holding the "God voice" in his hands, turning it left and right, and realizing he could smash it like a bug. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, listen to the other voice inside now. Go to sleep, let him come out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，你必须听体内那个声音的话。快睡吧，让他出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If... if other voice comes out... Dog... Dog won't wake up. Dog doesn't want to sleep, please don't make him...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果...如果那个声音出来了...狗...狗就再也醒不过来了。狗不想睡，求你不要让他…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Player is coaxing Dog to give up, letting God emerge. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...go to sleep. Good. Yes... make him sleep. Please...
ESP.TRADUIT: …睡着 。很好。让他睡吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Player is coaxing Dog to give up, letting God emerge. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...don't make me go to sleep. I... Dog is tired. Dog is tired, can't... keep eyes open. Sleep... Dog needs to sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...不要让我睡。我...狗累了。睁不开眼。睡觉...狗要睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, look, I wasn't the one who caged you here, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，听着，不是我把你关在这儿的，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Master? Master... Dog... Dog is listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 主人？主人...狗...狗在听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011dac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, the Master sent me. He commands you to listen to my voice now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，主人让我来的。他命令你听我的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... no, you put Dog here, you keep him here! Like other cages you put Dog in!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...不，你把狗关在这儿的！你还把狗关在了其他笼子里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011dad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... stay back, listen to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗…住手，听我说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED]Hnnh? Master? Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 哈？主人？不想惹主人生气...主人想要狗做什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog! Stop! Or Master will be mad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗！停下！不然主人会生气的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... Dog no listen to you, no listen to your voice anymore - will tear you apart, feed on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...狗不听你的，不想再听你的话了——要把你撕碎，吃了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready for more? Come on, let's finish this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还想再来吗？来吧，一决胜负。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nrrrrrrh... rhhhhharrhhh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 咕咕咕……啊啊啊嗷嗷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. Come on, let's fight, you big reject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。来吧，动手吧，你这个怪胎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't do it - fighting's more merciful than this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做不到——还不如战斗呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master needs you to pull on the chain on your neck as hard as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人让你用力勒紧脖子上的锁链。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master. Dog hopes to see you soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，主人。后会有期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Strangely calm as he's about to commit suicide, almost matter-of-fact as he slavishly obeys orders. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... listen to me... don't do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗...听我说...别这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hnnh? Master? Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯？主人？不想惹主人生气...主人想要狗做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog! Stay! If you don't, Master will be mad!
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗！停下！不然主人会生气的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Dog tired of listening to you - put you in cage, piece by piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 狗不想听你的话了，狗要把你扔进笼子，撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't plan on running, it's time to kill you both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有想跑，我要杀了你们两个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, then. I won't make it easy on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那来吧。我不会对你手软的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog will crush you, snap your bones, make red everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗会打烂你，打断你的骨头，让你的血洒得到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dog howls with murderous rage> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011d93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have, the legend, the curses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都听说过。无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some foolishness about it lying in the middle of a City of Dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在亡者之城的中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A city of ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一座幽影幢幢的鬼城……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beneath a blood-red cloud...
ESP.TRADUIT: 笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...a bright, shining monument, reaching out, luring treasure hunters to their doom. An illusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: …一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。一场幻梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A promise that you can change your fortunes. Begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一张空头支票。仿佛在那里你可以改写命运，重获新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finding it, though, that's not the hard part.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，找到它并非难事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's letting go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正难的是放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_9.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 真正难的是放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_11.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011df3_12.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 真正难的是放手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Last sentence of the DLC, this is the period at the end of the epilogue, close the book. ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have, the legend, the curses. Some foolishness about it lying in the middle of a City of Dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都听说过，无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在亡者之城的中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Last sentence of the DLC, this is the period at the end of the epilogue, close the book. ESP.ORIGINAL: A city of ghosts. Buried beneath a blood-red cloud... a bright, shining monument luring treasure hunters to their doom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一座幽影幢幢的鬼城，笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下……一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Last sentence of the DLC, this is the period at the end of the epilogue, close the book. ESP.ORIGINAL: An illusion that you can begin again, change your fortunes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一场幻梦，仿佛在那里你可以改写命运，重获新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Last sentence of the DLC, this is the period at the end of the epilogue, close the book. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingfi_00011dee_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's letting go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正难的是放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Last sentence of the DLC, this is the period at the end of the epilogue, close the book. ESP.ORIGINAL: The survivors of the Sierra Madre thought about gathering at the Fountain and waiting for the Courier.
