ESP.TRADUIT: 从马德雷山脉赌场中逃出的幸存者们本想聚集在喷泉处等待邮差归来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : ...yet she's resolved that she did her part. Draws this fragment to a close, slow, and quiet. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingin_00011de8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the end, the collars' silence made them uneasy, and the fear of turning on each other made them hesitate, and leave the goodbyes - unspoken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，项圈的沉默让他们深觉不安，彼此之间的不信任又让他们倍感踌躇。最终，他们只能将道别默默埋在心中，没能说出口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : ...yet she's resolved that she did her part. Draws this fragment to a close, slow, and quiet. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingin_00011de8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The radio message at the fountain was enough for them, and there was no need to add another farewell on top of all they had suffered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喷泉的电台里传出的信息对于他们来说已经足够。在共同经历过这一切之后，一句珍重都显得如此多余。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : ...yet she's resolved that she did her part. Draws this fragment to a close, slow, and quiet. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingin_00011de8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard stories of the Sierra Madre Casino. We all have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定听过关于马德雷赌场的传说。我们都曾听过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : This line leads in to the other narrations folks do. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingin_00011de9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This story's different than the others. It's all in promise of beginnings. And the ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而这个故事却有所不同。它开始于一个美好的承诺，而结局……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : This line leads in to the other narrations folks do. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingin_00011de9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the years that followed, the legend of the Sierra Madre faded, and there were no... new visitors to the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后的几年里，马德雷山脉赌场的传说逐渐被人遗忘，再也没有人…进入过这座城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Years later, when a mysterious blood red cloud began to roll across the Mojave, then West toward the Republic, no one knew where it had come from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又过了几年，一团神秘的红雾开始飘入莫哈维，并继续向着西面共和国的方向前进。没有人知道它从何而来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only that it brought death in its wake. Attempts to find the source of the toxic cloud failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到有人命丧红雾之下，人们才有所警觉。但毒雾的源头始终未能查清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mojave was cut off. Through the Cloud, lights were seen from HELIOS One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维就这样与世隔绝了。透过红雾，只有太阳神一号发出的光仍旧依稀可见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were stories of ghosts immune to gunfire, who struck down anyone they saw with rays of light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来传说出现了一群刀枪不入的幽灵，凡是遇到它们的人，都会被它们发出的光束击倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last chapter of the Mojave came when a modified REPCONN rocket struck Hoover Dam, releasing a blood-red cloud, killing all stationed there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，胡佛大坝被一枚改装过的瑞普康火箭击中，血红色的浓雾从中喷涌而出，驻扎在此处的士兵无一幸存。莫哈维就此走向终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All attempts to penetrate the Cloud and re-take the Dam failed, and both the NCR and Legion finally turned away from it, citing the place as cursed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们数次试图冲破红雾，收复大坝，但均以失败告终。NCR和军团不得不宣告放弃，将这里视为诅咒之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the years that followed, communities across the West began to die as traces of the Cloud began to drift over lands held by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后的岁月里，红雾继续向西扩散，NCR领地内的定居点开始逐一走向消亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only two remained alive in the depths of the Cloud, at the Sierra Madre, waiting for their new world to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只剩下浓雾深处马德雷山脉赌场里的两个人，依然在静静等待着一个重获新生的世界来临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draw this dark ending to a close. The player and Elijah declared war on a nation, and using the Sierra Madre, won. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011dec_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier, lured by the promise of the Sierra Madre, could not escape. Once inside the vault, the casino did not let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差被马德雷山脉赌场的宝藏所蛊惑，最终没能逃脱。凡是进入避难所的人，赌场都不会再放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, reverent, draw this end slide to a close with slight emphasis on "begin again," theme of DLC. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011ded_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Courier finally passed away, the casino created a new Hologram to walk with the other ghosts that filled its casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差去世之后，赌场里出现了一个新的全息影像，与其它游荡在其中的幽灵们成为了同伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, reverent, draw this end slide to a close with slight emphasis on "begin again," theme of DLC. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011ded_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a pre-programmed homage intended for another. It assumed a new meaning in the likeness of the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它原本是为纪念另一个人而准备的复制品。如今它却拥有了邮差的外貌，这也仿佛赋予了它一层新的含义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, reverent, draw this end slide to a close with slight emphasis on "begin again," theme of DLC. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011ded_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A means of allowing even the dead to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即便已经死去，也可以用某种方式重获新生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Quiet, reverent, draw this end slide to a close with slight emphasis on "begin again," theme of DLC. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingpl_00011ded_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnhhhh... Dog getting full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...狗快吃饱了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog's bark after devouring one of the Ghost People, happy to feed. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdevou_00011f3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OM NOM NOM
ESP.TRADUIT: 嚼嚼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Joke line.Dog's bark after devouring one of the Ghost People, happy to feed. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdevou_00011f3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rhrrrrrr...
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔唔嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog makes feeding, tearing noises as he devours a victim. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdevou_00011f3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: RhhhhaaarrrRRRRRRRR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜啊啊啊啊啊啊嗷嗷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog's roar before rushing to eat an enemy. His animation at this point resembles a roar (because he does). EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdevou_00011f3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show's about to begin. People, take your places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好戏要开场了，大伙儿，各自就位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Everyone - trigger the event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各位，我准备好了——动手吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally. Now, the gates will open. And so will the skies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于。大门终于要打开了，天空也要打开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slight disgust for the casino, he only cares about it when it's about to be triggered. AUDIO: Hear this over a speaker. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_0001214e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's do this. On the count of three... two... one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们动手吧，三，二，一……

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give two taps back.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <回敬两下敲击。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only a little longer, and we'll open the casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再过一会儿，我们就可以开启赌场了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine? We're almost ready here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀？我们马上就好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [A single tap comes from the speaker, then silence.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [扩音器里传来一声敲击，然后便安静了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be you, Christine. Sit tight, not like you have a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只能是你，克莉丝汀。好好呆着吧，反正你也没有别的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Save your energy, we still have to pull this off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 省点力气吧，我们还有事要做呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, now... I'll let you out when the event's over. Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，好……等到一切结束之后，我或许会考虑放你出来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The hammering stops for a second... and there's one final bang from the speaker, as if someone is smashing their fist into a wall.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [捶打的声音停了下来，紧接着扩音机那头传来最后一声巨响，仿佛是有人用拳头砸墙的声音。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01gal_nvdlc01galaeven_00011f5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, don't take too long, or it'll be a short recovery, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，别花太久，相信我，否则你会来不及恢复的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you get the strength to leave, do so - quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你有力气离开的时候，就尽快启程吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on and rest. I have to take care of something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 休息吧。我还有别的事要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you... for whatever you have done. I will remain here, need to get my strength back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你…虽然我不知道你究竟做了什么。我会留在这儿，恢复体力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012243_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're trapped inside a casino in a poisonous city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是座死城，我们被困在了一家赌场里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cage... but at least you're not in two of them now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是一间牢笼……不过好在你刚刚摆脱了另外两间牢笼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That... that was not the answer I was expecting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这不是我期待的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012239_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd take too long to explain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这事解释起来可能比较麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel as if I've woken up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉自己仿佛刚刚苏醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012240_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know you, yet I feel like I do, and a feeling of... gratitude. I... forgive me, I... I'm wounded. This chain... this bear trap on my arm...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认识你，但我仿好像以前在哪儿见过你，我的心里…充满了感激。我...抱歉，我受伤了。这锁链...我手臂上的这个捕兽夹...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012241_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...how did I even get this far with these wounds? The pain is excruciating, I... I need to rest for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是怎么带着这些伤走这么远的？伤口很疼，我...我要休息一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012241_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your voice... it's different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声音...变了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who... who are you? What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你是谁？这是什么地方？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just go before I change my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，趁我还没改变主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise I'll try not to get killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证我会努力活下去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We came this far, I'll manage. Go on, let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都走到这一步了，剩下的交给我就好。放心地去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were there all the time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都在...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012237_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...all the time, you were there, and so close...
ESP.TRADUIT: …一直以来，你都与我如今接近...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012238_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...together.
ESP.TRADUIT: …与我同在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012238_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I don't want you to merge, I need you here... Dog, listen to my voice. Dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我不再坚持让你们融合了，我需要你……狗，听到了吗，狗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog understands. Need help, need Dog in case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗明白。让狗帮忙，以防万一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. You... we might not get through this, otherwise. Need to survive, no matter what the cost. Now... now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，否则的话，你…我们也许熬不过这一关。无论如何，都要想办法活下去。现在…现在…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want you to be under anyone's control, even mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想让你被任何人控制，哪怕那个人是我也不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not having your help doesn't matter if this heals you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有你们的帮忙也没关系，别太放在心上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog understands... Dog has done... bad things, knows why voice was...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗明白...狗做过不少坏事…也知道那声音为什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012255_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...furious with him. Tired of the anger. Thank you... Courier. Even if it's only for minutes before the Sierra Madre kills us all, then...
ESP.TRADUIT: …会发火。不想生气了。谢谢你...邮差。哪怕我们也许不久之后都要葬身于这马德雷山脉中，我……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012256_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Dog hopes you find a way to save self, like you help Dog, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...狗也希望你能找到解救自己的办法，就像你解救了狗一样...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012257_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...when you meet him, find a way to save yourself, as you tried to save us. Otherwise, I'll be upset with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你见到他的时候，一定要保护好自己，就像你曾经对我们一样。不然，我可是会感到失望的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012258_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that you see, I want you to step back, listen to the voice again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你看见了，我想让你退回来。再听听那个声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know what happens if you go into the water, Dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你走进水里会发生什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then... step into the water, step into yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来...走进水里，和你自己融为一体吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog... if Dog goes into the water... Dog can't help if Master gets mad. You were nice to Dog, Dog wants to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果狗走进了水里...那主人发狂的时候，狗就帮不上忙了。你对狗很好。狗想帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Dog is trying to be nice in this node. Doesn't want to be sent away. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012235_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to picture the voice, inside, and, uh, turn in and look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着把那个声音想成一个实体，然后，呃，再想象你看着他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Dog can see the voice. Looks just like Dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 狗能看见那声音的样子了。似乎和狗长得差不多...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012244_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine the voice, not as a voice... but as water. Look at the voice now, what do you see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把那个声音想成...水面。看着它，你看见了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Dog... Dog does not understand. Voice? The other voice? What do you want Dog to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 狗...狗不明白。声音？另一个声音？你要狗怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012245_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you're not planning to blow up the casino now, great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不打算炸掉赌场就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you've got him on a leash, I need to finish things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你已经搞定他了，我还有很多事情要做呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to be all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things here... are... under control. Find the one that dragged us here, end him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前...还能控制。找到那个把我们绑到这儿来的人，杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012242_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, sleep, reject. Sleep like the dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就对了，睡吧。像个死人一样沉睡吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodnight, Dog. You won't wake up, ever again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚安，狗。你再也不会醒来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Close your eyes, and only open them if the voice tells you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭上眼睛。除非那个声音叫你打开，你再打开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it. You... I don't feel him struggling anymore... I'm in pain, and... I hate to say it, I'm starving, but... I'm not fighting him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了。你…我再也感觉不到他的挣扎了…我很痛苦，而且…虽然羞于承认，但我确实很饿，不过…我并不是要击溃他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Draw this resolution to a close. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I wanted was him to listen to me, take care of him, keep him from hurting himself...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想让他听话而已，照顾他，让他别受伤害……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Draw this resolution to a close. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I can. One day, when he's ready, I'll let him out. When we... understand each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我终于可以放心了。有朝一日，等时机成熟，当我们可以理解彼此的时候…我会再放他出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Draw this resolution to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001223c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... well done, Dog. I'm pleased. Now stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好...做得好，狗。我很满意。在这儿呆着吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some unfinished business. Are you going to be all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有些没完成的工作，你没事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, well, it had to be done. Now, I need you to remain here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，行了，这都是必须的。现在我要你留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. And... hungry. More hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗有话要说。狗不怕了。而且……很饿。更饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog will obey. Dog will stay here... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗会听话的。狗会暂时……待在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012236_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After... after that, Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后……狗会去找吃的，把它扯烂，吞下去。追到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。直到狗的肚子填饱为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012236_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you hungry? Go on - feed, piece by piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是饿了吗？来，吃吧，慢点嚼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, hold it tightly by the neck - now sink your teeth into it, tear it apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你要牢牢掐住他的脖子，再用力咬下去，撕碎他的喉咙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. No, Dog, no...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，狗，不...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...knows now. Voice was always small... Dog could have torn it apart, eaten it all this time, tear it...
ESP.TRADUIT: …狗明白了。那声音其实很弱小...狗可以把它撕碎，把它生吞活剥...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001224f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...apart, Dog... we cannot be apart, you need if... hnnnh... hrrhhaharrrrr...
ESP.TRADUIT: …不，狗...我们不能分开，你需要...啊...啊啊啊啊啊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Dog... Dog is... empty. The voice... Dog is hungrier than ever...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...狗...狗觉得心里空落落的。那声音...狗感觉比以前更饿了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Devoured his other personality, he's free... and so are his brutal instincts. Not a good thing. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012251_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... he's asleep. Finally. Shhhhhh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我... 他睡着了。终于。嘘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after Dog's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001233f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... all I wanted was for you to listen to me, let me care for you. Keep you from hurting yourself...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗…我只想让你听我的话，让我来照顾你吧。我不想让你伤害自己…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: God is being genuine here... all he wanted to do was keep Dog out of harm's way.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I can. And one day, when you're ready, I'll let you out. When you're calm, and we... understand each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我有能力了。将来有一天，等到时机成熟，当你能冷静下来，我们…能够相互理解时，我会再把你放出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after Dog's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012341_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: Calm, resolved. Loop back to the second line.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello? Voice? You there? It's Dog......Dog can hear himself. Voice is... is in cage? Locked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨？声音？你在么？ 剩下狗了...…狗只能听到自己的声音。声音…关进笼子了？被锁起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. And... hungry. More hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在狗能说话了。狗不再害怕了。 狗...很饿。比以前更饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried. The end should start sounding dangerous, like it may not have been the right thing to EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗要去找吃的…把食物嚼碎，吞掉。狗要追赶猎物，到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。狗要吃到肚子饱了为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried. This should be an uh-oh moment, as the player realizes this may not have been a good EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012345_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是什么地方？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012346_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel strange, like... sleeping. On my neck, is this... a chain? I... what's carved on my chest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好奇怪，感觉就像…做梦一样。我脖子上的是…链条么？我... 我胸口刻了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "God." No... not God. Something in reverse... hnh. Was that one of them...?
ESP.TRADUIT: "神" 。不…不是神。要倒过来看…唔。哪个才是正确的呢……？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should rest, get my strength back... then explore this place, see what it holds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先休息一下，恢复体力…再四处看看，搞清楚这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you just... uh... need to hear another voice, like mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能你需要…呃…听听别人的话，比如我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Master? Master, Dog hoped you come, voice... voice is going...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 主人？主人，狗一直在等你来，那声音...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，主人来了，主人让你停手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... Dog is my creature, and he's more than enough to end you here and now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...狗只听命于我，他现在就可以轻松地把你解决掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, listen to my voice, maybe... maybe I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，听我说，也许…也许我可以帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED]You... were kind to Dog. Dog will listen... Dog is glad you came...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你对狗很好。狗会听你的话...你能来，狗很高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, I stopped because I don't want to hurt you - now listen. I want to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，我停手是因为我不想伤害你——你仔细听着，我想帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mean you any harm... you just need to calm down, focus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想伤害你…你得冷静下来，集中精力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog tried. Just hard... hard to hear over voice sometimes... so loud... pain... pain...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗试过了。只是有时候很难……很难忽略那个声音...太大声了...痛…好痛...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...won't shut me out, Dog. It won't silence me. This human... both of them, they mean to...
ESP.TRADUIT: …你抑制不了我的，狗。疼痛也无法让我消失。这个人类...他们两个，他们都想...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...help Dog, please. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...帮帮狗，求你了。求你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. I'm sick of dragging you around anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。我也不想再带着你这个拖油瓶了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog knows... please... help Dog end the voice, Dog just wants it to go away. Dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道...请你...帮狗解决掉那个声音吧，狗只想让它消失。狗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and I have more in common than we know. Soon, you'll be inside Dog, just as I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: …与我有着许多共同点，甚至远超出我的想象。很快，你就会和我一样，变成狗肚子里的蛔虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bite down on it, chew until it's silent, then swallow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咬住它，让它安静下来，然后吞掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... don't do this, listen to me, my voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗...别这样做，听我说，听我的声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Master? Master, Dog hoped you would come, voice... voice is going...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 主人？主人，狗一直在等你来，那声音…那声音要…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，主人来了，主人要你住手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Dog... Dog wants to, Dog does, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 狗…狗要听，狗听了，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, that voice doesn't control you, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，那个声音没有控制你，知道吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog tried to shut it out, tried to hurt self enough to make it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗试过让他闭嘴，还试过用自残的方式来让它…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...quiet. Shhhhh, Dog. Let me handle this. I'll let you feed on this human when we're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...安静。嘘，狗，交给我吧。等一切都结束，我就拿这个人类给你打牙祭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, reject. You want to die? I'll accomodate you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，你这个废物。想找死吗？我可以满足你的愿望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog doesn't want to die. But the voice keeps shouting, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不想死。但那声音还在嘶吼，还...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not leaving me any choice, I have to stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我别无选择，我必须阻止你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is sorry, so sorry, didn't want to, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗很抱歉，非常抱歉，不想这样，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...it's time for you to realize who's in control here. First, we tear you apart - then this casino, and the Old Man with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: …该让你知道谁才是这里的老大了。首先，我们会把你撕成碎片，然后砸烂整个赌场，让那个老不死的一同陪葬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000124e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you, exactly? You're acting different than before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？你和之前表现得不太一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in. Now - what do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。所以，你有何贵干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you see these wounds of his, covering his skin...the bear trap on his arm? He placed his own hand in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到他浑身上下遍布的伤口…还有他胳膊上的捕熊夹了吗？是他自己把手伸进去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012667_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name he carved in his chest? To remind him of who he is, he inflicts pain on himself to silence me, when all I try to do... Hrr!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还在胸口刻上了自己的名字，好时刻提醒自己是谁。为了不让我出声，他不断地摧残自己的肉体。而我只是想……唔！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012667_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...he cuts, hurts, and tries to murder me out of him. He won't succeed. Just makes me angrier.
ESP.TRADUIT: …他故意弄伤自己，就为了将我从他的体内赶走。他不会成功的，这只会让我更加愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012667_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is the beast, we simply change cages. Like the ones here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗是一头野兽，我们只是换了个笼子。就像眼前这间笼子一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012667_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012668_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard electricity and radios can cause, uh, voices in people's heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说长期接触电流和无线电信号会让人，呃，出现幻听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That's the easy explanation, the one humans use. Pre-War technology, as if it's the cause of all ills, mind and body.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这是个万金油一般的解释，人类编造的借口罢了。仿佛一切生理或心理上的疾病都是战前科技造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012663_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I needed to come out of the cage to protect Dog. From clever humans... like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想走出笼子，保护狗。让他不会被你这样……聪明的人类利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012663_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Super Mutants, brain damage is usually the result of prolonged Stealth Boy usage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于超级变种人来说。脑损伤通常是长期过量使用隐形小子造成的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Perhaps. Or maybe I was here all the time, watching. Waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 可能吧。也可能因为我一直都待在这里，等着你现身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012664_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hit your head or something? You're acting odd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是撞到头了还是怎么的？你表现得很古怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Trauma... yes, in a manner of speaking.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 创伤...没错，可以这样说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001265f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have multiple personality disorder. Some trauma caused this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有多重人格失调症。是创伤导致的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... sometimes it simply wakes voices up.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不...有时候我脑子里就是会突然响起某种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012660_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...going to make casino burn, no more being...
ESP.TRADUIT: …我要烧掉赌场，不必再……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012793_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
ESP.TRADUIT: …回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012bde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...can hear you now. Not much longer, not...
ESP.TRADUIT: …可以听见你了。不必了，不必了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012bdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listening to me. Tired of being your minder, tired...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 我不想再照顾你了，不想再…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
ESP.TRADUIT: …让狗沉睡了，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
ESP.TRADUIT: …保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
ESP.TRADUIT: …主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listen to me. If you do this, we both...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 如果你这么做的话，我们 都会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
ESP.TRADUIT: …死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
ESP.TRADUIT: …救我们的。我可以帮助我们两个。如果你不肯，那你就会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012be6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram Vendor [010127AF] (mod) Quest : ([010127AB]NVDLC01HoloVendor) Hologram Vendor Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have anything I can buy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能从你这儿买点东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram flickers in acknowledgement.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像闪了闪，以示告别。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram Vendor [010127AF] (mod) Quest : ([010127AB]NVDLC01HoloVendor) Hologram Vendor Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes dart in the direction of the screeching sound. She looks frightened and trembles slightly, as if fighting an urge to run.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀朝着惨叫传来的方向望去。她看起来十分恐惧，身体微微颤抖着，似乎挣扎着想要逃跑。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtchrist_000127f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be patient, I'm going. Maybe you should know when to let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耐心点，我要过去了。 或许你也该学会放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Christine is walking to the Vault Elevator, asks player to be patient. This is a single bark to prevent breaking scripted sequence. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_0001172e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made it, good. I'm getting tired of waiting for you - and Elijah. Surprised? Yeah... I made it here, just like you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，很好。我实在是不想再等你，也不想再等以利亚了。很惊讶吗？没错…我和你一样，也来到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Player made it through the Suites, Hated. Christine's voice is back, although it's ragged, it just healed.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_0000a815_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made it, good... <Coughs>ugh.. Hurts to talk. I'll keep this quick in case my... voice goes out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，很好…… <咳嗽>呃……发出声音都难受，我会说得快一些，免得待会又哑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_0000a816_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. You sure you still want me here, collars and all? Not much for waiting around with a bomb around my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了？你还要我戴着项圈在这儿等吗？ 脖子上套个炸弹在这儿干耗，可做不了什么事啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Christine was not pleased to be asked to wait. Urges the player to find whatever he/she needs of her. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_0001172f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I wish you luck in the Vault. Elijah... he's tough to pin down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…祝你在避难所里一切顺利，以利亚…可不是个好惹的对手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Christine's voice is restored, wishes the player luck in the vault. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_0000c7df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine is looking at the Fountain, her eyes narrowed. She then scans the courtyard perimeter, gauging the distance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看着喷泉，眯起了双眼。她扫视着庭院的周边，似乎在测量距离。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_00012b69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She glances at your wrist, then back at the Fountain.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看了一眼你的手腕，然后又转向喷泉。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_00012b69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The woman before you looks disoriented, pained - she blinks a few times, then winces, as if the act of blinking causes her pain.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [站在你面前的女人似乎有些神情恍惚，脸上充满了痛苦。她眨巴了几下眼睛，身体不受控制地颤抖起来，似乎连眨眼的动作都会加剧她的痛苦。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000012db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine points at the sky, makes a fist, then makes an explosion gesture with her fingers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指指天空，握紧拳头，张开手比了个爆炸的动作。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000012dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head, narrows her eyes, then points at your compass.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀摇摇头，眯起眼睛，指了指你的指南针。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000103ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine motions to you, points at the door uneasily, then makes a pulling motion with her hand. She seems hesitant to go near it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀靠近你，吃力地指向门，做出拉拽的姿势，她看起来有些犹豫，似乎不愿靠近那扇门。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000133e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks at you warily.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀警惕地盯着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000012dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine glares at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀怒视着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000012de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀竖起了一条眉毛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_greeting_000012df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The flickering Hologram stares at you expectantly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像用闪烁的眼神充满期待地望着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram Vendor [010127AF] (mod) Quest : ([010127AB]NVDLC01HoloVendor) Hologram Vendor Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog will obey. Dog will stay here... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗听你的。狗就暂时…先呆在这儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012252_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things here... are... under control. Find the one that dragged us here, end him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切……又回到了掌控之中。 把那个绑架我们的人找出来，干掉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012253_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you... for whatever you have done. I will remain here, need to get my strength back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你……所做的一切。我想先在这里待一会儿，恢复一下元气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: God and Dog have merged in this node, "God Calm." It's God's voice, with the anger taken off, calmer, at peace. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012254_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Hnnnhrhhh... my voice... won't work, won't hold him, down, doesn't matter, won't help...
ESP.TRADUIT: ……哼啊……我的声音……起不了作用，控制不了它，一点效果都没有……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Deliver this like God is trying to break out of a cage, hates player, hates Dog. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_0001388e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Hnnnhrhhh... he's gotten too strong, too scared... even my own voice won't help...
ESP.TRADUIT: …哼啊……他太强大了，太害怕了…我的声音没有作用了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Deliver this like God is trying to warn the player and help the player, but Dog's fury is keeping him back. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_0001388f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You...? Master... no, not Master. Dog remembers you. Left Dog in cage, mean to Dog... now, Dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…？是主人吗？不，不是主人。 狗记得你。你把狗丢在笼子里，对狗很不好…现在…狗要……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dog fumes at the player and wants to kill> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_0000f330_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... you hurt Dog, keep hurting him. Dog hungry, not want to hurt any more... not want to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你……你伤害了狗，不停伤害他。狗很饿，狗不想再受伤了……不想了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Make the player feel bad for beating up the reject. Evil players will still enjoy it, though. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_0000f331_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You...? Master... no, not Master. Dog remembers you. Kind to Dog... Dog can't...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…？是主人吗？不，不是主人。 狗记得你。 你对狗很和气……狗不能……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dog wants to kill self> EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00011da0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind to Dog... then hurt Dog... you hate Dog, hate...
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始对狗很好……然后又伤害狗……你讨厌狗，恨他……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00011da1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master? Dog not hear you come in... too hungry, now... at cage door? Master, Dog is listening now you are close and he can hear you over hunger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人？狗没听到你的声音…狗太饿了…在笼子旁边吗？ 主人，狗现在能听清你讲话了， 就算很饿也听得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Confused, then reverent, obedient. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012a80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll wait here until there's fires in the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在这儿等着的，直到天空出现火光为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000139a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗会一直等的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000139a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better have brought enough meat. I can feel Dog's teeth tearing at my ribs, hungry to get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好尽快把足够的肉带来给我。我能感到狗的牙齿正撕扯我的肋骨，急切想要钻出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God asks if player has returned with food. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_0000f405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why Dog eyes go black for bit. You talk to other voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么狗的眼睛黑了一下？ 你和另一个声音讲话了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Pacing, getting angrier. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000139be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog wants out... Dog is hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗想要出去……狗饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog not free, Dog complains about being stuck and hungry. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000012e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let Dog out. Hungry, hate being in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让狗出去。狗很饿，狗讨厌留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Pacing, getting angrier. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000012e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here we are. A row of switches all lined up. How familiar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到了，一排连着的开关，好熟悉……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He knows what do, being cagey. Knows he's got the player in a hard spot, and the player needs his help. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00013468_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...these switches won't move themselves, after all... there must be some trick to it. Now that I'm here... what do you expect me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: .……这些开关需要人来扳动，其中应该……有些门道吧。 那现在这个情况……你想让我做什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He knows what do, being cagey. Knows he's got the player in a hard spot, and the player needs his help. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00013468_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are we here? Dog not want to be here... place too much like a cage for Dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们要到这里？狗不喜欢这里……太像笼子了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is referring a "bad" thing he did. Deep down, wants to do it again. He devoured a girl needing his help, couldn't, wouldn't stop himself. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012b27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Dog was fed like last time, Dog would listen. If the feeding was quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果狗能像上次那样吃得饱饱的，狗就听你的话。不过你拿来的食物可不能乱动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is referring a "bad" thing he did. Deep down, wants to do it again. He devoured a girl needing his help, couldn't, wouldn't stop himself. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012b27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... are we on our way to somewhere else...? A Gala Event, perhaps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…我们这是要去干啥啊…？是去参加盛世庆典吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012b43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you taking Dog? Dog doesn't want to leave, heard Master... saw Master in sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要把狗带到哪儿去？狗不想走，狗听到主人的声音了…主人就在天上…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012ab8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when Master not there... woman at fountain... she is made of lines and light, want to watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人不在的时候……喷泉里就会出现那个女人…… 她是由灯光和细线构成的，狗想见她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_00012ab8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't the clever one. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我们的小天才吗？你有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000109bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the nice voice... kind to Dog. You keep the other Voice quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个很好的人……对狗很好……你让另一个声音安静下来了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000012e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember you... you were mean to Dog, make Dog sleep... and other Voice come out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗记得你……你对狗很不好，让狗睡着了…还放另一个声音出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000012e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Dog remember you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，狗记得你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_greeting_000012e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You get no response.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [没有任何回应。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01012BDB] (ID) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you listening? Good. From now on, when I talk, listen - and follow my instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听得见吗？很好，从现在开始，我说话的时候，给我认真听，并且严格照我吩咐的去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013a3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play stupid, play clever, make the mistake of saying "no?" That collar on your neck'll go off and take your head with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是装傻充愣，耍花招，或者胆敢说个"不"字，你脖子上的项圈就会立刻爆炸，让你脑袋开花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013a3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've returned. Why? Gather the three as I've instructed, then I will have more for you - not before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么回来了？把我说的那三个人带过来，我才会给你进一步指示，现在我们没什么好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : When player awakes in Villa, Elijah hologram materializes and speaks, like floating head in Wizard of Oz. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013b04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, well done... now, for the festivities, and your parts in all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，干得不错……那么接下来，就该说说庆典仪式，以及你们几个的分工了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013b2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The owner of the Sierra Madre... for whatever reason... keyed the Grand Opening to the Gala Event itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场的主人……不知出于什么原因……将赌场的开业仪式与“盛世庆典”绑定在了一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013b2c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It needs to be fired off in order for the casino doors to open. As I've discovered, one person can't do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要打开赌场大门，就必须先启动这个盛世庆典。而我发现，这件事单凭一个人是做不到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013b2c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, get your team into position indicated on your Pip-Boy, then trigger it properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你要带着你的队友，到哔哔小子的地图上标记的地方去，再用合适的步骤启动仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so close now, don't let me down. Otherwise, I'll have to rely on the next team.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离成功只有一步之遥了，别让我失望。否则，我就只能指望下一支队伍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slightly less brutal in first sentence, then can't help himself for the second sentence and ends up resuming being a dick. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00013b2c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You. You're in the vault... finally. After all this time. The Sierra Madre... mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，总算进入避难所了。 过了这么久，马德雷山脉赌场终于……是我的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011216_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't move, don't go into the vault. And don't touch anything else... there may be more traps down there... another security system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别动，别进金库。 也不要 碰任何东西……那里也许还有其他陷阱……甚至可能配备了另一套安保系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011216_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说的够多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Father Elijah [01013A42] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoever designed the Sierra Madre... their obsession with messing with frequencies and signals...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是谁设计了马德雷山脉赌场……他们对于各种频率和信号真的是很痴迷…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming down - I'll meet you face to face at the vault entrance. If you resist, I'll use the collar, even if it puts the vault at risk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就下来，我会在避难所的入口和你见面。如果你敢违抗我，我就引爆项圈，即便将整个避难所炸毁都在所不惜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming down - I'll meet you face to face at the vault entrance. No tricks. If you prove troublesome, well... there's always the collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就下来，我会在避难所的入口和你见面。别和我耍花招，你要是敢给我惹事……别忘了你脖子上的项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming down, forget the Sierra Madre security, I'll find you myself. Try to break into the vault, I'll set off the collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就下来，赌场的安保设施根本没用，我要亲自干掉你。你要是敢闯入金库，我就引爆项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c92_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Curious? You must be. We have time, now that you've done your work. And our interactions have been too one-sided, even for my tastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好奇吗？你肯定很好奇吧。你已经完成了自己的使命，我们有的是时间。 不过，即便是以我的性格来衡量，咱们之间的交流也未免过于简单了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_000117b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask! You still have time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问吧！你还有时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_greeting_00011c93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the place you need to go when everyone is in place. Until then... nothing more than a diseased view of the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到所有人都就位之后，你就到这里去。 在那之前……我们也只能继续盯着这令人烦躁的马德雷山脉赌场发呆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slight disgust for the casino, he only cares about it when it's about to be triggered. AUDIO: Hear this over a speaker. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01gal_greeting_00012170_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Gala Event Control Panel [010120C8] (mod) Quest : ([0100C10D]NVDLC01GalaEventQuest) 0100C10D (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Anticipation, this is the big moment. AUDIO: Hear this over a speaker. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01gal_greeting_00012171_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you showed. Felt the collar start kicking again as soon as the elevator doors rattled open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于露面了，电梯门开的时候，我感觉到项圈又开始动了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you're going to up-stage me, here at the Sierra Madre? I don't think so. Now that I'm inside... well, I don't need you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿可是马德雷山脉赌场，你居然想在这儿抢我的风头？别做梦了。既然我已经进来了……你对我也就没用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, a friendly face... hey! Partner! Up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算看到一张熟悉的面孔了！嗨！伙计！这儿呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is hemmed in by lethal security holograms. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a bit of a predicament here... had to duck backstage, take a powder, the audience is a little... murderous tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到了些小麻烦…只能先溜进后台躲着，今晚的观众实在有些…过于热情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is hemmed in by lethal security holograms. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you're resourceful, I'll give you that - it's going to take a lot more than juggling keys and shooting speakers to stop me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你很厉害，我承认这一点——但要想阻止我，光会偷钥匙和打坏喇叭可不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I see it? All I need to do is kill you, then make a run for the exit. You do the same, you'll be clawing at the lock until your head blows off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 依我所见呢，我现在只要干掉你，再从这儿跑出去就行了。你也可以学我这么干，但最后结果无非是你扒着紧锁的大门，绝望地看着自己的脑袋被炸开花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So maybe you and I should have a little chat - just like we did when you first waltzed into town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，不妨聊两句？就像你刚到镇上，咱们第一次见面时那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062e_3.ogg
