ESP.ORIGINAL: Those electric ghosts aren't the kind of audience I like at the best of times - at least the ones in the Villa had manners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不乐意让那些电子幽灵来当我的观众呢，至少别墅区里的那些还懂点礼貌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even know how I ended up here... guess the casino still recognizes guests even after all this time, huh? How's that for history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不知道自己是怎么到这儿来的…看来过了这么久，赌场的来宾智能识别系统还在运作。真是优良传统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0001062f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure. This place is a dump! Lousy acoustics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也不想在这里表演了！这里简直糟透了！音响差到不行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <THEATER: Dean Greet/Bye Bark, if he was dealt with peacefully.> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_00010630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now, we got bigger problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说话，我们有更大的麻烦要解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0000eda2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that him floating above the Fountain, the boss man? The one who put these bowties on our necks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喷泉上漂着的那位就是整件事的幕后老大咯？是他把炸弹套在我脖子上的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_00012ba0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure does like to make a presentation... wish he'd keep it down, or else the Ghost People are going to swarm the gates, Vera Hologram or no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙还挺爱出风头的……希望下次他能低调点，不然那些鬼人迟早会冲出来把我们吞了的，连薇拉的影像都阻止不了它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_00012ba0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a seat, and then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先坐下，我们再聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_0000f21f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre. Mmm... beauty, isn't she. She the one who invited you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场。 嗯…她可真美啊，不是吗？是她邀请你来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe you didn't catch her voice on the radio. Woke up, confused, like some of the others. Least you're still breathing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也可能你不是从收音机里听到她的声音的。只是和其他人一样，醒来后发现自己莫名其妙就到这儿了。不过至少，你还有气儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, don't get up or make any sudden motions, no matter how uncomfortable that chair gets... the cushion's just for show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，那椅子坐着可能不大舒服，但无论如何，别起身，也别轻举妄动……那垫子只是个装饰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll hold up my end, don't you worry. We get to the Sierra Madre, it'll be a different tune, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说话算话，你不用担心。但是等我们进了马德雷赌场，可就要风水轮流转了，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000133ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Hold the wires, Dean." Talk about being a second stringer.
ESP.TRADUIT: "守着这些电线吧，迪安。" 感觉我就像个替补队员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this is where I'm supposed to put on the show? Played better venues, let me tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这里就是给我准备的舞台？我给你讲，我平时演出的地方可比这里好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000133ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's that there... wiring? Looks... looks like it's tied to the sound system in the Villa, except for that snipped section there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？电线吗？看上去…它连接了整个别墅区的音响系统， 只有这块儿，已经断掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000133ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what, I stand here, hold the two ends in my hands, and tap them together like cymbals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你打算让我站在这儿，两手各执一段电线，然后像上下镲片那样把它们接在一块儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000133ad_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think much of our chances, now I'm thinking I was wrong. What's the next step?
ESP.TRADUIT: 本以为没戏了，看来是我想错了。下一步干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, now, if it isn't my ball, chain, and dog collar rolled all into one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，这不是那位老喜欢折腾和使唤我的大人物吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have that sad, questioning look in your eye. Not sure talking to me's going to make it any better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你满脸都是悲伤而疑惑的表情，感觉我也没法让你喜笑颜开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_greeting_000012d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The holographic cashier faces you, flickering. It seems to be waiting for you to speak.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息收纳员的身姿在你面前闪烁，它似乎正等着你开口。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_greeting_0000c4c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cleaners will knock twice. Make sure they're thorough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清洁工会敲两下门。记得放他们进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny [00101C9B] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家扔手雷

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch where you're chucking those things!
ESP.TRADUIT: 扔的时候小心一点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_playerthrowgren_000053b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine covers her ears.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀捂住了耳朵。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_playerthrowgren_000053b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't waste those - save one for when they get close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别浪费——留几个等它们靠近了再用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_playerthrowgren_000053b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arooooooooo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哦哦哦哦哦哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_playerthrowgren_000053b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little party favor before the grand finale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大幕落下前再添一场压轴戏是吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_playerlaymine_000053e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine points at mine, then taps her temple.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指了指地雷，然后敲了敲自己的太阳穴。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_playerlaymine_000053e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thinking ahead... good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打提前量…不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_playerlaymine_000053e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want Dog to fetch bomb-thing? Or not touch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让狗把那些炸弹拿过来吗？还是别碰它们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_playerlaymine_000053e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be ridiculous - point that somewhere else, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 少跟我开玩笑，你能不能别拿这玩意指着我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_playerinironsit_000053c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns, points at your collar, then hers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉，指了指你的项圈，又指了指她的。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_playerinironsit_000053c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't take you for suicidal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你该不会是想找死吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_playerinironsit_000053cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't shoot. Bullets hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别开枪。子弹打到会很痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_playerinironsit_000053ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back if you need something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要什么就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([010140DB]NVDLC01ArcadeGoodbye) 010140DB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_goodbye_000012cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd shed a tear, but I'm sure we'll be chatting again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先让我擦下眼泪吧，不过我敢说我们很快就会再见面的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_goodbye_000012cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就到这吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd shed a tear, but I'm sure we'll be chatting again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先让我擦下眼泪吧，不过我敢说我们很快就会再见面的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_goodbye_00013d8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就到这吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to cash this one out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该做个了结了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_attack_00005345_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Godammit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_attack_0000fcac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Batting a thousand, that's us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以一敌百说的就是我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_attack_0000fcad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to open in Paris. Paris. Now this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想当年我可在巴黎开过个唱，巴黎啊，现在居然混到这步田地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_attack_0000fcae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe I left the apartment for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信我离开自家房间后居然干起了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_attack_0000fcaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, and her stance changes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，改变了姿势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01followers_attack_00005346_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hrrhrhhhhnnnh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯嗯嗯哼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_attack_00005347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something needs to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些东西非死不可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_attack_00005348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_hit_00005379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine takes the blow, doesn't flinch.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀身中一击，但她没有退缩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01followers_hit_0000537a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_hit_0000537b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ennh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯嗯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_hit_0000537c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flee
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Valor, you're up - discretion and me, we're outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有种你自己冲吧，我的理智告诉我还是走为上计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_flee_000053a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head, waves at you to follow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀摇摇头，挥手示意你跟上。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01followers_flee_000053a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnh-hnnnh-hnnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼哼—哼嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_flee_000053a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a defensible position, we'll kill them there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找个便于防守的位置，我们在那儿干掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_flee_000053a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steal
ESP.TRADUIT: 偷窃

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you find a place to pawn that, go right ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到典当它的地方，那就偷吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_steal_00005365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greed took the others - go on, keep it. I'll get it back eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贪婪已经吞噬了其他人，你留着吧。反正我最后会拿回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_steal_0000fcb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, then shakes her head and waves you off.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起了双眼，摇摇头，向你挥手告别。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01followers_steal_00005366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnh? Rhnhhhrrrr...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯？啊呜呜呜嗯嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_steal_00005367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take from me again, and I'll leave you for the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是再敢从我这里偷东西，我就把你丢给马德雷山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_steal_00005368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine - don't want us both blowing up anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好—我也不想让我俩全被炸飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_acceptyield_00005385_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine checks herself, stops attacking, looks angry, points at collar.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀检查了自己的伤势，停止了攻击，她看上去十分愤怒，指了指她的项圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_acceptyield_00005386_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnr? Hnnn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯嗯？哼嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_acceptyield_00005387_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next time, I'll break your legs and hang you from the Madre gates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再有下次，我就打断你的腿，把你挂在马德雷赌场的大门上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_acceptyield_00005388_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 突击

ESP.ORIGINAL: What're you doing that for? Fine, let's settle this.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine points at your collar, then hers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指了指你的项圈，又指了指自己的。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01followers_assault_0000532e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave 'em wanting more.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_combattonormal_000053d9_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀扫视了整片区域，然后微微放松了下来。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lost them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找不到人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去哪儿了？

ESP.TRADUIT: 跑到天涯海角我都会找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_combattolost_0000541f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lost, but not forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跑得了和尚跑不了庙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_combattolost_00005418_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now where did you go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底去哪儿了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_combattolost_00005419_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_combattolost_0000541a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_losttonormal_0000542c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madre's playing tricks on me. Whoever it is, they're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷又骗了我，那家伙不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_losttonormal_00005428_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess they skedaddled. Sounds good to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许那家伙已经逃走了，挺好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_losttonormal_00005429_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine scans the area, then shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀扫视了整片区域，然后摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_losttonormal_0000542a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_losttonormal_0000542e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food's back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物回来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunt's on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狩猎开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_losttocombat_000053f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should've stayed lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不该出现的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_losttocombat_000053fa_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会再失手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back like a bad habit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃不出我的手掌心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_losttocombat_000053f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought they'd bailed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还以为他逃走了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_losttocombat_000053f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnrrrrrrrrrrrr.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯嗯——
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnnrrrrrr...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯嗯……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever it is, it's still out there. Waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管那是谁，它肯定还在附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll come to us, Dog. Just wait. We'll kill it together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它还会回来的，狗。别急，我们会一起把它干掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它还在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can hear you moving, whoever you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是谁，但我听见你的脚步声了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_alertidle_000053bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is the food?
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃的呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog hungry, please come out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗饿了，求你快出来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01followers_lostidle_000053d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_lostidle_000053d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll find you, you can't hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想躲起来，我会找到你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01followers_lostidle_000053d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still looking... although I'm all for following suit and leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在找呢……虽然我觉得应付一下就好，还是正事要紧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_lostidle_000053d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vanished like a Maxis act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩什么大变活人呢。

ESP.TRADUIT: 狗找到了很多东西…可以分给你…有吃的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说战术了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. "Tactics" means "stay out of sight" around here anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。反正 "战术"的意思就是别让人看到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005424_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods, waits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头，等待着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005425_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，还有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnh-nnn. Dog not sure he remember anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼，反正狗不一定能记得住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005426_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you bet. I'll flank them... might take me a while, though, so you just hold tight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的，我会从侧面包抄他们……可能会花点儿时间，你可要撑住咯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods, makes a half circle with her hand.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头，用手画了一个半圆。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005376_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll watch over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会掩护你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough gum-flapping, Madre's not getting any younger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再废话了，马德雷赌场可是在一天天老去呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_0000538e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like dancing with your shadow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和你形影不离的。

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005352_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005354_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hrnnnh, Dog will be kin. Like others in night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，狗会和你相亲相爱的。就像其他人在晚上做的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the one who dragged me out of my apartment, so yeah, I'm keeping close. So what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你把我从家里拽出来的，我当然要跟紧你了，有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005414_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀轻轻歪了歪头。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it? It won't matter in the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？算了，反正也无关紧要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnh?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005416_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be sure to cover you, don't you worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会掩护你的，别担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005331_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头，单眼紧闭，手做出扣扳机的样子。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005332_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I'm in control, my ability to use his hands is... difficult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要是我控制着这副躯体，我就没办法灵活应用双手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005334_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog will try... trigger and sight... Dog prefer to hit with bear trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗试试吧…扳机和瞄准镜……狗更喜欢用捕熊夹来揍人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005333_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boxing's not really my thing. I prefer the gentle touch... but all right, it's your show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不太会打拳啊，我更乐意轻轻抚摸对方……不管没关系，你说了算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_000053c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods, and her stance changes slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点了点头，她的站姿轻微地发生了变化。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: To warn you, as long as I'm in control, my coordination... suffers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丑话说在前头，只要我控制着这副躯体，我的动作……就不会很协调。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's jaw all day and all night, why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，咱们就这么瞎耗时间，不也挺好的嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns, taps the back of her wrist, then circles her finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，敲了敲手背，又画了个圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_0000535a_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's all, let's shake a leg.

ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Style's not something you just change, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风格这玩意可不是你说变就能变的，朋友。

ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看着你，等着你发言。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as I am in control, fighting... is difficult. I'm not the... beast he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我控制着这副躯体，就很难…战斗。我没有…他那么凶残。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tactics? What, we going to get into a shootout soon, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术？怎么，咱们马上要打仗了吗…？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005336_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tactics? Why don't you let me worry about that - you just follow along, I'll take care of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术？干嘛不把这个问题交给我来考虑呢，你只要乖乖听我的就好，我会保护你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Music to my ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求之不得呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I was growing... impatient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我都开始……不耐烦了，

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rhhhr. Dog will follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，狗会好好跟着你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure? I mean... look, you can't just tell me to walk now, you know. That's... well, not very friendly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？不是啊，你怎么能这么随便就把我打发走……这样…很不友好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followersfired_00005448_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀挑起了一边眉毛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followersfired_00005449_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... want us to split up. All... three of us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…想和我们分道扬镳？我们三个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersfired_0000544b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you send Dog away? Dog hear you right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要赶走狗？狗一直都听你的话啊？、
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersfired_0000544a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lose the second-stringer, and I'll make the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先把身边那家伙踢去替补席，再来找我吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000353a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strike up the band, Domino's back in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好戏开始，我多米诺又回来啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followershired_00005389_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine glances at your companion, shakes her head, then raises her index finger.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀瞟了一眼你的同伴，摇摇头，竖起了中指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000353b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000538a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll only travel with you... get rid of the other piece of meat, then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不希望身边还有除了你之外的第三人……你先把那家伙赶走，否则我们免谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000538c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll follow you. For now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就暂且跟着你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000538d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nnnn-Nnn... too many, Dog waits until you lose one... maybe let Dog feed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…不…人太多了，你先把另一个人赶走，再来找狗…或者，你也可以把那家伙喂给狗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000353c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is ready. Where we go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗准备好了，我们要去哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followershired_0000538b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrrooooooooooohnhrhnhr.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊呜呜呜呜呜呜啊啊啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_0000fcb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to feed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该吃东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have time for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没时间玩这套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just wanted a little peace and quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想要片刻的清静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to make some music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该起音乐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_0000fcb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strike up the band.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好戏开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_0000fcb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_startcombatresp_000053e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes narrow, stance changes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛，换了个姿势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a relief. I-I mean, not like I care. I'm fine on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可太好了。其实吧，我无所谓的。我自己一个人也能行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredn_00005349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, then shrugs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，耸了耸肩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredn_0000534a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make up your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先自己做好决定吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredn_0000534c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog stays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗可以留下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredn_0000534b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't say it hasn't been fun... well, I can, but I'll save it for my memoirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你在一块的这段经历实在算不上有趣……好吧，也不能这么说，将来我会把它写进回忆录里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredy_00005392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredy_00005393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make more progress on my own - just don't get us killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己也能行的——只要不死就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredy_00005395_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog will leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗要离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersfiredy_00005394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followersacknow_00005355_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followersacknow_00005356_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersacknow_00005358_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hhh-hhnn. Dog hears you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯—嗯，狗听清楚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersacknow_00005357_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全听你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005396_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine raises an eyebrow, then shrugs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀扬起眉毛，耸了耸肩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005397_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as you don't get yourself killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不自己找死就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005399_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only if save pieces for Dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: 能给狗留几块肉吗…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005398_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, right. Oh, you're serious. You bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。哦，你要来狠的，行吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005321_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005322_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course... murder's in our blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了……杀戮可是我们的本能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hrrrrrrrrrrr... Dog will do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咕咕咕…狗会照做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followerstactic_00005323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who was this Father Elijah to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚对你来说是什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would say he was my tutor, but that doesn't cover it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把他当成我的导师，但还不止于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After my parents passed, he looked after me. The whole Brotherhood brought me up, really, but he made sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父母去世后，他就一直照顾我。是兄弟会把我拉扯大的没错，但这都要归功于他的领导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never had a grandfather - not that I knew, anyway - but Elijah was in some ways what I'd imagine a grandfather to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有祖父——反正我也不认识他——但以利亚在某些方面确实很符合我心中祖父的形象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is he now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他现在在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. Last time anyone saw him was in the battle at HELIOS One. I wasn't there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。他最后一次现身是在保卫太阳神一号的战斗中。我当时不在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He gave orders to hold the plant until it could be reactivated. But he ran out of time. The NCR overran it. Everyone thought he was dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他下令坚守设施，直到其重新启动。可他没能争取到足够的时间。NCR最终占领了电站。大家都以为他死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I got a note from him at a comm station. That's... how he liked to talk, even to me. He wasn't good at face-to-face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我在一个通讯站发现了他留下的笔记。他……喜欢用那种方式交流，甚至和我谈话时也是如此。他不善于与人当面说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm bleeding green here, any ideas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的血都要流干了，能想想办法吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_healthquarter_00005440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine winces, clutches her side.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀疼得呲牙咧嘴，护住了自己的身体。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_healthquarter_00005441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnhrrrrrhn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼嗯嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_healthquarter_00005442_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head swimming. Can't hold myself... together much longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 脑子发昏…感觉撑不了多久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_healthquarter_00005443_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... could use a little boost here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…我觉得我还可以抢救一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_healthhalf_00005339_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great, spilling my guts out to everybody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真棒，马上我的肠子就要流得满地都是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : Bleeding, at half-health, being sarcastic - not too worried yet, but irritated. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_healthhalf_00010ed7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine winces, then tries to hide it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀疼得呲牙咧嘴，但她还是努力保持镇定。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_healthhalf_0000533a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hrrrrrrn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_healthhalf_0000533b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Losing blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我流血了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_healthhalf_0000533c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't want to repeat that number.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想再做返场表演了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels like someone played my head like a trombone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉我的脑袋里刚刚有一支喇叭在响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01followers_wake_00013b80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head, gets quickly back on her feet.]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine quickly leaps to her feet, narrows her eyes, and scans the area.]

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crouching's hell on my knees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一蹲下来，我的膝盖就像受刑一样难受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_00005329_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine crouches down.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀蹲下了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_0000532a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I had a Stealth Boy instead of this bear trap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不想要这个捕熊夹，要能有个隐身小子就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_0000532c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会跟紧你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_00012b09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnnnn. Dog is following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，狗会跟着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_0000532b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No have wrist-collar now - Dog still good at not be seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使没有戴手环——狗也能很好的隐藏自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_00012b07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How Dog hunted back West. For Lou.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前狗在西部时，就是这样给中尉干活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01fol_followersstealt_00012b08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's better you don't. Let me hold onto it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好不要看，让我收起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I guess it doesn't matter anyway, keep it. I won't ask again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我猜它也没多重要，收着它吧。我不会再问你要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you mind if I looked at the message?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意我看看这则消息吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just mad ramblings. He didn't make much sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是些不知所云的疯话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god. He... I guess he was lost a long time ago. Even at the end...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝。他……我想他在很久以前就迷失了。即使到最后……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... thanks for bringing word. At least, now I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是……感谢你的转达。至少我现在知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He explained the search for the Sierra Madre... healed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说对马德雷山脉赌场的搜寻……治愈了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Unlikely. He was a little too focused on gears and diodes... tech was the cure-all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。不太可能吧。他很痴迷于齿轮和二极管……他觉得技术才能治愈一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you unlock it for me first? He was... vague on that point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能先把它解开吗？他的表达有些……含混不清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Yeah. Thought as much. He'd been fading away for a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是。所见略同。他已经神志不清很长一段时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some last words - a message. Nothing important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些遗言，一则消息。没什么重要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was on it? What did he say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 内容是什么？他说了些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry... feel a little out of it. Head's spinning a bit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起……感觉有点难受。头有点晕……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Oh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think he left me a gift. Maybe I can use it better than he did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他还给我留了一件礼物。也许我能用得比他更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did he say to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他都跟你说了些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The parts I understood? Didn't matter. Past all the garbage, all it amounted to was goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说我理解了的那部分？没什么。去掉那些没用的话，总结起来就是告别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was... that was hard to watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这……这怎能让人忍心看完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should watch it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该看看这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll watch it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会看看的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should listen to this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该听听这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He left this holo-message. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他留下了这个全息留言。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you get this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪弄到的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I was right about the bad news, huh? Same look Elder McNamara always gave me when I was up for promotion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我猜对了，是个坏消息，是吧？你的表情就跟麦克纳马拉长老要提拔我时一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he say anything when you met him? Anything...anything at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你遇到他时他有没有说什么？什么事……什么事都没说吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...it doesn't matter. He died when we all retreated to Hidden Valley. I didn't expect to see him again, no one did.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……无所谓了。他在我们向隐谷撤退时就死了。我没想过还能再见到他，没人想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to trap him inside a Pre-War... prison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不把他困在一座战前的……监狱里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trapped him? Where?
ESP.TRADUIT: 困住了他？在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You killed him? But...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀了他？但是……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了以利亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did? Where? Oh my God, I mean... I thought... I don't even know what I thought might have happened to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？在哪里？天啊，我的意思是……我以为……我都不敢相信还能听到他的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... you don't have a "this is good news" expression on your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是……从你的表情来看，似乎不是什么好消息啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me at the Fountain, then we'll go from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到喷泉处等我，我们再出发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, come with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods, and steps slightly behind you, waiting.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头，轻轻的在后面跟着你，等待着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011bf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just die, tired of listening to you anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死去吧，我不想再听你说话了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，沉默确实更合适。等你的主子现身时，我也一样会把他收拾掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < Christine talks smack back and starts the fight. "Master" is delivered with disgust.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_playerinsultsch_0000a806_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just glad you're safe. Hold up here, I'll take care of Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你没事。在这里等着，我去干掉以利亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. He's... not an easy opponent. If I can, I'll help. Might be able to figure something out using the Sierra Madre's computer systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。 他可不好对付。我会尽力帮你的。或许我可以找出赌场电脑系统里的漏洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < voice is restored. Christine wishes the player good luck and walks over to the intercom to disable security. > EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_playersaystheyw_0000a813_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been hunting the one who hijacked your Pip-Boy, Elijah, for... some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个入侵了你哔哔小子的人，以利亚，我追杀他……有些时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_playersaysgoahe_0000a810_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He cannot leave the Sierra Madre alive. What he's done... what he's done here is nothing compared to what he's done in the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 决不能让他活着离开马德雷山脉。他在这儿……在这儿所做的事情，和他过去犯下的罪行相比，简直是小巫见大巫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_playersaysgoahe_0000a810_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only way to bring him out is if you get to the vault... he won't allow you to go down there alone. That's when we kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要引他出来，唯一的方法就是进入避难所…他肯定不会让你独自进去的。那就是我们动手的绝佳时机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_playersaysgoahe_0000a810_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could have said something sooner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以早点说的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't sure until now I could trust you. Now I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前我不知道能否信任你。现在我明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < voice is restored. Christine says she didn't know who she could trust. Thinks player is worth keeping around. > EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000a80d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, when I woke up here... however that happened... I had this key on me - I think it belongs to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我醒来的时候…我也不知道究竟怎么回事…反正我发现兜里装着一把钥匙，我觉得应该是她的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013b16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't had a chance to use it yet - might open the dresser, or the safe - didn't have time to experiment with it before you arrived. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这是用来开哪儿的，也许可以打开衣橱或者保险箱，在你来之前我也没时间试验。先给你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013b16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't sure until now I could trust you. Now I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前我不知道能否信任你。现在我明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < voice is restored. Christine says she didn't know who she could trust. Thinks player is worth keeping around. > EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001401c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know Elijah needs to be dealt with, just let me handle it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道必须干掉以利亚，交给我处理就好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Dog fell in the Sierra Madre casino, two died as one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗笨重的身躯在赌场中倒下，与他共生的人格也随之死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog died hungry, alone, frightened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死在了饥饿、孤独与恐惧之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The voice in his head died with him. Screaming. Furious. Enraged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他脑海里的那个声音，也在尖叫、咆哮与愤怒中，与他一同消亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the voice was gone, and Dog was grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那声音消失了，狗却充满了感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Dog was dead and the voice needed to watch over him no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少狗死了之后，那个声音也无需再时刻盯着他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the moment before their lives ended, the wall between the two personalities fell. The two became silent as they saw the chain between them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他们的生命行将结束前，那道横亘在两个人格之间的高墙轰然倒塌。目睹了彼此之间的联系后，两个灵魂都沉默了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunger and control are twin greeds, something Dog and his shadow had never realized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 饥饿与支配不过是贪婪孕育的一对孪生子，狗和他的另一个人格至死也未能理解这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Draws this end credits sequence to a close, slightly rough, as if bitter. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_0000ada3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog forgot himself, as did the voice that raged within him. After their passing, a new voice spoke within the mutant's shell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗和他体内那狂躁的声音一起忘记了自我。他们消失后，一个新的声音在这变种人的躯壳中诞生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was difficult for the voice to remember the two it once was... there was the beast, Dog consumed by hunger...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这声音无法再回想起自己的过往…印象中曾有一只野兽，被饥饿所驱使……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and the other in reverse... the one consumed by control.
ESP.TRADUIT: …还有另一个声音…不肯放下自己的控制欲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both were driven by need for the other. The Courier brought them together, somehow, joined the two into one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个灵魂原本彼此互补，针锋相对。但邮差却让他们走到了一起，将他们合二为一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that happened at the Sierra Madre, was a faint memory to the new personality... like a flickering light in the clouds of the mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对这新的人格来说，所有关于马德雷山脉赌场的记忆…都化为了浓雾中摇曳的一束烛光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The new voice did not think of the Courier again until the battle at the Divide reached his ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到发生在大裂谷的那场战斗传到耳边，这个声音才想起了邮差的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The battle between the two couriers, beneath the torn skies and the Old World flag... each bearing a message for the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在残破的天空下，背负着旧世界的旗帜，两位邮差展开了宿命的对决... 彼此都携带着给对方的一段口信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the mutant prayed the Courier that had saved him... had been saved in return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是变种人开始为那个曾经拯救过他的邮差祈祷……希望吉人自有天助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : The final word, ending. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df1_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, free of the voice inside his head and no longer waiting on the voice of the Master, wandered back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗摆脱了脑海中的声音，没有了主人的吩咐，他开始向西流浪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close and end on a downnote, Dog devoured these communities. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011def_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His hunger never ended. Often, small communities would suddenly vanish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的饥饿感从未消失。时不时会传出一些小村落突然集体失踪的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close and end on a downnote, Dog devoured these communities. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011def_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were assumed to have been hit by Wasteland creatures and dragged away... dogs, Brahmin, and humans alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们普遍猜测这些地方遭到了废土生物的袭击…无论狗、双头牛还是人类，都无一例外惨遭毒手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close and end on a downnote, Dog devoured these communities. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011def_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freed of both Dog and the one who held Dog's leash, the other voice resumed control. First the mind, then finally, the mutant's shell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不在了，那个企图奴役他的人也消失了，脑海里的声音终于获得了主导权，从思想和肉体上完全控制了这个变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close. God has begun preaching the gospel in this line, and the last sentence should be quieter, thankful. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His first act was to tend to the scars on the body with careful hands, slowly healing all the scars except the ragged name torn on his chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他做的头一件事便是小心地治疗这副伤痕累累的躯体，让伤疤逐步痊愈。不过，那个刻在胸口的潦草名字，他并没有去碰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close. God has begun preaching the gospel in this line, and the last sentence should be quieter, thankful. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He briefly thought of remaining at the Sierra Madre. But it was a monument built by humans, representing something he no longer needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始，他想继续留在马德雷山脉，但很快就改变了主意。这是人类留下的遗迹，他已经不再需要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close. God has begun preaching the gospel in this line, and the last sentence should be quieter, thankful. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He began walking west, in search of others like him. As he did, he spoke of the courier who had set him free and allowed his life to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是他开始向西进发，寻找自己的同类。每当遇见自己的族人，他便会和他们讲起那个曾经解救过他、赋予了他新生的邮差的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw to a close. God has begun preaching the gospel in this line, and the last sentence should be quieter, thankful. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingdo_00011df0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine, scarred by her hunt for Elijah and unable to let him go, perished in the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀为了追杀以利亚而身心俱疲，未能放下执念的她最终死在了在马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : This plays if Christine died. Even though narrating, slightly judgmental and sad at the same time, as if shaking head. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_0000ada2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She never completed her mission, nor did she stop to consider what had driven her to accept the mission in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她没有完成自己的使命，也从未停下脚步思考过究竟是什么驱使她接下了这个任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : This plays if Christine died. Even though narrating, slightly judgmental and sad at the same time, as if shaking head.
