EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_0000ada2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obsession is another form of greed, a lesson that Christine never learned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 执念不过是另一种形式的贪婪，只可惜克莉丝汀至死都没能明白这个道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : This plays if Christine died. Even though narrating, slightly judgmental and sad at the same time, as if shaking head. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_0000ada2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christine, her mission complete, found new purpose as the Sierra Madre's warden. She watched over it silently - by choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉丝汀完成了使命，也找到了新的人生目标，她成为了马德雷山脉赌场新的看守者。为了守护这里，她决定保持沉默。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over time, the Ghost People came to see her as one of the Holograms. They would watch, silently, as she walked among them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间推移，鬼人们渐渐把她当成了全息影像。每当她从身边走过时，它们便会安静地注视着她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At times, Christine thought of the Courier, who had kept Elijah's hand from her throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时，克莉丝汀会想起那位邮差，正是那个人从以利亚的魔掌中解救了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier reminded her of the other courier she had met in the Big Empty, and wondered if the two had found each other at last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那位邮差又令她回忆起了自己曾在大山脉遇到的另一位邮差，她不禁好奇这两人是否有朝一日会相遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She did not think of them again until she heard the legends of the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她渐渐淡忘了这件事，直到有一天，她听说了发生在大裂谷的传奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide, where the two messengers, the two couriers, fought beneath an ancient flag, at the edge of the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在裂谷中，两位邮差，两位信使，在世界的边缘，在古老的旗帜下，展开了较量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. Keep this quietly dramatic. This is forecasting a horrible, tragic event to come in a future adventure. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingch_00011df2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean Domino, entertainer, singer... thief... had his last show on the Sierra Madre stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安 ·多米诺，艺人、歌手…窃贼…在马德雷山脉赌场的舞台上，他献上了人生的告别演出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, a little sad as if shaking your head, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_0000ada5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The heist he spent over two hundred years planning fell apart, just as the first, by underestimating his partner's strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两百年苦心积虑的抢劫计划最终付诸东流，如同当初一样，他低估了自己同伙的实力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, a little sad as if shaking your head, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_0000ada5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after the Courier left the Villa, the lights in the theater shut off, one by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差离开别墅区后不久，剧院的灯便一盏接一盏熄灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, a little sad as if shaking your head, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_0000ada5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only Dean's Hologram remained on stage, singing silently to an empty room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只剩下迪安的全息影像仍站在舞台中央，静静地对着空无一人的剧场歌唱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, a little sad as if shaking your head, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_0000ada5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... as consumed as he had been with its riches and ruin, the Sierra Madre had held him captive long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许…沉沦在马德雷山脉的财富与废墟之中的他，早已剩下了一副空皮囊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, a little sad as if shaking your head, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_0000ada5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dean Domino, entertainer, singer... thief... explored the Sierra Madre not long after he was rescued by the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安 ·多米诺，艺人、歌手…窃贼…在被邮差救下后不久，他走遍了整个马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once he left the theater, the Sierra Madre recognized him as a guest, and many doors opened to him. He had to admit, it had been built to last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开剧院后，马德雷山脉赌场将他视为了贵宾，许多大门在他面前敞开。他不禁感叹，这里的一切确实坚固。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: During his search, he came across the final records of Vera and Sinclair, and realized what happened the night the bombs fell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在探索时，他意外发现了薇拉和辛克莱留下的最后记录，终于明白了核弹落下当晚发生的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He felt strangely sad for a moment, and he had no idea why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刹那间，一股莫名的哀伤涌上心头，可他却不知这股哀伤从何而来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shrugging it off, his mind turned instead to where the Courier had come from. Vegas still survived, out there in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将这思绪抛诸脑后，转念又想起了邮差来的地方。维加斯还没有消亡，她依然矗立在莫哈维沙漠中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its sights, sounds... and casinos, ripe for the taking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里流光溢彩、歌舞喧嚣…也有繁华的赌场，令人垂涎欲滴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So giving the Sierra Madre one last nod and a wink, he set off beyond the Cloud to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是，他对着马德雷山脉赌场献上最后的致意，转身走出毒云，踏上了新的旅途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([0100ADBD]NVDLC01Ending) 0100ADBD (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Slow, draw this to a close. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01end_nvdlc01endingde_00011dea_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> We'll take the elevator up, see if there's another way to do this. After you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我们坐电梯上去，看有没有其他解决办法。你先走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and moves to the elevator.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀轻松地微笑着，向电梯走去。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000b039_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let me see if I can find another way to do this without sending you down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我找找别的办法，这样你就不用下去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and nods. She opens her mouth slightly, then closes it, frustrated.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀笑了，似乎松了口气。她点点头，张开嘴好像想说点什么，又沮丧地合上了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000b038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She points at you, then makes a fist and puts it against her chest and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她指着你，然后握拳放在胸前并点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000b038_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to go down to the manual bypass room to regulate the power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你下到配电室去，重新分配电力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine glances at the elevator, her expression becomes worried, then she looks back at you, then reluctantly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀瞥了一眼电梯，露出了担忧的神情，然后她看向你，勉强地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_gettingchristin_0000b036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to stay here and fire off the Gala Event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你留在这里启动盛世庆典。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you get some Hologram guards lit up in the courtyard below? No dice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你在下面的院子里部署一些全息守卫，否则没门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, whoa, whoa... in the middle of town here? Alone? On a rooftop, with a big lightshow in the air?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂，喂…你要我待在镇中心？只身一人傻站在屋顶上，身后的夜空中还噼里啪啦地闪着烟花？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000b035_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what - why don't you just find one of those Cosmic steak knives so I can slit my wrists, be less painful checking out that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你啊，倒不如直接塞给我一把大宇宙菜刀，让我就地割腕得了，这样起码还能死得痛快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000b035_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like help with something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有别的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram waits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 20 Chips for 20 Pre-War Bills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 20美元战前钞票换20个筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You count out the bills on the counter. A panel flips, followed by slow, steady series of clicks, and a stack of chips rise up from the panel.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你把数好的钱放在柜台上。桌板翻了过去，紧接着是一阵缓慢而均匀的咔嗒声，一堆筹码随着桌板升了上来。 ]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me have 5 Chips for 5 Pre-War Bills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用5美元战前钞票换5个筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You set the bills on the counter. A panel flips, there is a single whir, a click, then a panel rises up with a handful of Sierra Madre Chips.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你把钞票放在柜台上。桌板翻了过去，你听到了嗡嗡的响声和清脆的咔嗒声，随后桌板升起，几枚筹码出现在你眼前。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... 1 Chip for 1 Pre-War Bill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…1美元战前钞票，换1个筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You place the bill on the counter. A panel rotates, and the bill is replaced with a single Sierra Madre Chip.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你把硬币放在柜台上。桌板翻转了过去，你的钞票变成了一枚马德雷山脉赌场筹码。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram nods, gives a stiff farewell wave.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像点点头，僵硬地与你挥手道别。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I turn in my Sierra Madre Chips for Pre-War Money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把马德雷山脉赌场筹码换成战前货币么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram points at the table before you. As you set the chips down, the tabletop rotates, and with a whir, Pre-War bills slide out.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像指了指你前面的桌子。你把筹码放下，桌板瞬间翻转，伴随着嗡嗡的响声，一沓战前钞票从里面滑了出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to exchange Pre-War money for some Sierra Madre Chips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想用一些战前的钞票来换马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram makes a gesture, seems to be indicating amounts and figures.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息影像做了个手势，看起来像是在说明金额和数量。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000c4c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, now. Talk about a captive audience. Or captive entertainer? Eh - whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还好吧。原来这就是所谓的让观众流连忘返啊。或者应该说是让艺人下不来台？随你怎么说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dean gives key to his safe - where supplies, and Vera's Holotape are found. He also gives the Entertainer Pass, to open Theater up. Thanks.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000c4da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you just do... can't access the protocols. Didn't even think Elijah could break Madre security... hnh. Must be a Scribe, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才你做了什么…无法访问安保协议。连以利亚都无法破坏马德雷的安保系统……嗯，一定也是个学士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine hates player, checking security systems, can't figure out what the player just did, confused, then talks to herself.> EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Security's down...? Hnh. Doesn't matter, won't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安保系统关闭了…? 嗯。 没关系，你一样完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Hates player, player shut off security, surprised by this, then re-evaluating the threat, determined and back in control. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's who I think it is, this is Christine... recovered. In what looks like an Old World hotel room, high class, two rooms - exit's sealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是你吧，我是克莉丝汀…我恢复了。现在我被困在一个看起来像旧世界宾馆的的高档两室套房里，出口被封住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine's voice is a little ragged in this sequence, it just healed up.> EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000a80b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Floor's got holographic security. Not latest tech, field of view targeting systems, primitive. Familiar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这层到处是全息保安在巡逻。不是最新型号，用的还是扇形视野追踪系统，很原始。很熟悉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Floor looks like it protected the guests too well. Checked the Suite, found the holographic woman from the Villa Fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这一层对客人的保护有些过度了。我在套房里转了一圈，发现了别墅区喷泉投影里的那个女人的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Surveying the room, looking for something helpful - finds a dead body instead, not rattled, just taking it in somberly.> EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picking up that interference frequency, same as the Villa, floor's live with speakers and radios. Keep an ear out, watch the walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了频率扰动，和别墅区的一样，这层布满了喇叭和无线电。所以千万要竖起耳朵，注意四周的墙壁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doors on this floor are all operated manually in an emergency, place is locked up tight. Must be keycards around somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于启动了应急机制，这一层的门全部只能手动操作，整个楼层封得死死的。附近肯定有门卡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like security systems did more to kill the people here than the Bomb did. Hope there's a way out of this casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来这里的安保系统杀的人比核弹还多。希望有办法可以逃离赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with my collar... Elijah? Or... no, it's you. Even better. This is Christine, voice back. You got off on the wrong floor, you're trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的项圈是怎么回事…以利亚？…不，是你。来得正好。我是克莉丝汀，我的声音恢复了。你走错楼层了，现在你被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine hates player. Has gotten her voice back, her voice has healed up. A little ragged, but gets strength back.> EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you can make it past security. I've been looking forward to taking care of you since the Gala Event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你不会被安保系统干掉。自打盛世庆典结束后，我就一直想亲手解决你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine hates player, taunting them as making their way to her suite.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Elijah were working together this whole time. Should've known, just from your actions, you have his... outlook on things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和以利亚狼狈为奸。我真该早点看出来，从你的行为判断，你和他的…完全就是一类货色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Hates player, still addressing them as the player is roaming through suites.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad8a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you aren't dead yet... although I'm sure my collar would let me know. I could just detonate it now, but saving it for someone special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你还没死…虽然我只要摸摸项圈就能知道你的情况。我现在可以马上引爆项圈，但我还是打算为你留着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ad8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you really think you could steal from me? The Sierra Madre is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真以为你可以偷走我的东西吗？马德雷山脉赌场是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah remarks that's just a matter of small time before he gets what he wants, that he can't be stopped. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ceda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you've outsmarted me? You can't get away. You're the one on a leash, you always were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得自己比我聪明么？你逃不掉的。你不过是只待宰的羔羊，从一开始结局就已经注定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Initially angry because the player has outsmarted him, then cold and executioner style in the second half as he sets the bomb collar to go boom. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you've escaped... no. No, you were never out of reach... my hand was always around your neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得自己逃出生天了吗？……不，不，你永远别想逃出我的手掌心…你的性命掌握在我手里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah realizes that player is beyond reach. Triggers player's bomb collar. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This entire structure is mine to command. Security... weapons... all this technology - mine. Now - you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整栋楼都听命于我。安保系统…武器...所有这些科技，我都能操纵。现在，去死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : First two sentences, muttering to himself as he's working/typing on his wrist-computer - the second part, to the player, should be louder, directed, EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000cecf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alarms... what... you. Think you can run, think you can trick me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 警报…怎么... 是你。你以为自己逃得掉吗，你居然敢耍我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Curious, then realization, anger. Elijah notices alarms beeping, then realizes what's happening. He curses, and taunts you about trying to trick him. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh? What's this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000cecc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you've won? You've won nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 觉得自己赢了？你根本没赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Spits this out. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came all this way... but you lost as soon as you arrived here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大老远跑来…可你一到这里，就迷失了自我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000cedb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not without weapons of my own... let me show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不是手无寸铁…让你见识一下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Struggle all you want... the Sierra Madre will be your grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽情挣扎吧…马德雷山脉就是你的坟墓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time is against you. It always was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间永远不在你这一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Cold, as if watching a lab rat slowly choke to death. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aaah... Pre-War junk. I'll put you down myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊…战前的垃圾！我要亲手解决你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's patience runs out - he realizes he must kill you before you destroy the Vault's security sentries. He charges into the Vault after this bark EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000cece_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have time for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间和你纠缠了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah impatiently waiting to see you die by Vault security sentries, player's getting under his skin. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pre-War tech... so easy to control, just like your Pip-Boy. Turrets, Holograms, they're all just toys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前科技…太容易控制了，如同你的哔哔小子。无论安保炮塔还是全息影像，都只是玩具而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah gloats in seeing you fight the Vault's turrets, and comments on how you can't possibly defeat all sentries EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have the Sierra Madre kill you for me. You can't beat all the casino's defenses... it's only a matter of time now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以借助马德雷山脉的力量来杀死你。你不可能破坏赌场所有的安保措施…你的死不过是时间问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah activates Vault security systems, believe he's in control. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000cecd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Staying in the Vault? Think it'll protect you? No... I don't think so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想蜷缩在避难所里？以为它会保护你吗？不…我可不这么认为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Elijah notices you before entering the Vault area proper, and comments on being prepared for anything, that you're insignificant to him. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahva_0000ced5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlock it, give it back, then shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开它，交还给我，然后闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. It was entrusted to me, not you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对。这是给我的，不是给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did it make any sense?
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面说了些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a message. The news is up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是一条信息。想不想听由你自己决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something I wanted to pass along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些东西要转交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's trapped, no chance of him escaping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被困住了，永远也逃不出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had to kill him before he hurt others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了避免他害人，我只能杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get away while you can, before he comes back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你快走吧，不然他要回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Makes Dog hurt self.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗会伤害自己的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Master, help me, Master, help me. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人，救救我，主人，救救我，求你救救我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : (Father = Elijah.) "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let him make me hurt myself. Hurt keeps him away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别让他逼我自残。我自残，他就不会出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be good this time, I promise, Master, just keep him away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这次一定乖乖的，我发誓，主人，只要别让他靠近我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Dog" is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Noise makes my stomach hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吵得我胃痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn the noise off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把噪音关掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puts Dog in the cage, hiding downstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把狗放进笼子里，把梯子藏起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's watching, waiting for you to try and let me go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在观察，等着你把我放出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog, back in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，回笼子里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Note this comes from a recording, on player's Pip-Boy, so will need filter. This unlocks God.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000dfc7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have we here? You weren't who I was expecting. I'm disappointed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧瞧谁来了？ 你不是我要等的人，我很失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000fd89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... even if you aren't my intended guest, you take direction. Good. You can't have been an idiot to figure out how to release me from my cage...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过…虽然我等的不是你，但你还是听从了我的指引。很好。既然你懂得如何把我从笼子里放出来，说明你也不是个傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000fd89_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...or perhaps you are, with that leash on your arm and the one around your neck... with our collars and manacles, why, we may as well be kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: …又或者你确实是个傻子，毕竟你的胳膊和脖子上都绑着东西……瞧瞧我们身上的项圈和镣铐，呵，咱俩都可以算是同类了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000fd89_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew you would come, below the cage... down to where I am. Maybe you saw the letters I scratched on the Villa walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料到你会来，到笼子下面来…来找我吧。估计你已经看到了我刻在别墅区墙上的字了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Speaker filter.>1st time players hear God: Creepy-as-hell pre-recorded tape playing in dark police station basement to bait intruders. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little farther. Follow my voice... that's it. The one in the cage? Dog. I had to lock him up. He keeps... disobeying me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再往前一点。顺着我的声音走…就是这样。笼子里那个？那是狗。我必须把他锁起来，因为他总是……不听我的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Speaker filter>Creepy-as-hell pre-recorded message to bait intruders smart enough to figure out what to do. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's me, there, on the table. The disk. My voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里。看啊，桌子上，那盘磁带。那就是我的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't take any chances, though... you may be some victim who simply stumbled down here. If so, can't let you let Dog out... no, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过为保险起见…也许你只是个误打误撞闯进来的倒霉蛋，如果是这样，我就不能让你把狗放出来…不，不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're who I think you are, you came to fetch Dog, use him to drag others here. Now I'll use you - and that Pip-Boy you're wearing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而假如我的推测正确，那你应该是要来带走狗的，你想利用他来绑架其他人。现在我要利用 你，和你手上的哔哔小子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4df_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're smart. Clever. The key to Dog's cage is simple. Take my voice to the cage above. Let me speak to the beast inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很聪明。非常聪明。打开笼子的方法非常简单。把这盘磁带拿到上面的笼子旁边，播放它。让我和笼子里那个怪物说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4df_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you and I... we can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我和你…我们就能交谈了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : [0100E4E4] (ID) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000e4df_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for this. Get in the damn elevator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没空和你扯皮。赶紧进电梯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head, more insistently this time. She points at the elevator, then downwards, then holds herself tightly and shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀这次更加坚定地摇了摇头。她指了指电梯，然后走了下来，紧紧抱住双手，并摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ec8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found a way to do the bypass from here. You should be able to just use the terminal over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到方法了，在这上面就可以操作。你只需要负责那台终端就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods gratefully. She glances in the direction of the terminal, looks at you, smiles, gives a thumbs up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀感激地点了点头。她向终端的方向瞥了一眼，然后看着你，给了一个赞许的微笑。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ec8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine motions to you, points at the door uneasily, then makes a pulling motion with her hand. She seems hesitant to go near it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀招呼你过去，艰难地指了指门，然后用手做了一个推的动作。她似乎很犹豫，不敢靠近它。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <She is signaling this is where the event takes place.> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000ec8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if I can get here, others will be, soon enough. Fountain's the safest place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我能找到这里，那其他人迟早也会找来。喷泉是最安全的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... a good point. All right, let me grab some smokes, and I'll meet you at the Fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这……说得有道理。好吧，我先去拿几包烟，然后咱们喷泉边上见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Get up and follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。起来跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…搭档。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right... but you already got company, so tell you what - I'll meet you at the Fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧…但是你已经有了同伴。这样吧，我去喷泉处等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any reason you can't find your way there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不敢自己过去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what's out there. It's why I've planted a mine field, shotguns, and explosives all the way on the road to my little boudoir here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道外面有什么。所以我才会在离家门不远的路上布置一大堆地雷、霰弹枪和炸药机关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we go together, or we're not going at all. I'll split my hand in Blackjack when the time's right, I'm not splitting up in this town, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么我们一起走，要么哪儿也别去。虽然我玩21点时绝不会错过分牌的机会，但我也知道在这镇上绝不可以分头行动，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed8f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll find out more about our "contract" back at the Fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到喷泉那去吧，到时候我们就会知道这笔“生意”的具体内容了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Get up and follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。起来，跟我走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you can manage walking there without me. Now get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算没我陪你，你也可以自己走到那儿去的。走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, wait... wait just a minute. I'm not walking out there on my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等，等等…等一下。我可不想一个人在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet at the Fountain, and we'll hear what the next step is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在喷泉处集合，我们就会知道下一步该怎么做了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not leaving me much choice. The Fountain, huh? Hope the Hologram's still working and the battery's running strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也没得选。喷泉是吧？希望那里的全息影像还在运行并且电量充足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll follow you, I'm not going alone, trust me. Not like I'm a coward or anything, I'm not running around town without an escort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟着你，我不会单独行动的，相信我。并非我胆小，我只是不喜欢在无人陪同的情况下在镇上乱跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed9c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm serious. One of the locals catches us, we aren't coming back - and I'd like to keep an eye on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是认真的。要是被那些土著逮着，我们就完了，而且……我也要监视你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed9c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's starting to make sense, now that I've met you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我遇到你之后的遭遇来看，这种事似乎也说得通。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right... looks like marriage finally caught me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈！好吧，好吧…看来还真是躲不掉的姻缘啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening... partner. What's next, if we're death-til-we-part?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就听你的吧…伙伴。下一步你要干啥？该不会是要和我厮守到天荒地老吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only need you breathing. Push me, I'll bring you to the point of death, then leave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要你会喘气就行。再逼我的话，我会打得你只剩一口气，然后把你扔在地上自生自灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agree to come with me now, or I get up from this chair and kill us both, shaped-charge or no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须跟我走，不然我就从这椅子上站起来，管它是不是锥形炸药。反正我可以拉你陪葬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this, I'm leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either deal with me as an equal, or I walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么咱俩公平交易，要么我就走人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like all the rest. Strolling in here, thinking you own the place. I've been here longer than any of you tourists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和其他人一样，以为自己手眼通天，能当这儿的老大。其实我在这儿待的时间比你们任何一个游客都长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013300_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I'm letting you off easier than the Sierra Madre ever would. Nobody's going to miss you... whoever you are, you're old news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，比起马德雷山脉赌场，我已经算是很客气的了。无论你是谁，不会有人想念你的…再见咯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013300_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're bluffing. I'm getting up, right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你在虚张声势。我这就站起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... look, maybe we can make some sort of... deal, you and me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……听着，也许咱们可以做笔……交易，如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你这话是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your negotiation skills assume you're bargaining from a position of strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你说话的口气，难道你以为自己才是强势的一方吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] The hand's been dealt, that's the deal. You going along with my terms, or do you want your brains to be wallpaper?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我的牌已经打完了，条件都摆在这里，你不同意也得同意，还是说你想让自己的脑浆溅得满墙都是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our collars... these "neckties" are linked. I die, you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们戴的项圈…你所谓的“领带”，它们是连在一起的。我死了，你也会死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's an interesting clause. That's a real bad contract you have. We have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这说法可太有意思了。看来咱们俩遇到了霸王条款啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edb1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll cooperate. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意合作。你有什么要求？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good - then we're in business. I may be a betting man, but I like it when the odds are in our favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，很好，这才是上道的人。虽然我生性好赌，但我还是更喜欢顺风局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010c9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're here with who I think, then I'd rather have you on my side than his. An... ace in the hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道背后指使你的人是谁，与其听他的，不如站在我这边，这样我就能有张…底牌了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010c9e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to live, I want what's in the Madre. Real simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想活命，而我只想得到马德雷山脉的宝藏。就这么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010c9e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Misund...? Ummm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会什么悟？呃……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christ, if that collar blows, I don't know if you'd know the difference, you'd probably still keep walking around with that dumb, blank look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老天啊，是不是项圈炸了，你也不会有任何反应，我估计到时候你还要继续顶着那副愚蠢而茫然的表情四处晃荡呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just because I work in entertainment, doesn't mean I'm a moron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我做的是艺人行当，但不等于我就是个傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got my attention. For the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就暂且听你说两句吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look - I need your help to get into the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我需要你帮我进入马德雷赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, of course you do. Now, it's like we're married with these big wedding rings around our necks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你居然会要我帮忙。感觉咱们真像一对夫妻，所以脖子上的这玩意就是结婚戒指咯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So why don't you hear my proposal first, before you start talking about what you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你想要我做事，为何不先听听我的意见呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edac_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... you... probably want to hear my side of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…你不妨听听我的意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] And that's what I've missed - a rapt audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 多教人怀念啊，居然来了一位全神贯注的听众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll save my questions for the end - please, go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你先说吧，我待会再提问。你继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You don't listen too good, do you? Makes me think whatever you have to say isn't worth my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 看来你根本没有认真听我说话，就你这种态度，哪怕你有意见，我看也是狗屁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get up without my permission, I'll blast your ass so far through your head, it'll turn the moon cherry pie red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没我的允许，你不准站起来，否则我会炸得你从屁股到脑袋全面开花，内脏和血肉比翼双飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So - let's keep this sweet and polite, and finish our conversation with no misunderstandings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，咱们还是尽量保持礼貌，来一场友好而亲切的会晤吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000eda9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just because I work in entertainment, doesn't mean I'm a moron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我做的是艺人行当，但不等于我是个傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard my necktie beeping, I know what that means - I'm part of this somehow. I want out of this contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一听到脖子上那领带在响，就明白是怎么回事了。肯定是有什么情况找上我了，但我不想趟这浑水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you put me in it, I'm not going to be too happy. So whatever's going on here, if you're part of all this? You're taking orders from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你非要逼我，那我只能来硬的了。我不管究竟唱的是哪一出，但既然有你的份，那你就得听我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edab_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not an idiot. I know the reason I'm in here now is because of the old guy - and you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是傻子。我知道我现在之所以落到这步田地，纯粹是因为那个老头子，还有你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you're wearing a collar, so I trust you a little more than the old guy. He's more controlling than I'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你戴着项圈， 所以和那老头子相比，我更信任你。他的控制欲实在有些旺盛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, here's where being my partner pays off. See, I know how to get into the casino vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，和我做搭档的好处这时候就体现出来了。你看，其实我知道进入赌场避难所的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So here's the short of it - piece together Little Miss Vera Keyes' song in the right order? Sierra Madre opens its legs, we're in business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 捡半截说吧，我们只要把薇拉姑娘的歌曲片段以正确的顺序拼接在一起，马德雷赌场就会像小妞一样张开双腿，然后我们就能大功告成了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh?
Great, a moron - just what I need. Look? That seat you're sitting in? It's a bomb. Go boom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，好死不死居然来了个傻子。听明白了么？我说你屁股下的那把椅子，它是个炸弹。会炸的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The chair's... an explosive? But...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这椅子……会爆炸？可是…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Sounds like you've done some blue collar construction work in your life, your Ma must be proud. Still...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 看来你以前下过工地，当过蓝领啊，你妈妈一定引以为傲吧。不过……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better be a shaped charge, or you're going to kill both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你说的“锥形炸药”是真的，否则咱俩就要一块儿上天了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] "Butt" is right. That heart-shaped charge in the stuffing will cause just the right amount of bleeding.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 没有什么“可是”。这垫子里的锥形炸药只会让坐在上面的人毙命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ed98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not one for sitting when the clock's ticking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时间宝贵，我没空坐着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说啥？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be a bit rude, but that chair you're sitting in - it's got a shaped charge in the seat cushion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然这么说可能有些唐突，不过还是提醒你，你屁股下的椅垫里装了锥形炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Villa and the town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以说说别墅区和这个小镇的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residential area, clinic, police station - should keep away from the police station, it's a Ghost People hangout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是住宅区，有诊所、警察局。不过你最好远离警察局，那里有很多游荡的鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salida del Sol, Puesta del Sol are East Town, West Town. "Sunrise" and "Sunset." Or were when the streets and sky weren't covered with toxic gas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 东边和西边的镇子分别叫做“日出镇”和“日落镇”，用的是西班牙语起的名。以前街道和天空还没有被有毒气覆盖，这么叫倒合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost People don't come into the Villa much. West Town and East Town, though... they're thick with the Cloud and Ghost People. Like hunting grounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼民不太常出现在别墅区。但西镇和东镇就不同了…里面的毒云很浓，鬼人也多，简直就像是狩猎场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Cloud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说毒云吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Cloud? Showed up after the Bomb. I think. I got used to it in small doses. Now, it covers the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒云？我想应该是核爆之后出现的吧。我已经习惯了吸入少量的毒云。现在整座城市都被它笼罩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over the years, it kept climbing up out of the Sierra Madre, until it was curtains for the sun. Didn't see the sky again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多年来，毒云持续不断地从马德雷山脉赌场中涌出，甚至遮蔽了太阳。我已经很久没见过阳光了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't seem to bother the Ghost People. Can't see through it too well, though, so sometimes I can use the Cloud for cover... if I get desperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒云似乎对鬼人没有影响，不过它们在毒云里视线不太好，所以如果遇到危急情况…有时我会用毒云作掩护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find these cards?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到这些小卡片？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Around. Don't have much use for them myself, not worth the risk to get them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周围找找看吧。那些东西对我来说没什么用，不值得为它们冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got all the basics covered, as long as I have the chips to pay for them. I don't need much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正只要身上还有足够的筹码，我就能满足日常所需。我不需要太多东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What other items can you get out of the machines?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能从机器里得到别的东西么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's an emergency, you can get chems for any... uh... condition. Sinclair left that for doctors and trained professionals, not the common folk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生紧急情况时，你还可以从中获得一些…呃…常用药品。这是辛克莱特意为医生和受过系统训练的专家准备的，不开放给普通民众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even security and maintenance could get special supplies out of them. Staff had codes on little cards they could use to unlock them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甚至连保安和维修人员都可以利用它们来获取特定的装备。员工小卡片上写着代码，可以解锁这些物资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he describe it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱是怎么介绍它的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Called it "self-sufficient." Like he was doing the residents a favor. Right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱说它的作用是实现“自给自足”，说得好像他在给这儿的老百姓做慈善一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grifters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 吞金兽？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair made sure if you spent money here, it went one direction - although that's not how he described it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱用它们将人们的钱财全都掠进了自己的口袋，虽然他向公众介绍的时候不是这样说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen machines like those before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前从没见过像那样的机器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, machines like those weren't unusual before the Bomb. Maybe to you, they're amazing, to me, they're grifters without the personality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗，在核大战以前这种机器一点儿也不稀罕。也许在你看来它们很神奇，但对我来说，它们就是一堆没有感情的吞金兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the Vending Machines all over town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上这些自动贩卖机是干什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those little company stores? Sinclair's toy boxes, put in a casino chip, get a treat, like you're some dog doing tricks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些内部商店？它们是辛克莱的玩具箱，只要投入赌场的筹码，你就能得到一些小奖品，就像耍把戏的狗一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take any of the casino chips, put 'em into the machine, and you'll get something out - a snack, a cola, something to mend a tear in your shirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便拿几个赌场的筹码，塞进机器里，你就可以从里面得到各种东西，比如零食、可乐、甚至缝补用的针线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes you have to know exactly what to ask for, other times, there's codes for... eh, unconventional items. For emergencies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时你得先想清楚自己要什么，其他时候呢，为了应对紧急情况，也会有一些兑换代码，来满足特殊的……呃，需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else about them I should know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他建议可以告诉我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever we do - don't rile them up. Normally, there's only a few, maybe a pack. There's more out there, a lot more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，千万不要招惹它们。一般情况下，你只会遇到两三个，最多也就一帮。但其实，它们的数量非常多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they find out someone's trespassing, it'd be shaking a hornet's nest. Don't want to think how many of them could fill these streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦它们发现有人入侵，那就和捅了马蜂窝差不多。我不敢想象到时候街上会涌出多少鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有其它的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you do. Let's hear 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 十万个为什么啊。问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your time, and if you want to spend it chatting, not much I can do about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正时间都是你的，你想把这么宝贵的时间花在聊天上，我也没什么可说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000ee53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had questions I wanted to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, keep it short, we don't have a lot of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，长话短说，我们没有那么多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Focus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 专注？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always had the Sierra Madre to keep my mind occupied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的心无时不刻都向往着马德雷山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most folks, they don't have the same drive, the same need. Not worth my time. Pretty much Ghost People before the Bomb, now Ghost People after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的大多数人，他们没有我这样的动力，也没有我这样的坚持，不值得我浪费时间。核弹落下前，他们就已经犹如一帮行尸走肉，如今它们不过是做实了这个称呼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did they come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们是从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friend... "there's more mysteries in heaven and earth..." wait, no, "there is more between heaven and earth..." oh, forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友…“世界之大，无所不能……”等下，不对。“世界之大，一无所…”算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd sooner ask what makes me an undying son of a bitch than spend any thought as to why they crawled to life here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与其花时间深究这帮家伙为啥能一次次复活，我倒更想知道为何我会变成一个老不死的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm counting myself lucky I still have my faculties - they sure don't. Then again, they may not have had the... focus I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我算走运的了，身体机能一切正常，它们肯定不是这样。而且，它们应该也没有我那么…专注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edcd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a bad shot. I could probably kill one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我枪法不差，杀掉一两个应该没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well... you seem like you know how to handle yourself. All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯…看来你的身手不错。好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once, I fired a lucky shot, hit a gas tank one was holding. Blew his arm off at the shoulder... and he didn't get back up after that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有次我侥幸射中了一个鬼人身后背着的气罐。炸飞了他的胳膊..然后他再也没有站起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you're that good, don't aim for the head - aim for their bombs. And if you can wait until his buddies are close by, even better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果你真的枪法好，那别瞄头，瞄准它们背后的炸弹。要是你能等到它们离近了再射，那就更好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edc9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a fair shot. One shot, one kill is how I handle problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个精明的枪手。我喜欢一发子弹消灭一个敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yeah, well, "probably" is something a gambler says, not a survivor. I'd keep your pistol where it belongs - in the holster.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 行吧，听上去有赌的成分，不像是强者会说的话。我还是保管好你的手枪吧——让它乖乖待在枪套里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How tough are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们有多么难缠？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shoot them, they get back up. You stab them, they get back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算你用枪放倒它们，它们也还是会重新爬起来。用刀子捅它们，它们也依然会爬起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I have explosives all over this place - unless you blow them up, chop them up, disintegrate 'em, the Ghost People don't go down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才到处安放炸药，除非把它们炸飞、剁碎，或者熔解掉，否则这些鬼人是不会死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not enough bullets in the town to spend on them. So unless you're a real good shot, save one for yourself right before they catch you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个镇上没有足够的子弹来对抗它们。除非你是个神枪手，否则我还是建议你给自己留颗子弹，万一跑不过它们，就自行了断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you tried to deal with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就没想过办法对付它们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tried talking to them, bribing them, leaving food - nothing. In the years since, they haven't changed their approach, but I sure have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尝试过和它们说话，讨好它们，给它们留吃的，一点用都没有。这么多年，它们的行为丝毫没变，可我却变了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They catch you, they drag you into the Cloud, and you're not coming back out. After that, having your necktie go off would be mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦它们抓住你，把你拖到毒云里，你就再也回不来了。遇到这种情况，还不如我脖子这“领带”直接爆炸来得更痛快些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My advice? Stay out of their way, they don't die easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我个人建议，离它们远一点，这些家伙的命也很硬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edd6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is anyone else alive around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿还有其他活人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Alive's" a tricky word. The locals, the Ghost People? Not sure it applies to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: "活人"是个很微妙的字眼。你说本地那些鬼人吗？不知用这词形容它们是否合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a little... uncivilized. They don't talk much. As in, at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们的行为有些……野蛮。而且它们不善言辞。不对，它们根本就不说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000edce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have other people shown up in search of the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人也来寻找过马德雷山脉赌场吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tourists, you bet. They don't stay long... and they don't stay alive long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些都只是游客。他们基本不会待太久…而且他们也活不长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they survive the Cloud, the Ghost People, the traps, then greed takes over, and they start sizing each other up for funeral suits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即便他们能躲过毒云、鬼人和重重的机关陷阱，他们最终也会被贪婪所吞噬，开始自相残杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00012b8e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're coming with me, or else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我走，否则别怪我不客气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not going to work for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这套对我没用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, together we can get out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，只有我们齐心协力才能离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head - once, then crosses her arms.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头，叉起了胳膊。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If your collar goes off, mine goes off, it's better if we guard each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的项圈爆炸了，我的也会爆炸，所以咱们最好合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to cooperate if we're going to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要离开这里，我们就必须合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head again and draws a line in the air between the two of you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她再次摇了摇头，用手在她和你中间划出了一条线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we can have this not-talk later, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后再聊这个也不迟。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of this shit, we need to move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的我受够了，咱们得离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say we're in this together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我直说吧，咱俩现在是一条绳上的蚂蚱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, narrows her eyes, then slowly shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱起眉头，眯着双眼，缓缓地摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you want to lose your head, stop.
