ESP.TRADUIT: 住手！你的脑袋会被炸飞的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a bomb collar - mess with it, it'll go off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个炸弹项圈，你乱搞的话，它会爆炸的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't do that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这样！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks surprised. Then notices your collar, and raises an eyebrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看起来很惊讶，随后她留意到了你的项圈，眉毛立了起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you attack me, you'll regret it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是对我动手，你会后悔的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't what it looks like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是你想的那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The woman opens her mouth again, winces, then frowns and drags a finger across her throat in a slow motion. She looks more angry than pained now.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [女子又一次颤抖着张开了嘴，接着皱起眉头，用手指轻抚着喉咙。现在她的神情与其说是痛苦，不如说是愤怒。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Frowning, she touches her throat again, gently, then her hand brushes her collar, then her frown deepens.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱着眉头又一次抚摸起自己的喉咙，她的手碰到了项圈，顿时眉毛变得更加扭曲起来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her eyes narrow as she traces the edge of the collar until she finds the lock. She begins to press it with her fingers.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她眯起双眼，顺着项圈的边缘摸索着，随后发现了项圈上的锁。她开始用手指按压锁扣。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我是来帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks shaken. As she glances at the Auto-Doc, she recoils, and her mouth opens - but again, nothing comes out.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她瞟了一眼自动医生，身体因恐惧而蜷缩，她又张开了嘴，但依然没发出任何声音。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks back at you, and her hands clench into fists - her eyes narrow, and she takes a step back, studying you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她重新看向你，握紧了拳头。她眯起双眼，后退了一步，打量着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did somebody cut your vocal cords?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人切断了你的声带么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like someone carved a roadmap across your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像是有人在你的脸上刻了一个地图。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks at you, blinks again, then opens her mouth - but nothing comes out.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看你，又眨了眨眼，然后张开嘴巴，却没有发出声音]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She touches her throat, then traces the scar beneath the chin, and her eyes widen in alarm.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她抚摸了自己的喉咙，又摸了摸下巴上的疤痕，惊恐地睁大了眼睛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0000eed5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a seat - came all this way, least I can do is let you rest your feet for a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐吧，你走了那么远的路，也该让我尽下地主之谊，让你歇歇脚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000f21a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just sit there on my little casting couch - more a chair, really, but I prefer up-and-comers to relax when I interview them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就坐在那张沙发上吧，其实应该叫凳子，不过我还是希望在和你这样的后起之秀面谈时，气氛能轻松一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000f21b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're my guest. If you're going to be rude, you can show yourself out. Probably won't tap-dance no more when you leave, but that's on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我的客人，但如果你不懂礼貌，我也可以请你出去。至于离开时你要不要跳着踢踏舞出去，随便你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000f21c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You standing there is making me nervous. Sit down, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你站在那里让我很紧张。坐下来，可以么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000f21d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a seat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请坐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0000f21e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...going to make casino burn, no more being...
ESP.TRADUIT: …我要烧掉赌场，不必再……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: Dog and God's personality are waging war on each other in these lines - they blend the words as they fight back and forth.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00010b2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
ESP.TRADUIT: …回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0000f32e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...can hear you now. Not much longer, not...
ESP.TRADUIT: …可以听见你了。不必了，不必了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0000f32f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listening to me. Tired of being your minder, tired...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 我不想再照顾你了，不想再...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
ESP.TRADUIT: …让狗沉睡，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
ESP.TRADUIT: …保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
ESP.TRADUIT: …主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listen to me. If you do this, we both...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 如果你这么做的话，我们 都会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
ESP.TRADUIT: …死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001234f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
ESP.TRADUIT: …救我们的。请交给我吧。如果你不肯，那你就会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00012350_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All fire now. Burn away voice, leave Dog in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是火。用火把那个声音赶走，狗就能获得安宁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dog begins muttering about ending it once and for all> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0000f324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! Dog, get back in the c-
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！ 狗，回笼子——
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <God attempts to take control and screams no, trying to stop Dog from killing them both.> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0000f325_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't found enough yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有找到足够多的肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then nothing's going to keep me here... we need bait, or the beast is going to wake up, and you'll never see the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我坚持不了多久的…我们需要诱饵, 否则野兽就会觉醒，你就再也见不到马德雷山脉赌场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < God will not stay unless he has enough food. > EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000f403_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, this should be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这应该就够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're good at fetching... this should keep him where he belongs. For now. I'll wait... send the signal, we'll be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还挺会找东西的…这样应该就能安抚他了。我会暂时留在这里…只要你发信号，我们随时待命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0000f402_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well... lead on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好…带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013961_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already have someone in your shadow... I'll meet you at the Villa Fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经有人跟着了... 我会到别墅区的喷泉下面等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me over at the Fountain, we'll plan our next move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到喷泉那里等我，我们会计划下一步行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well... to the Fountain and its ghost, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧……那我就去喷泉和那个幽灵作伴吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013963_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about 500 Chips for 500 Pre-War Bills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 500美元战前钞票换500个筹码怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You set the stack of bills down. A panel flips, there is a whir, series of clicks, and a stack of chips rises up in place of the bills.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你放下一沓钞票。桌板翻了过去，你听到钱币拍打的呼啸和一连串咔嗒声，然后一叠筹码就从原本放钱的地方冒了出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Can we get a sound for this node?> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000fe27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 100 Chips for 100 Pre-War bills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 100美元战前钞票换100个筹码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [You place the bills on the counter, a panel flips, taking the bills with it... and 100 Chips appear in their place.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [你把钞票放在柜台上，桌板一翻，钞票不见了…取而代之的是100个筹码。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\voicedonotrecordm\nvdlc01cas_nvdlc01casinoco_0000fe26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect Comps
ESP.TRADUIT: 取回免费券

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram cashier nods, then a section of the tabletop slides away, and a package rises from it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息出纳点点头，桌面的一侧滑开了，一个包裹从里面弹了出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100D7EB] (mod) NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram cashier nods, then a section of the tabletop slides away, and a package rises from it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息出纳点点头，桌面的一侧滑开了，一个包裹从里面弹了出来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100D7EB] (mod) NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The Hologram cashier nods, takes a step back, then the whole tabletop slides away. A package slowly rises from the opening, steam trailing from it.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [全息出纳点点头，后退了一步，整张桌面滑开。一个包裹冒着蒸汽缓缓从桌子下面升了上来。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hologram [0100D7EB] (mod) NPC : Hologram [0100C4D0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C4D4]NVDLC01CasinoComps) NVDLC01CasinoComps EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's head through the hole in the wall there - if we go backstage, we avoid the locals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从墙上的那个洞里穿过去吧。只要绕到后面去，就可以避过那些本地居民了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([010012FD]NVDLC01Followers) DLC01 Followers Comment (NAM2) : <The player enters west town for the first time and Dean suggest the player head through the hole in the wall to avoid the ghost people.> EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01fol_nvdlc01wtdeanen_0000fe53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you listening? From now on, when I talk to you, pay attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听见我的声音了么？从现在起，我和你说话的时候，你要认真听讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahau_0001008c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've left markers on your Pip-Boy - find the three other collars in town - 8, 12, and 14, get them to the Fountain. Obey me, and you can all go free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在你的哔哔小子里做了标记，找到镇子里其他三个戴项圈的人——8号，12号，和14号，把他们带到喷泉这里来。只要照我说的做，你们都会获得自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Slow, brutal, clear. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahau_0001008c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could have left the Sierra Madre. Left this Villa, joined your own kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你其实可以离开马德雷山脉赌场，离开以利亚，去找你的同类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_00010091_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre's mine, my heart's right where it belongs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场是我的，我的心永远和它在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_00010092_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't abide it. There's no heart. You hate it, I can hear it in your words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是你的真心话。其实你讨厌这里，我可以从你的语气里听出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_00010093_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you need your hearing checked. Sierra Madre, it's meant for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我建议你去检查一下自己的耳朵。马德雷山脉赌场，是我命中注定的归宿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_00010094_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Touched by radiation, and you choose to spend your time here. You could have just left... but you're too obsessed to let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你受了辐射，还选择留下来。你大可以直接离开…可你却沉迷于那些财宝，不肯放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_0001008d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to know a ventriloquist with more skill than you. At least he had the sense to know his own name, without carving it into his chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经认识一个比你厉害的腹语术大师。至少他记得自己的名字，不必把它刻在自己的胸口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_0001008e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mirrors tell me my name when needed... and I have a name for you, several. Thief, coward... showman. Radiation couldn't kill the truth, could it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要照镜子就能知道自己的名字…但我倒是有个名字可以送给你，不，应该有好几个。小偷，懦夫…假把式。哪怕辐射也无法抹去这些事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_0001008f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth, buddy, is this: you and me, we're now family as long as we got these bowties on. So watch your mouth, you don't scare me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，眼下只有一条事实，那就是咱俩只要还戴着这项圈，就是一条绳上的蚂蚱。所以你说话小心一点，你吓不倒我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtodea_00010090_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell did you get this one. "Dog?" What, so you don't forget your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是从哪里搞到这玩意的？"狗？"你就用这种方式来记住自己的名字？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_00010095_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember you. Who are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不记得你，你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_00010096_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little slow, huh? Uh... Dean. Dean Domino. I... live here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你反应有点慢啊？呃…迪安。迪安·多米诺，我…是住这儿的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_00010097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like food, smell like food. Dog - hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来挺好吃，闻起来也挺好吃。狗……饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_00010098_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, pal, you stay in your corner, I'll stay in mine. Do not leave me alone with this thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，朋友，你就呆那儿别动，我也不会乱动的，行吗？千万别让我和这玩意独处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_00010099_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you obviously hear good - even if you aren't much of a talker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，虽然你不太爱说话，但明显你的听力很不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes narrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起了眼睛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, that's a plus in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，在我看来这可是加分项呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine eyes narrow to slits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀的眼睛眯成了一条线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, are you getting any shred of your voice healed up, or...? Like anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你就从没想办法治好自己的嗓子吗，还是说……？没想过？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you obviously hear good - even if you aren't much of a talker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，虽然你不太爱说话，但明显你的听力很不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_00011349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh... those scars? What happened, somebody... something carve you up, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……你身上那些伤疤，怎么了？是有人…故意弄的，还是...?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns, tilts her head slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱着眉头，轻轻歪了歪头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn shame, hate to think if someone put you in there. Who bailed you out again, the new guy? Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可怜，居然有人会把你丢在那种地方。是谁救你出来的？新来的那个人吗？有意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what's your story, beautiful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你有什么故事吗，小姐？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine studies Dean, frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀打量着迪安，皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't... uh... don't talk much, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…呃…不太爱说话，是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head slowly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀缓缓的摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, then. I'll just wallflower it over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我还是继续当个花瓶好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantoch_000100b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone wanted to cut your voice, little doll. Or they didn't finish their work, or didn't know how to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人想要让你变成哑巴，小娃娃。他们要么是没来得及这么做，要么就是不懂得该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it wasn't me... I have no use for your neck beyond what encircles it. The lack of screams when I finally kill you... that is what I'll regret.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，又不是我干的…我对你的脖子没有任何兴趣，除了它上面围着的那圈玩意。要是我最后杀你的时候听不到尖叫声…那我才会感到后悔呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? Why... it's a little doll. Were you carved by a craftsman, or mauled by a drunk who didn't know his tools?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这位是谁？哎呀……原来是个小娃娃。 你是被哪位工匠给雕成这样的，还是被一个不识好歹的醉汉给划拉成这样的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Referring to Christine in this line, she's a surgically-scarred mute girl in the party, so God's having his "fun." EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, gets into a combat stance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛， 摆出了一副要开打的架势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to hurt you... yet. Much. Scars tell a story, some old, some new... and the one on the throat is fresh and red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会碰你的…至少现在不会。这些伤疤的背后似乎藏着不少故事，有些旧了，有些还很新…比如喉咙上的那些，还留着血丝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01godtochr_000101f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop looking at me, you idiot. I can hear your stomach growling from here, I don't like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再盯着我看了，大白痴。我大老远就能听见你的肚子叫唤，我不喜欢那种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想摆脱狗？狗可是捕猎能手。他会找到你，把你撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That a bet you want to take? Cause I'll see that and raise you a few bullets to the skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想和我赌谁的命更硬？那尽管来吧，我会用子弹在你的脑门上多开几个洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog's been shot before, many times. Won't stop me from catching you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗以前已经被射伤过很多次。区区一点疼痛是无法阻止他追杀你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you've got this one under control, because he's giving me a nasty itch on my trigger finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你好好管教一下这家伙，不然下次我会忍不住扣扳机的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so carved up - that a bear trap on your arm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么浑身伤痕累累的，你胳膊上套了一个捕熊夹吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西可以把那个声音赶出我的脑子。当我疼痛难忍的时候，他也不能说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh... wait, so you're not just slow, you're screwy, too? Some crew we are... we are never getting into the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……等一下，所以你不仅仅反应迟钝，连脑子也有问题？瞧瞧咱们这班人…恐怕是永远也进不了马德雷山脉赌场咯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is hungry. Tired of your voice... when do we eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗饿了。听你说话都累了…我们什么时候吃东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like the way this guy is looking at me. You better be his leash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这家伙盯着我的眼神。你最好拴紧他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deantodo_000101f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... we... hope you've enjoyed your stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我们…希望您享受这段旅程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_00010307_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewells can be a time of sadness. Letting go... difficult. As a guest of the Sierra Madre, you know that truth more than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告别也许令人伤感，放手…也很难。 作为马德雷山脉的贵宾，相信您一定比他人更清楚这个道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : The last sentence has a double-meaning, so draw this out - the player had to let go of unllimited wealth to survive. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_00010308_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frederick Sinclair believed one's life could be made anew every day, that fortunes were more than the wealth in your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗雷德里克·辛克莱相信，生命中的每一天都能可以焕然一新，一个人拥有的财富远不止手中的金钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_00010309_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love. Life... family, those to care for, and those who will care for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有爱、生活…和家庭，以及那些与你心心相印的人们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_0001030a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To those who know these joys, the Sierra Madre holds little they don't already have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于能够理解这些幸福的人来说，马德雷山脉中也许并没有他们需要的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_0001030b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out in the world, beyond these walls, that is your chance to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯有高墙之外的世界，才是您真正从头再来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_0001030c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you'll return, in happier times. Until then, the Sierra Madre... and I... will hold you in our hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望下次再会时，您的人生能变得更加美满富足。在那之前，马德雷山脉…与我…会一直将您铭记于心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiofar_0001030d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guests, and residents of the Villa alike, I ask you to step outside and look to the night sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各位贵宾，各位别墅区的居民，请与我一同走向户外，眺望今晚的夜空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_0001030e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the moment you've been waiting for, the reason we're all here - the Gala Event, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你们期待已久的时刻，也是我们欢聚于此的原因。这场庆典，标志着马德雷山脉赌场的盛大开幕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_0001030f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the ones who have made this momentous occasion possible, and for that, we thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你们令这一伟大的时刻变为现实。在此，我们向您表示衷心的感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_00010310_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So raise your glass in celebration - let music fill the streets, fireworks light the sky, and promise of new beginnings fill your hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就让我们举杯庆祝——让音乐在街巷中流淌，让焰火照亮整个天空，让内心满溢新的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Emphasize the middle section and take it slow - these normal "festival events" are the reason speakers are shrieking all over the villa and the zombi EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_00010311_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what your fortunes, no matter what your cares, let go this night, and begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论富有贫穷，无论高低贵贱，今晚，都请您放下手中的一切，迎接新的开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_00010312_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suggest you hurry, though - the gates of the Sierra Madre are open, but only for a brief time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，建议你们加快脚步，虽然马德雷山脉的大门已经敞开，但它开放的时间并不长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_00010313_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, the doors will close for the evening's festivities, and won't open again until morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后，为举办庆典活动，大门将会暂时关闭，直到次日清晨才会再度开启。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Even though she's "teasing" here, the player should be scared that the casino's doors might close if they can't run there in time, so deliver this sl EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiogal_00010314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, the Sierra Madre Casino, in all its glory, is inviting you to Begin Again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样，满怀荣光的马德雷山脉赌场邀请您开启新的人生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_0001038d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to a place where wealth, excitement, and intrigue await around every corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，数不尽的财富，激情和秘密正等待着您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_0001038e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stroll along the winding streets of our beautiful resort, make new friends... or rekindle old flames.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以沿着度假区美丽的街道在微风中漫步，结交新的朋友…重燃旧的激情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_0001038f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your eyes take in the luxurious expanse of the open desert, under clear starlit skies. Gaze straight on into the sunset from our Villa rooftops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在星光璀璨的天空下尽情领略沙漠广袤的美景，在别墅区的天台上欣赏壮丽的夕阳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_00010390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Countless diversions await.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有无数娱乐设施正等待着您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_00010391_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gamble in our casino, take in the theater, or stay in one of our exclusive executive suites that will shelter you - and cater to your every whim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以在我们的赌场中豪掷千金，在剧院里陶冶情操，或是入住我们的高级行政套房，在这里实现您的一切突发奇想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_00010392_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if life's worries have weighed you down... if you need an escape from your troubles... or if you just need an opportunity to begin again, join us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果生活的重担压得您喘不过气…如果您需要一个摆脱烦恼的心灵港湾…或是一个机会来开启新的人生，那就加入我们吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_00010393_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let go and leave the world behind at the Sierra Madre grand opening, this October. We'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个金秋十月，让我们放下一切，在马德雷山脉的开业庆典上欢聚一堂。我们诚挚恭候您的光临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BA]NVDLC01RadioCasino) Vera Radio Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdcl01radiogra_00010394_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been trapped in here for some time, then you come along and let me out. So... you opened my cage for a reason. Now... I want to know why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被关在这里已经有段时间了，然后你才来把我放了。 所以…你打开笼子，想必是有原因的。现在，我想知道为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you do. And so do I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然有很多疑惑。我也有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in. Now - what do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。所以，你有何贵干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you see these wounds of his, covering his skin...the bear trap on his arm? He placed his own hand in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到他浑身上下遍布的伤口…还有他胳膊上的捕熊夹了吗？是他自己把手伸进去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name he carved in his chest? To remind him of who he is, he inflicts pain on himself to silence me, when all I try to do... Hrr!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还在胸口刻上了自己的名字，好时刻提醒自己是谁。为了不让我出声，他不断地摧残自己的肉体。而我只是想…啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a93_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...he cuts, hurts, and tries to murder me out of him. He won't succeed. Just makes me angrier.
ESP.TRADUIT: …他故意弄伤自己，就为了将我从他的身体里赶走。他不会成功的，这只会让我更加愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a93_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is the beast, we simply change cages. Like the ones here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗是一头野兽，我们只是交换了一下牢笼。 就像眼前这间笼子一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012a93_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hrnnn... will kill us both unless you do something. Never felt him so strong before, he won't listen to my voice. He's... he's...
ESP.TRADUIT: …咕…除非你找到办法，否则他会把我们都杀了。他以前从来没有这么固执，他不听我的。他…他…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hungry. Come here, or Dog will chase you, break you until you no run anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: …饿了。过来，否则狗会追你到天涯海角，直到把你腿打断，让你再也跑不动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...hrnnn... listen to you... can't hold him back much longer... tell him... to pull on his chain, as hard as...
ESP.TRADUIT: …咕…听到了吗…我再也无法阻止他了…告诉他…一定要拷上锁链，紧紧地……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Dog can. What Master wants, Dog can do. Please don't be mad with Dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: …将狗拴住。无论主人有何吩咐，狗都会去做。 请不要对狗发怒……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...live anymore. Sick of being inside, sick of hearing his stomach screaming at me, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: …不活了。 我受够了，我不想再待在里面，我也不想再听他的肚子对我叫唤而且...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Dog is tired... Dog tired of fighting, being here... Tired of you keeping Dog caged here.
ESP.TRADUIT: …狗已经厌倦了... 厌倦了厮打，厌倦了这里... 厌倦了你把狗关在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011da9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...both of us are. Tell him to listen to me. Then we can get out of this... finally... and...
ESP.TRADUIT: …我们都厌倦了。让他听我的话。只有这样，我们才能最终…解脱...并且…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011daa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...now Dog is listening to voice, your voice only.
ESP.TRADUIT: …从今往后，狗只听从你的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00011dab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nnn-nnn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00012aaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who locked you in that cage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是谁把你关在笼子里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locked myself in. Could feel myself... letting go. Dog's howling getting louder. It happens when he's hungry and no one's around to tell him... no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我自己关的。我当时觉得自己…不太稳定。狗叫得越来越凶。当他肚子饿，又没人制止他的时候，就会发生这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Amused, proud of his own cleverness initially, then starts getting more frustrated. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000103c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That name carved on your chest... are you Dog?
ESP.TRADUIT: 刻在你胸口的那个名字...你是狗么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The carving's a reminder, for mirrors and for Dog. Dog, who you heard coming in, howling and hungry, as always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刻字是为了让我照镜子时能够提醒自己，也是为了提醒狗。狗，就是你进来时听到的那个声音，他始终在饿着肚子咆哮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : He's saying "and for Dog" to himself, because he's frustrated Dog carved the name on his chest to drive him away. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000103c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声音怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the voice of reason. I sleep sometimes... down in the basement, in the cage. Now that I'm awake, Dog goes back in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的声音代表了理智。有时候…我会在地下室的笼子里沉睡。现在我醒了，狗也就回到了笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Choosing his last sentence carefully because he doesn't want to admit he's being protective, makes him seem weak. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000103c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog knows I'm here, but can't do anything about it. I'm his... conscience. Keep him tame, keep him from hurting us... doing foolish things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道我在这儿，但他奈何不了我。我是他的…良知。是我驯服了他，让他不会伤害我们…不会随意做傻事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Choosing his last sentence carefully because he doesn't want to admit he's being protective, makes him seem weak. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000103c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in the Auto-Doc?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会躺到自动医生的手术台上的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She moves her finger in a circle, frowns, then drags her hand down over her eyes. She raises them again, points to you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她用指头划了一个圈，皱了皱眉头，然后把手放下来盖住了眼睛。紧接着她又举起手，指向了你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where were you before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She moves her finger in a wider circle, then raises her hand over her eyes.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她把手指摆成更大的圈，然后把手举过双眼。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…不是很明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, looks impressed.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她点点头，似乎对你十分赞赏。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... that's a Brotherhood of Steel symbol, right? You're a Scribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等下…你比的是钢铁兄弟会的标志，对么？你是个学士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She shakes her head, then nods in the direction of the casino again.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她摇了摇头，然后又示意你看向赌场。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you cut your own hair off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以是你自己把头发剪掉的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't restore your voice, we'd need a real Auto-Doc to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没办法让你重新说话，我们得找个货真价实的自动医生来行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shivers slightly, and shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她微微颤抖着摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Auto-Doc cut your voice box, not your scalp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以自动医生割断了你的喉咙，但没有把你剃光头？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀点点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Auto-Doc didn't do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是自动医生干的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She touches one of the scars on her cheeks, shakes head. Then touches the scar on her neck, and nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摸着脸颊上的一道伤疤，摇了摇头。随后她又摸着脖子上的伤疤，点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you researching something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找什么东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you looking for something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找什么东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell did you get out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是怎么从这里出去的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shrugs. Then she points to you and shrugs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她耸耸肩，接着指了你，又耸了耸肩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [BOS] You were a Brotherhood of Steel Scribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: [钢铁兄弟会] 你以前是钢铁兄弟会的学士么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods. She looks impressed.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她点点头，似乎对你十分赞赏。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, wait, I want to hear this. You were bald before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，这件事我得搞清楚。你以前就是光头么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods with an exasperated look, then makes a circle with her hands, repeats it twice more, then raises her hands and waves them like wings.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她愤怒地点点头，然后用手反复的画了三个圈，接着举起双手，像翅膀一样挥动着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She puts both hands in front of her, then makes a motion with her hands as if writing something.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她把双手放在身前，摆了一个正在写东西的姿势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, the Auto-Doc didn't shave you bald?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，不是自动医生把你剃成光头的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She waves her hand, then shakes her head - she then nods in the direction of the casino.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摆了摆手，摇头，示意你看向赌场。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why they shaved you bald.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白他们为什么把你剃成光头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine looks blankly at you. Then touches her head, smiles, then shakes her head.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀茫然地看着你。她笑着摸了摸头，随后也摇头表示不解。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like someone set the bone saws to run random.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来是有人故意给你动刀子的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She shakes her head... then pauses, and shakes her head again, then looks exasperated.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她摇摇头，停顿了一会儿，又摇了摇头，神情显得非常愤怒。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有别的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She looks exasperated, then waves her hand in a circle in front of her.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她看起来很绝望，在身前用手挥了一个圈。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She raises an eyebrow, then tilts her head slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她竖起眉毛，头微微一歪。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, then cups her hand to her ear.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱了皱眉头，将手拱起来放在耳边。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had questions I wanted to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题想问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine glances straight up, frowns, then turns back to you and taps her wrist.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀直直的看着前方，皱了皱眉头，然后像你转过身并割了自己的手腕]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Auto-Doc really carved you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个自动医生看来把你害得不轻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods... slowly, then puts her hand in front her throat, closes it slowly, then points at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [她慢慢…点了点头，然后把手放在喉咙前，缓慢合上，又指着你]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those facial scars weren't done by the Auto-Doc - the throat scar was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你脸上的伤口和自动医生无关，但你喉咙上的伤疤是它造成的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] [She frowns, narrows her eyes, and looks at you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [她皱起眉头，眯着眼睛看着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_000103e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is where it ends, Dean, give up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到此为止了，放弃吧，迪安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can take a chump like you even if I didn't have eight lives lined up behind me, and a rising soundtrack. So put your dancing shoes on - let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付你这种级别的蠢货，我用不着八条命，也用不着播放慷慨激昂的背景音乐。既然你这么喜欢出洋相，那就来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <THEATER: Dean curses Player, getting ready to fight to the death> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001062b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get up there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么到那里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea... woke up here, thought I was dreaming for a second... right back on stage, the mic...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道….我醒来后，一开始还以为自己是在做梦…梦见自己重回舞台，拿起麦克风...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought I was back at the Fronds... well, except no audience, used to pack theaters back then... so stepped up on the stage, check things out...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至一度以为自己又回到了碎叶赌场……只是台下没有观众，我早习惯了座无虚席的剧院…于是我走上舞台，想看看究竟怎么回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010632_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then suddenly Holograms walked out of the wings... and they started raising their hands to their heads all creepy-like, not a good sign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁知那些全息影像突然就从舞台侧边冒了出来…它们一个个把双手举过头顶，那样子相当渗人，我顿时感觉非常不妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010632_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Christine after Executive Suits, killed her. Static.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 克里斯汀在行政诉讼后， 暗杀她.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Needs radio filter for this, and ambient sounds outside suites after Christine has been saved and is speaking to herself.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 需要电台渗入此内， 在克里斯汀被救并且自言自语后，让周围声音适应她的声.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Christine in Executive Suites.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频：克里斯汀在行政诉讼中.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Christine after Executive Suites, still lost voice.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频：克里斯汀在行政诉讼后， 仍然失声.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [STATIC]
ESP.TRADUIT: [静电声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001136e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001134b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it wasn't me... I have no use for your neck beyond what encircles it. The lack of screams when I finally kill you... that is what I'll regret.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，又不是我干的…我对你的脖子没有任何兴趣，除了它上面围着的那圈玩意。要是我最后杀你的时候听不到尖叫声……那我才会感到后悔呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001134c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's eyes narrow.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起了眼睛。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011345_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, that's a plus in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，在我看来这可是加分项呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011346_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine eyes narrow to slits.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀的眼睛眯成了一条线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, are you getting any shred of your voice healed up, or...? Like anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，你就没有想点办法治好自己的嗓子吗，还是说……？想过吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone wanted to cut your voice, little doll. Or they didn't finish their work, or didn't know how to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人想要让你变成哑巴，小娃娃。他们要么是没来得及这么做，要么就是不懂得该怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001134a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: If the player hasn't dropped Christine off at the Gala Event and she is alone at the fountain, this will be crackling silence.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频：如果玩家不在盛会开幕时抛下克里斯汀，并把她留在喷泉广场， 那么这将会打破宁静. >
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: After Gala Event, not Act 3 yet.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频：在盛会开幕事件后， 还没有达到3.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at the Gala Event in a "good" way, this is the signal that will play.>
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Christine is breathing slightly faster than normal, no banging or panic. She taps on metal, as if tapping a message in Morse code for "hurry up" - if EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at Gala Event and she hates the player, she'll bang on the doors of the elevator to be let out.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 如果玩家在盛会开幕事件里抛弃克里斯汀并让她怀恨在心， 她会通过重击电梯大门方式企图逃出去.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [STATIC]
ESP.TRADUIT: [静电声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001134d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Mikey, this line needs to dupe the horrible saw-like whirring sound effects of Christine's Auto-Doc in the Clinic, so the PC can track it.>
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛， 摆出了一副要开打的架势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes, gets into a combat stance.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛， 摆出了一副要开打的架势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011353_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to hurt you... yet. Much. Scars tell a story, some old, some new... and the one on the throat is fresh and red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会碰你的…至少现在不会。这些伤疤的背后似乎藏着不少故事，有些旧了，有些还很新…比如喉咙上的那些，还留着血丝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011354_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine studies Dean, frowns.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀打量着迪安，皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011357_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't... eh... don't talk much, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…呃…不太爱说话，是么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011358_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine shakes her head slowly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀缓缓的摇了摇头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, then. I'll just wallflower it over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我还是继续当个花瓶好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001135a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine frowns, tilts her head slightly.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，轻轻歪了一下脑袋。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001135c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn shame, hate to think if someone put you in there. Who bailed you out again, the new guy? Interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可怜，居然有人会把你丢在那里头。是谁放你出来的？新来的那个吗？有意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001135d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this little doll? Were you carved by a craftsman, little doll, or were you mauled by a drunk who didn't know his tools?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个小娃娃是谁？ 小娃娃，你是被工匠雕刻成这样的，还是被一个不识好歹的醉汉给弄成这样的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011352_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what's your story, beautiful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你是怎么了，美人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011356_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh... those scars? What happened, somebody... something carve you up, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……你身上那些伤疤，怎么了？是有人…故意割的，还是...?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_0001135b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: After freeing Christine, she's at the fountain or at the Clinic alone.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 在释放克里斯汀后， 她要么是在喷泉广场或者就是独自在诊所里.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_000108cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [STATIC]
ESP.TRADUIT: [静电声]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B8]NVDLC01RadioChristine) Christine's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiochr_00011355_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Dean's collar goes off, boom, flatline. No actual dialogue needed here.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 迪安的项圈炸开了，轰隆一声， 当场暴毙. 此处无声胜有声. >
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell did everyone else go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人都去哪儿了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder what happened to the suckers. Might have gotten taken away, like I did? Hnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道那几个傻瓜怎么样了。说不定也和我一样被抓走了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔。这个剧院和过去相比几乎没什么变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是不准备继续在这里表演了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First time on stage in a hundred years, and it has to be this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是我时隔百年后首次登台亮相，结果就这？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need some help here... and that audience is not looking friendly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁帮我一把…那位观众似乎不是很安分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope my partner fared better than I did... better not have left me high and dry, get-even's not going to be pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我的搭档处境比我好一些…最好别让我孤立无援，否则我做鬼也不会放过那家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That audience... better lay low, get a feel for the crowd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那位观众…最好低调一点，考虑一下周围人的感受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing, someone walks in here, they're toast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 棒极了，有人进来了，他完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... hasn't changed at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方……根本就没变嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010c1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想摆脱狗？狗可是捕猎能手。他会找到你，把你撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That a bet you want to take? Cause I'll see that and raise you a few bullets to the skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想和我赌谁的命更硬？那尽管来吧，我会用子弹在你的脑门多开几个洞的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog's been shot before, many times. Won't stop me from catching you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗以前已经被射伤过很多次。区区一点疼痛是无法阻止他追杀你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you've got this one under control because he's giving me a nasty itch on my trigger finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你好好管教一下这家伙，否则下次我一定会忍不住扣扳机的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't come all this way to get conned by some tourist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好不容易走到这一步，绝不能栽在区区一个游客手里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried).
