Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see who's holding the cards in the end...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看究竟是谁能笑到最后吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The joke's on you, "partners." You aren't getting to the prize without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是自作聪明，"伙计们"。没有我，你们拿不到大奖的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a fine how do you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可真是教人心寒哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should have blown up that seat cushion right when they sat down, would've been a better end than this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真该在那家伙坐下的时候就引爆座垫，就不会落到这个下场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just finish the last job, Dean. It's all you've wanted, just hang in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把活干完，迪安。你想要的就在眼前，再坚持一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your head down, Dean, don't let the locals see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持低调，迪安，不要让当地人看到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair, you better appreciate all I do to screw you over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱，你真该感谢我为了扳倒你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tourist is better than most. Probably won't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个游客比大多数人都强，也可能也没啥大不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Town's going to be filled with Ghosts when the sky lights up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到天亮的时候，整个镇子都会布满鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The linked collars is a new trick. Can't say I like it much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把项圈连在一起倒是个新花样。但我不喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting for the fireworks. Just like last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等着看烟花吧，就像上次一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place is going to be swarming with the masks when the sky lights up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到天亮的时候，这里的鬼人就会满大街都是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much time to get to the gates before they shut the door and turn folks away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他们关闭大门并驱散当地人之前，我们没有多少时间到达大门那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Mary, Mother, and Joe - now there's a show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的老天啊，演出开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now - I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我要离开这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Ghost People didn't know we were here before, they know now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这下鬼人可就都知道我们的位置了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone struck up the band. A band of tortured cats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 演出开始了。 简直就像是虐猫演出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of casino has two Grand Openings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的赌场会举办两次开业庆典？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your last hurrah, Sinclair, I promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱，我向你保证，这是你最后一次欢呼了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just my luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 撞了大运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luck's finally shining down on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运女神终于眷顾我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. ESP.ORIGINAL: You wait, beautiful. Keep that gate open for me, Dean'll be there soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你等着，美人儿。给我留着门，迪安马上就来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre, sweetheart, Dean's coming home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷，我的甜心，我回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop looking at me, you idiot. I can hear your stomach growling from here, I don't like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再盯着我看了，你这个大白痴。我大老远就能听到你肚子叫唤，我不喜欢这种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Dog dies in the Kitchen, boom, then flatlines, just an explosion and flatline is needed.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 疯狂死在厨房， 轰隆一声， 接下来就是死一般的寂静， 除了爆炸和死亡什么也不剩下.>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010909_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... he's asleep. Finally. Shhhhhh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我... 他睡着了。终于。嘘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after Dog's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog... all I wanted was for you to listen to me, let me care for you. Keep you from hurting yourself...
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗…我只想让你听话，让我来照顾你吧。我不想让你伤害自己…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: God is being genuine here... all he wanted to do was keep Dog out of harm's way.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I can. And one day, when you're ready, I'll let you out. When you're calm, and we... understand each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我有能力了。将来有一天，等时机成熟，等你能冷静下来，我们…可以相互理解时，我会再把你放出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after Dog's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: Calm, resolved. Loop back to the second line.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello? Voice? You there? It's Dog......Dog can hear himself. Voice is... is in cage? Locked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨？声音？你在么？ 剩下狗了...…狗只能听到自己的声音。声音…关进笼子了？被锁起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. And... hungry. More hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在狗能说话了。狗不再害怕了。 狗...很饿。比以前更饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried. The end should start sounding dangerous, like it may not have been the right thing to EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001236f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗要去找吃的…把食物嚼碎，吞掉。狗要追赶猎物，到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。狗要吃到肚子饱了为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried. This should be an uh-oh moment, as the player realizes this may not have been a good EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel strange, like... sleeping. On my neck, is this... a chain? I... what's carved on my chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好奇怪，感觉像…做梦一样。我脖子上的是…链条么？我... 我胸口刻了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012372_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "God." No... not God. Something in reverse... hnh. Was that one of them...?
ESP.TRADUIT: "神" 。不…不是神。要倒过来看…唔。哪个才是正确的呢……？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should rest, get my strength back... then explore this place, see what it holds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想先休息一下，恢复体力…再四处看看，搞清楚这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: This is delivered in God's voice, but he's calm, and both God and Dog have been submerged, this is same voice, different personality, EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012374_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...going to make casino burn, no more being...
ESP.TRADUIT: …我要烧掉赌场，不必再……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : <Script Notes: Dog and God's personality are waging war on each other in these lines - they blend the words as they fight back and forth.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012360_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
ESP.TRADUIT: …回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012361_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...can hear you now. Not much longer, not...
ESP.TRADUIT: …可以听见你了。不必了，不必了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012362_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listening to me. Tired of being your minder, tired...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 我不想再照顾你了，不想再...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012363_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
ESP.TRADUIT: …让狗沉睡了，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
ESP.TRADUIT: …保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012365_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
ESP.TRADUIT: …主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012366_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...listen to me. If you do this, we both...
ESP.TRADUIT: …听我说。 如果你这么做的话，我们 都会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012367_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
ESP.TRADUIT: …死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012368_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
ESP.TRADUIT: …救我们的。我可以帮助我们两个。如果你不肯，那你就会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00012369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. The human pulled it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。那个人类成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The human did it. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人类做到了。 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是不是朋友，都该到大门那儿去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coming for you, human... you just wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madre's mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011a38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insides growling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肚子在叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011a39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Mournful whining to self ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 自己悲泣 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011a3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011a3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Stomach rumbling.::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 胃不停地响着。::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011a3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_000119e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre's mine, my heart's right where it belongs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场是我的，我的心永远和它在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001134f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't abide it. There's no heart. You hate it, I can hear it in your words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是你的真心话。其实你讨厌这里，我可以从你的语气里听出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011350_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you need your hearing checked. Sierra Madre, it's meant for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我建议你去检查一下自己的耳朵。马德雷山脉赌场，是我命中注定的归宿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011351_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could have left the Sierra Madre. Left this Villa, joined your own kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你其实可以离开马德雷山脉赌场，离开以利亚，去找你的同类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001134e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯光在哪里？狗想看见灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to see the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好想马上见到灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Impatient Growl ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 不耐烦地嚎叫 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry up, Dog doesn't like being here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快一点，狗不喜欢待在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to go... Casin-oooo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该去...赌场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't... we do this before? Can't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以前……是不是这么干过？记不得了。

ESP.TRADUIT: 想看灯光表演，想对着它们大叫。

ESP.TRADUIT: 请放我出去。

ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. ESP.ORIGINAL: What did I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做错了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. ESP.ORIGINAL: Lights and fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯火通明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's pretty happy about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's pretty happy about it. ESP.TRADUIT: 太吵了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Master? Did Master make fires in the sky?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人在哪里？天上的烟花是主人放的么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's pretty happy about it. ESP.TRADUIT: :: 高兴地拍手 ::

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nooooooooooo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Howling, frightened. ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 吼叫，吓坏了。 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me out, let me out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我出去，放我出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. ESP.ORIGINAL: Noise hurts, noise hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噪音很吵， 很吵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. ESP.ORIGINAL: Streets are hurting my ears!
ESP.TRADUIT: 街上的声音吵得我耳朵疼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bright, too bright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太亮啦，太亮啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry, we're targets out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快一点，我们要变成活靶子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost inside. Finally. Then I can get rid of the baggage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于能进去了。接下来，我就可以抛掉这份累赘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静，狗，待在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sick of these Old World deathtraps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 受够了旧世界的这些陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre's almost mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场眼看就是我的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They better not try and leave me here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们最好不要把我丢在这里……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this festival fires, I'm the first one in the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到焰火点燃时，我要第一个跑向大门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I ever deal with human trash...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我最后一次和垃圾人类打交道了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After the Bomb, still slaves to technology, events, Pip-Boys, collars... hnnnr.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核爆以后，我们依旧被科技、娱乐、哔哔小子和项圈奴役着…哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll whip you for this, Dog. I'll crush your cage with you inside it for making me go through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，我要惩罚你。你让我受了这份罪，我要把你连同笼子一起碾碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this - if I get inside the Sierra Madre, it's all worth it. All of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受了这么多苦，只要能进入马德雷山脉赌场，那它们就是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as those collars go off... we'll settle things, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦那些项圈爆炸…事情就解决了，对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. He's angry and pissed about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The human did it. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人类做到了。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是敌是友，都该到大门那儿去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coming for you, human... you just wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madre's mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. The human pulled it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。那个人类成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gate won't be open for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门不会开太久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to know a ventriloquist with more skill than you, at least he had the sense to know his own name without carving it into his chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经认识一个比你厉害的腹语术大师。至少他记得自己的名字，不必把它刻在自己的胸口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001135f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mirrors tell me my name when needed... and I have a name for you, several. Thief, coward... showman. Radiation couldn't kill the truth, could it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只要照镜子就能知道自己的名字…但我倒是有个名字可以送给你，不，应该有好几个。小偷，懦夫…假把式。哪怕辐射也无法抹去这些事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011360_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The truth, buddy, is this: you and me, we're now family as long as we got these bowties on. So watch your mouth, you don't scare me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，眼下只有一个事实，那就是只要咱俩还戴着这个项圈，就是一条绳上的蚂蚱。所以你说话小心一点，你吓不倒我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011361_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Touched by radiation, and you choose to spend your time here. You could have just left... but you're too obsessed to let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你受了辐射，还选择留下来。你大可以直接离开…可你却痴迷于那些财宝，不肯放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_0001135e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Impatient Growl ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 不耐烦地吼叫 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Weeping. ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Whimpering ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Howling in frustration ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 沮丧地吼叫 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please let me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做错了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me out, let me out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我出去，放我出去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like this place. Want to go back, back to the base. Or the Church, miss the Church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喜欢这个地方。我想回去，回到基地。 或者教堂，我想念教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insides growling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肚子在叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Mournful whining to self ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 自己悲泣 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那声音不要再回来了，坏坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Master? Did he go away? Dog will be good this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人去哪里了？他走了么？狗下次一定会听话的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swallowed something bad. Taste like burnt wires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吞了不好的东西。味道像烧坏的电线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Stomach rumbling.::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 肚子不停地响。::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信这个白痴吞下了项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while player isn't around. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's taking that human so long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人类怎么这么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while player isn't around. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that human wasn't wearing a collar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个人类没有带项圈...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while player isn't around. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder what that human's insides would look like laid out over the fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道喷泉上面那个人类的内部构造是什么样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while player isn't around. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be able to rip the Pip-Boy off his arm without killing him. Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以在不杀他的情况下把哔哔小子从他的胳膊上扯下来。唔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while player isn't around. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air tastes like copper. Or Old World gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空气中有一股铜臭味。也许是旧世界的黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost got away... then the idiot's hunger screws it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼看就要逃出去了…那个白痴却因为饥饿掉链子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00010d67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静点，狗，在笼子里待好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B7]NVDLC01RadioDog) Dog's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodog_00011f46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember you. Who are you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不记得你，你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011370_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little slow, huh? Uh... Dean. Dean Domino. I... live here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你反应有点慢啊？呃…迪安。迪安·多米诺，我……住这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like food, smell like food. Dog - hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来挺好吃，闻起来也挺好吃。狗……饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011372_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, pal, you stay in your corner, I'll stay in mine. Do not leave me alone with this thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，朋友，你就呆那儿别乱动，我也不会乱动的，行吗？千万别让我和这东西独处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西可以让那声音离开我的脑子。当我疼痛难忍的时候，他也不能说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_0001136a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, so you're not just slow, you're screwy, too? Some crew we are... we are never getting into the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……等一下，所以你不只是反应迟钝，脑子也有问题吗？瞧瞧咱们这班人…恐怕是永远也进不了马德雷山脉赌场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_0001136b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is hungry. Tired of your voice... when do we eat?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗饿了。听你说话都累了…我们什么时候吃东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_0001136c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like the way this guy is looking at me. You better be his leash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这家伙看我的眼神。你最好拴紧他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_0001136d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell did you get this one. "Dog?" What, so you don't forget your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身上的字是从哪儿来的？"狗？" 怎么，这样你就不会忘记自己的名字了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_0001136f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so carved up - that a bear trap on your arm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么浑身伤痕累累的，你胳膊上套的是一个捕熊夹吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00011369_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think it was Spring the way tourists keep rolling in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多游客涌进来，还以为是春天来了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That one's got a head on their shoulders. For now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算来了个有点脑子了。虽然只是暂时吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope that tourist is hurrying, haven't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那个游客动作快一点，我可没那么多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least this one seems like a straight shooter. Or sucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙要么是个直肠子，要么就是个傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tourist crosses me, they'll regret it. Even if they don't, they still might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个游客竟敢惹我，他会后悔的。即使没有，也可能会后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should never have set that radio signal on repeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不该反复播放电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2B9]NVDLC01RadioDeanQuest) Dean's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radiodea_00010d10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you hear me? Signal should be stronger in here. I'll set this on loop... just in case I need to step away for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能听到吗？ 这里的信号应该强一些。我会把这段语音调成循环播放... 以免我有事不在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010955_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the bombs hit, this casino sealed up like an Emperor's tomb. If you don't know what that means, never mind, it means we're trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹落下的时候，整座赌场就像皇陵一样被牢牢封上了。如果你听不懂这句话也没关系，反正我的意思是，我们现在被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010956_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So - get the power running to the main floor. That'll open the elevators and unlock the doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你得想办法重启主楼的电力，这样电梯才会启动，各扇门的门锁也会解除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ones that didn't strip their gears when they locked into place, Old World junk. Shoddy workmanship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过也只有锁芯没断的门才能打得开，旧世界的垃圾。粗制滥造的玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010958_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the power's on, then I'll tell you your next steps. Just get this part done, and then listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等通电之后，我会告诉你下一步怎么做。先把这件事办完，再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010959_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're wondering where your crew is, well... the casino saw them as guests. Which means they all got assigned to their floor. Just like mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你的其他队友嘛…赌场把他们当成了客人，已经将他们送往不同的楼层了。就像我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about them, they're of no use if you can't get the power running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心他们，如果恢复不了电力，他们也没有用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is you for the rest of this. Which means we just need to deal with them, one by one, and then the Vault's... ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剩下的事情，我只需要你一个人来做就够了。因此我们得把其他人处理掉，然后避难所就会是……我们俩的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You got the power on, excellent. You were quite a find, glad my trap in the desert caught you before time ran out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你恢复了电力，很好。你真是个不可多得的人才，幸好我在大限将至之前，用设在沙漠里的陷阱逮到了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And also glad you didn't come across this place first, might have plundered it first... can't have that. Like at HELIOS. And Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也庆幸老天没有让你提前发现这个地方，否则也许会被你捷足先登……这可不行。太阳神一号和胡佛大坝就是前车之鉴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, setting this on repeat in case you're some idiot-savant braincase and need the reminder...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，为了避免你过于健忘，需要他人随时在耳边提醒，我已经把这段语音设为了循环播放……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010960_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my greedy friend, we've got some unfinished business. I'm not one to share, and there's loose ends we need to wrap up first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我这位嗜财如命的朋友，我们还有些事情没有完成。我这人并不喜欢同他人分享财富，所以首先，我们必须要收拾掉不必要的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010961_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest of your team is on different floors. They got assigned there, ushered there based on the casino's records as to the best "fit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的同伴们已经分散到别的楼层去了。赌场会根据记录将他们引导到“合适”的楼层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010962_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't ask me how, Pre-War casino security and escort systems aren't my specialty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别问我这是什么原理，我对战前赌场的安保和接待系统研究得并不透彻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010963_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to each floor, and kill them. I don't need them anymore... well, now that you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你就到各楼层去杀了他们。我已经不需要他们了…有你一个就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010964_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't need anyone... except each other. Together, we'll crack the Sierra Madre, and we can both leave this place behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用太多人……只要我们俩。我们携手合作，一定能破解马德雷山脉的秘密，一起离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010965_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... if anything about our little heist went smoothly, you'd go to the Vault... except it's locked by some code I'm not familiar with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了…如果这场抢劫进展顺利的话，那么接下来你就该前往避难所了...只可惜，避难所被锁上了，而加密的方式我并不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010966_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door to the casino vault is hidden in the Executive Suites, without the means to unlock it, it's useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往赌场避难所的大门就藏在行政套房里，如果没办法打开门锁，那我们所有的努力就白费了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010967_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a way to open it, bypass the code, then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到打开它的方法，破解大门的密码，然后回来向我复命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010968_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did it... a voice lock. Why would he have done that? Uh! Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你成功了…居然是声控锁。他为什么要搞这种东西？啊！算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010969_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I just need you to go below, look around. See if there's any other surprises down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我要你坐电梯下去，侦察一下里面的情况。看看有没有什么别的惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001096a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be along once you've found the Vault. No need risking myself just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你找到了金库，我就去与你会和。目前我还不想拿自己的性命开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001096b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: End of line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通话结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001095d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 出什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala Event... finally. Probably wake up half the things in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盛世庆典...终于开始了。镇上一半的鬼人大概都会被惊动吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010950_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Power's fluctuating in here... getting some systems waking up, good, good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能量出现波动…系统启动了，很好，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010951_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now all they have to do is just get here. Tired of waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他们只要进来就行了。我已经等得不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010952_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry... hurry... you just need to get inside, I'll handle the rest. Come on, you fools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点…快点…你们快进来，剩下的我来处理。来啊，你们这群蠢材。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010953_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not far now... soon, the Sierra Madre's mine. Doors won't hold open forever... just like the last time. Come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过不了多久…马德雷山脉赌场就是我的了。大门可不会一直敞开…上次也是这样。动作快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010954_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now everything's coming together...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事情终于有转机了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010945_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just need to keep their gears turning a little while longer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要让它们的齿轮再多转一会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010946_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe this old Pip-Boy saved me. Even if it led me to that damn signal in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢想信这个老旧的哔哔小子救了我。 不过也是它先害得我跟着那个该死的信号走到这儿来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him.
