(Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010947_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing the new recruit had a Pip-Boy, too, probably stole it from a Vault 21 dweller. Still, a thief's just what I need for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不错，新来的那家伙手上也有一个哔哔小子， 大概是从21号避难所的居民手里偷来的。我也正好需要一个小偷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010948_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only the others would've obeyed orders half as well as this one... should have thought of linking the collars together the first few times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前那帮人要是能和现在这家伙一样听话，哪怕就听一半……我早就该想到把项圈接在一起的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010949_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I can still hook into the Villa speakers by remote...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我依然可以远程遥控别墅区的喇叭…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Hologram tech. Worthless as security... better as weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋全息影像科技。用在安保上一文不值…更适合做武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are they doing out there. Hurry up, you idiots, I don't have a few more years to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们到底在干嘛。快一点，你们这些白痴，我可没剩下几年时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outwitted by doors. Hermetically sealed doors don't protect anyone, all they do is seal us in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居然被几道大门给难倒了。密封的门保护不了任何人，只会把我们关在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the owner tied all of this to the Gala Event, insanity... backwards thinking, having a festival be your key. No wonder the bombs fell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这儿的拥有者会将大门的开关和盛世庆典连接在一起……现在想想，居然将一场晚会作为自家开门的钥匙，难怪要挨核弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001094e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still can't figure out why I lost the signals...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是不明白我为什么会丢掉信号…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010935_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no reason why it could have gone wrong, had it all planned out... maybe it was the curse of the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能会出问题啊，一切都计划好了... 也许这就是马德雷山脉的诅咒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010936_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Cloud still in my lungs, rattling around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的毒云还在我的肺里转悠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Clatter of wrench dropping>Dammit, get back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 扳手掉下的咔嗒声>该死，给我回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010938_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 还是不明白我为什么会丢掉信号…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010939_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I installed radios in the collars, Pip-Boy's letting me pick them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我已经往项圈里安装了无线电接收器，哔哔小子可以让我找到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is 21 doing now... hnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 21号现在到底在干嘛…唔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fool better not decide to sleep. Vitals go down, I'll get someone else to do this job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那蠢货最好不要想着睡觉。要是丢了性命，我就再去找别人来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unnn... sitting too long. Damn arthritis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…坐的时间太长了。该死的关节炎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come too far to go back now. Too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走得太远，不能回头了。太远了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Going to wipe the slate clean. Kimball, the Republic... Hardin, McNamara, my "brothers." Then I'll head back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。要把他们统统消灭。金博尔，共和国…哈丁，麦克纳马拉，还有我的"兄弟们" 。然后再往西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_0001093f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better loop some instructions in case something happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好将一部分指令循环播放以备不测。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010940_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going to get inside this place if it's the last thing I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算剩下最后一口气，我也要进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010941_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Running out of volunteers. Last ones couldn't see beyond their own greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快要没有志愿者了。上一队人马被贪婪蒙蔽了双眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010942_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only people would do what I say, wouldn't need these damn collars to keep them in line. Keep going for each other's throats like dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们肯听我的话，就不需要用这些项圈来约束他们了。他们总是像狗一样互相撕咬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010943_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I... still had that damn Holorifle. Spent forever making it... need to find it when this is all done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望…那把全息步枪还在我身边。为了研制它，我花费了无数心血…等这一切都结束，我就去把它找回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([0100F2BB]NVDLC01RadioElijah) Elijah's Collar Radio Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01rad_nvdlc01radioeli_00010944_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we doing in here? Planning to toss me in a cell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来这儿干嘛？你想把我丢到牢里么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001383b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going to be sad to leave the Residential District. Well... not really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要离开住宅区了，真叫人难过啊。好吧……其实也没所谓啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure left a lot of traps around. Sometimes I forget where they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这儿确实装了很多机关，有些连我自己都忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As worse as the other places are? This section of town is the most dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和其他地方一样糟糕？小镇的这一块是最危险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to get out of here - come alone if you want, don't drag me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能在这儿待，你要来你自己来，别拉我下水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013830_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear there's a belltower and church to the North... filled with Ghost People.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说北面有座钟塔和教堂...里面全是鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013831_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cafe survived? How about that. Had great coffee - and one of the waitresses? Rhonda? Piece. Of. Work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咖啡馆居然没塌？真是不得了。这儿的咖啡挺不错的。还有个女服务员，好像叫郎达？长得可俊了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013832_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not leave me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别把我留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013835_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never liked the Chief here, real stickler for "policy."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不喜欢这里的警长，他实在太有“原则”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001383c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Made off with a lot of mines, shotguns, and explosives from here... wasn't easy with the Ghost People around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从这里顺走了不少地雷、霰弹枪和炸药……附近的鬼人不少，可累死我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001383d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a worse grease smell down here than Danny Parker's hair on Opening Night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方比丹尼·帕克首演那天晚上抹的发油还要难闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013827_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we doing here for? This place is... well, it's haunted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来这里干嘛？这个地方……这个地方闹鬼啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013828_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously, we should get out of here. The Security Holograms... shoot on sight, and you can't even hurt them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实在的，我们应该离开这里。那些安保全息影像一看到人…就会发动攻击，而你根本伤不到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013829_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salida del Sol - "Sunrise." Not much to look at now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 日出镇，现在早就看不到日出了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013836_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure came a long way to rob this place. Guess greed is in the blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大老远的跑来，就为了抢这里的宝贝。看来你真是够贪的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010c9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Breath of fresh air in here... literally. If you need to take a breather from the Cloud, this is a good spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里面…居然还有新鲜空气。如果你不想再吸毒云了，倒是可以来这儿换个环境。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013833_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be a nice place to hole up for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方不错，可以用来暂时藏身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013834_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check the fountains, might have some wishes... er, chips we can snag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看喷泉底下，说不定可以发现一些许愿的……呃，筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013837_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch the ground for bear traps and any openings for tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心地上的捕熊夹和门口的绊线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013838_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost People.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00013839_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I ever had to come here, I stuck to the overhangs and roofs - like sidewalks up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我一个人来这儿，我一定会选择爬上屋檐和屋顶，在上面穿行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001383a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a toxic ashtray down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里像个毒烟灰缸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find a way to get this place hopping again... would clean all the toxic gas out of Puesta del Sol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果能想办法让这地方重新启动…就能把日落镇里的毒气全都净化掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stinks down here. And I can barely smell anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里散发着恶臭。要知道我的嗅觉已经很差了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001382a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure glad one of us knows what you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还好我们俩中有一个人头脑清醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001097e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, this used to be a nice town. Well, nice enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道么，这镇子本来挺不错的。相当不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_0001097f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When in doubt, step quiet - and watch where you step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你犹豫了，就放慢脚步，注意脚下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where there's a bear trap, Ghost People aren't far behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有捕熊夹的地方，往往附近会有鬼人徘徊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch out if you see a prize lying around - the Ghost People leave "supplies" as traps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到地上有好东西，一定要小心，鬼人喜欢把“物资”放在地上当诱饵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010982_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting real tired of tourist season - no offense, but you guys are lowering the bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常讨厌旅游旺季，无意冒犯啊，我就是觉得你们拉低了这个地方的档次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cloud wasn't always here. Grew over the years, even without cars or factories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前没有毒云的。尽管汽车和工厂早都消失了，可毒云却还是越来越浓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010984_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre may wait. Not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算马德雷山脉屹立不倒，我也实在等不下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010986_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre's not getting any younger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉正在一天天凋敝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一步怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are idles that Dean says while he's a companion. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about the Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道更多关于你主人的情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to get to your Gala Event position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你做好启动盛世庆典的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe Dog will obey you. I'm not as easily broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许 狗会服从你。但我可不会那么轻易服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000109bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先聊到这里吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就之后再说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000109b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's this Old Man who brought us here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我们抓来的那个老头是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有问题问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000109c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有问题要问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我随时可以解答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_000109c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think it was Spring the way tourists keep rolling in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多游客涌进来，还以为是春天来了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ae7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That one's got a head on their shoulders. For now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算来了个有点脑子了。虽然只是暂时吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ae8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope that tourist is hurrying, haven't got all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那个游客动作快一点，我可没那么多时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ae9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least this one seems like a straight shooter. Or sucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙要么是仗义。要么就是个傻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010aea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tourist crosses me, they'll regret it. Even if they don't, they still might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个游客要是敢惹我，一定会后悔的。就算不惹我，可能也会吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010aeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should never have set that radio signal on repeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不该反复播放电台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010aec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's letting go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正难的是放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introend_00010aee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsta_00010aed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something... wrong in the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的味道…不太对劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dog sniffs around noticing a gas valve has been turned off.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00010b2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The quick... the quick scribe... jumped over the lazy paladin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敏捷…敏捷的学士…跳过了懒惰的圣骑士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mi-mo-mih.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咪-哞-咪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Knight Christine Royce, of the Brotherhood... Christine Royce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是兄弟会的骑士克莉丝汀·罗伊斯... 克莉丝汀·罗伊斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh... feels like a sore throat - after chewing on nails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…嗓子好像发炎了，仿佛咬了指甲似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like I smoked a mile of cigarettes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的声音听起来像个老烟鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels like the Cloud crawled in my mouth and died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉吃了一嘴的毒气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chris-tine. Chris-tine. Hello. Hello. Hello.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莉斯-汀。克莉斯-汀。喂。喂。喂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine makes a sweeping motion of the room, does a deep inhalation, then gives a thumbs up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀环顾了房子四周，深吸了一口气，竖起了大拇指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine sniffs the air, then gives a thumbs up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀对着空气嗅了嗅，竖起了大拇指。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's breathing quickens, and her eyes dart around the walls.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀呼吸变得急促，她的双眼在四周的墙壁上快速扫视着。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine seems to be sweating heavily, and her hand is twitching slightly. She looks ready to bolt.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀看起来流了很多汗，她的手轻微地抽搐着，好像时刻准备要逃。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine nods at the ground, points at her eyes, then points at the ground again, as if in warning.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀对了地面点了点头，指着她的双眼，然后又指向了地面，像是在警告什么。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine motions at ground, makes a snapping motion with her hand, then taps her eyes and pantomimes walking slowly, looking in front of her.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀指向地面，用手打了个响指。然后她敲了敲自己的眼睛，比划着蹑手蹑脚的动作，直勾勾地瞪着前方。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001386f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine scans the area. She seems on edge, checking the arcades and arches for movement.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀扫视了这个区域。她看起来很紧张，边走边检查四周的走廊和角落。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013870_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine makes a motion of loading a fake gun, then suiting up.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀做了一个给枪上膛的动作，摆好了架势。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00013871_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe I came all this way to have my voice stolen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信我走了这么远的路，居然把自己的声带给搞丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Script Notes: Christine has just gotten her voice back. It's a little sore, new, and she's testing it out. These lines would also be duped for the ra EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010b85_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what, you're going to risk blowing off your own head to kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想干嘛？难道你不惜自己脑袋开花也要杀了我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not. I'll get out in time - you won't. Once I kill you, exit stage left, and my collar will go quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我才不会死呢。我会逃出去，而你…等我杀了你，我就立刻从后台跑出去，这样我的项圈就不会爆炸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the world's a stage. Soon your brains will be all over it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界就是一个舞台，很快你的脑浆就会洒得满世界都是。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have time for the song and dance, Dean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪安，我们现在没时间手舞足蹈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you didn't do it out of the goodness of your heart. So... instead of empty words and a flourish, let me give you something more useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，你救我并不是因为大发善心，这样吧…我可以给你点实在的好处，如此一来咱俩也算互不相欠了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, lucky us. Love getting shot at by Pre-War ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我们够走运吧。老是被一帮战前的幽灵追着打。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm more about the short goodbyes than long thankful speeches... but I appreciate you bailing me out of a tight spot there - partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，虽然我这人不太擅长说客套话，但我还是要感谢你救我脱离了险境——搭档。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you didn't do it out of the goodness of your heart. So let me give you something a little more practical - a way we both come out ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，你救我并不是因为大发善心，这样吧…我可以给你点实在的好处，如此一来咱俩也算互不相欠了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b92_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Casino security hit you like it hit me when you reached the lobby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你一进大厅，保安就把你打翻了，和我一样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know what happened to the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道其他人怎么样了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you think you can take me, come down and try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就凭你也想杀我？那就来试试啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... no, no... I'm not leaving this spot. Why dirty my hands when the Sierra Madre can kill you for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不不……我才不会离开这里。何苦脏了自己的手呢？马德雷山脉赌场会替我干掉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000132ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for a little show - I'll just grab a seat and watch how this plays out from backstage. Security can handle it from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 演出要开始了，我会去后台找个地方，坐着静静欣赏的。接下来就交给保安们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dean bids farewell to the Player. The trap springs, and he retreats to the stage's scaffolding/hallways to avoid harm - Holograms are on> EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't act stupid. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别干傻事，我们一起离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid? No, playing it smart. You're the dumb one, waltzing in here without realizing who the headliner is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻事？不，我可聪明了。傻的是你，稀里糊涂地闯进来，却不知道谁才是这里的腕儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dean bids farewell to the Player. The trap springs, and he retreats to the stage's scaffolding/hallways to avoid harm - Holograms are on> EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, stabbing me in the back for the Sierra Madre?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢，你就为了马德雷山脉不惜对我痛下杀手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm the bad guy here? I'm not the one slapping bomb collars on innocent folks and flicking the switch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我卑鄙？难道给无辜的人套上炸弹项圈，还在背后偷偷拨弄开关的人是我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm not stabbing you in the back. I was facing you all the time. This heist? I planned it lifetimes ago. You and that old man? Tourists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才没有背叛你，我自始至终都和你坦诚相见。这场抢劫我已经策划了几辈子。而你和那个老头子，不过是两个过客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010b9c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry, would you? Get me out of this mess. Got to sue my agent for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，行么？ 等你救我出去，我非要把我的经纪人告上法庭不可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get me out of here, they've got me trapped!
ESP.TRADUIT: 救我出去，我被它们堵在里面了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold it together, Dean, you've been in worse jams. Like Madrid. Christ - Madrid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚持住，迪安，大风大浪都过来了，还记得马德里那场演出吗？天啊，马德里那次真是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Tries to calm himself down in the middle of being pinned down. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long you think you can keep dancing around out there? Song's going to end soon, you along with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你还可以跳多久？歌曲快放完了，你也快完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't get out of here alive. Even if you reach me, you don't have the guts to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你别想活着出去，就算你找到我，你也不敢和我打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm calling the tune here - this is my theater, my show, I've waited my life to get back here. You? Not even worth the time it'd take to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才是这里的主角，这是我的剧院，我的演出，为了回来，我已经等了大半辈子。而你，甚至不值得我浪费时间动手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010ba8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if she is alive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么如果她还活着呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then she can make some beautiful music. I'm not banking on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那她就能派上大用场，虽然我并不太抱希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're going to prove it now? How?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在要证明？怎么证明？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't know at first. Then the old man showed up. You showed up. Then... that woman showed up, covered in scars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一开始我也不明白。直到后来那个老头出现，你也出现，接着…那个浑身伤痕累累的女人也出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one who makes all the hand signs, a little tight around the corners of her mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是那个老爱打手语，嘴角有些紧绷的姑娘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I put her in the Clinic, tuned her like an instrument. If she heals up, it's not going to be her voice speaking any more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把她扔进了诊所，然后像给乐器调弦一样，对她的声道做了手术。将来如果她伤口痊愈，她的声音也会彻底变成另一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is, if the Sierra Madre didn't get her. If it did... well, there's enough of Vera around for me to spend a few years piecing a book together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然前提她得活着。但……即便她死了，这附近有关薇拉的信息也够多了，大不了我再花个几年时间，也能拼凑出一段语音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget Sinclair. If Vera was the key, she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了辛克莱吧。如果薇拉是钥匙的话，她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only saw her yesterday. Well, a few yesterdays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我昨天还看到她呢。好吧，几天前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what did he do to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可他究竟对你做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do to me? What, weren't you listening? He thought he was better than me. Don't believe me? Look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我做了什么？ 你没在听我说话吗？他自认为比我优秀。不相信么？看看这周遭的一切吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This big casino, this big colossal monument - think it was for some woman? No, all ego, all self-righteous-in-lights, fit him perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座巨大的赌场，这座雄伟的纪念碑，你以为他是为了某个女人而建的？不，这是他得意忘形、不可一世的产物，和他简直是绝配。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to take him down a few pegs, bring him down to my level. "Begin again?" Some things you don't get up from... I was going to prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须煞煞他的锐气，让他也体会一下我的处境。“从头再来“？有些事是无法从头来过的…我要证明给他看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was your problem with Sinclair?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和辛克莱有什么瓜葛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem? All high-and-mighty. Lording it over everyone. Acting so self-righteous, like nothing could touch him. He was the one with the problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓜葛？他整天摆着个破架子，在人前威风凛凛的。那副自以为是的模样，好像凡事在他眼中都不值一提。他这个人本身就有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never got mad at anything. Nothing seemed to shake him. Even after... his life kept getting dragged through the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他从来不生气，仿佛任何事情都无法撼动他。即便…他的人生一次次地遭遇挫折和变故。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always kept looking for the bright, shining future in everything. So... I decided to take everything from him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他永远是那么乐观，老把事情往好的方面想。所以…我才决定要夺走他的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bomb. Vera got sealed in here. A few hundred years go by, give-or-take. Almost the end of the story - then you came along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核战爆发，薇拉被困在了里面，然后就这么过了大概几百年。本以为故事要到此结束的时候，你出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we finish the job. Rob the Sierra Madre, rip out its heart. Last chapter of Frederick Sinclair, close the book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是该给这事画上句号了。抢劫马德雷山脉，挖出它的心脏，这是弗雷德里克·辛克莱传奇的最后一章，让我们替他写下结局吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All she had to do was get inside the Sierra Madre for the Gala, then use her voice to open the door. After that... smooth sailing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本来她只需要进入马德雷山脉赌场参加开业大秀，再用自己的声音打开避难所大门。在那之后…一切就能水到渠成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010be9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would have been the biggest heist in history. Sinclair left holding the bag. Ruined.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这原本将是有史以来规模最大的抢劫案。留给辛克莱将是一个巨大的烂摊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010be9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the history lesson, get to the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别上历史课了，说重点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair was already puppy-eyed, so all I had to do was the introductions. She smiled, fluttered her eyes, showed a little leg...
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱早就对她一见倾心了，我只不过是充当了牵线人。仅仅凭借她的一丝微笑，一次眨眼，再加一点春光乍泄…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and he built this whole place for her. Made her the key to his vault, like a joke, cause of her name. Her fake Hollywood name.
ESP.TRADUIT: …他居然就不惜代价为她修建了这整个地方。甚至还将她的声音设置成了打开避难所的钥匙，简直和玩儿似的，就因为她的名字，那个用来混迹好莱坞的假名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except Sinclair didn't know I'd been there first. I could twist her whatever direction I wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只可惜辛克莱不知道我早已捷足先登，把她捏在掌心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll head out and see what I can do on my end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我这头也努力想想办法，我先出去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go knock yourself out. I'm just going to catch my breath a bit. That performance... well, more pressure than I was expecting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去吧。让我先喘口气。刚才的表演…呃，压力实在有点大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you don't know the phrase?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你不知道那句短语是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that I still had to figure out - still do. Sinclair wrote stuff down, was obsessive about it. Just got to find where.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，也猜不出来。辛克莱把它记下来了，而且看得很紧。得找找它究竟藏在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗓音？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, the woman, the Starlet, Vera - her voice. Didn't realize there was so many holotapes of her still around, otherwise... eh, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，那个女星，薇拉，用她的声音。我没想到这里居然有这么多她的全息磁带，否则…哎，算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me. The short version.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲讲吧。简短一些就好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elevator's up in the Executive Suites. Voice-activated. Speak the right phrase, in the right tone of voice, and it's open sesame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行政套房的电梯是声控的。只要用正确的语气说出指定的短语，它的大门就会打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was able to snag the voice, or thought I had. The right tone and phrasing... well, that may take some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗓音这块，我很早就搞定了，就是出了些差池。至于正确的语气和短语... 好吧，可能需要一点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bf4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a private elevator, Sinclair's elevator. It's up in the Executive Suites, in Vera's room. Not a coincidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱有一台私人电梯。就装在行政套房，薇拉的房间里。这绝不是巧合。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010beb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vera. She was... my other partner, before the Bomb. Took some legwork. Some convincing, made it happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薇拉。她是我……在核大战前的一位朋友。我打通了不少关节，费了许多口舌，才让辛克莱对她百依百顺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010beb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine stares at the headless corpses for a second. Then she makes a slow, angry scowl.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀盯着无头尸体看了一会。然后她缓慢的、愤怒的皱起了眉头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010bfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a picture, a bunch of headless saps all waiting for the pearly gates. Whoever did this... messed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得曾经有幅画，上面是一帮没脑袋的人正排着队等着进天堂。干这事的人……做得可真糙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Dean is looking at medical stretchers with headless corpses on them. He put them there to examine, doesn't want player to know.> EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010bfb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First time on stage in a hundred years, and it has to be this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可是我时隔百年后首次登台亮相，结果就这样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。这个剧院几乎和以前一模一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell did everyone else go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人去哪儿了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need some help here... and that audience is not looking friendly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要帮助…那位观众不是很友善。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope my partner fared better than I did... better not have left me high and dry, get-even's not going to be pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我的搭档处境比我好…最好别丢下我一个人跑了，不然我做鬼都不会放过这家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔。这个剧院和过去相比几乎没什么变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place... hasn't changed at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方……根本就没变嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder what happened to the suckers. Might have gotten taken away, like I did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道那几个傻瓜怎么样了。说不定也和我一样，被抓走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That audience... better lay low, get a feel for the crowd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那位观众…最好低调一点，考虑一下周围人的感受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing, someone walks in here, they're toast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 棒极了，有人进来了，他死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以后不会在这里表演了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you come with me, whatever else you're here for, not my concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不和我一起走呢？不管你有什么问题，我都不关心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're looking for something else. Fine, I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找别的东西。好吧，我可以帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She studies you again, then her expression softens slightly. She shakes her head slowly, and gives a silent sigh.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她又一次打量着你，表情似乎缓和了一些。她慢慢摇摇头，发出了无声的叹息。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods at you, then raises an eyebrow and nods at the door.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她向你点点头，然后竖起眉毛，示意走出大门。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c3d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What exactly is wrong? Don't you want out of here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么情况？你不想离开这里么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'm not trying to order you. But your life is tied to mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不想命令你。可毕竟我们现在是一条绳子上的蚂蚱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She frowns, glances at the collar, looks back at you. She makes a circle with her hands, puts her hand over her eyes and squints.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她皱了皱眉，看了一眼项圈，又转过头来看着你。她用双手画了一个圈，然后把手放在眼睛上面眯着眼看。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [She nods at you, then lowers her hand from her eyes, shakes her head. She draws a slow line between you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她向你点点头，然后把手从眼睛上放下，摇了摇头。她缓慢地在你俩之间画了一条线。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get going. I'll meet you at the Fountain in the center of the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出发吧。我会在别墅区中心的喷泉那里等你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine gives a brief nod, then turns and begins to walk.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀微点一下头，然后转身走开了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Would hate to have carved you up anymore than you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。毕竟你都这么惨了，我也不忍心再给你多割几刀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine's defeated expression vanishes into a stone-faced glare.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀受挫的表情消失了，变成了冰冷的怒视。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad we understand each other. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理解万岁。咱们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine narrows her eyes slightly. She slowly nods, then steps slightly behind you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀微微眯起眼睛。她缓缓点头，小步在后面跟着你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Christine glances at your follower, shakes her head, then points at you, her, and nods in the direction of the fountain.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [克莉丝汀瞥了一眼你的随从，摇了摇头，然后指着你和她自己，并向喷泉的方向点了点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I let you out of the Auto-Doc. I can put you back in there just as fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是我把你从自动医生里解救出来的，我可以一样轻松的把你送回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Her eyes widen, and her eyes gauge yours. She then touches her wounds, and her expression crumbles into anger, as if defeated. She slowly nods.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她睁大双眼，死死盯着你的眼睛。接着她把手放在伤口上，表情变得十分愤怒，仿佛饱受挫折。她缓缓点头。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010c36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ... a monument to wealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: …一座为财富而造的丰碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00010c46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was built before the War, a tower of gold and lights, where fortunes could be gained and lost...
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是战前建造的，闪耀着黄金与光芒的高塔，金钱在此犹如过眼云烟……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00010c48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bright, shining monument luring treasure hunters to their doom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Foolishness about it lying in the middle of the City of the Dead, buried beneath a blood-red cloud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在死亡之城的中心，笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) NPC : Narrator [0100ADBE] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have, the legend, the curses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都听说过，无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01010A12]NVDLC01Intro) 01010A12 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01int_nvdlc01introsli_00013c60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the blazes... piece of junk! You rigged that terminal, didn't you. Didn't want security showing you out, eh? We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么…没用的垃圾！你对那台机器做了手脚！既然不肯让保安请你出去，那咱们走着瞧吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean curses, insulting the old Stage Manager's computer terminal (in the closed area of the backstage), after it blows up when he tried to use it. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Maybe I can shut down these ghosts using the Stage Manager's old termin... dammit! Well, so much for that idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。也许我可以用舞台经理的终端把这些鬼影关掉...该死！ 好吧，这个想法只能作罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean curses, insulting old Stage Manager's computer (backstage), after blows up when tried to disable Holograms. PC's only chance to escape alive. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... partner, are you a sight for sore eyes. Unfriendly crowd tonight, in a lethal way - if you could calm the house down, I'd be grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你啊…搭档，你来得真是时候。今晚来的观众都不怎么面善，甚至会要人命。如果你能让大家安静下来，我可就千恩万谢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean's anxious, hemmed in by lethal holograms set to kill, glad to see player, hoping the PC can bail him out. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey... guess who finally showed. You weren't on the guest list. Guess I'll need to call security, have them show you the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿…瞧瞧是谁来的。我可没请你啊，看来我得让保安请你出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean warns PC they made a deadly mistake coming to get him at Theater. Invites player to become acquainted with (Holograms). EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you think you have what it takes to beat me, on my stage, in my town? Come on down, we'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道……你真以为自己有本事打败我吗？在我的舞台上，我的小镇里？那就来走着瞧吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean challenges, in an act of desperation, the player to come down and hunt him. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't do it. Leave that projector alone - I'm warning you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别那么做，别碰投影仪，我警告你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean threatens PC to stop triggering the event that will disable his last line of defense against the player. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... can't leave well enough alone, have to enter Vera's room. Some things are better left in the past, "partner."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你啊……就是不懂得少管闲事，非要进薇拉的房间。过去的事，有些还是忘掉的好，“搭档”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Player enters another dressing room backstage of a long-dead starlet Dean used to know. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, now... that's my room. You want your own dressing room, you have to work for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我站住…这可是我的房间。你想要个化妆间，你自己去想办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, man... nice job. Good thing I was distracting them while you flicked them off. We're a good team - I run the show while you run the box office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…干得漂亮。调虎离山果然是个好方法。我们配合得不错，我上台演出，你负责看后场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : {Dean's jubilant when the Holograms vanish. He congratulates the player, although trying to make himself appear as having been stronger than he was i EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now calm the audience down and let's go home. And when my part plays, no cracking jokes - that was the hairstyle back then, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让观众安静下来，然后我们回家。如果到时候我的影像出现在台上，你可别笑哦，我当年的发型就是那样的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean urges the player to hurry up in disabling the Theater's Hologram security, cracks joke about seeing old self perform in holograms. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're making real progress, good. Uh, look that's... Vera's room, so careful what you touch in there, be respectful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你获得了实质性的进展，很好。呃，这…这是薇拉的房间，别乱碰里面的东西，要保持尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean excited the player is making headway, even if hesitant to share his old life's links when player discovers Vera's dressing room backstage. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you found my old room. I mean, it's a little small... and hey, watch the hands in there, I remember where I left everything, got it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你找到了我以前的化妆间。你不觉得，这里有点小吗……嘿，别乱碰，我可不想这里的摆设被人动到，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deanthea_00010c5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Meet at the Fountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。那在喷泉见咯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. If that's all, let's head out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。这就是事情的原委了？那我们上路吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. The human pulled it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。那个人类成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cc7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cc8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gate won't be open for long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门不会开太久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is watching a festival erupt in the Villa, and he's impressed the player pulled it off. He's talking to himself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010ccb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The human did it. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人类做到了。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是敌是友，都该到大门那儿去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
ESP.TRADUIT: 焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coming for you, human... you just wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来找你了，人类……等着瞧吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madre's mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God hates player. God's watching a festival erupt in the Villa, talking to himself, impressed the player pulled it off. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this festival fires, I'm the first one in the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到焰火点燃时，我要第一个跑向大门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I ever deal with human trash...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我最后一次和垃圾人类打交道了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. ESP.ORIGINAL: After the Bomb, still slaves to technology, events, Pip-Boys, collars... hnnnr.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核爆以后，我们依旧被科技、娱乐、哔哔小子和项圈奴役着…哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll whip you for this, Dog. I'll crush your cage with you inside it for making me go through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗，我要惩罚你。你让我受了这份罪，我要把你连同笼子一起碾碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event.
