ESP.ORIGINAL: All this - if I get inside the Sierra Madre, it's all worth it. All of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受了这么多苦，只要能进入马德雷山脉赌场，那它们就是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as those collars go off... we'll settle things, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦那些项圈爆炸…事情就解决了，对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God's told to wait in a dangerous area to pull a lever and trigger an event. ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry, we're targets out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快一点，我们要变成活靶子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cb0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost inside. Finally. Then I can get rid of the baggage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于能进去了。接下来，我就可以抛掉这份累赘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God has been told to wait in a dangerous area, but he understands the reason, even if it stresses him out. ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静，狗，在笼子里待好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sick of these Old World deathtraps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 受够了旧世界的这些陷阱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sierra Madre's almost mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷山脉赌场眼看就是我的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They better not try and leave me here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们最好不要把我丢在这里……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No toxins in the air in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的空气没有毒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this place has seen better days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这个地方确实有点残破。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we need to fight, you should call Dog out... as much as I hate to admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我有些不乐意…但如果我们需要战斗的话，你最好还是把狗叫出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be able to use the gas valves around here to set traps of our own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以利用这里的气阀来设计陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll need to move faster than this if we're going to outwit the Old Man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们想胜过那个老头，那我们的动作得再快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: Happy you followed the Sierra Madre broadcast? Curiosity and greed, same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着赌场的广播来这儿，你觉得开心吗？好奇心和贪念，你们都是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your own fault you're here. Couldn't leave well enough alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你落到这步田地，都是你自己一手造成的。你就是不懂得适可而止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: That Pip-Boy... maybe I'll tear it off your arm, wear it on my neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个哔哔小子……可能我会把它从你的胳膊上扯下来，戴到我的脖子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquegod\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01goddialo_00010cd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air tastes like copper. Or Old World gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空气中有一股铜臭味。也许是旧世界的黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost got away... then the idiot's hunger screws it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼看就要逃走了…那个白痴却因为饥饿掉链子了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you keep looking at your Pip-Boy? It won't help. Didn't help the Old Man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你一直在看哔哔小子？ 那玩意没用。那个老头已经受过教训了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God is making random comments while with the player. ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信这个白痴把项圈吞了下去。

ESP.TRADUIT: 请放我出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. ESP.ORIGINAL: What did I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010d04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 灯光在哪里？狗想看见灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to see the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好想马上见到灯光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Impatient Growl ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 不耐烦的嚎叫 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry up, Dog doesn't like being here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快一点，狗不喜欢待在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to go... Casin-oooo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该去...赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't... we do this before? Can't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以前……是不是这么干过？记不得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cdc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want show and lights and yelling to start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想看灯光表演，想对着它们大叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cdd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really dark down here. Smell like oil and 'tronics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里真的很黑，闻起来一股石油和电线的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog not like this place. Air smells like burnt sparks and blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗不喜欢这个地方。闻起来有一股燃烧的火苗和血液的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013872_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cafe. Food place. Maybe something in kitchen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 咖啡馆。吃饭的地方。厨房里可能会有东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013873_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喜欢这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013874_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Dog catch a Ghost in plastic, Dog tear him apart so they don't get back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗一抓住穿防护服的鬼， 就会把它们撕碎，让它们再也起不来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cf8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smells like... flesh in plastic... lots of food around here. We should catch some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闻起来像…防护服里的肉…这里有许多食物。我们应该带一些走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lots of marks on walls from other dead people. They not get far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 墙上有许多其它死掉的人留下的标记。他们没能走多远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cfb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is Master? Did he go away? Dog will be good this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主人去哪里了？他走了么？狗下次一定会听话的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swallowed something bad. Taste like burnt wires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吞了不好的东西。味道像烧坏的电线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cfd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always yell at Dog. Yell at Dog because gets hungry, can't stop it... always need more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总是骂狗。因为狗总是饿，控制不住…吃得太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010edd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insides growling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肚子叫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013875_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好饿啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013876_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't like this place. Want to go back, back to the Base. Or the Church, miss the Church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不喜欢这个地方。我想回去，回基地。 或者教堂，我想念教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013877_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air in here not burn chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的空气没有那么热了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013878_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Mournful whining to self ::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 暗自悲泣 ::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00013879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: :: Stomach rumbling.::
ESP.TRADUIT: :: 肠胃翻滚。::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_00010cfe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy Mary, Mother, and Joe - now there's a show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的老天爷啊，多么壮观的表演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much time to get to the gates before they shut the door and turn folks away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门不会开启太长时间的，他们会很快就会关门送客了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now - I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我得撤了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Ghost People didn't know we were here before, they know now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这下鬼人可就都知道我们的位置了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone struck up the band. A band of tortured cats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 演出开始了。 简直就像是虐猫演出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of casino has two Grand Openings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的赌场会举办两次开业庆典？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ce9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your last hurrah, Sinclair, I promise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你最后一次出风头了，辛克莱，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just my luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可真走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ceb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luck's finally shining down on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运最终降临到了我的头上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wait, beautiful. Keep that gate open for me, Dean'll be there soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等着，美人儿。替我留门，迪安马上就来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010ced_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre, sweetheart, Dean's coming home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷宝贝儿，我回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dean is commenting on fireworks display in the sky, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Mixed feelings about it. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sinclair, you better appreciate all I do to screw you over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辛克莱，你真该感谢我为了扳倒你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That tourist is better than most. Eh... probably won't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个游客比大多数人都强，也可能也没啥大不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The linked collars is a new trick. Can't say I like it much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把项圈连在一起倒是个新花样。但我不喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waiting for the fireworks. Just like last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等着看烟花吧，就像上次一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place is going to be swarming with the masks when the sky lights up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到天亮的时候，这里的鬼人就会满大街都是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, but confident in the player. Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010d0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see who's holding the cards in the end...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看究竟是谁能笑到最后吧……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't come all this way to get conned by some tourist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好不容易走到这一步，绝不能栽在区区一个游客手里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The joke's on you, "partners." You aren't getting to the prize without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这是自作聪明，"伙计们"。没有我，你们拿不到大奖的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a fine how do you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可真是教人心寒哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should have blown up that seat cushion right when they sat down, would've been a better end than this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真该在那家伙刚坐下的时候就引爆座垫，也就不会落到这步田地了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just finish the last job, Dean. It's all you've wanted, just hang in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把活干完，迪安。你想要的就在眼前，再坚持一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your head down, Dean, don't let the locals see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持低调，迪安，不要让当地人看到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Town's going to be filled with Ghosts when the sky lights up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等到天亮的时候，整个镇子都会布满鬼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Forced to stand and wait in a dangerous area, irritated about it (and worried). Dean is talking to himself in these lines. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010cf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This thing on my neck isn't for show. That bomb goes off, so do I - and you, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我脖子上的东西可不是拿来好看的。如果我的炸弹爆炸了，你的也会炸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leaving me in that goddamn elevator in the dark? You'll beg me to do the same to you while the Holograms are tracing lasers across your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然把我丢在黑漆漆的电梯里？等那些全息影像发出的激光照到你的脸上，你想求我把你塞进电梯里都来不及了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010d99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So come on and get me, jackass. I'll have this floor's security dissect you like an Auto-Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来杀我啊，笨蛋。我要让这层的安全系统像自动医生一样把你大卸八块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010d9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So come on and get me, bitch. I'll have this floor's security dissect you like an Auto-Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来杀我啊，婊子。我要让这层的安全系统像自动医生一样把你大卸八块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010d9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should be able to rewire them, failing that, shoot them, although that'll alert the others, they're on a linked patrol pattern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该可以篡改它们的程序，如果不行，用枪也可以，不过这可能会惊动其它影像，因为它们的巡逻路线是互联的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010d98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All doors are locked down, security's activated - and emitter signals are lighting up all over this floor. I'll do what I can from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的门都锁上了，安全系统已经启动，这一层所有的投影仪都被打开了。我会尽量想想办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) NPC : Broken Intercom [0100AD99] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : <Christine's is determined, building strength - she's going all military precision here, even with wounded voice.> EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00010d97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why pipe not break. Pipe. Break. Hnh. Leave it, not important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么管子没有裂。管子，裂啊。唔，算了，也没那么重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : < Dog notices the valve has been reinforced by the player. "Why won't you break?!" > EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00010da6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, looks like you already forced the gate. Now, everybody and their mother can walk right in, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看来你已经把门撬开了啊。 多亏了你，现在任何阿猫阿狗都可以闯进来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010edc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have to take the long way back - there's a shortcut across the way, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用走那么大老远的路回去，其实有一条捷径的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010eda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's through the Cloud - but if I'm with you, I can help you through it. If you didn't already force the lock to the gate, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然需要穿过毒云，但只要有我在，我可以帮你过去。不过前提是，你没有把大门的锁撬开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_00010eda_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Dean, I wouldn't leave you here, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 迪安，我不会把你丢在这里，我发誓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, nice words, nice promises... not worth a dime out here in the shadow of the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，各种花言巧语…在马德雷山脉赌场面前一毛钱都不值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say you wouldn't leave me here, I know better. And you leave me here, this Gala Event isn't going to happen, I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说不会把我丢在这里，但我心里可门清着呢。你要是不把我丢在这里，这盛世庆典就无法举行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to let any harm come to you, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会让你受伤的，好么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... you're not the type, but accidents happen, good intentions or no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是...你确实不会，可就算你是真心的，谁知道会不会出意外呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? That wasn't the "we're both bomb-married" talk you gave me when we first met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？咱们刚见面时，你还说咱俩是“一条绳上的蚂蚱”呢，这会儿就变口风了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you could offer me a steel clad contract for a world tour of all major cities with Imperial Records, I still wouldn't stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，就算你有本事拉来帝王唱片公司给我一份天价合同，让我到全世界各大城市巡演，我也坚决不留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dean Domino [010012FE] (mod) Quest : ([01001302]NVDLC01DeanDialogue) Dean Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniquedean\nvdlc01dea_nvdlc01deandial_000133b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Less painful would be me throwing you off the roof. Understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要痛快点，最简单就是我把你从房顶扔下去。明白么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pipe stay broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管子。继续裂啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Fixed" a pipe, had just twisted it closed, wants it to stay broken so the gas flow is uninterrupted. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00010f53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pipe needs to behave, or Dog will hurt pipe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 管子要乖乖听话，不然狗就教训管子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : "Fixed" a pipe, had just twisted it closed, wants it to stay broken so the gas flow is uninterrupted. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00011d26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All better. Pipe be good now, keep hissing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啦。管子乖，嘶嘶响就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Equivalent of "That's better." EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_00010f54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sound like the woman in the Sierra Madre broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声音听起来很像马德雷广播站里的那个女的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I? It sounds off to my ears... hard to tell. Not to mention it... hurts like hell to swallow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是么? 可我倒是听着有点怪…不过也分辨不出来。更别说我的喉咙……疼得厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Thinking. In second part, referring to the skeleton in the bedroom with her, dead. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001106f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be why I got moved off to this suite... it's hers. That's her over there, got trapped by security like I did. Just took a different way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这就是我会被抬到这个套房里来的原因…这是她本来的住所。她人还在那里，也和我一样，被安保系统困住，但最后她选择了自我了断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Thinking. In second part, referring to the skeleton in the bedroom with her, dead. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001106f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't the one hiding all this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老躲着的人又不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure needed it to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来你要靠它才能逃出生天啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Proud that you have one? I can hear the superiority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你很得意自己手里有一台吗？我都能听出你话里的优越感了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_00011c64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That thing on your wrist - it's a convenience. It tells you where to go, what to do, dulls your brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手上戴的那东西，实在是过于方便了。它告诉你该去哪里，该干什么，你的大脑因此而变得迟钝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may have helped you find the Sierra Madre broadcast, but it's just as much a crutch today as it was in the Old World.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然它帮你接收到了马德雷山脉赌场发出的信号，但这东西现在的作用和它在旧世界时差不多，只是一种工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you access my Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么连上我的哔哔小子的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You speak as if your fingers have never touched the keys of a RobCo terminal. No machine is foolproof, they are designed to obey us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我说你从来没有碰过罗伯科公司生产的终端。只要是机器，就能被破解，因为它们被制造出来的目的就是为我们服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Pip-Boy's operating system has vulnerabilities... advantages to those who've studied its construction, even superficially.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哔哔小子的操作系统存在许多漏洞……凡是研究过其架构的人，哪怕只是略知皮毛，都可以利用这些漏洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just a machine, though. Its real vulnerability is who wears it. And that's how you were caught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，机器到头来只是机器罢了。真正的漏洞其实是它的主人。这就是你被抓到这儿来的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still hiding behind images and screens, I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么你还躲在这张大脸盘子后边呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hiding? Hardly. Trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲？不。确切说是被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you were the first one to unlock the casino door? No, I did it... with other hands, other bodies. After that, the casino wouldn't let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你以为你是第一个打开赌场大门的人吗？不，是我……还有其他人。然而赌场却不肯放我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I was locked in, no way out... until your Pip-Boy signal came to life in the Villa. Then... then, uh, things changed. And here you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被锁在里面，没法出去……直到你的哔哔小子发出的信号传到了别墅区。然后…然后，呃，事情才有了转机。所以你才会出现在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a lot to answer for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的很多事情都是你造成的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I? For what? Your greed? Curiosity? You came here on your own, no one held a gun to your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是么？我造成了什么？你的贪婪？你的好奇心？是你自己要来这儿的，可没人用枪逼着你来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen your Pip-Boy archives, your map markers and notes - you picked up the Sierra Madre signal just as I did, you couldn't resist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经看过了你哔哔小子里的记录，还有你在地图上做的标记，和所有的笔记。你和我一样，收到了马德雷山脉的信号，就无法抗拒诱惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you feel I have a lot to answer for... no, the blame isn't on my shoulders. Might as well have put the collar on yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果你把我当成罪魁祸首……不，责任不在 我。倒不如说是你自己把项圈套在脖子上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (mod) Quest : ([01001305]NVDLC01ElijahDialogue) Father Elijah Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01maleuniqueelijah\nvdlc01eli_nvdlc01elijahdi_0001120c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a chance he'll see reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以和他讲讲道理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and reason with him, see what happens. He's so lost in his technology, I don't think he even understands why anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就去和他聊大道理呗，看他会有什么反应。他过度沉迷于各种科技，我甚至怀疑他自己都搞不清楚为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011213_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sympathized? Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 同情你？为啥？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said he understood what it meant to track someone who had such a... impact on his past life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他能理解我，追杀一个对自己的人生有着如此巨大……影响的人，会是怎样一种感受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011212_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said people were like couriers, sometimes never understanding the messages they brought. That's who he was hunting for... some courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说其实人人都像邮差，有时自己身上带着某种信息，却对此一无所知。 而他也在追踪…一个邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011212_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knew Elijah? How?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怎么会认识以利亚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No idea. A courier. Wore an Old World flag on his back. He was the one who pulled me out there, told me where Elijah had gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不清楚。那人是个邮差。背上贴着旧世界的旗帜。就是他把我从大空山里救出来的，他还告诉了我以利亚的下落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001120b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helped me heal up, listened to my story. He... sympathized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他甚至帮我疗伤，听我说了自己的身世。他是个非常有同情心的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001120b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said he knew you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他认识你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He saw me, before the scars, at a place far from here. It's where he found some of the technology he uses now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他确实见到过我，那时我还不是这副伤痕累累的模样。他现在使用的一些科技正是从那里找来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011209_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a place called the Big Empty. The name's deceptive - if you know where to look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那地方叫大空山。对于不了解其缘由的人来说，这个名字颇有迷惑性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011209_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost got trapped there. There was someone else, though, who came along. Knew about Elijah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点被困在那儿。不过后来又出现了另外一个人，他也认识以利亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011209_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Settle it?" You're here to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: "干掉？"你是来杀他的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those are my orders. I've seen what he's done, and I believe in those orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接到的命令就是这个。我见识过他的所作所为，我相信这道命令是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011210_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你和他有个人恩怨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He... cut me off from someone I cared about a long time ago. He used his status to break us apart. So I had to find a new purpose, same banner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他…很久以前，让我和心上人强行断绝了关系。甚至不惜动用权势来逼我们分手。所以我只能申请调去了兄弟会的其他部门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011214_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then he became unstable, left a trail of crimes across the wasteland. Once word reached us, I was ordered to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后来他的神智越来越不稳定，在废土上犯下了一连串的罪行。我们得知这些情况后，上级就命令我杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you been hunting him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你追捕他多久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too long. Thought I might have had a chance to settle it before this event happened, but then the chance slipped away again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久了。我本来想在这件事发生前就将他干掉，可后来我又一次错失了良机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011217_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator to the vault is here, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往避难所的电梯也在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The elevator to the casino vault is here. In the starlet's room? That seems intimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往赌场避难所的电梯就在这里？在这女明星的房间里？他们的关系还真是紧密啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_0001120a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that your voice is back, what did you want to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你把声音找回来了，你现在想说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your voice... is that the Starlet's voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的声音…是那个女明星的声音么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess the Sierra Madre healed me. It doesn't matter, and to be honest, I miss my voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是马德雷山脉赌场治愈了我。无所谓，说实话，我很想念自己的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had enough of you and Elijah running the show. Now it's my turn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经受够了被你和以利亚来回使唤。现在该我教训你们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010012FF] (mod) Quest : ([01001303]NVDLC01ChristineDialogue) Christine Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01femaleuniquechristine\nvdlc01chr_nvdlc01christin_00011211_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People missing heads... make mistake coming here. Make Dog hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好多没有头的人…他们不该来这里的。狗觉得饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Dog sees some headless corpses laid out on clinic tables. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogdialo_0001121c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like someone was experimenting... although they were doing so after the collars went off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎有人曾经在这个地方做实验……是为了测试项圈爆炸后的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : God [0100E413] (mod) NPC : Dog [01001301] (mod) Quest : ([01001304]NVDLC01DogDialogue) Dog/God Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : God sees a series of headless corpses laid on lab tables. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\deadmoney.esm\nvdlc01creatureuniquedog\nvdlc01dog_nvdlc01dogkitch_0001121d_1.ogg
